




























































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Ikhitabu eikya khikolo eikya Yeisu Klisiti mwana va Ibrahimu.
U Ibrahimu ale vise va Isakha, nu Isakha ale vise va Yakobo, nu Yakobo ale vise va Yuda nu vukolo vake.
UYuta ale vise va Pelesi nu Sera khwa Tamali, uPelesi vise va Hezeloni, nu Hezeloni vise va Ramu.
U Ramu ale vise va Aminadabu, Aminadabu vise va Nashoni, nu Nashoni vise va Salimoni.
U Salimoni vise va Boazi khwa Rahabu, u Boazi vise va Obedi khwa Luti, u Obedi vise va Yese,
u Yese ale vise vantwa u Daudi. U Daudi ale vise va Sulemani khu dala va Uria.
U Sulemani ale vise va Rehoboamu, Rehoboamu vise va Abiya, Abiya vise va Asa.
U Asa ale vise va Yehoshafati, Yehoshafati vise va Yoramu, nu Yoramu vise va Uzia.
U Uzia ale vise va Yothamu, u Yothamu vise va Ahazi, Ahazi vise va Hezekia.
U Hezekia ale vise va Manase, u Manase vise va Amoni nu Amoni vise va Yosia.
U Yosia vise va Yekonia na vavahave useikhi ugwa khutoliwa ukhuluta khu Babeli.
Va vile vatoliwe ukhuluta khu Babeli, u Yekonia ale visa va Shatieli, Shatieli ale khukhuye va Zerubabeli.
U Zerubabeli ale vise va Abiudi, Abiudi u vise va Eliakimu, u Eliakimu vise va Azori.
Azori vise va Zadoki, nu Zadoki vise va Akimu, nu Akimu vise va Eliudi.
U Eliudi ale vise va Elieza, nu Elieza vise va Matani nu Matani vise va Yakobo.
UYakobo vise va Yosefu ugosi va Maliya uvi umwene UYesu aholiwe, uveikhilangiwa vei Kilisite.
Ifivumbukhu fyooni ukhuhuma khwa Ibrahimu impakha khwa Daudi fyale ifivumbukhu kumi ni fine, ukihuhuma khwa Davidi impakha ukhutoliwa ukhuluta khu Babeli ifivu mbukhu kumi ni fine nu khutoliwa ukhuhuma khu Bababeli impakha kwa kilisite ifivumbukhu kumi ni fine.
Ukhuholiwa khwa Yeisu khwale nde. Umamaye, UMaliya, UYosefu, vu ahilikhe eindanda sakha, vuva khamale ukhutolana pu UMaliya akhavonekha ukhuta aleinonehigo mumakha ga mepo umbalanche.
Ugosi va mwene u Yosefu ale munu golofu sanogwe ukhukoncha isoni pa vanu. Pu akhalamula ukhundekha u ng'eincha va mwene khuvutitu avanu khitaluanya.
Pu avile isaga ndavule usuhwa Vantwa akhambonekhela mu njosi, akhata, “Yosefu mwana va Daudi, ulekhe ukhudwaada ukhutola uMaliyamu ndu dala vakho, ulwa khuva unchigo ugwaleinagwo gwa makha gamepo umbalanche.
Puyaihola umwana udeemi puyavukhupa eitawa lya mwene vei Yesu, ulwa khuva ayikuvapo kha avanu va mwene.”
Aga gooni gahumile ukhuvonesya khila eikhikhyanchoviwe nu Ntwa ukhugendela munya malago vuita,
“Lola, ung'enja uvisagonile nu gosi lusikhu pu iva nu chigo nu khuhola umwana udeemi, puvikhumwilangaga eilitawa lya mwene Imanueli”— khukhuta uNguluve paninie nufwe.”
U Yosefu akhasisimukha mutulu nukhugaha nduvu usuhwa va Nguluve ambulile ukhuta atole ave idala va mwene.
Pu leino sa gone nave impakha avile aholile umwana udeemi pu akhamwilanga eitawa lya mwene vei Yesu.
U Yesu avile aholiwe mu Bethelehemu ya vayuta mufigono fya Nkuludeva u Herode, avanu avamanyi va nondwe ukhuhuma khuvuhumo wa linchuva vakhafikha khu Yerusalemu vakhata,
“Aleindakhu umwene uviaholiwe unkuludeva vava yuta? Tuvye tuyeiwene einondwe ya mwene khuvuhumo wa linchuva nufwe pu twinchile khukhumwimikha.”
Useikhi ugu unkuludeva u Helode aviile apulikhe akhakalala, na yei Yelusalemu yooni paninie na yumwene.
U Helode akhavalundania avavaha vava tekhenchi vooni na visimbi va vanu, pu akhavuncha, “U Klisiti ayoiholiwa ndakhu?”
Vakhambula, “Mu Bethelehemu yava yuta, ulwa khuva vuyisimbiwe nu nyamalago.
Nuve Bethelehemu, mukhilunga eikya va yuta suleideebe muvalongonchi vava Yuta, pakhuva ukhuhuma khulyuve ikhwincha umbaha uviyakhiva ikhuvadeemaga avanu vango Israeli.”
Pu leino u Helode akhaviilanga avamanyi va nondwe khuvutitu akhavavuncha gyu seikhi guleikhu ugu einondwe yeivile yeivonikhe.
Akhavasuha khu Bethelehemu, akhata, “Mlutage einjila eiyie mkhavunche fincho umwana uvyaholiwe. Pu mungambone mwinche mumbule ukhuta nayune puninche neimwimeekhe.”
Puvavile vapuleihinche unkuludeva puva khava vanu va khuluta, pu einondwe yeila uyuvakhayiwene khuvuhumo wa linchuva yeikhavalongolela impakha upu ya eimile pala upu umwana uvyaholiwe upu ale.
Useikhi uguvayiewene einondwe va howikhe fincho.
Vakhingeila munyumba puvakhambona umwana nu mamaye u Mariamu. Vakhamwinamila nukhumwimekha, vakhavopola ifipakho fyavo vakhambonola uluvonolo ulwa lutalama, uvufumba ni mono inonu.
U Nguluve akhavavula munjosi valekhe ukhukilivukha khwa Helode, puvakhahega ukhuluta khumyavoyo puvakhagenda einjila eiyeinge.
Puva viile vahegile, usuhwa vantwa akhambonekhela u Yosefu munjosi nu khuta, “Wime, utole umwana nu mamaye pumunyileile khu Misiri. Muve khukhukhwa impakha yakhiva nikhuvavula ulwa khuva u Helode ilonda ukhwangamencha umwana.
Ikilo eiyo pu u Yosefu akhasisimukha nukhutola umwana nu mamaye pu vakhanyileila khu Misili.
Atamile ukhu impakha u Helode avile afwile. Eiyie puyiekhavombekha nduvu uNtwa anchovile ukhugendela khu nyamalago, “Ukhuhuma khu Misili ni mwilangile u manango.”
Pu u Helode aviile awene akalaliwe na vanu avamanyi va vanu avamanyi va nondwe avipile fincho. Pu akhalageila ukhubudiwa avana vooni avadeemi avu vaale mu Bethelehemu na vooni avuvale nkilunga khila avanya miakha givili na pasi pa miakha eigyo ukhukongana nu seikhi ugu amalile ukhulumanya khuvamanyi va nondwe.
Leino pulikha leikwilanile eilimenyu leila eileilyanchoviwe nu ndomo gwa nyamalago u Yelemia,
“Eingolo ya puleikhikhe khu Ramah, eikhileilo nu lyoveelo uluvaha, u Raheli wikhuva leileila avana va mwene pu akhabeela ukhunchesiwa ulwa khuva vasipali hange.”
U Helode avile afwile, lola usuhwa va Ntwa akhambonekhela u Yosefu mu njosi ukhu khu Misili nu khuta,
“Wime utole umwana nu vanina pu mlutage mukhilunga eikya mu Israeli ulwa khuva avakhalondaga uwumi wa mwana vafwile.”
U Yosefu akhima akhatola umwana na vanina puvakhincha mukhilunga ikhya mu Israeli.
Puleino aviile apulikhe ukhuta u Arikelau ale mbaha va valongonchi khuva Yuta ahalile pa vise va mwene u Helode, adwaadile fincho ukhuluta ukhwa. Pu uNguluve avile ambulaninche munjosi akhahega ukhuluta khukhilunga eikhya khu Galilaya
pu akhaluta khutama mumbunchege uwa khu Nazareti. Pu ukhuta leivombekhe eilimenyu leila eili lyamalile ukhunchoviwa navanyamalago ukhuta ayikhelangiwagwa Mnazareti.
Pu mufigono fila u Yohana uveiaonchaga aleikhulumbelila munyikha incha va Yuta,
“Mpelage inongwa ulwa khuva uludeeva lwa khukyanya lu leipipi.”
Ulwa khuva uyu vei mwene anchoviwe nu nyamalago u Isaya aleikhuta, “Ngolo ya munu uvei alei ndukungu, munonchage einjeila ya Ntwa, mgolosyage umwa khuluta umwene.”
Leino u Yohana aafwalile amanchwa ga ngamia nu lukata lwa ngwembe mukhi vina khya mwene. Eikhya khulya khya mwene khyale imanji nu wuukhe uwa mumisitu.
Pu ei Yelusalemu, ni Yuta yooni ni khilunga khyoni eikhinchungula ulugasi ulwa Yolodani pu valei khunduteila umwene.
Puvaleikhyonchiwa nu mwene mundugasi ulwa Yolodani khunu vipela inogwa nchaavo.
Puleino avile avawene ava falisayo na vasadukayo valeikhwincha khumwene khukhyonchiwa akhava vula akhata, “Umwe mwiva khivumbukhu khya njokha veeni uvei ava vuulile umwe ukhukimbela uluviipo uluyakhiva lwikhwincha?
Muvoniage eisekhe inchino gelanile nu vupeli.
Pu mulekhe avange ndyumwe ukhusaga nu khwincho fanja, 'Tuleinave u Ibrahimu ndu daada yeito.' Ulwa khuva u Nguluve avahile ukhumwimekhila umwana ukhuhuma mumawe aga.
Einjunu puyeimalile ukhuveikhiwa mfikolo fya mabeikhi. Puleino khila beikhi ugu sagu houpa isekhe inonu pu gugeidiwaga nukhu laheila mu mwoto.
Pu une nikhuvoncha na magasi savuli ya khupela. Pu leino umwene uveikhwincha musana ndyune vei mbaha ukhunduteiila une, na yune saneinogile ukhugega ifilato fya mwene. Pu umwene ikhuvonchaga khu mepo umbalanche nu mwoto.
Uvie umwene ulupeetelo luleimavokho nu mwene pwi nonchaga fincho eikhyaalo khya mwene nukhulundania einganu mukhibaana khya mwene. Pu leino amapuna pwi nyanyaga mu mwoto ugusagwinchima.
Pu u Yesu akhincha ukhuhuma khu Galilaya impakha khulugasi ulwa Yolodani khukhyonchiwa nu Yohana.
Puleino u Yohana aleikhunogwa ukhu beencha aleikhuta, “Une ninogwa ukhyonchiwa nuve, uve puvukhwincha khulyune?”
U Yesu akha mwanda akhata, “Weideekhe ulu leino ulwa khuva yeilondiwa ukhutekhelesya eilweli yooni.'” Pu akhamweideekha.
Pu aviile amalile ukhyonchiwa, pu u Yesu akhahuma mumagasi, pu u Yesu akhahuma mumagasi, pu nilola ikyanya nchikhade indukha. Pu akhambona umepo va Nguluve vu ikhwincha ndei khihwani khya ngundya pukhikhalitama pa mwene.
Lola, eingolo eikhahuma khukyanya eiyiita, “Uyu vei manango ugane, uveinihovokha fincho nu mwene.”
Pu leino u Yesu akhalongonjwa nu Mepo impakha khu lukungu ukhuta ageliwe nu tavangwa.
Pu akhideenda ukhulya isikhu alubaini pamusi na pakilo, pu akhipuleikha einchala.
Pu leino ugeli akhincha pwakhambula akhata, “Unave uve ulie mwana va Nguluve gavale amaganga aga gave fisyesye.”
Pu Yesu akhamwamula akhata, “Yeisimbiwe u munu sayitamaga ni khisyesye khyeene khisita limenyu eilihuma mndomo gwa Nguluve.”
Pu utavangwa akhangileikha muvunchenge uvuvalanche pu akhambeikha patembile baho pa hungile fincho,
pu akhambula akhata, “Ungave uve uleimwana va Nguluve, weilaheile pasi ulwa khuva yeisimbiwe ikhuvavula avasuhwa vamwene vikhu khyupeila mumavokho ga va veene, ulekhe ukhukuvala eikhilunde khyakho muliwe.”
U Yesu akhambula akhata, “Yeisimbiwe, 'Ulekhe ukhugela uNtwa vakho u Nguluve.”
Pu leino, utavangwa akhaatola nu khumbeikha baho pahangile ukhuluteilila fincho pu akhambonesya uvukuludeeva wooni uwa kilunga nuvunonu wa incho nchooni.
Pu akhambula akhata, “Punikhukhupa eikhyuma khyooni ikhi ungave vukhunyimikhaga nu khwisuya khulyune.”
Pu uYesu akhambula akhata, “Lutaga uhege apa, veitavangwa pakhuva yeisimbiwe umwimikhage uNtwa uNguluve vankho nukhumbombela umwene mwene.”
Pu utavangwa akhandekha, pu lola avasuhwa vakhincha vakhambombelela.
Pu uYesu avile apulikhe ukhuta uYohana va mwibite akhahega nu khuluta khu Galilaya.
Akhahega khu Nazareti pwa khaluta khutama khu Kaperanaumu, eiyileikhunji mnyanja ya Galilaya, ukhupakhana ni khilunga eikhya Zabuloni nu Naftali.
Eiyi yahumile ewo ukhuvonesya eikhyukhyanchoviwe nu nyamalago u Isaya,
“Mu mbunchenge uwa Zabuloni nu vunchenge wa Naftali, ukhulonha khunyanja eimwambo ya Yolodani, Galilaya ya vapanji!
Avanu avatamile muhisi valuwene ulumuli uluvaha, na vala ava vatamile muhisi ya vufwe mumbeene ulumuli luvamulikhe.”
Ukhuhuma apo u Yeu akhatengula ukhulumbeileila nukhuta, “Mpelage imbivi pakhuva uludeeva ulwa khukyanya lulipipi.”
Avile igenda mundukanji mwanyanja ya Galilaya, akhavavona avana munu vaveili, u Simoni uvie ailangiwagwa Petro, nu Andreya umbahave, valie khutega inyaafu munyanja ulwa khuva vale valovi va somba.
U Yesu akhavavula, “Mwinchage mang'ongage, punikhuvaveikha valovi va vanu.”
Khimbeivimbeivi vakhanchilekha inyaafu pu vakhakonga.
Nu Yesu akhaluta pakhimbale akhavavona avana munu vaveili, u Yakobo umwana va Zebedayo, nu Yohana umbahave, vaale muwaato nu Zebedayo u vise vavo vahonaga inyaafu nchaavo akhavielanga,
akhaseikhi ndakhuleikhu vakhavulekha uwato paninie nayu vise vavo vakhakonga.
Pu uYesu agendile mu Galilaya pakhasigala padebe ukhumala yooni, pwaleikhu manyisya mumasinagogi gaavo nukhulumbeileila eilivangeili lya ludeva nu khuponia uvutamu uvulipapingi mumbano.
Pu ikhulongu ncha mwene chikha vaala mu Siria mwoni, pu avanu vakhincha vooni avuvale nuvutam uvalipapingi uvu wa pelaga uluvavo, uvavale ni mepo imbivi na vanyaligonchi na vavo vafwile eiganji emiveili gyavo.
Ni fipuga fingi ifya vanu filikhukonga ukhuhuma khu Galilaya na khudekapuli mu Yelusalemu na mbu Yuta nu khuhuma eimwambo ya mu Yolodani.
Navope aviile avawene ifipugu fya vanu akhatoga khukhyamba. Pu avile amalile ukhulama, avakongi va mwene vakhincha.
Pwakha deendula undomo gwa mwene akhanja ukhuvamanyisya, nu khuta,
“Huba vala avaganchu va numbula manya uluudeva lwa khukyanya lwavo.
Huba avanya lususuvalo, manya avo yaviachesiwagwa.
Huba avanyakhisa, manya avo vala khihala ikhilunga.
Huba avanya njala ni khyumilwa ikhya yeilweli, manya avo valigutaga.
Huba vula avanya lusyikhilo manya avo valasyeikhiliwagwa.
Huba avanya numbula inonu manya avo yavikhumbona uNguluve.
Huba avavisayania, manya avo vikhilangiwagwa vana va Nguluve.
Huba avaviveipeiliwa savuli ya vuyeilweli manya uludeeva lwa khukyanya lwavo.
Huba umwe yumwe avanu yavikhuvadukhaga nukhuvapa uluvungu nukhuva uvuvivi umwe nukhuvadelela savuli yango.
Muhovokhage nukhulu lutila, manya ulutalama lwinyo luvaha khukyanya ulwa khuva vuyeilievyo avanu vava vungaga avanya malago avuvalekhyo umwe vu mukhanale.
Umwe mulei mwoyo gwa khilunga. Pu einave umwinyo guyanchinche uvunonu wa gwene, pu yiva ndakhikhi ukhuta yuve nonu khange? Pu nalusikhu sagwiva nonu khu khinu eikhinge khyukhyoni, puleino pugwiva gwa khutaga khunji nukhukadiwa na vanu.
Umwe muleilumuli lwa khilunga. Uvunchege uwuvunchengiwa pakyanya pakhyamba savufihama.
Na vavanu saviwasya einyali nu khuveikha pasi pakhisanja, pu vi veikha pavuhagufu, puyikhuva muleikhaga voni avahei mgati munyumba.
Pumululekhe ulumuli lwenyo lumuleikhage mbulongolo mu vanu munjeila eiya khuta avanu vanchivonage imbombo inonu ndyumwe nu khumwimikha uDaada yeinyo uva khukyanya.
Mlekhe ukhuta ninchile khudenya ululageilo vave vuvanya malago saninchile khudenya punichele khwinoncha nukhugolosya.
Pu lweli nikhuvavula ukhuta pu napakha ikyanya ni khilunga fyooni filute, khisikhuli eikhigelelo nakhimo eikhya lulagilo ulu yakhiva lwihega, pu mpakha apo upoyakhiva khila khinu khiva khikwilanile.
Pu leino umunu uveiavenchaga uveideenya ululagilo uludeebe loninie mundagilo inchi nukhuvanyisya akange ukhudeenya uywa puikhilangiwaga ideebe muludeva lwa khukyanya. Pu ula uveikhunchibata nukhuvamanyisya avange uywa ikhilangiwaga imbaha muludeeva lwa khukyanya.
Manya nikhuvavula ukhuta einave uvugolofu weinyo savulutiila, mumbogolofu wa vasimbi va kalata na Vafalisyao, pusamuleingile lusikhu mundudeeva ulwa khukyanya.
Mupoulikhe ukhuta avanu ava khatale vavuliwe ukhuta, ulahudaga nu munu ubudi panogile ukhuheigiwa.'
Pu leino une nikhuvavula ukhuta umunu unyaluviipo khu niine punogile ukhuheigiwa, umunu uveikhinchifula nukhusula ulukololwe panugile ukhuheigiwa palulundamano lwa vaheigi nu munu uveikotola vivakhulahiwa mundugadu ncho ulwa mwoto ukali.
Puleino unave vuheileikha isadakha ya panekhelo yakhutekhela khuntwa, punakhumbukhe ukhuta uleininogwa nu lukololwo ikuta nuve,
pu yeilekhe isadakha eiyo pala panekhelo, pu beite tasi ukhideehane nulukololwo, pukilivukhe khwilaha isadakha yakho.
Weideehane nu munu uveitutile inogwa khumwene, weideikhe khimbeivi mbeive vumuleimunjeila mwiluta khubalasa, pu unave savukhwidehana nave munjei pu ula uveiutulile einongwa khumwene avahile ukhukhulekha khumbaha vavuheigi wa nongwa pu ula ikhukhuheilikha mmavokho ga vasikhali puvikhukhudeindeila mundu pala nie minyololo.
Pu weideikhe ukhu nalusikhu sakha khudekhepele winchiga ukungiwe mulamula vusuhombile eihela ya mwene impakha yakhiva vuhomba yooni.
Mupulikhe ukhuta, linchoviwe eilita ulaligupaga.'
Pu une nikhuvavula niita umunu ikhundola udala mumbunogwe uywa amalile ukhuligupa nave munumbula ya mwene.
Enave eiliho lyakho eilya khundyo likhukhupela uvunangi pu uleihenche utage khuvutali nuve. Ulwa khuva huba uve mbula khamagikha khaninie. Pu umbeili gwakho gwooni gulekhe ukhutagiwa mundugaduncho la mwoto.
Pu ni khivokho khyakho eikhya khundyo khinga khupele uvunangi pugeide, utage khutali nuve. Manya panogile uve mbulakhimagikha khininie, pu umbeili gwakho gyooni gulekhe ukhutagiwa mundugaduncho lwa mwoto.
Leinchoviwe eilita, uveihumya udala nukhupa eikalata eiyiita niswimile udala uyu.'
Pu une nikhuvavula niita, uveihumya udala va mwene vusaligwipe, pu ikhupela aveindigu na vanu avange pu umunu uveitola udala uvalekhiwe nu gosi va mwene uywa pu iva iligupa nave.
Mupulikhe ukhuta, vavuliwe ava viise veinyo ukhuta, 'Ulekhe ukhwijiega mbudesi, pu umwe mweijiagage khu Ntwa kwene uvwayeilweli.
Pu une leino nikhuvavula niita, muleijieguga na padebe, khumela nu khuta manya nakhukyanya, ulwa khuva khyukhigoda eikhya Nguluve;
Khive mukhilunga manya pupakhuvikha amalunde ga mwene, yeive mwu mu Jelusalemu, pakhuva wuvunchenge uwankuludeva umbaha.
Khyumela nukhwijiega pakhuta, manya neilie nuntwe manya neilieninchwele pakhuva sawigela nukhupela ate uluywilei hata lumo ukhuta luve lu valafu yeive luve lutitu.
Pu amamenyu geinyo gavenchage ga khuta, 'Ena, enave mukhweideihana, mutenchage khyomela enave samukhwi deihana.' Pa khuva agaluteilile pa ago gihuma mundugu.
Mupulikhe lisimbiwe eilita ukhwita, vuleila eiliho pa liho, eilino pa lino.'
Pu leino une nikhuvavula niita, mulakilanaga nu munu umbivi; pu umunu anakhutove ni lipi khuvunchuga waakho uluvafu ulwa khundyo pupinchage nuluvafu ulunge lwope atove.
Pu umunu anakhuheileikhe pavuheigi apokhe umwenda gwakho pu upinchage na gugunge.
Pu ula uveikhukhyumeilincha ukhugenda nu mwene eimaili yeimo pu gende nave imaili eveili.
Pu ula uveikhudova ifya khudova upeinchage, ula uveidova ukole upe ulekhe ukhusyetukhila khungosi.
Mu pulikhe leisimbiwe eilita uganage unino, unsoulage utavangwa.'
Pu une nikhuvavula niita muvaganage avatavangwa veinyo, muvadovelage ulusayo vala avikhuvakotola muvavombelage inonu na vala vavo vavansoulile,
pu muvenchaga vaana va Daada yeinyo uva khukyanya. Pakhuva umwene ikhuva muleikhila eilinchuva avavivi na vanonu, ifula ya mwene yeitima khu vagolofu navatava vagolofu.
Pumunave mukhuvagana vala vavo vavaganile umwe, pu muhombiwa khinukheikhi? Avasangunchi voope nchusavivoomba ndincho?
Hange munave musamusania mwivana munu yumwe, pu muvomba khinu khikhi ukhuluteila? Pu! avanu avapanchi nchu savivoomba ndiincho?
Pu umwe muvenchage vagolofu nduvu u Dada yeinyo uvakhukyanya umwavelile igolofu.
Mweilolage mulekhe ukhuvomba uvugolofu weinyo pamiho ga vanu ukhuta nuvonekhe khuvene, pu munave mwigaha ewo pusamwikava uluhombo kwa Daada yeinyo uvaleikhukyanya.
Puleino vuleipakhuhumya isadakha yakho pulekhe ukhunkuva eingalape yuve nukhwiginia nduvu avanu avadesi umuvigahila munyumba ncha khwisayeila ukhuta avanu puvavakele, pu ncha yilweli. Lweli nikhuvavula niita, pu viva vakavie hani uluhombo lwavo.
Pu uve vuwihumya, isadakha yakho ikhivookho khyakho eikhyaheigi kheilekhe ukhulumanya khila eikhyukhi vombiwa nei khivookho eikhyakhundyo,
eisadukha yakho ukhuta puyivenchage ya khuvutitu. Pu uDada vakho uveilola nifyakhuvutitu veikhukhupa uluhombo lwakho.
Pu useikhi uguvukhisaya, ulekhe ukhuvanda vadesi, ulwa khuva vinogwa ukhwima nukhwisaya manyumba icnha khwisayeila na munjeila inchilekhehine ukhuta avanu puvavavone, lweli nukhuva vulela vamalile ukhukava uluhombo lwavo.
Pu leino uve vuleipakhwisaya iengeila mukhiyumba khyakho. Deinda ulwinchi puwisayage kwa Daada vakho uvyalei khuvutitu. U Daada vakho uvei ilola khuvutitu ikhukhupa uluhombo.
Nu pumwiva pakhwisaya pumulekhe ukhupwateila nduvu vipwateila avakaya pakhuva avene puvisaga viita vanapwatage amamenyu gavo pugipuleikhikha.
Pu mulekhe ukhuhwanana navo, ulwa khuva u Daada yeinyo agamanyile ugumulonda vu mukhaale ukhudova.
Pu umwe vumukhisaya mwisayage mtenchage: Daada veito vakhukyanya, eilitawa lyakho leivalanchiwe.
Uludeeva lwakho lwinchage, uvunogwe vwakho vukongiwagwe pasi apa nda khuyanya.
Utupinchange ifinu fyieto ifya eilelo iyi.
Utusyiekhilage inogwa ncheito, ndufwe vutukhuvasyiekhila avanyanogwa khulyufwe.
Ulekhe ukhutuveikha palugelu, pu utupokhe pa mbivi, pu uludeva lwakho na makha gakho nu vudwadwa vwakho sikhu nchooni.
Munave mukhavasyiekhila avanu inongwa nchavo, pu uDaada veinyo uva khukyanya voope ikhuvasyiekhilaga inongwa ncheinyo.
Pu leino munave samukhuvasyiekhila avanu pu nayu, daada yeinyo sakhavasyeikhile inongwa ncheinyo.
Pu unave weideindile ukhulya savuli ya khisaya, pulekhe ukhuguva khu miho pakhuva nukhikoncha isoni, mulekhe ukhuva nda vanu avadesi umuvigahila viguva khumiho ukhuta avanu puvavavone ukhuta vadeendile ukhulya savuli ya khwisaya. Pu lweli nikhuva vula vumalile ukhukava uluhombo lwavo.
Pu uve upuwiva udeindile savuli ya kwisaya, bakha imono untwe gwakho pu ukalave na khumiho.
Pu sayikhavonekhe khuvanu ukhuta ue udeindile savuli ya khwisaya. Pu yimanyekhikha kwene khwa Daada vakho uveilola khuvutitu veikhukhupa uluhombo.
Khyomela ukhwilundikhila ifyuma fyakho mukhilunga umu, umuimikoswe nu husu yinangania hange avalyasi puvibomola nukhuhincha.
Eikhivaha mwilundikhilage ikhibana khyinyo khukyanya ifyuma ifyumwi kava, pakhuva khukyanya ingoswe neihusu sayinanga, upu navava valyasi savigela ukhuhincha nukhunanga.
Pakhuva ikhibano khya fyuma fyakho upukhileipwo, pu apo na yeinumbula yakho puyileipwo.
Eliho nyali ya mbeili gwakho. Pu leino, inave eiliho lyakho linonu umbele gwakho gwooni gwiva nulumuli.
Pu einave eiliho livivi, na ngumbeili gwakho gwiva neihisi. Pu leino einave ulumuli lulwa lulei mugati mundyuve luvye hisi fincho, pu hisi mu khigelelo khikhi!
Asikhuli nayumo uveigela ukhuvavombela avankuludeva vaveili, ulwa khuva pwayi khukalaleila yumo nukhugana uyunge. Hamuwezi kumtumikia Mungu na mali.
Pu leino nikhukhuvula ulekhe ukhwigatancha nukhusaga pa wumi vwakho, pakhuta yawilya khiikhi, ya winywa khiikhi, nu mbeili gwakho ya vufwala khiikhi. Pu! Uwumi savululeilile pa khya khulya nu mbeili gululeilile pafyakhufwala?
Mulolage ifidege ifya khukyanya. Safileima hange safibena, pu safilu ndania nukhuveikha nkibana, pu u Daada yeinyo uvakhukyanya ukhufileisya ifyo. Umwe pusamuluteilile khufyene?
Pu veeni mundyumwe uveigeila ukhwiyongelencha ikhigono khimo muwumi wa mwene?
Pu khikhi mwiva na masago gakhwisagila pa mienda gya khu fwala? Mulole khiluhala uvuluva mufyalo umuvudaleila. Savuvomba mbombo hange savukhifwaheincha.
Pu neipinchige nikhuva vula niita, na yu Sulemani mumbuvaha wamwene wooni safwale lusikhu ndu vuluva uvu na vumo.
Einave uNguluve ifwaleincha ewo eilinyasi mufyalo, leilyo litama isikhu yeimo pukhilavo gilahiwa mumwoto, pu mukhigelelo khileikhu ayikhuvafwaleincha umwe, umwe mwei vayikhuvafwaleincha umwe, umwe mwei vanyalweidekho ludeebe?
Pu leino niita khyomela ukhwisagila nukhula, 'Pu ya twilya khiikhi?' Pu ya twinywa khiikhi?” Pu ya tufwala khiikhi?”
Ulwa khuva avankhilunga, avakaya vikhufilonda ifinu ndiifi, nu Daada yeinyo uva khukyanya alumanyile ukhata mulonda ifinu ifyo.
Pu leino mulondage uludeeva lwa mwene taasi nuvwayeilweli vwa mwene pu ifinge fyooni ukhuvongelenchaga.
Pu ulekhe ukhwisagila savuli ya khilavo, pakhuva ifya khilavo fikhisageila fyeene. Ifigono fyooni umufikyiela filinincha fyene.
Khomela ukhuhiga pakhuva nayumwe malahigiwa.
Pakhuva eimihigile gila igyumwihegiwa vulevule. Pu nakhikhigelelo eikhumu gelela avange nayumwe mulageliwagwa mueikhyo.
Pu khikhi wilola akhalagaleilo akhalagile muliho lya nino, pu leino salumanyile ukhuta muliho lyakho muleikhi lagaleila khya gubeikhi uguvaha?
Pu wiva na makhamakhi agakhunchova khunino ukhuta ukhi nikhuhenche akhalagaleila mu liho la nino vu uve muliho lyakho muleigulagalila uguvaha?
Uleidesi uve; puhenche tasi ugulaga leila muliho lyakho, pu leino wiva na makha gakhuhencha akhalagaleila muliho lya nino.
Khyomela ukhunchipa imbwa ifinu ifivalanche, hange khyomela ukhunchilahila ingube inyambo. Pakhuva inchene pu yachikanda inyambo eincho na malunde ga nchene nukhuvasyetukhila nukhuva niefulania.
Pudovage puvupewa. Ulondage, puvukhufivonaga. Hodenchaga, nuve puvudeinduliwagwa.
Pu ula uveidova ikyupeleilaga. Nula uveilonda ikhufivonaga, nu umunu uveikohona eideinduliwa.
Pu khulei munu veeni khulyumwe uvei anave umwana va mwene idova eikhisyesye pwi khupa eiliwe?
Pu anave idova eisomba, ikhupa pu ikhupa einjokha?
Pu leino, einave umwe mwivavivi lyooni mukhimanyile ukhuvapa avana veinyo ifinu ifinonu pu u Daada yeinyo uvakhukyanya alekhe ukhuvapa umwe ifinu ifinonu ukhuluteileila ifyumudova khumwene?
Savuli ga eiyo, upuwinogwa ukhuta avanu vavavombelage umwe inonu nayumwe pumuvombage vulevule. Pakhuva eiyo lyu lulageli na vanyamalago.
Mwingeilage na ndyango ufinye, ulwa khuva undyango mwelefu na yeinjeila nyeleefu eiyuyiluta khuvuyagi, hange pu vingi avigenda munjeila einyelefu.
Ifinye undyango ifinye nu einjeila yiebanelinchiwe eiyo yiluta khuwumi na veene avikhuyeivona vadebe fincho.
Mwivandeikhe nukhwilolela navanya malago avavudesi, vavo vikhwincha puvafwalile eingwembe ya ng'osi, humbe leinu eilyulibuda avanu.
Pu mukhuvamanyaga musekhe nchavo. Pu leino avanu vitungula amasilu mu mitwinyo? Pu umunu itungula ncha kuyu pamatula?
Vuvuwa umbeikhi unonu guhupa isekhe inonu, nu ubeikhi umbivi guhupa isekhe imbivi.
Ubeikhi unonu saguhupa lusikhu isekhe imbivi, nu beikhi umbeivi nalusikhu saguhupa isekhe inonu.
Ubeikhi gula ugusaguhupa isekhe inonu gwakhudumula, nukhutaga mu mwoto.
Pu leino niita mukhuvamanyagamusekhe nchavo.
Mulekhe ukhuta vala vooni avuvii, 'Inkhuludeva, Inkhuludeva,' khuntwa vuvalingeila khukyanya ndeili, pu ula uveivomba nchila inchinogelanile pa Daada vava lingila khukyanya.
Pu avanu vingi pa khigono eikyo valata, 'Inkhuludeva, Inkhuludeva, salulikhulangula munditavwa lyakho, satulikhutuleikhumya munditawa lyakho? ifidego satuleikhuvomba munditavwa lyakho?'
Pusanilavafihe nilavavula pava valafu ukhuta, 'Samvanyile umwe! Muhege palyune mwemvivombeile imbivi mwimukhale nalubedo!'
Pu leino, umunu uveipuleikha eilimenya lyango nukhukonga pu ihwana naga nu munu unyaluhala uveanchengile einyumba palinalawe.
Pu eifula yeikhatima ingasi nchikhadeiga gukhuyila ukulugutu gukhakula einyumba eila, pusayagwe pasi, ulwa khuva yanchengiwe palunalawe.
Pu ula uveipuleikha eilimenyu lyango sikhuleikonga, pwihwanana nu munu unchimu uveianchengile einyumba ya mwene palusanga.
Eifula yeikhincha yeikhatima fincho amagasi gakhadeiga ukulugutu gukhuyeila gukhapula einyumba yeila yeikhagwa eikhutuveili khikhadang'alukha.”
Pu gukhafikhe useikhe ugu u Yesu akhava amalile ukhunchova amamenyu aga, pu avanyalulundamano vadegile fincho ulumanyisyo lwa mwene,
ulwa khuva amanyisye ndu munu umwene vutwa.
Pu umwene avile ikhile ukhuhuma pakhyamba, avanyalulundamano vingi vakongile.
Pu lola, akhincha umunu unyabuuba, akhata, “Nkhuludeva unave winogwa wimonie uvutamu.”
U yesu pwakhagolosya ikhivokho khyamwene akhamwabasya akhata, “Ninogwa upone. Pu akhapona useikhe gulagula ibuuba.
Pu u Yesu akhambula akhata, “Lola khyomela ukhumbula umunu eikhidego eikhi. Pu lutage ukhivonesye khuntekhenchi, pukhahumye neinekhelo nduva alagile u Mose muvamanyile avane”
Pu uYesu avile afikhe khu Kapernaumu, pu undongonchi vavasikhali akhincha khumwene,
pu leino unchongonchi ula akhasimelencha akhata, “'Veinkuludeva, umunu vango aleipa kaya alambalieile igona umbeili gwa mwene gufwe eiganji hange aleinuluvavo fincho.”
Pu u Yesu akhambula akhata, “'Nikhwinja neinjaveile apone”.
Pu ula undongonchi vavasikhali akhamwamula akhata, “Inkhuludeva, vango sapanogile ukhuta uve wingile mukaya yango, pu ni doova unchove eilimenyu vuvule pu umbombi vango ipona.
Ulwa khuva une na yune neilimunu neiveikhivwe pulungonchi vwa vasikhali ava valipasi palyune. Nei ngale khyuyu “'Luta' khuvuleive, pu iluta 'Vuvule' pu khuyunga neingate inchaga khunu ikhwincha vuvule, hange umunu umbombi vango neingate,' vomba eikheive puivomba vuvule.
Pu u Yesu vuapulikhe ndavule adegilee fincho nukhuvavula avakongaga akhata, “Ncha yeilweli nikhuvavula, saneigelile lusikhu umunu unya lweideikho ndulu mu Israeli eiyei yooni.
Nune nikhuvavula eiyakhuta avingi valahuma khuvuhumo wa linchuva na khuvusemo wa linchuva, valatama pupaninie nu Abrahimu, nu Isaka, nu Yakobo, pakhulya ifinu mundudeeva lwa khukyanya.
Pu leino avene avana valudeeva vala lahwagwa muhisi ya khunji, pu ukhwa khulava neikhileilo nu lugaduncho lwa meno.”
Na voope uYesu akhambula undongonchi vavasikhali akhata, “Lutaga! puyive nduvunchovile ukhuta umunu umbombi vakho apane, Ukhukongana nu lweidekho lwakho.” Pu leino umbimbi va mwene akhapona useikhe gulagula.
Pu uYesu akhafikha khukaya ya Petro, pwakhambuna unkwive va Petro vaninemwa va dala va mwene, igona pakhihaga aleineimungu.
Pu uYesu akhamwabasia ikhivokho khya mwene imungu puyeikhandekha.
Pu pakhimihe vukhwilile pu avanu vakhavagega vavingi avavule ni mepo imbivi. Akhandimenyu lya mwene akhavaponia vooni avo vale vatamu hange vatokhile.
Pu yeikhava limalile ukhuvombekha eiliemenyu leila ilyanchoviwagwa nu nyamalago u Isaya, eilyakhuta umwene avatulile uvudekhedekhe vwito, nu vutamu vwito wooni avupeimbeile”
Pu umwene u Yesu avile avwene ikhipuga khya vanu vuvingi vanchungutile akhavavula nuvalagila ukhuta tuvukhe tulovokhe khumwambo khunyanja eiyamu Galilaya.
Pu umunu uyungu usimbi vakalata akhandutila uYesu, pwakhata, veimanyisi uve nikhukhukonga khyoni ukhuwiluta.”
U Yesu akhamwamula akhata, “Amakave galeinamaguli umwakhugona ifidege fyope filinuvufumba, pu umwana vanya munu aleinchila pakhuveikha uluvafu nukhuhagalila untwe.”
Ukongi va mwene uyunge akhambula akhata, “Nkuludeva, nidova nilute nikhasyile u Daada.” Pu u Yesu akhata,
“Ung'ongage une uvalekhe avafwile vasyiilage vavo.”
U Yesu akhingeila muliboti, avakongi va mwene vakhakonga.
Lola inyanja yikhahambukha vu umbelo guleikhukulugata neimepo yale mbaha fincho. Pu leino u Yesu agonelile utulu.
Avakongi vakhanduteila vakhasisimula nukhata, gwe Nkhuludeva utupokhe ufwe tuleivanya khyongomela munyanja.
U Yesu akhavavula akhata khiikhi muleivadwaanchi umwe, khikhi mulei nulwidikho ludebe umwe?” Akhasisimukha, pu akhava munu va khutama khu kulugutu ugunya mepo eiyinya mbelo uguleikhupiga eiliboti pu einyanja yeikhalitama,
avanu vooni vakhadeya nukhuta umunu uyu aleinamakha makhi, hange aleindakhikhi pakhuva ukulugutu gwa mepo eiyinyambelo gyope gukhudwaada?”
Pu useikhi ugu uYesu avile alutile khumwambo khu khilunga eikhya vaMagadala, valepo na vanu vaveili avanya mepo imbivi vakhaganila nave. Avanu avo vahumile khumapumba pu valeikhuvagatancha fincho avanu, pa navava gendanjeila savaleikhugenda einjeila yeila.
Lola, puvakhovela eilimenyu vakhaya, “Tuleinakhikhi nuve vei mwana va Nguluve? Winchile apa pakhuta kineila vu pakhale useikhi sagufikhe?”
Pu kwale neikhipuga khya ngube pu nchale pipi navo, hange valepo na vadeimi vagube,
imepo imbivi punchilikhukuta khwa Yesu ukhuta. “Pu ungave ulwamwile ukhutuhumya utuheileikhe magubenchila.”
Pu uYesu akhata, “Lutaga!” Pu imepo imbivi nchikhahuma khu vanu vala nukhunchikhingeila khugube. Lola eikhipuga khyoni khikhikha ukhuhuma khukhyamba leikhaluta nukhwingila munyanja punchikhafwa mumagosi.
Pu leina avadeimi vagube vakhanyila ukhuvuya, vavile vafikhe khu vanchege vwa vanu vakhayavula nchooni inchuvanchiwene na vavanu avanya mepo imbivi.
Lola, uvunchenge wooni wa vanu vakhincha khukhwaganila nu Yesu. Vaveile va mbwene vakhasimeileincha ahegage nu khilunga khyavo.
Pu u Yesu akhingila mundiboti, pwakhalovoka nukhufikha mumbunchege uwamyave.
Lola, pakhincha avanu vagegile umunu uvyafwe eiganji vugoninche pa khihaga puvakhapimba. Pu uYesu akhaluvona ulweideikho lwavo. u Yesu akhambula utamu ula akhata, “Manango uve nuluhekhelo weikanganche, usyeikhiliwe inongwa nchakho”
Lola, pu avamanyi vakalata vaninie vakhinchofanja munumbula nchavo, vakhata uyu eikhubeiga lweli unguluke”
U Yesu akhagamanya amasege ugu visaga pwa khata, “Khikhi musaga uvuvivi munumbula ncheinyo?
Pu lilele leileikhu neigate usyeikhiwe inongwa nchakho nukhuta ima ugendage?'
Puleino mulumanye ukhuta umwana vanyamunu veimwene uveisyeikhila inongwa (Pu ikhumbula ula utamu) hega weitwikhe eikhihaga khyakho ulutage khukaya yakho.”
Pu umunu ula uveifwele eiganji akhima nukhuhega ukhuluta khukaya ya mwene.
Pu ikhipuga khya vaanu khyooni vavile valolile ndavule puvakhadwada hange nukhuginia uNguluve uvei avapeile avanu amakha aga leidavule.
Pu uYesu avile eigeinda ukhuhuma pala akhambona umunu eilitawa ale vei Mathayo, atamile pavusangunchi wa songo. Pu akhambula, “Ung'ongage une” Voope akhima nukhukonga.
Pu u Yesu avile atamile pasi ukhuta alavukhe eikhya khulya munyumba, vakhincha avasangunchi va songo vuviingi na vanu avatula nogwa vakhalya pupaninie nu Yesu eikhya khulya hange na vavakonge vamwene.
Pu avafalisayo vavile valolile ndavule, puvakhavavala avakongi vakhata “Khikhi umanyisi veinyo ahanga eikhyakhulya navusangunchi va songo na vanu avatula nongwa?”
U Yesu avile apulikhe ewo na vope pu akhata “Avanu vavosavatamu vukafu pa mbeili vusavilonda unyakhuvayavila, pu vala vavo vatamu vu avo veilonda unyakhuvaya veila.
Pupanogile mulute mukhamanyile khukhuta khikhi amamenyu aga, “Nilonda eikhisa sanilonda isadakha ya nekhelo.
Leino puvukhincha avakongi va Yohana vakhavuncha vakhata, “Khikhi ufwe nava Falisayo khikhe tukhufilekha ifinu ukhulya, pu avakongi vakho savikhufilekha?”
U Yesu akhavavula akhata, avanu vavo veilangiwe khuvulegulani puvisusuvalaga ndakhikhi vuvalei nutegula ndala? Lakini siku zinakuja ambapo Bwana arusi atachukuliwa kutoka kwao, na ndipo watakapofunga.
Asikhuli umunu uveivekha eikhikata eikhipya pa mwenda unkulu, ulwa khuva khila eikhikata ekhipya khipapukha pamwenda unkulu.
Vusikhuli avanu avaviveikha unekhe ugwa masilu puvidudeileila mupakho unkulu, einave viveikha ifipakho fila pufiniefukha amasilu gidudeikha. Ndeili unekhe gwa masilu vidudeila mumipakho eimipya eigya musilu, pu fyoni fiva finonu vuvule.
U Yesu avile aleipakhuvavula inchi lola pwakhincha umbaha vava manyisi pwaleikhufu gafuga pu Yesu aleikhuta, “Umwaleivango afwile akhaseikhi akha leino, puwinche siwo uveikhe eikhivokho khyakho pamwene pu inchukha iva mwumi.
Pu uYesu akhima akhanda ukhukonga navakongi va mwene vakhalongonjana.
Pu lola, udala umo uvei ale khwimali eimyakha eikhinchigo neigeiveili akhahegelela pa Yesu khusana pu akhabasya eikhilundwa khya mwene khu malunde.
Pakhuva ainchofanjinche munumbula ya mwene akhata, “Puninave nikhwabasya khyene eikhilundwa khya mwene punipona.”
U Yesu pwakhava munu vakhusye tukha khusana pwakhambona akhata, “Mwaleivango weikanganche einumbula ulweideikho lwakho lukhuponinche.
Pu uYesu avile afikhe khukaya ya mbaha vava manyisi puakha vavona ikhipuga khya vanu nava nkhuva fiwiwi ni nyovelo imbaha.
Pu akhata, “Muhege apa pakhuva umanango safwile, pu agonelile vuvule. Pu avene vakhahekha nu khubeida.
Avanu vala vavile vahumile khunji, pu u Yesu akhingeila khugati akhamwibata eikhivokho umwana ula akhima.
Pu einongwa inchi nchikha daala nukhupulikhikha mukhilunga khyoni eikhavanhenge vula.
U Yesu vuahumile pala iluta khuvunye pu avanu vaveili avabofwile amiho vakhincha, vakhakonga, puvakhava vanu vakhyova nukhuta, “Vei mwana va Daudi, utuleileilage eikhisa.”
U Yesu avile ingile munyumba vala avabofwile amiho vakhincha khwa Yesu, pu akhavavula akhata, “Mukweideikha ukhuta nikhimanyile ukhuvomba einchumsagile?” Pu avene vakhambula vakhata “Ena, Nkuludeva”
Pu u Yesu akhavabasya amiho gavo akhata “Vuyeivombekhe ewo nduvumweideikhe ulweidekho lweinyo.”
Pu amiho gavo gakhadeindukha. Nu Yesu pwakhavataneila fincho ukhuta, “Mweilolelage umunu na yumo alekhe ukhulumanya inchivombikhe khulyumwe.”
Pu leino avanu vala vakhahega vuva humile khunji puvaleikhuva vula avanu voni vakhalumanya mukhilunga eikhya vunchenge wooni.
Pu vavile viluta lola pwavanu vakhagega umunu uveisinchova ahuliwe ndu munu avaleikhinunu, ulwa khuva ale ni mepo imbivi.
Imepo imbivi nchavile nchihegile pu akhanda ukhunchova, avale pa khipuga vakhaswiga fincho nukhuta eili satugele tuleivone mu Israeli.
Pu leino avafalisayo puvaleikhuta ihumya imepo imbivi mumakha gambaha va mepo imbivi.”
Pu uYesu pwaleikhunchungula mbunchenge uvuvaha nuvudebe akhamala wooni vuimanyisya munyumba nchavo inchakhwisayila pwaleikhuvavula inongwa inonu inchaludeva pwalikhuvania avanu voni avuvale vatamu nuvulemale uvuleipapingi.
Vu avile akhuvalola eikhipuga khya vanu akhava kolela eikhisa ulwa khuva vatokhile nukhwihasania ndi ng'osi inchilimbula deimi.
Pu akhavavula avakongi vamwene akhata. “Imbene nyingi fincho pu leino avabeni vadebe.
Pu leino mudovage khu mwene mbene avasuhage avabeni mumbene ya mwene.”
Pu u Yesu akhaveilanga avakongi va mwene vooni eikhinchigo nafive ile pupaninie akhavapa amakhaga khuhencha imepo imbivi nukhuponia uvutamu nuvulema wooni.
Amatawa gavene avapositili eikhinchigo nafiveili gu aga. Utanchi ale vei Simoni (uveiva mwilangaga Petro), eilinge eilitawa, nu Andrea ununa va Yakobo unya Zebedayo, nu Yohana unu nave:
Nu Philipo, nu Bartelemayo, Thomaso, nu Mathayo usangunchi va songo, nu Ykobo unya Alfayo, nu Tadeo,
nu Simoni uva Mukananayo, nu Yuta uva muiskariote, uveiasambukhile uNkuludeva.
Avakongi ava khinchigo nafiveili vu avasuhile akhata khuvakaya mulekhe ukhuluta hange mumbunche vwa vasamaliya indekhe ukhwingila.
Pu beitage khung'osi incha Vaislaeli avayagile.
Vu mwiluta indumbeileilage ukhuta uludeva lwa khukyanya luhegelile.'
Muponiage avatamu munchusyage avatamu, mukhavaponiage nukhuva valancha avanya buuba nukhuhencha imepo imbivi.
Mulekhe ukhuhava ulutalama, almasi nukhuva nifyuma mumipakho gyeinyo.
Khyomela ukhwivopela eimbopo pa ncheila, mulagegaga mwenda ungwongelile, five filato, luve lusaga pakhova umbombi anogile ukhukava ulahombo lwa mbombo.
Uvu nchenge uwavenchaga vuve vuvaha vuve vudebe uvuyakhiva mukhwingila mulolange veeni ukhwa uviavile igolofu pumulamage khumwene impakha yakhiva mwihega.
Numwe vumwingile pakaya ya munu pu muvasamusye,
enave eikaya yeinogelanile ulunonche hencho lweinyo luve pala, pu enave sapanogile pu muve nulunonchehencho muhegage apo.
Pu vanave vabelile ukhuvupeileila hange nakhukhuvapuleihincha ugumwinchova vumwihege pa kaya eiyo pu mwikuhunage amalunde ngeinyo ulufumbe palapala.
Pu nchayeilweli nikhuvavula ukhuta, pu yeilava huba uvuhegi uwa mbunchege uwa mu Sodoma nu wakhu Gomolah uvahegi uwavunchege uwa vulaluteila.
Lola panikhuvasuha nding'osi pagati na gati pafikana ifitalaam fidwancha, pu muvenchage nuluhala ndinyandalwe hange muvenchage vudekhedekhe ndigundya.
Mweitevekhage nukhwilolela na vanu, pakhuva yavikhuvaheilikha khuvaheigi vanongwa nukhuvatova hange munyumba nchavo eincha khwisayila.
Pu valavagega mbulongolo pa vanu avavaha na va nkuludeva savuli yango, pu khive khimanyilo khuvene nakhuva kaya.
Puyakhiva vikhuvakunga nukhuvaheilikha khuvavaha avavuheigi mulekhe ukhusagania agakhunchova, pakhuva unkuludeva umbalanche veiyaikhuvapinchaga palapala amamenyu agakhunchova.
Pakhuva samwemwe mweiyakhiva minchova, pu leino uMepo uva Daada veiyainchovaga igati ndyumwe.
Pu umunu alasambukhila ulukololwe uvei vaholiwe ung'onchi yumo pwikhugega pakhubuda, na yu visa alagagila umwana vamwene, na vana valeimag nu khuvagagila avahonchi vavo nukhuva buda.
Pu umwe avanu vooni vikhuvavipeilaga savuli ya litawa lyango, pu ula uviyakhiva eikhiyumileincha mpakha pavusileilo veiuywa alapokhiwagwa.
Pu leino yakhiva vikhuvasweima mbunchege uva muhegage mkimbeilage nukhuluta khuvunchege uvukonga, ncha yeilweli nikhuva vula samukhamale uvunchenge wooni uvwa mu Israeli impakha umwana vanyamunu alava akiliwikhe.
Asikhuli ukongi uveimanyila puikhunduteila umanyisi vamwene.
Eikweilanile ukongi ukhuva ndu manyisi vamwene nu mbanda ukhuva ndu ntwa vamwene. Einave unyakaya vapeile elitawa viita Belzabuli, puyavikhu valekha avange avaleimunyumba ya nyakaya.
Mula dwadaga umwe, pakhuva khisikhuli eikhilava khuvutitu hange eikhilikhuvutitu khilava pavuvalafu.
Leila eilyunikhuva vula khuvutitu pu muleinchovage pavuvalafu, na leila ailyuni khuva hehela muleinchovage khuvanu.
Mulekhe ukhuvadwada avibuda avibuda umbeile pu valinchilamakha agakhubuda ula unyamakha gakhubuda umbeile ni numbula yope mulwongomencho lwa mwoto ukali.
Pu ifiyuni fiveili safigonchiwa ni senti yeimo? Hata hivyo hakuna anayeweza kuanguka chini bila Baba yenu kufahamu.
Pu leino umwe nanchinchweile ncheinyo khumintwe nchivaliwe nchooni.
Pu mulekhe ukhudwada umwe pakhuva mufiluteilile ifiyuni.
Pu leino ula uveiyakhiva ikhunchova pavuvalafu pavanu vuvipulikha ukhuta amanyile une, pu nayune nilata nimanyile pamiho ga Daada vango uvakhukyanya.
Pu ula uveiyakhiva ikhumbela pavanu ita sanimanyile nayune punila beila pamiho ga Daada vango uvialei khukyanya.
Mulatenchaga pamo ninchile khuveikha ulunonchencho inkeilunga, saninchele khuveikha ulunonchencho, puneigegile eimundu khwigeida.
Ulwa khuva ninchile khukhuva palahania umunu nuswambe, ung'eincha nu vanina, umunu nu kwive.
Nu ntavangwa va munu vuvala avamukaya ya mwene.
Uvei aganile uvise nu vanina ukhuluteila ukhungana une sanugile palyune khange uvei aganile unswambe nu mwaleive ukhuluteila pakhugana une sanogile palyune.
Pu umunu anave sitola eikhida mileihanie nukhung'onga unesanogelanile palyune.
Ula uveikhuvupokha uwumi vei ula uveikhuwambuncha uwumi savuli yango leino vei uywa avupokhile uwumi wa mwene.
Uvei ikhuvupeileila umwe ikhunyupeile ila une, nula uveikhunyupeileila une ikhamwupeileila ula uvei asuhile une.
Uvei ikhumwupeileila unyamalago ulwakhu inyamalago vei uywa alahombwa uluhombo ulwanyamalago. Nula uveiyakhiva iva igolofu ikhumwupeileimbo ulwavugolofu.
Ula uveiyakhiva ikhupa umo muvadebe ava, pundakhive khinywelo khimo eikhya magasi amanchinchimu, ulwakhuva umwene ikongi, lweli nikhuvavula pu umwene pusaladeila uluhombo lwa mwene.”
Pwu yikhava uYesu wa maliele ukhuvavula avankongi va mwene kumi na mbili akhahege pala akhaluta khumanyisya nukhulumbielila khukhilunga ikya vene,
uYohana waliemukheghu ngwa avile apuliekhe imbombo incha Klisiti, akhasuha ululagielo ukhugeendela khuva nkhongi avamwene,
vakhambuncha, “Uve ndaveve vunkwincha, apange nkhwale uyuunge uvyakhiva inkwinhanga?”
UYesu akhavamu akhata, “Mulutage mukhambule u Yohana nchila inchuomupulikhe na nchila ienchumunkhu nchivona.
Avanu avasavilola vilolaga, avifugafuga vigeendanga, avankhoma vivalanchiwaga, avanchivile viepuliekhaga, avafwile vinchukhaga ukhuva vumi, avagaanchu vilambeeliewagwa eilimenyu eilinonu.
Asayiewe uvie umwene unchila luuviepo nune.
Avanu ava vuvahegiele, u Yesu akhatengula wakhunchova na vanu inongwa incha Yohana, “'Akhavavancha upwumukha lutile khulukhungu mukhakhiwe khinu khikhi, ieligugu lieliekhusukhaniekha nie mepo?
Inave saewo mukhahumile mukhalutiele nkwilola khikhi? Umunu uvyafwalile imienda iminonu avietama munyumba iya nkhuludeva.
Humbe munkhahegiele ukhuluta kwilola inkhikhi? Apange khukhombona unyamalago.
Uyou ule imbombo nchamwe chandiekhiwe, 'Mulolage, nikhunsuha umunu vango, nikhusuha khulyumwe uvakhiva ikweta injila pamiho ghakho.
Mwidikgage, nikhuvavula ielweli asikhuli umunu uvaholiwe khudaala uvyahwanine nuu Yohana uvikhwoncha. Humbe vie iedebe mu mumbu ntwa uwa khukyanya, vie mbaha ukhulutielila khwa Yohana uvikhwoncha.
Ukhuma mumanchuva aga Yohana umwonchi ukhufikha leino, uludeva ulwa khukyanya lwa makha, avanu avanyamakha vuvitola namakha.
Ulwa khuva avanyamalago voni avandagielo avanchovaga ukhudugha wunsiekhi ugwa Yohana.
Inave mukwiedihana, ukhuta vyuula uEliya, uvie avanyamalago avalikhuta ula viikyiencha.
Uviali ni mbulukhutu inchakhupulika apuliekhage.
Uvuholiwa uvu nivuhwananinche nie khikhi? vuliendavana avikhina vikhwilangana vikyega nduviengilo,
vita, tuvatovile iekhiwiewie khunema, twaiembiile inyimbo incha khililo samuliekhuliela.'
Ulwa khuva uYohana ainchile saliekhulya nu ukhunywa pwu valie khuta, 'Alieni mepo imbivi.'
Umwana va Adamu ainchile aliekhulya nukhunywa valiekhuta ielya ano khange ingaanchi, umanyani va vasangunchi avalie nimbivi!' Ulwa khuva uluhala lwa mwene luvonekha mu mbombo inchamwene.”
U Yesu pwakhatengu ukhuvaduka mwoni muvunchenge umwuo imbombo ncha mwene inchuavombile nchavonikhe, ulwa khuva savapele,
uliviekhi, Kolazini, uliviekhi Betisaida! Ukhuta imbombo imbaha nchale nchivombe khu Tilo na khu Sidoni inchivombike apa vuvakhasayiwe khatale vakhale vifwala amaguniela nukhubakha ilyeela.
Hange ukwieyumilincha khu Tilo na khu Sidoni ilie nchuva ilyavuhiegi ukhulutilila khuvene.
Uve, Kapernaumu, wieta uyuvukhwie miekhiwa impaka khukyanya? Bakho vukhwikhaga pasi khuvufwe. Khu Sodoma khukhale khuvombekhage imbombo imbaha, nduvunchivombike khulyuve, ukhale wiva khwule ufikha ilelo.
Ulwa khuva akhanchovile khulyuve ukhuta, yivahuoba ikhilunga ikya khu Sodoma ukhunchukha ilinchuva ilya vuhiegi ukhulekha uve.
Unsiekhi ugwa uYesu anchovile ankhata, “Ninkhugienia Dada, Vinkhuledeva va khukyanya na Nkhilunga, ulwa khuva ukhavafihiele imbombo inchi avanyaluhala nuvumanyi, nu khuvavonekhela avasaviembiele, uvadiendulile avana avadebe.
Ena Dada ukhuva inchi nchu nchinogile pamiho ghakho.
Ifiinu fyoni amile Udada. Hange asikhuli yuywa amanyile unswambe amanyile ywu Dada, hange asikhuli uvamanyile Udada amanyile yu mwana, nu vieumwana anganile vieikhumbonesya Udada khumwene.
Mwinchage khulyune mwievoni yumwe muhangayiekha, yuumwe mwitwiekhile ieminchiigo eiminchitu, une ninkhuva ghata lusya.
Mwiyumilinchage khulyune mumanyilage khulyune, ulwa khuva une niliemwidihinchi hange nieliindenkhedekhe va numbula pwu mukhaga ulugataluko ulwa munumbula nchienyo.
Ulwa khuva undeghehe gwango iendekhedekhe nu nchiigo ngwango impepe.
Unsiekhi guula uYesu alutile akhageenda mufjalo ya vanu ielinchuva ilya sabato. Avankhongi va mwene vale nienjala pwu valiekhudenya isoncho ncha nganu valiekhusegheya mu mavokho valiekhulya.
Avafalisayo vuvaloliele ewo, vakhambula uYesu vakhata “Ulole avankongi vakho vanangile ululagielo vivombo inchusanchinogiewa ukhumba ilinchuva ilya Sabato.”
Pwu uYesu akhavavula akhata, “Samwiembile inchu uDaudi avombile unsienkhe uuguale nie njala, na vanu vamwene uvuale nawo?
Vwuingile munyumba iya Nguluve alikhulya ikhisyesye, khikyo sakyale kyakhula na vanu uvuale nawo, kyale kyankhula avate nkhenchi vene?
Khange samwimbile ululagielo ukhuta avatekhendu mugaati muntembile vikhuyibeda ei Sabato, ulwa khuva valievuvule uvuvivi?
Pwu nikhuva vula umwe ikhuta umbaha ukhulutielila ietembile pwale aapha.
Mwale mulumanye eile khikhuta khikhi; une nilondo iekhisa sahielonda iefyakhusa; samukhale munkhuvahiga vavo valie vuvule ienongwa,
Ulwa khuva umwana va Adamu veimwene inkhuludeva va Sabato.”
U Yesu pwankhahega pala akhaluta muntembile yavene.
Lola pwu ale umunu uvyaposile inkhivokho. Pwu vankhambuncha uYesu vankhata, “Ndayiva lweli unkhumponia umunu eilinchuva ilya Sabato?” Valiekhunogwa ukhusitakha ukhuta avombile imbivi.
U Yesu ankhavavula, “Veni umunu yuywa angave nie ng'osi yiengile ndiguli eilinchuva ilya Sabato, sakhawesye ukwingile mugaati ndiguli mukhuyihumya na makha eing'osi mundieguli?
Khiliekhu iekhienunu ukhulutielila khuo ng'osi! Pwu yiva lweli ukhumba inonu ielinchuva ilya Sabato.”
wu akhambula umunu unla akhata, “Husya iekhievokho kyakho” Akhahusya iekheivokho nkhapona khinkha khwanana niekhieniena.
Avafalisayo vankhahuma nkhunji ankhanchovana vankhidihana umwakhumbudiela pwu vankhahuma khunji vuvikhwidihana ukhubuda.
U Yesu wanchimanyile ienchi ankhahuma ankhahega apo. Pwu avanu avingi vavo vankonga, ankhavaponia voni.
Ankhabencha unkhuta valenkhage ukhuvavula avanu ynkhuta umwene vyavaponninche.
Ukhuta linkhongane nielivanchovile unyamalago u Isaya, ukhuta,
Mulolage umbombi vango uvieniegaanile une muugaati munumbula yango niengaaniele. Nivieka inumbula yango muugaati mumwene, unkhuta avavulaghe avanyampaji uvuhiegi.
Salatabeikha hange nukhuliela na mankha; hange asikhuli uyakhiva ipuliekha iliemenyu lyamwene munjila.
Saladeenya aligugu alepunuikhe; salanchimya ikhiesikhi eikhihumya eilyosi, ukhuduga uvuhiegi ukhuwesya.
Avanyapanji pwu vivinchaga va nuhuvila munditawa ilyamwene.
Pwu vankhandetela umunu uvyabifwile amiho ububu, unyaniepo imbivi khwa Yesu. Unkhuta anjaviele akhanjaviela akhapona, umunu ula akhapona ankhalola nunkhuchova.
Avanu aviingi voni valienkhudegha nu nkhunchova, unkhuta “Uyu samwana va Daudi?”
Avafalisayo vuvapuliekhe ienkhiedego iekhi, vakhata, “'Umunu uyu sihencha imepo imbivi khumakha agha mwene yuywa iekhencha khumankha aga Belzebuli, umbaha va mepo.
“U Yesu aghamanyiele amasago gavene akhavavula akhata, “'Inkhilunga nkhingasambunkhilanile kyene khinangienkha, uvujeenge uwa nyumba vungalekhehane vuwa savukhieme.
Iengave Usetano inkhung'encha Usetano uniene, pwu iva inkheihambula yuywa mumbwumi uwamwene.
Khunjiela yieliekhu uvutwa uwa mwene vuliemiekhiwa? Inave ihencha imepo imbivi khumakha aga Belizabuli, avankongi avanwene pwu vihumya khunjila yieliekhu? Khulugendo ulu valavavalamuli.
Inave iehencha iemepo imbivi khumakha aga a Mepo uva Nguluve, uludeva ulwakhukyanya lwiva lwinchile khulyumwe.
Umunu ikwingila ndakhiekhi munyumba yamunu unyamakha nukhuhiencha, vusankhungile umunu unyamakha? Pwi weesya ukhuhiencha ifinu munyumba.
Umunu uvieavenchaga yuywa salielipupaninie nune pwu iva alivuunge nune, hange uviesilundamania nune uywa vieihasania. (itaga)
Pwu nienchova nkhulyumwe, eimbivi eiyavienchaga nulubedo avanu visyiekhiliwagwa, pwu ukhumbeda uMepo umbalanche uywa salasyiekhiliwa.
Uvieavinchaga uvieinchova eilimenyu vunge nu mwana va Adamu, ielyo lisyiekhiliwa. Hange uviavenchaga uvieinchova vunge khu Mepo umbalanche, uywa salasyiekhiliwa mukhilunga iekhi, na khikhilunga ikhikyuncha.
Pwu uvombe umbinki ukhuva guuve ni nsenkhe inonu, apange unange uguu nange umbinkhi ugwa sekhe na nchisekhe ncha yene, ulwa khuva umbinkhi gwumanyiekhikha nisenkhe ncha yene.
Umwe mwivaholilwa va njonkha, umwe mulievavivi, ndamuwesya ukhunchova imbombo inonu? Ulwa khuva undomo gwinchova inchihuma munumbula yamunu.
Umunu unonu munumbula yamwene inchueivikhile inchova inonu, numunu umbivi munumbula yamwene inchova imbivi inchuiviekhile.
Lino pwu ninkhuvavula ukhuta khila limenyu ilyuinchova umunu lya lahomya eimbalilo ilinchuva eilyavuhieghi.
Ulwa khuva khumamenyu ghankho ulavalieliwa imbalielo khuvuyilweli wa mamenyu ghako ulahiegiewa.”
Pwu avanklani na Vafalisayo vakhamwa khwa Yesu vakhata “Imanyisi, twinogwa twale tulole iekhimanyielo ukhuhuma khulwuve.”
Hange uYesu akhamula nu khuvavula, “Uvuholwa uvuvivi ikya vuliigu khilondo eikhimanyielo. Khisikhuli inkhiemanyilo eikyakhiva khihumila khuvene khumbe ikhiemanyilo ikya Yona unyamalago.
Nduvu unyamalago uYona atamile mulitumbu eilya somba eimbaha amanchuva ghaatadatu pamusi na pakhilo, vule vule umwana va Adamu wayiva mughati munumbula ya nkhilunga khumanchuva ghadatu pamusi na pankhilo.
Avanu avakhu Ninawi valiema pavulongolo pavuhieghi pwu paninie na vaholwa avalieno ava. Ulwa khuva vavombile imbivi vakhapela wie lumbiliela u Yona, ulwa khuva khwale apa umunu umbaha ukhulutielila khwa Yona.
Unkhuludeva undala uvakhusikha alatogha pwu paninie khuvuhieghi na vanu avakhivumbukho iekhi nukhukhihiega ukhuta valie nimbivi. Ulwa khuva umwene akhumile uluvafu ulwa khuvusilielo wa nkhilunga ukhwincha khupuliehiencha uluhala ulwa Selemani, lola apa pwale umunu umbaha uvalutielile khwa Selemani.
Vui imepo imbivi vunchi huma khumunu, nchihumili apoonu upwu ghasipali amaghasi vughilonda apakhughataluka, humbe pasipali.
Pwu nchita, 'nighodonkha khukhaya ukhuniehumile khunyumba yango iyounihumile.' Vuikhilivukha pwivona inyumba iela yiekhuniwe yieviekhiwe vunonu.
Pwu iluuta inchikhunchi ghegha inchinghe imepo imbivi saba imbivi ukhulutielila khumwene, pwu nchikhwicha nchitamaga numwene upwa lyiepo. Umwakhavelile pakhusila pwu iva pavuvivi huba pavutengulielo. Vuyakhieva khiva ikhievumbukho ikhie eikhivivi.
U Yesu vuinchova na vanu avinghi, uvanina navalukhololwe vaeimile khunji, valiekhunogwa ukhunchova nave.
Umunu yumo akhaluta akhambula, “Akha ujyuva vako navalukhololwo veimile panchi, vinkhukhulonda vinogwa ukhunchova nuve”.
Akhamula akhata uvyambulile ujyuva vango veini? na valukholo lwango veini?”
Umwene akhinula iekhievokha kya mwene khuvakhongi vamwene akhanchova, “Lola, uyou vie jyuva vango navalunkholo lwango!
Ulwa khuva umunu uvieivombo uwieghane wa Dada vango vuuakhukyanya, umunu uyou vilukholo lwango, ving'anchavango hange vijyuva vango”.
Eilinchuva eilyo uYesu akhakhegha munyumba akhaluta khulukhanji khu nyanja akhatama.
Avanu avinghi valundamine, vakhanchungula, umwene pwakhingile mumbwato akhatama mughati. Avanu avinghi pwu vakheima khulukanji khu nyanja.
Pwu akhavavula ifinu finghi aliekhuhwananincha ni fihwani, alikhunchova, “Mlole, umbyalie alutiele khuvyala.
Aliekhuvyale ienchinghe iesekhe nchiliekhugwa mu njiela pwu fikhincha ifideghe fikhahola.
Inchinghe nchikhagwa palunalawe, incho sanchakhave ung'anga mwingi ukhuta nchimelaghe. Nchikhamela ulwa khuva ung'anga gwale indebe.
Pwu ulunchuva lwavile lwivala lukhanyanya iemilela ulwa khuva gyale pakanya ung'anga gwale iedebe pwu nchikhuma.
Iembeyu inchienghe nchagwile mumintwinyo. Eimitwinyo gheikhakhula ghekhava mitali ukhulutielila inchene pwu nchikhalemwa ukhukhula.
Iembeyu inchienghe nchikhagwa mung'anga unonu, nchikhamela nukhuhupa, inchienghe nchikhahola mala mia moja, inchinge sitini, inchingi salasini.
Umwene uvyalienie mbulukhutu inchakhupulikha apuliekhaghe.
Avankhongi va mwene vakhincha vakhambuncha u Yesu, “Khinu khiekhi inkhewienchova na vanu wienchova nifiehwaniehencho?”
UYesu akhavanda akhata, “Umwe mkhavile ukhunchimanya inchilikhuvutitu incha ludeva ulwa khukyanya, avene savakavile.
Ulwa khuva umwene yuywa alienafwo ifinu uywa vie vieikyongelenchiwa ifinghe, hangha pwiva nafyo ukhulutielila. Uvalievuvule hange nakhikyo alienakyo pwu ipokhiwa kyope.
Pwu ninchova nawo khufikhwani ulwa khuva vangalolaghe savakhalolaghe. Hanghe vangapuliekhaghe valekhe ukhupuliekha, hanghe valekhaghe ukhunchimanya.
Eilimenyu lya nyamalago uIsaya lievombikhe khuvene pwu lita, ukhuphulikha mpulikhagha hanghe samukhanchimanyaghe.
Ulwa khuva ienumbula incha vanu ava nchivile nchitu, niembulukhuto nchavo sanchipulikha vunonu, namiho gha vene vasisiliele, ukhuta valekhe ukhulola na miho ghavene, vakhaphulikha ni mbulukhuto nchavene, vakhanchimanya ni numbula nchavene vakhasyetukha, une nikhavapokha.”
Musayiwe ulwa khuva amiho gheinyo ghilola, nie mbulukhuto ncheinyo nchiepuliekha.
Mwiedhiekhaghe nikhuvavula, avanya malagho avingi na vanu avanya lwiedhikho vanogwagwa ukhunchivona nchila unchumukhunchivono. Valemilwe ukhunchievona, vanoghilwe ukhuphulikha imbombo iela inchumupuliekha, savakhapuliekha.
Pwu mupuliekhaghe lieno ienongwa iya mbyalii.
Umunu uvieiphuliekha eilimenyu ilya ludeva ulwa khukyanya alekhaghe ukhuliemanya, umbivi pwu ikhwincha itola eiliekhavyaliwe munumbula mumwene. Eiyi yu mbeyu iyavyaliwe munundukhanji munjila.
Uvya vyaliwe mundunalawe vie ule uvyaliephokhiele ielimenyo nukhuhovoka.
Alivale eimilela mughati mumwene, lietama unsiekhe iendebe. Pwu yienghahumile ietabu apanghe ukhuhanghayiekha khu nongwa ya liemenyu, umwene pwu iviepha iembeive.
Uvieavyaliwe mumintwinyo, uyuo vieiphulikha eilimenyu iekwaghana ni mbombo incha nkhilunga nifwa vunongwe uwankhielungha pwu nchikhu mpelela ukhuta ielimenyu lielekhe ukhupa iesekhe.
Uviavyaliwe mung'anga unonu. Uyuo veihola isekhe na vienchiholagha isekhe nchunyingi mala mia, iyeinge sitini, iyeingi salasini.”
UYesu akhavapha eikhikhwani eikhinghe. Akhanchova, “Uludeva lwa khukyanya luhwanine numu yuywa avyalile iembeyu mukyalo kya mwene.
Vuvaghonelile avanu pwu vakhancha avalughu vamwene akhavyale amanyasi munganu vakhahegha vakhaghodokha.
Ingano yiekhamela nukhuhupha, na ghamanyasi ghope ghakhamela.
Avavombi va nyakyalo vakhincha vakhambuncha unyakyalo vakhata, 'Khikhi sawauyale iembeyu einonu mukyalo kyako? Khihumile khikhi lino mbona ghamelile amanyasi?
Akhavavula akhata, undughu avombile imbombo inchi.' Avavomba mbombo vakhambola vakhata, “Lino wienogwa tukhakhupule?”
Unyakyalo akhanchova akhata, 'Mwielekhelwe, ukhuluta khukupula, ulwa khuva vumukhupula amanyasi pwu mukhupulagha nayie ngano pwu paninie.
Mughalekhe ghakhula pupaninie ukhudugha upwakhiva gwifikha unsiekhi ugwakhubena. Unsiekhi ugwakhubena niela vavula aviebena ukhuta, 'Mutale ukhunkhupula amanyasi mughakhunghe mumwoto, pwu mulundamanie einganu tuviekhe mukhibana kyango.”
U Yesu akhavavula ikhikhwani hincho ikhinghe. Akhata, “'Uludeve ulwa khukyanya lukhwanine nie mbeyu iya haladali(iendebe nno) yienyo umunu atoliele akhaluta kuvyala mukyalo ikya mwene.
Eimbeyu eiye nini eno(ndebe) ukhulutilila imbeyu inchinghe nchoni. Vuyimela nukhukhula pwu yiekhula yive iembiekhi imbaha ukhulutilila ambiekhi eghienghe mukyalo pwu ifidege ifya munkyanya vikwinchaga vikwemaga nukhughataluka pakyanya pa mbikhi finchengagha nuvufumba mumaswatu gha mbikhe.”
Akhavapha ikhikhwananincho eikhinghe akhata. “Uludeva ulwa khukyanya lukyanine nie khinu ikhilulile khikyo undala atolile akhapima ifiphimielo fidatu akhahanjania mumbutine woni vukhatutuma.
Nchoni ienchi uYesu anchovile pavanu avinghi nukhuhwananincha ifihwani. Ukhulekha ifyakhuhwananincha pwu salikhunchova khinu.
Ukhuva nchila inchanchoviwe navanyamalagho nchivonekhaghe, upwu inchova, “Uyunikyama undomo gwangho ukhuchova khufihwani. Uyuninchova imbombo nchincho nchikhale khuvutitu ukhuhuva khuvutenghulilo uwa khilunga.”
Pwu uYesu akhavalekha avanu vinghi akhaghodokha khumyave. Pwu avakhongi avamwene vakhankongha vakhata, “Utuvule vunonu ikhihwani ikyamasi mukyalo.”
U Yesu akhavanda akhata, “Uvie ivyala iembeyu inonu vei mwana va Adamu.
Eikyalo kyu khilunga; imbeyu einonu vuvana avakhuludeva. na manyasi vuvana ava ndughu untavangwa, nuu mbivi uviavyalile vei setano.
Uvubeni vuvusililo uwa khilunga, aviebena vuvasuhwa va nghuluve.
Amanyasi vughilundama nukhu nyanya mu mwoto, vuyilava eiwo khuvumalilo uwa khilunga.
Umwana va Adamu alasuha avasung'wa vamwene, ukhwincha khuluondamania ukhuhuma khuludeva ulwa mwene imbombo nchoni inchikhapelagha imbivi na voni avakhavombagha inchambivi.
Voni valalahiwa mundighuli eilya mwoto, ukhwa khukhulava nikhililo nukhuheveta amino.
Pwu avanu vavo vavombagha inonu valang'ala ndielinchuva khuludeva ulwa Dada vavo. Uvyalieni mbulukhuto aphuliekhaghe.
Uludeva ulwa khukyanya luliehani niekhiebana khikyo khiefihiele mukyalo. Umunu akhakhievona akhafiha. Munduhekhelo ulwa mwene pwu akhaluta khwighuncha fyoni fifwo akhale nafwo, nukhughula eikyalo.
Hange uludeva ulwa khukyanya luleindumunu unchulusi uvieilonda ulutalama ulunonu ulwa khukhava indalama inchiluteilile.
Aviele akhaviele uluntalama ulunonu ulualondagha, ankhaluta ankhaghuncha iefyuale nafyo fyoni ankhanchighula ulutalama uluanoghielwe.
Uludeva ulwa khukyanya luliehaniele ni nyafu inchilakhiwa munyanja, pwu nchi lundamania khila khinu eikhiliemaghasi.
Vunchidieghile avalovi pwu vikhweghela khulu nkhanji vitama pasi, pwu visalula iefinonu vinhola viveikha mu fyombo, ifisafielondiwa pwu viekhufietagha khuvutali.
Vuyielava eiwo eilinchuva eilya khusiliela eikhilunga. avasuhwa valukhumila, valavakhencha avavomba mbivi voni mughati mbavo vivomba ienonu.
Pwu valavatagha mundighuli ilya mwoto, pwu khulava nikhilielo nukhu kheveta amino.
U Yesu akhavavuncha munchimanyile imbombo nchoni? Avankhongi va mwene vakhanda vakhata, “Ena.”
Pwu u Yesu ankhavavula akhata, “'Khila nkhalani yuoywa aviele nkhonghi va ludeva ulya khukyanya, akhwanine nunyanyumba uvie ihumya mukhibana kyamwene iehomya ifinu ifiepya nie finkhulu.”
U Yesu wa maliele iefikhwanie kheincho, akhakhegha pala upwuale.
U Yesu wanchifikhe khukhielunga eikya khumyave ukhu aliekhunchikhuvamanyisya avanu muntembiele. Pwu valiekhudhegha valiekhuta uyuo atoliele ndakhu uluhala uolu nie fidhehgo iefii?
Umunu uyou samwana vaselemala? uMariamu ndasavie vanina? Avalokhololwe savuva Yakobo, Yusufu, Simoni nu Yuda?
Navahanchave tulie navo apha pakhaya? Khumbe umunu uyou anchiwene ndhakhu ienchi nchoni?”.
