Vakhendola khukhisa, vakhasuha avapelelesi avalikhwivona ukhuta vogolofu, valikhulonda inogwa ukhuhuma mumbulumbileli vwa mwene, pwu vamwibata vakhelekhe khu vavakha
Avene vakhambunha, vakhata, “imanyisi tulumayile ukhuta winhova nukhuumasya uwayelweli savusogiwa nu munu uviavenchaga, uve vumanyisya uwayelweli khunjila iya Nguluve.
Ufwe yenogile ukhukhomba isongo khwa Kaisari, au vudesi?”
U Yesu akhagamanya amasago gavene, akhavavula,
“Mumbonesye edinari. Esura nuvusimbe wani pakhyo?” Vakhanchova, 'Wa Kaisaria.”
Umwene akhaakhavavula pwumupenchage UKaisari ifya mwene nu Nguluve mpenchage ifya Nguluve.
Avasimbi na vatekhenchi vakhalemwa ukhubencha akhyoanchovile khuvulugolo khuvanu. Valikhuswiga anyadile ya mwene savakhanchova khinu.
Pwu avamasadukhayo vakhadutela, avachoraga ukhuta khusikhwuli ukhuchukha,
Vakhambuncha, vakhata, “Imanyisi, U Mose atusimbile ukhuta umunu agafyilelwe nulukhololwa unyadala unchila mwana yenogiwa ukhutola udala uvalukhololwe nukhuhole nawe.
Khwale na vanamunu saba uvakhwanda atolile, akhafwa khetandekha umwana,
Nayuvavili mwope.
Uvadatu akhantola vulevule uvasaba sandekhe umwana akhafwa.
Usikhi wwukhulutile undala mwope akhafwa.
Pwu khuvunchukha ivadala vani? Ulwakhuva voni saba vatolile. '
U Yesu akhavavula, “Avana vakhiluga ekhi vitola nukhutuliwa.
Avanogelanile ukhwambilila uvuchukha wavafwile nukhwigela khuludeva lwa khukhya savitola wala ukhutoliwa.
Savifwa khavili, ulwakhuva vakha wanine ndavasug'wa na vanava Nguluve uvana va vunchukha.
Pwu avafwile vinchusiwa, nu Mose avanisye pakhisitu, pala pwuamwelagile Untwa vi Nguluve va Abrahamu nu Nguluve va Isakha nu Nguluve va Yakobo.
Lino, umwene sio ve Nguluve vavafwile, ila avumi, ulwakhuva voni vitama khumwene.”
Avag'e avamanyisi vandagilo vakha mwanda, 'Imanyisi, uchovile vononu. '
Vakhadwada ukhumbuncha amameyu agange.
U Yesu akhavavula, “Khekhi avanu vita Kreste mwana va Ndaveti?
Daudi anasema mwenyewe katika zaburi: U Dada ambulile Dada vango:
Tama khukhivoko ikhyando, Ipakha nivavekhe avavivi vakho pasi pamalunde gakho. '
U Ndaveti akhamwelaga Kreste 'Daada,' yivandakhikhi mwana va Ndaveti?”
Avanu voni vavilevikhupulekhencha akhavavula avakhongi va mwene, '
Mwilolelage na vasimbi, avinogwa ukhugenda vafwalile imienda imitali, vinogwa ukhusamusiwa khusokhoni nukhutema ifigoda ifitali mtembile, na amamenyu akhakhisa.
Avene pwa vilya khuyumba encha vafwele, vigaha ukhuta vikhwesaya ulwesayo ulutali. Ava valaambilela uvukhegi uvuvakha fincho. '
U Yesu alolile akhavavona avagosi avatayeni avavikhaga ikhela chavene khubengi.
Akhambona ufwele yumo ug'anchu vuvivekha indalama chamwene ivele.
Pwu akhanchova, “Lweli nikhuvavula, uyu ufwele uganchu avekhile nyingi uuhusinda avage voni.
Avage voni vakhuminche ikhela ukhukhogana nuvumofu wavo. Ufwile uyu, mumboganchu wa mwene, ne ahuminche indalama nchoni inchoa khale nacho mumbwumi wa mwene.”
Avagevavilevinchova itembile, umunu vayenochekhinehe na mawe amanonu ne enekhelo, akhanchova,
“Ukhunogwa inchomukhunchivona, isiku nchikhincha inchu iliwe salilasigala pakhyanya paliweilege ililakhenchiwa.”
Pwu vakhambuncha, vakhata, “Imanyisi, inogwa inchi nchilahumela ndeli? Filahumilago ifidegofikhu ukhuta inogwanchi nchilepakhumila?”
U Yesu akhanda, “Muve nuluhala mlekhe ukhusiviwa.
Mkhapulikhe iligoha nefujo, mlekhe ukhudwadwa, ulwakhuva inogwa inchi mpakha nchihumile, uvusilelo savukhahumile nambivi.”
Pwu akhavavula, “Ikhiluga khilima ukhulwa ni khiluga ikhige, uvutwa nu vuywa uvunge.
Khulava nekheseyenge ikhivaha, nenjala nitavuni khuvutali na khuvuli. Khulava ninogwaincha khudwancha nifidego ifyakho dwancha ukhuma khukyanya.
Wunchikhale inogwa incho nchoni, vivekha amakho gavo nukhuvatesya. Vikhuhelekha khutembile na khukhikugwa, ukhuvagega khuvatwa na valo gonchi khulitawa lwago.
Eye yelavapa uvulegefu khulwelekho lweyo.
Pwu mulamulage munumbila nchiya ukhulekha ukhwitetela,
Ulwakhavanikhuvapa amameyu akhaluhala, uluawavivi venyo savakhanesye ukhukanika au ukhubela.
aAvahonchi veyo vala vabelagha, avalukhulolwenyo, avamanyani vuyo valabudivaga avageavayenyo.
Valavakha lalila avanu voni khulitawa lyango.
Lusikhuli uluyele khalalumo ulalayaga khumitwe gienyo.
Vwu mukhwumilila mlanchipokha inumbula ncheyo.
Apayamwivona Yerusalemu yenchova guliwe na vasikhali, mlumaye ukhuta uvunagi vukhegelile.
Avale ku Yudea vayililage khufyamba, navala avalipagati pa vunchege vakhegage, valekhe ukhuvalekha avalekhu vijiji ukhukhilivukha.
Ulwakhuva isikhu nchi ncha vukhuvelwa, pwuinogwa nchoni nchasimbiwa nchikwele.
Vukhuvelwa khuvala avanyavunchita navala avikwisya umesekhi ikhyo! Ulwakhuva kulava netabu imbaha mukhihuga, nuvuhegi khuvanu ava.
Valatemiwa ni mundu valatoliwa vavanda khufiluga fyoni, ne Yerusalemu yelakhayiwa na vaya panchi, ipakha usekhi ugwa vanu avanyapanchi gulavakhukwela.
Khulava nefidego khulinchuva, nu mwenchi ninodwa. Khukilunga khulava nenjala ya vanyapanchi, ukhugatala khula humananunchwego gwa Nyanja numbelo.
Khulava navanu avichilekha khuvudwanchi, wuvikhuvila inogwa inchoyakhiva nchihuilo mukhilunga, ulwakhuva amakha ga khiluga galatetema.
Pwuvalambona umwana va Ndaveti waikhwikha mumavego na makha nu vuvalanche uvuvakha.
Inogwa nchi apyachitegula ukhuhumila, mwimage, mwunulage imitwe gwinyo, ulwakhuva uvupokhi wenyo vulugelile pawipi.”
U Yesuakhavavula khukhihwani, “Mlolage umbekhi, nemibekhi gwoni.
Vwuvukhumila uvuluva, mukhilolela yumwe nukhulumanya ukhuta ikhinchuva khihegelile.
Vulevule, mwumilola imbombo ncho nchihumila, umwe mulumanyage ukhuta uludeva lwa Nguluve luhegelile.
Elweli, nikhuvavula, ikhipaponkhi sakhikhalute, nupakha inogwa nchi apyanchikhumila.
Khukyanya napasi vilaluta, amameyu g'ago sakhagalaluta lusikhu.
Mwilolage yumwe, ukhuta inumbula nchayo nchila vatola nuvulwasi, uvuganchi, nukhuhagayekha nifyakhiluga ikhi.
Ulwakhuvaikhigono khile khilincha nambiwe Ndulutambo. Ulwakhuva yelavakhwakhila munu uvitama pasi pamiho ga khilunga khyoni.
Pwumume mikho imisikhe gwini, mudovageukhuta muvevunonu ukhuhene inogwa ncho apyachihumila, nukhwima khumiho khumwana va Ndaveti.”
Pamusi amanyisyaga mutembile pakhilo alikhuhuma khunji, nu khuluta khukyamba ikhitambuliwa Mizeituni.
Avanu voni vamwinchile panavusi khu vwukhilo khukhupulehencha mugati mutembile.
Esikhukhu iya fivanda yahegelile, iyitambuliwa pasakha.
Avatwa navasimbi vakhavunchana umwa khubudela U Yesu, ulwakhuva valikhuva dwada avanu.
Utavagwa akhigila mugati mwa Yuda Isikariote, uninje navakhogi khinchunigo na fiveli.
U Yuda akhaluta khuvunchania na vatwa umwakhug'elekhila U Yesu khuvene.
Vahowikhe, nukhwidekhana ukhumpa indalama.
Umwene aedikhe, alikhulonda usekhi ugwakhug'elekha U Y esu khuvene khuvutali nchukhunchi lya vanu.
Ikhigono ikhya fivanda ikhafikha, upwuyinogiwa ig'osi iya Pasakha yekhuminchiwe.
U Yesu akhavasuha U Peteri nu Yohani, akhanchova, “Mulutage mkhatunonchehenche ikhyakhulya ikhya Pasakha twinche tulye.”
Vakhambuncha, “Ndakhuwinogwa tukhavombe imbmbo iyo?”
Akhavanda, “Mpulikhinchage, apya munchikhwigile mumbunchege, khumbona ugosi itwekhile incilo ya magasi ivapaninie numwe.
Mkhogage khuyumba iyu akhivaikhwigile. Pwumumbulage unyayumba, “Umanyisi ikhukhuvula, “khilindakhe ikhiyumba ikhyavageni, upwunino gwa ukhulya ipasakha navakhogi vango?”
Ikhuvavonesya ikhiyumba ikhya khukyanya khitayani. Mkhutesaniage umwa.”
Pwu vakhaluta, vakhakhanchivona khila khinu nduavavulila. Vakha noncha ikyakhula ikhyapasakha.
Usekhi gwa vilekhufikhe atamilena vakongi va mwene.
Pwu akhavavula, “Ninogwa lweli ukhulya ipasakha numwe usekhi wusakhutegwile ugwavukhuvita wago.
Ulwakhuva nikhuvavula, sanikhalye khavili ipakha ipyayekhwalanile khuludeva lwa Nguluve.”
U Yesu akhatola ikhiywelo, avile adovile, akhata, “Mtolage ikhimga vane yumwe khwa yumwe.
Ulwakhuva nikhuvavula, sanekhalye khavile unsabibu, impakha uludeva lwa Nguluve apialufikhe.”
Pwu akhatola akhivanda, akhisaya, akhameyula, akhavapa, akhanchova, “Ugu gwumbili gwago ugukhume nchiwe khulwimwe. Mgakhage vulevule mwumkhug'umbukha une.”
Akhatova ikhiyelo vulevule wuvigonikhe akhata, “Ikhiywelo ikhi lwidekhano ulupya khukhisa gwago, ukhududikhe khumbivi ncheyo.
Pwu mlolage. Ulauveikhumbuda pwale panienune pamesa.
Ulwakhava umwana va Ndavati iluta nduwa yasimbiwe. Pwu elolelageumunu uviukhugendela umwene umwana va Ndaveti ibudiwa!”
Vakhategula ukhuvanchana vavo khwa vavo, veni pagati palwufwe aviimbomba ewo.
Lukhahumila ulukhani pagati pavene ukhata veni uveyaivaimba imbakha khuvoni.
Akhavavula, “Avakhuludeva va vanu avanyapanchi valinavakha khuvene, navala avanyamakha khukhyanya khuvene vikhuvatambula vavaha valoleli.
Sayinogiwe lweli ukhuva ewo khulyumwe. Pwu mwilekhelwe ula umbakha khulyumwe ave ndu mwana udebe. Nulauvalutogo fincho aveduve ivomba.
Pwu alikhu umbakha, ulauveitamapamesa, au ula uveivomba? Syulouveitama pamesa? Nayune neledula uveivomba pagati palyumwe.
Umwemwemwe mwivapanie nune mumbukhuvilwa wangu.
Nikhuvapa umwe uludeva, nduwuudada amile uneuludeva, Pwumulinchage nakhuywa khuludeva lwago.
Mtamamfitamelo ifya ludeva wumukhuvahega ifivu mbukho khinchigo na vivile ifya vayaisivaeli.
Simioni, Simioni, ulumanya ukhuta, utavago adovile ukhuta avapete ndinganu.
Ulwakhuva nikhudovile, ulwedikho lwakho lulekhe ukhufwa. Apya ukhiliwikhe kavili uvakhaganchage, avalu khololo.”
U Peteri akhambula, “Dada, nili tayari ukhuluta nunu khukhikugwanakhuvufwe.”
U Yesu akhanda, “Nikhukhuvula, Peteri, ilikhogove salikhavike ilelo, wusumbelile mara khadatu ukhuta umayile.”
Pwu U Yesu akhambula, “Navile nevakhelikhe umwe khinchila mpakho, ikhitundu ikhya finu, au ifilato, pwu mkhalemilwe khinu?” Vakhanda ate.”
Akhavavula, “Lino, khilaunyapako, agutole ponie nekhitundu ikhyafi akula. Ulauvealivuvule emundu yenogile agunche ikhanjo ya mwene agule khimo.
Ulwakhuva nikhuvavula, nchoni inchisimbiwe khuliune ipakha nchikwela, 'Atoliwe ndumunu uviadenyile indagilo; Ulwakhuva khila ikhyanchoviwe khulyone khikwelile.”
Pwu akhanehove, Dada, lola! Pwunchile apa imundu ivele.” Pwuakhavavula “yekhwelile.”
Wuvalile ikhyakhulya ikhyakhu kimihe, U Yesu akhahega, nduwu akhavombage imisekhe gwini, akhaluta khukyamba ikhya Mizeituni, vkhongi vakhakhonga.
Vavilevafikhe, akhavavula, “Mdovage ukhuta mlekhe ukhwigela mudugelo.”
Akhaluta khuvutali navene ndu khulaha iliwe, akhafugama akhadova.
Akhata, “Dada, unasewinogwa ghe nchechenche ikhiywelo ikhi. Yelekhe ukhuva nduwuninogwa une, uvunogwe wakho vukhogiwage.”
Avasug'wa ukhuhuma khukhyanya akhagihumila, akhampa amakha.
Wualipakhutamwa, akhadova khunumbula yoni, nedwinga amavaha agakhisa galikhugwa pasi.
Avileasisimwikhe ukhuhuma khukhwisaya, akaluta khuvakhogi, akhavona vagonelile ulwakheva vasusuvile,
Akhavuncha, khikhi mugonelela? Sisimukha mudovage, ukhulamulekhe ukhwigila mudogelo.”
Avile baduipinchova, lola, ikhipuga ikhivaha ikhya vanu khikha humila nu Yudaiskariote, ukhukogi va mwene akhava logoncha. Akhincha karibu nu Yesu ukhuta amwabasye,
Pwu u Yesu akhambula, “Yuda, lweli vukhubuda umwana va Ndaveti nukhumwabasya?”
Usikhi gulaavelepawipi nu Yesu vavile valolile ncho, vakhanchova, Dada, tuvegede ni mundu?”
Pwu yumo akhantova umbombi va Ntwa, akhageda imbulukhutu iya khudio.
U Yesu akhanda, “Iyeyekhwelile. Akhabasya imbolukhutu yamwene akhaponia.
U Yesu akhanchova khuNtwa umbakha, nakhuvavaha vatembile, nakhuvadyakoni avainchile khiyume numwene. Pwu mwikhwincha ndavanu aviluluta khwilwa navalyasi, ninyambunda ni mundu?
Upwanekhale numwe isinchuchooni mtembile, samkhavigha amavokho giyo khutwe khulione. Lin khavalilo khako, nuvuvaha uwakhisi.”
Vakhamwibata, vakhandogoncha, vakhaghilikha khunyumba iya Ntwa umbaha. U Peteri alikhukonga khuvutali.
Vavile vapulile umwoto musebule iyagati vakhatama panie, u Peteri akhatama pagati pavene.
Umbombi yumo undala akhambona u Peteri u pwu atamile palumuli uluhumana nu mwoto, akhandola akhambula, “Uyu umunu akhalepaninie nave.”
U Peteri akhabeva, akhata, “Vindala uve, unesanimajile.”
Pwu akhasikhe khadebe, umunu uyuge akhambona akhata, “Nayeve ulipaninie nave.” U Peteri akhanda, “Vigosi uve, une sionene.”
Baada ya khavalino khamo ugosi yumo akhamumilincha akhata, “Lweli umunu uyu mwope akhale paninie nawe, ulwakhuva Ngalilo ya.”
Pwu u Peteri akhanchova, “Vigosi uve, sanelemayile uliwunchova.” Avileinchova, ilikhogove likhavikha.
Akhasyetukha, Untwa akhandola U Peteri. Nu Peteri akha kumbukha ilimenyu lya Ntwa pala upwuambulile, “Wulikhale ukhuvekha ilikhogove vukhumbela une mara khadatu.”
Akhaluta khunji, u Peteri akhalila khukhisa lweli.
Vala avagosi avandolelaga u Yesu, valikhukhinda nukhu ntova.
Vakhagubekha amikho, vakhambuncha, vakhata, “Langula! Veni uveakhutovile?”
Vakhanchova inogwa inyingi incho savombele u Yesu nukhumbeda umwene.
Wavilevukhile panavusikhu, avangyakhoni vakhalundamana paninie, navavahavavatwa na vasimbi.
Vakhaghilikha khubalasa, Vakhata, “Unane uve vevekreste utuvule.'
'Umwene akhavavula, “Ndanivavula, samukhanyedeke, Ndanivavunche, samukhanyande.”
Ukhutegulila lino nukhwendelela, umwana va Ndaveti iva atemile khukhivoko ikhyandyo ikhya Nguluve.”
Voni vakhanchova, “Khwukhwuta uve ulemwana va Nguluve?” Pwu u Yesu akhavavula, umwe munchovile une nene.”
Vakhanchova, “Khekhi tupilonda uvusaidi? Ulwakhava nayofwe tupulikhe ukhuhuma mondomo gwa mwene.”
Ululundamano lwoli lukhima, vakhaghilikha u Yesu khwa Pilato.
Vakhategula uuhumbeda, vakhaya, “Tumbwene munu uyo iyanche ikhilunga kyeto, wuibencha uuhuhumya isongo khutwa, pwu akhinchova umwene ukhuta vekreste, ukhurudeva.”
U Pilati akhambunchaakhata, “Uve veve khuludeva vavayuta?” U Yesu akhanda akhata, “Uve vevewichova iwo.”
U Pilati akhambula Untwa umbakha na vayaluluneleno,
“Sanikhuyevona inongwa khu munu uyu.” Avene vakhagega vakhata, “Akhasogelenchaga avanu, alikhumanyisya khuvuyahudi khwoni, ukhutengulila khugalilea lino aliapa.”
U Pilati avileapulikhe inchi, akhavuncha umunu uyuva khugalile?
Avilealumanyile ukhuta alepasi pavulongonchi wa Herode, namwope ale khu Yerusalemu khufigono vila.
Herode avile ambwene u Yesu, akhowikhe fincho ulwa uhava alondaga uuhumbona isikhu nyingi. Apolikhe inogwa ncha mwene alekhunogwa ukhulola ifichago ifivombukha nu mwene.
Herode akhambula u Yesu amamenyu amingi, u Yesu sakhanda khinu.
Avatwa avavakha paninie na vasimbi vakhima nuluvipo nukhughiga.
U Herode paninie na vasikhali vamwene, vakhadukhila nukhumbelda, nu khufwekha imienda iminonu, pwavakha khilivula u Yesu khwa Pilati.
Herode nu pilati vakhavavumanyani uuhuma isikhu ila, (khuwadilo valefitina).
U Pilati akhavilaga paninie avatwa avavakha na valogonchi na vanu voni,
Akhavavula, “Mugegile umunu uyu ndu munu uveilogoncha avanu vavombage imbivi mulolage, wune mbunche khuvulogolo ukhuliumwe, saniyewene inogwa khumunu uyu khunogwa nchoni inchu umwe msitakhile umwene.
Akhabela, u Herode, akhiwile khuliufwe, lolaga khisikhuli khikhwoni akhiavombile iklunogelanice itabu iya vufwe.
Pwu nikhug'ega nukhundakha.
Lulwakhuva u Pilati adendulile ukhugwa yumo khuvayahudi usikhe ukhwa lukhekhelo.
Voni vakhapwata, vakhata, “Mug'enche uywa, mutodendulile u Baraba!”
U Baraba akhugiwe khunogwa ncha mwene mumbunchege nukhuluda.
U Pilati akhambula khavili, alikhunogwa ukhundekha u Yesu.
Avenevalikhupwuta, valikhuta, “Abudiwage, abudiwage.”
Akhavavuncha ulwadatu, “Umunu uyu avombile vuvivivukhi? Saneyewene inongwa iyikhugegela ufwe umwene. Apyaniemalile ukhuntova nikhindikhesya.”
Pwu valikhukhasya khulupwate uluvakha, valikhukhunogwa abudiwage. Amameyu gavenu galikhugiga u Pilati.
Pwu u Pilati akhalamula ukhavapa uvunogwa wavo.
Akhandekhesya ulauvivanogwagwa uveakhugiwe khunogwa iya mbivi nukhubuda. Pwu akhag'umya u Yesu khuvunogwe wavo.
Valivelikhug'elekha, vakhamwibata umunu yumo alikhutambuliwa Simioni uvakhukirene, akhumilekhukhilunga, vakhatwekha ikhidamig'ania, au khukhoga u Yesu.
Ululundamano lwa vanu, na vadala avavipele nuuhulila khwaajili ya mwene, valikhukhonga.
Pwu akhavasyetukhila, u Yesu akhavavula, “Mwivakhencha vamu Yerusalemu, mlekhe ukhudilila una, mwililelage yumwe navana vinyo.
Lolaga, ifigonofi khwincha valata, “Vasayiwe avasavikhola na matumbu gagosaulilola, namavele ugasagosinche.
Pwuvalafivulaga ifyamba, “Mtugwele, 'Nutwamba, 'Mtugubekhile.'
Vanavevivombo inogwa incho khubikhi umwigu, yiva ndakhekhi gugavekhuvumile?”
Avagosi vavili avage, avanangi vaveli, vagegiwa paninie vakhabudiwe.
Vavilevafikhe apitambuliwa Fuvu lya twe, pwuvakhambuda paninie navala avatulanogwa, yumo khungyo nuyuge khuhege.
U Yesu akhata, “Dada uvasyekhele, ulwakhuva savalumayile inchovivomba. “Avene vakhatova ekura, ukhugava emienda gwemwene.
Avanu vaimile valikhulola avalogonchi vavo wuvikhubeda, vita, “Avapokhile avage, lino wipokha yuve, anave umwene ve Kreste umwana va Nguluve, umbalanche.”
Avasikhali navope valikhubeda, vakhahegelela khumwene, nukhupa isiki,
Valikhuta, “unave uve ulikhiludeva vavayuta wipokhe yove”
khwale nuvusimbe pakyanya uwasimbiwe”UYU VE KHULUDEVA VAVAYULE.”
Utulanogwa yumo akhadukha akhata, “Uve siveve Krete? Wipokhe yove nafwe”
Pwu uyugekhanda akhanda, akhadukha akhata, “Uve savukhudwada u Nguluve, nayuve ulimbukhegi vuvuwa?
Ufwe pwutuleapa khuvuyelweli, ulwakhuva ufwe tukhwambilila khila ikhinogelanile khumbomboncheto. Umunu uyovombile ikhivivi.”
Akhogelenche, “Yesu, ugumbukhage apyawukhigela khuludwa lwakho.”
U Yesu akhambula, “Wideghage nikhuuhuvula, ilelo iye wivapaninie nunu khuludeva.”
Apogwale usikhi saa tisa, ikhisi yekhincha ikhiluga khyoni mpakha saa tisa,
Ulumuli lwa linchuva lukhanchima. Pwu umwenda ugwamutembile gukha diefukha pagati ukhuhuma khukyanya.
Akhalila fincho, u Yesu akhata, “Dada mmavokho gakho nikhuyevikha inumbula yago, “Avileachovile ewo akhafwa.
Pwu u Akhida avileawenenchivombikhe ewo akhag'inia Unguluve akhata, “Lweli umunu uyu akhale golofu.”
Ululundamano lwa vanu avainchila paninie kwilola vavilevalolile imbombo inchivombikhe, valikhuvuya vitova ififuvafyavene.
Pwu avamanyani vamwene, navadala avakhogile ukhukhuma khugalitaya vaimilekhuvutali valikhulola imbombo incho.
Lola, pale numunu alikhutambuliwa Yusufu, alepanie na vakhagi, umunu unonu ugolofu,
(Saidekhane nuvulamunchi wa mbombo nchavo), ukhukhuma, kukhu Arimathayo mumbunchege uwa vavayula, uwapulikhega uludeva lwa Nguluve.
Umunu uyu, akhahegelela khwa Pilati, akhadova umbili gwa Yesu.
Akhamwisya, nukhubina numwenda akhambikha mumbuguli uwapunji wa iliwe, ilyoasikhuli umunuaviagelile ukhufyeliwa.
Khyale khigono, khyakhutegulila Isabato wuyekhagelile.
Avadala, avakhumile nave khutalilenya, valikhukonga, vakhalola ilipumba numbile gwamwenu wuvagoninche.
Vakhavuya nukhutegula ukhuboda, imono inonu, ikhigono ikhya sabato vakhagatolukha ukhukhoga indagilo.
Isikhu iya khwanja iya mulungu panavusikhu wukhilo, vakhincha khulipumba, vakhagega imono inchuvavikhile.
Vakhavona iliwe libelwikhe khuvutali nelipumba.
Vakhigila mugati, savakhuvuna umbili ukhwa kuludeva u Yesu.
Ikhahumila ukhuta usikhi wuvancha ganyikhiwe khueli, nambivi, avanu vavili vakhima pagati pavene vafualile imienda ig'iga ragadekhaa.
Avadala vakhadega ulususuvalo vakhasulekha imifwe givo pasi, vakhavula avadala, “Khekhi mukhondonda uvianchukhile kufwe?
Asipali apa, anchukhile! mkumbukhe uwoachovile numwe wualikhu Galilaya,
Akhanchova ukhuta umwana va Ndaveti mpakha ahumenchiwe mumavokho gavatula nungwa nukhutefiwe, isikhu iyadatu, anchukhe khavili.”
Avadala valavakha khumbukhe amaneyu gamwene,
Vakhakhilivukha ukhuhuma khulipumba vakhavavula inogwa incho nchoni vala khinchigo nayumo paninie navagevoni.
Pwu uMaria Magadarene, Joana, Maria u mama va Yakhobo, navadala avage paninie vakhakhumiya udomo ugu khuvasukhiwa.
Pwu amameyu agha khagha vonekha vudesi khuvasukhiwa, savakhavidekha avadala vala.
U Peteli akhasisimukha, akhagilaukhuluta khulipumba, alikhu hugila nukhulola mugati, akhayevona isandayene. Pwu u Peteli akhahega ukhuluta khu nyumba ya mwene, alikhudega khikhi khihumile.
Lola, vavili pakhati pavene valikhulutaikhigono khilakhila mumbunchege uvotambuliwa Emmau, khuyeleimaili sitini ukhuma khu Yerusalemu.
Valikhunchova vavokhwa vavo inogwa nchoni inchihumile.
Usekhe vavile vikhinchofancha nukhu vunchana amaswali, u Yesu akhahegelela pawipi akhalogonchana navo.
Amikho gavene gakhadendiwa ukhumanya umwene.
U Yesu akhavavula, “Khinu khikhi ikhyumwinchova umwe vavili mwu mugenda?” Vakhima pala vakhava na lususuvalo.
Yumu ilitawalyamwene vecleopa, akhanda, '“Uve veve munu vimwe ne apa pa Yerusalemu yuwe supulikhe inogwa inchihumile khunu iskhu inchi?”
U Yesu akhavavula, “Nogwa nyikhi?” Vakhanda, “Inogwa incha Yesu Unazareti, uviakhale Nyamalago, unyamakha khumbombo na mameyu khumiho ga Nguluve na khuvanu voni.
Avatwa navalogonchi veto vakhaghu minche khuhegiwa uvufwe nu khu budiwa.
Tulikhuhuvila ukhuta umwene veikhuvavikha mumbolegefu avaya Israeli. Paninie ninchi nchoni, ilelo khigano khyadatu ukhuhuma imbombo inchi nchivombekha.
Pwu vaninie avadala ukhuhuma khukhipuga khyeto vakhatudwaanchinehe, wuvalutile panavusikhu khulipumba.
Swaguwene umbili gwa mwene, vinaile vinchova ukhuta vakha lolile avasug'wa avakhakha nchovile ukhuta anchukhile mwumi.
Avagosiavage avakhalale paninie nufwe vakhalutile kulipumba, vanchiwene nduwuvakha nchovile avadala. Savakhambone umwene.”
U Yesu akhavavula, “umwe mwavanu vapelwa mleninumbula inchifu inchakhulekha ukhwidikha nchoni unchovachovile avayamalago!
Sayalelweli u Yesu ukhutesiwa khunogwa incho, nukhwigila kuludeva kwa mwene?”
Ukhutegulila khwa Mose na vasug'wa voni, u Yesu akhavavula imbombo inchamwene inchilembufimbe woni.
Vavile vakhegelile mumbunchege vula, valikhuluta u Yesu akhava inogwa ukhwendelela khuvulugolo.
Vakhamwumilencha, vakhata, “Lama paninie nufwe, ilwakhuva lino wilile nesikhu yesilile.”Pwu u Yesu akhigila khutama navo.
Yakhumile ukhuta, avile atamile navo pakhulya, akhatola ikhivanda akhakhisaya, nukhumenyula, akhavapa.
Pwu amikho gavene gakhadenduliwa vakhamanye, akhayaganikha nambivi khumikho gavene.
Vakhavunchena vavo khwa vavo, “Ulu inumbula ncheta sanchikhavikhe mugati ndufwe, usekhe wuinchova nufwe munjila, wuikhutundindulila uvusimbe?”
Vakhema usikhe gugwa, nukhukhilivukha khu Yerusalemu. Vakhavavona vala khinchigo nayumo valundamine paninie, navalaavale paninie navo,
Vakhata, Untwa anchukhile lweli lweli, agumile u Simoni.”
Pwuvakhavavula imbombo inchihumile munchele, nuwu u Yesu avonikhe khuvene khuvene pakhumeyule inchivanda.
Wuvinchova inogwa incho, u Yesu yuywa akhema pagati pavene, akhavavula, “uluhungu luve numwe.”
Vakhadwada lukhadega ulutende, vali khusaga ukhuta vayewene inumbula.
U Yesu akhavavula, khekhi msikhitikha? Khekhi amameyu gilihuma munumbula ncheyo?
Mlolage amavokho gago namalunde gago, ukhuta neneyune. Muyilate mlole. Ulwakhwa inimbula yenchila nyamana manchege, nduwumwilola une nilinafyo.”
Avileamale akhunchova, ewo, akhavavonesya amavokho gamwene namalunde gamwene.
Vavilebadu vakhowike nukhulekha ukhwidikha, nukhuswiga, u Yesu akhavavula, “Mulinakhyo akhyakula?”
Vakhampaekhemegu khyasomba iyuvanyanyile.
U Yesu akhatola nukhula khuvulogolo uhuvene.
Akhavavula, “Upwunekhale numwe, nikhavavulile ukhuta nchoni inchisi mbiwe khudagilo invha Mose navanyamalago ne Zaburi impakha nchi khwela nile.”
Pwu akhadendula igala nchova, ukhuta vavumaye uvusimbe.
Akhavavula, “Ukhuta yesimbiwe, u Kreste mpakha atesekhe, nukhunchhukha ukhuhuma kuvufwe ikhigono ikhya datu.
Ukhupela nukhusyekheliwa imbivi impakha nchilumbeliliwe khulitawa lya mwene khuviluga fyoni, ukhuma khu Yerusalemu.
Numwe mlivamasaidi va nogwa inchi.
Mlolage, nikhuvahelekhela ululegilo lwa Dada vago khukyanya khulimwe. Pwu mpulikhele bahapa mumbunchega mpakha apyamvikhava amakha ukhuhuma khukyanya.
Pwu u Yesu akhavalogoncha ichunji impakha vavilevafikhe khu Bethania. Akhinula amavokho gamwe khu khyanya, akhavasaya.
Ikhahumila avile ikhuvasaya, akhava lekha akhapimbiwa ukhuluta khukhya
Pwu vakhamindekha, nukhuvuya khu Yerusalemu vahowikhe.
Valikhupitama mtembile wuvikhudova Unguluve.
Pavutengulelo pala nie limenyu, nie limenyu lwale paninie nu Nguluve, nie limenyu ahava ve Nguluve.
Elimenyu elwavutengulile lwale paninie nu Nguluve.
Ifinu fyoni fyavombikhe ukhugendela khumwene, upwasipali umwene sakhikhavombekha ekhenu khyokhyoni.
Igati mumwene mwalemo nu wumi, nu wumu uwa wale lumuli lwa vanuvoni.
Utumuli lumulekha mukhisi, pakhuva ekhisi sayikhanchimye.
Pale nu munu uvyasukhiwe ukhuma khwa Nguluve, uve mwene elitawa ve Yohana.
Ainchile wila imwemwelenchi khulolela ulumuli lulla, khukhula voni vawesye ukhwedekha ukhugendela mumwene.
U Yohana sale velumuli, khukhuta akhinchile khwilola ulumuli.
Ulwa lwale lulumuli ulwayelweli ululwa inchile inkelunga khukhombekha ulumuli vevoni.
Alepo pakhelunga, nekhelunga khyavombiwe ukhugendela mumwene, ne khelunga sakhikhamanya.
Ainchile ni vinu fya mwene, na vanu vamwene savakhamwupelela.
Pakhuva avingi avakhamwedikhe, avakhedikhe elitawa elwa mwene, pwa vapile elweli ukhuva vana va Nguluve.
Avakholiwe, sio khunkisa, wala khuvunogwe uwambele, khukhuta khuvuga ne uwa munu, pakhuva yu Nguluve mweve.
Nelimenyu lwavombiwe imbele lyatamile igati mulyufwe, tuluwene, uluginwo lwa mene, uluginwo ulwa munu uyale mwene khwa baba, adenchiwe uluhungu ulwayelweli.
U Yohana emivele egwamwene, pwa khaloncha elimenyu akhata, “Uyo ve mwene venekhanchoovile ululagelo ulwa mwene, “Uyikhwincha khusana khulyune vembakha khuvoni, ulwakhuva alepo kabla yango.”
Pakhuva pakhukhuma pavugolofu wa mwene, pakhuva twevoni twupelile emivombele paa mivombele.
Pakhuva ululagelo lwainchile ukhugendela khwa Musa. Uluhungu ulwayelweli lwainchile ukhugendela khwa Yesu Klisiti.
Asikhuli umunu avambwene u Nguluve usekhe gwoni. Umu ve mwene uNguluve, uvalepakhefuva ekhwa Nguluve, ambikhile umwene amanyekhe.
Pa khuva ege gyu mivele gya Yohana akhasekhe akhademi uvakhulawi avasukhiwe khumwene Avayahudi khukhomboja, “Uve ve veni?”
Pakhuva tudwadadwada nivi sipali pwa khavone, “Une sio Klisiti.”
Pu vakhambuncha, “Uve ve venile no?” Uve ve Eliya? Ahanchova, “Akhata one siyo.” Vakhanchoova, Uve ve nyamalago? Akhanchova,” akhata amuna.”
Tena puvakhambula, “Uve ve veni, khukhuta tuvavule anda avavatu sukhile”? Vukhevekhela ndeti emivele vemwene?”
Ahanchoova, “Ahata une nene limenyu elelikhwelanga ndu gima: 'Golosya enjela eyambakha,' ndo lwa nyamalago u Isaya vuakhanchoovile.”
Pakhuva pale na vanu avavasukhiwe ukhukhuma khwa Vafalisayo. Vakhambuncha nukhunchoova,
“Pa khuva khekhi vukhwoncho inave uveve sio ve Klisiti vala Eliya vala nyamalago?”
U Yohana avandile akhanchoova, “Nikhwoncha khu magasi. Pakhuva, inganti indyumwe ayikhwema umunu uyusamumanyile.
Uyo veikhwincha usekhe ugwango. Une saninogelanile ukhulege sya indegekhe incha filatu ifya mwene.”
Imbombo inchi nchavombiwe hu Bethania, khumwambo khu Yordani, aponu upwalekhuvomba uYohana ukhwonchaa.
Emisekhe egegwakokile u Yohana akhambona u Yesu ikhwincha khumwene inchoova, “Lola eng'osi eya Nguluve yikhwincha khulola imbivi incha khelunga!
oyo venekhanchovile ukhuta indagelo inchamwene nekhanchova, “Umwene uvikhwincha khu sana khulyune vembakha khulutelela one, ulwakhuva ale mbolongolo indyune.'
Sanekhagundule yeyoni, pakhuva yavombiwe eve ukhuta adendoliwe mu Israeli, pakhuva nainchile khukhwoncho na magasi.”
U Yohana ale nemivele, “Nekhalolile umepo ikhwikha ukhukhu makhukwanya nekhekhwani ekhwa khengondya, puyikhasigile pakanya pa mwene.
Unene sanekhagundule ila umwene asukhile nonche na magasi ambolile, 'Ula uvevukhombona nu mepo vuikhwikha nukhwikha nukhutama nu mwene, Pakhuva oywa veikhwoncha nu mepo umbalanche.'
Nelolile ne mivele ukhuta oyu ve swambe va Nguluve.”
Pakhuva akhasekhe akhakhalikhukongo u Yohana akhamile paninie na vakongi vamwene vavele,
vambwene u Yesu igenda nu Yohana akhanchova, “Lola, eng'osi eya Nguluve!”
Avakongi vavile vakhapulekha oyoha na voinchova ita tukongage o Yesu.
Pu Yesu akhapendukha akhavavona avakongi vikhokonga, pwa khavavula, “Mwinongwa ekhekhi?” Vakhanda, “Rabbi, (Pakhuva pene 'indongonchi,' vutama ndakhu?”
Akhavavula, “Mwinche mulole. “Puva khaluta vakhalola esehemu eyi tamaa, vatamile pupaninie esikhu eyo, ulwa khuva yale ukhuta khasekhe kha lwakhemikhe.
Yumo paninie pavale vavele uveakhapulikhe u Yohana voinchova ukhuta tukonge uyise ale ve Andrea, lokololwe va Simoni Petro.
Akhambona olokololwe u Simoni nukhumbula, “Tumbwene umasihi” (Uvinchovivwa ukhutave Klisiti).
Akhagega khwa Yesu. U Yesu akhandola nukhuncova, “Uve ve Simoni veswambe va Yohana ya vukhelangiwa ve Kefa,” (pakhuva ve 'Petro').
Akhasekhe akhakhakongile uYesu vuinogwa ukhukhega ukhuluta khu Galilaya, akhambona o Filipo nu khumbula, “In'ongage one.”
U Filipo atamaga khu Bethsaida, ekhelunga ekhwa Andrea nu Petro.
Ufilipo akhambwene Unathanaeli nukhumbula, tumbwene uyakhatile Umusa andikhe indagelo incha mwene nu lulagelo uluva nyamalago. U Yesu uswambe va Yusufu, ukhukhuma khu Nazareti.
Nathanaeli akhambula, “Je ekhenu khweto khiwesya ukhukhumila khu Nazareti?” U Filipo akhambula, Wincho ulole.”
U Yesu akhambona Nathanaeli vu ikhwincha khumwene nukhunchova, “Lola, Mwisraeli lweli lweli uyo sideta igati mumwene!”
Nathanaeli akhanchova, “Umanyile ndakhekhi one?” U Yesu akhanda akhambula, “Pakhuva u Filipo vu sakhwelangile vulepasi pabebhe, ne khakhuwene.”
U Nathanaeli akhanda, “Rabi uve uleswambe va Nguluve! Uveve ve intwa vakhu Israeli!”
U Yesu akhanda akhambula, ulwa khuva nakhuvulile 'nakhuwene pasi pabekhe' je vukhwekha? Yuwilola amambo amavakha khuligo aga.”
U Yesu akhanchova, “Lweli lweli mula khevona ekhelunga vukhelunga vukhidendukha, nukhuvavona avasung'wa vovitoga nu khwikha pa kwanya paswambe va Adamu.”
Osekhe ugwa sikhu idatu, khwalekho nu weng'ani khu Kana eya Galilaya nu mamaye Yesu alekho okhwa.
U Yesu na vakongi va mwene vailangiwe khuweng'ani.
Osekhe uguyasilile edivai, uma maye Yesu akhavavula, “Valevu vule divai.”
UYesu akhanda, “Uvedala eyoyi khonanga ekhekhi one? Usekhe gwango one bado sagufikhe.”
Umamaye akhavavula avavombi, “Khyokhyoni egeyakhuva vikhuva vula vombaga.”
Pakhuva pale na majelo sita agaliwe agavavekheli gakhukala va paselekhe eya vayahudi, khela lijelo lwale nuvujitu vwa mbili tatu.
U Yesu akhanchova, “Mudenche amagasi mumajelo aga mawe.” Vakhadencha impakha pakhwanya.
Pu akhavavula avavombi vala, “Tola khedebe mukhelekhe khumbombi ombakha uva mesa.” Vavombile nduluvasukhiwe.
Ombombi ombakha akhavonja amagasi agagagevwikhe ukhuva divai, pakhuva sakhalumanya ukhugakhumile (pakhuva avavombi avavatumile amagasi vagamanyile ukhugikhuma). Puakhamwelanga umbakha va wekhani.
Akhambula, “Khela munu ikhwanja ukhuvupilincha avanu edivai enonu vangagale ikhuvapa yeyo sanonu. Pakhuva uveve uvekhile edivai enonu mpakha olo”
Ekhedego ekhwa khu Kana ya Galilaya, lwale lulutengulelo ulwa mivonekhelo egwa khedego ekhwavombile u Yesu, vukhwinula uluginwo ulwa mwene, pakhuva avakongi vamwene vakhamwidekha.
Osekhe ogo, Yesu, umama vamwene, avalokololwe vamwene na vakongi vamwene valutile khukhelunga khwa Kapernaum puvakhatama okhwa akhasekhe khadebe.
Pakhuva ekhwakha khwa Vayahudi khekhasogile, pakhuva u Yesu akhalutile khu Yerusalemu.
Avavwene avagujanchi ava senga, ing'osi ne vingundya mugati mutembile. Navavi khupesanwe indalama vale igati mutembile.
U Yesu akhatengenesya ondegekhe ugule nefikhodekho, avakhuminehe vooni avale igati mutembile, pupaninie isenga nei ngosi akhadiuda indalama incha vavikhwu pesanya indalama nukhugevusya imeza inchavene.
Khuvala avaviguncha ifingondya, “Khencha ifinu ifi khutali naapa, bekhela okhovomba etembile eya Nguluve vango ukhuva khevanja khwa sokhoni.”
Avakongi va mwene vakumbwikhe ukhuta yasimbiwe, “Uwivu uwa nyumba yakho vulandya.”
Avavakha Avayahudi vakhanda, vakhambula, Yu njila yilekhu eyakha vuvonesya pakhuva vuvomba imbombo inchi?”
U Yesu akhanda, mugwesye etembile eye nayune nikhuyemekha akhasekhe kha sigono sidatu.”
Leno avavakha va Vayahudi vakhanchova, “Lwatolile akhasekhe akhamilongo arobaini na sita ukhujenga etembile eye nuve wita vukhulejenga akhasekhe kha sigono vitatu?”
Inave, omwene anchovile ukhuta etembile eya mbele ugwa mwene.
Pakhuva usekhe na khasekhe akhakhunchukha umwene ukhukhuma khuvafwile, avakongi vamwene valumanyile ukhuta anchovile evo, vakhedekha ovosimbe ne limenyu elyu Yesu akhumile pakhunchova.
Pakhuva vuale khu Yerusalemu akhasekhe akha Pasaka, asekhe ugwa sikukuu avanu vingi valekongile elitawa lwamwene, pakhuva vakhalolile ekhedego ekhe khavombikhe.
Pakhuva u Yesu alenchila lwedekho navene pakhuva ava manyile avanu vooni.
Salekhunogwa umunu vevoni ukhumbula vuvalevo avanu pakhuva akhemanyile ekhelegati muvene.
Pakhuva pale nu Falisayo ovikhela ngiwa Nikodemo, paninie na vafumbwe vavakhegi va Vayahudi.
Umunu oyo akhandutile umbakha u Yesu pakelo nukhumbula, “Rabi, tulumanyile ukhuta ulemanyisi ukhukhuma khwa Nguluve, pakhuva asikholi uyiwesya ukhavomba indagelo nchooni incha Nguluve pupaninie numwene.”
U Yesuakhanda, “Lweli, lweli, umunu siwesya ukhwingela muvotwa ovwa Nguluve angalekhe okhokholiwe mala ya vele.”
Unikodemo akhanchova, “Umunu iwesya ndakhekhi okhokholiwa angave igogolo? Siwesya okhwingila igati mulitumbo elwa mama vamwene mala ya vele nu khukholwa, je yiwesekhana?”
U Yesu akhavanda, “Lweli, lweli umunu inave sikholiwa na magasi nu Mepo, siwesya okhwingila muvutwa owa Nguluve.
Ekhekholiwe nu mbele khya mbele, ne khekholiwe khu Mepo khwa mepo.
Mulekhe okhosyiga pakhuva nekhavavolile, vinogiwa okhokholiwa akhasekhe akhavele.'
Emepu yikula khwakhwoni okhuyinogwa ne savoti ya yene mukhuyipolekha, pakhuva samukhweliwa ukhuwikhuma khuwi luta. Voyelevo ehali eyakholiwe nu mepo.
Unikodemo akhanda, nu khunchova, “Imbombo inchi nchiwesekhana ndeti?”
U Yesu akhanda, “Uveve ve ndogonchi vava Israeli, pakhuva sunchimanyile imbombo inchi?
Lweli, lweli, nikhokhovula, khela ekhetu khemanyile nemivele nukholola. Pakhuva samukhwopelela emivele gweto.
Inave nevavalile imbombo incha pakhelunga samukhwedekha, yamuwesya okhwedekha ningavavole imbombo incha khukwanya?
Pakhuva asikholi oya togile khukwanya pakhuva khukwanya pakhuva umwene oyoakhikhile, oswambe va Adamu.
Pu yengave ndo Musa uluakhayemikhe enjokha khulijangwa, vovolevole umwaleve va Adamu lasima emenchiwe,
pakhuva vooni avavikhumwedekha vave nu wumi uwa sikhu nchooni.
Pakhuva khunjila eye Unguluve akheganile ekhelunga, khukhuta oswambe va mwene, khukhuta amunu oyikhamwedekha alekhe okhosaga ila ave nu wumi wa sikhu nchooni.
Pakhuva u Nguluve sakhasukhe oswambe pakhelunga ili akhege ekhelunga, khukhuta ekhelunga khepone okhogendela omwene.
Oyikhomwamini sakhakhegiwe. Oyosikhomwamini tayali akhegiwe pukhuva salwaminile ilitawa elwa swambe va Nguluve.
Eye yonjila ya vukhegi, pakhuta olomuli lwinchile nkelunga, pakhuva avanu vakhano gwa ekelo saidi ya olomuli pakhuva imbombo inchavo nchale mu mbivi.
Pakhuva oyivomba imbivi ikholovipela alomuli pukhuva sigenda ndomuli idwada ukhuta imbombo inchamwene yanchivonekha.
Pakhuva, oyivomba elweli ikhwincha ndomuli ni mbombo incha mwene nchivonekha ukhuta nchilimbogolofu wa Nguluve.
Akhasekhe akha, o Yesu paninie na vakongi vamwene vakhaluta khukhelunga khwa Yudea. Okwa atolile akhasekhe paninie na vene alevooncha.
Pakhuva u Yohana alekhwoncha khukhukhwu Ainea igati mu Salim pakhuva pale na magasi mingi avanu valekhwincha khumwene nu khwonchiwa,
pakhuva Oyohana sakhadendeliwa igati.
Pakhuva savalekhwelevana avakongi Yohana na Vayahudi ukhokhusu ishelekhe incha lwesayo.
Vakhaluta khwa Yohana vakhata, “Rabi, umwene uvekhale nave khumwabo khulo gasi olu Yorodani, uvemukhalolile emivele ni mbombo incha mwene, lola, ikhwoncha vooni viluta vikhukonga.”
U Yohana akhanda akhata umunu siwesya ukhwupelela ekhenu khyokhyoni pekhuva apeviwe ukhukhuma khwa Nguluve.
Yumwe nemivele gwenyo mwinchova ukhuta, 'one si Klisiti', pakhuva ya pene nekhanchovile, 'nesukhiwa khuvolongolo khumwene.'
Umwene ovale nu bibi arusi ale mbakha va harusi. Leno olokololwe va mbakha va harusi, oyikhwema nukhupulekhencha imbakha sinchopakhuva khulimenyu elya mbakha va harusi olo lulukhekhelo ulwango olwedikhe.
Inogiwa okhotoga, nayone ninogiwa okhwikha.
Ovikhuma khukyanya, alekhukyanya khugoni. Umwene uvakhelunga ikhuma mukhelunga puinchova imbombo incha khelunga. Ovikhuma khwa Nguluve alekhukyanya khugoni.
Omwene veinchova agalolile nukhupulekha, Pakhuva asipali ovikhwopelela emivele gwa mwene.
Umwene uvikhwopela emivele egwa mwene edikhe ukhu u Nguluve ve lweli.
Pakhuva avasukhiwe nu Nguluve inchova amamenyu aga Nguluve. Pakhuva sikhupa Umepo khwa khupima.
Ubaba aganile oswambe ikhupa vyooni ifilemavokho aga mwene.
Uvikhomwedekha oswambe ale nu wumi lweli, pakhuva oyosikhi mwedekha sikhovovona awumi, pakhuva uvukalale ovwa Nguluve wikhwibatana nu mwene.
Pakhuva u Yesu avile alomanyile ukhuta Mafalisayo vapulikhe ukhuta u Yesu alena vakongi nukhuvoncha khulikho u Yohana,
(pakhuva Yesu yumwene salekhwoncha ila avakongi vamwene),
akhumile khu Yudea akhaluta khu Galilaya.
Evo yale lasima okhugendela khu Samalia.
Pu akhafikha khukhelunga ekhwa Samalia, ekhekhikhelangiwa Siakari, uvuvubadaninie ne khelunga akhyapile u Yakobo oswambe u Yusufu.
Ne khekholo khwa Yakobo khwalepo apo. U Yesu agatile nukhugenda pwa khatama palukanji pakhekhulu. Khale khasekhe khapa musi.
Udala Osamalia ainchile khunega amagasi, nu Yesu akhanchova, “Ime amagasi nenywe.”
Pakhuva avakongi vamwene vakhalutile khujini khwigula ekhyakhula.
Udala ola akhambula, “Ndakhekhi uvenjahudi, akhondoma one nedala ne Samalia, akhenu ekhwa khunywa?” Pakhuva Avayahudi savikhekhanjanwa na Vasamalia.
U Yesu akhanda, “Inave akhemanyile ekhikungelwa ekhwa Nguluve, nu munu avikhukhuvola, 'Ime magasi,' ukhalevukhodova, akhale ikhukhupa amagasi aga wumi.”
Udala khanda, “Imbakha ulevovole endovo eyakhunegela, ne khekholo khetali. Vukhugavona ndakhu amagasi aga wumi?
Uveve ve mbakha, khuliko ababa veto o Yakobo, avakhatupile ekhekholo ekhe, yu mwene na vana va mwene voni paninie ni senga incha mwene nchikhanywa amagasi pa khekholo ekhe?”
UYesu akhanda, “vevoni uyinywa amagasi aga ipata ekhamu tena,
inave uvinywa amagasi aganikhupa one siwesya okhupata ekhemu tena. Pakhuva amagasi aganikhupa giva lumiminukho ulolukhwedekha isikhu nchooni.”
Udala ola akhambula, “Imbakha nidove amagasi ago nelekhe okhwumila tena, nelekhe okhotesekha okhwincha apa khwinega amagasi.”
U Yesu akhambula, “Luta khamwilango ogosi, pu vuye.”
Udala akhambula, “Nelevovole ogosi.” UYesu akhanda, “Onchovile vononu, 'Ulevovole ugosi;'
Pakhuva uvile na vagosi vakhano tena oveulenave leno sio igosi vakho, pakhuva unchovile lweli!”
Udala akhambula, “Imbakha nivona ukhuta oveve ve nyamalago.
Ava baba veto vaisayile mukhe wamba ekhe. Pakhuva omwe mwinchova mwita Yelusalemu lyo lieneo alwa vanu lwa khwesayela.”
U Yesu akhanda, “Ovedala, inyedekhe, akhasekhe khikhwincha sokhesaye khwa Baba pa khewa mba ekhe au Yerusalemu.
Mwe vanu mukhesaya ekhesa mukhevona, pakhuva twikhesaya ekhetukhevona, pakhuva ovolokhole vukhuma khu Vayahudi.”
Inave evo, osekhe gukhwincha, leno ogo apa, osekhe ogu vovikhesaya elweli yuvikhesaya khwa Baba khu mepo nelweli, pakhuva u Baba ikhovalonda avanu ndava ukhuta vanu vamwene avavi khesaya.
U Nguluve ve Mepo, na avavikhesaya yenogelanile okhwesaya khu mepo ne lweli.”
Udala akhambula, “Nelumanyile ukhuta u Yesu ikhwincha, (Ovikhelangiwa Klisiti). Oywa voikhwincha ikhotuvula gooni.” U Yesu akhavavola,
“One vevunchova nene.”
Osekhe gugugwa avakongi vamwene vakhakilivokha. Navope vakhaswiga khekhi inchoova nudala, pakhu akhasipali avakhavonchinche, “Vunogwa ekhekhi?” au khekhi vunchovanave oyo?”
Pu dala akhalelekha elitenchi akhalula khujini khuvavola avanu,
“Mwinche mulole umunu ovyanchovile imbombo nchooni inchinevombile, te yiwesekhana ukhuta ve Klisiti?”
Vakhakhuma khumuji vakhincha khu mwene.
Akhasekhe khapamusi avakongi va mwene vakhanchova, “Rabi lwiya ekhwakhula.”
Pakhuva omwene akhanchova, “One nelenakhwo ekhyakholwa ekhesamukhemanyile omwe.”
Avakongi vakhavolana, asipali uva ndetile ekhenu khyokhyoni, “Je vakhaletite?”
U Yesu akhavavula, “Ekhyakholwa khyango khuvomba uvonogelanile vwa mwene avyasukhile nu khuvomba indagelo incha mwene.
Te, samunchova, 'Pakhuva akhasekhe khadebe uvubeni vyango vuva tayali?' Nikhuvavula lolaga ifyalo vofilitayali khu vubeni!
Omwene ovibena ikhupelela emisahala nukhuvundanwa isekhe incha wumi wa sikhu nchoni, pakhuva uyivilwa nu vibena va lakhekhelaga pupaninie.
Pakhuva ovonchovi ovu wayelweli, 'Oyunge iviala oyunge ibena.'
Navasukhile khwibene ekhe tava samukhavombele, avange vavombile embombo omwe mwingile ndo khekhelo olwa mbombo eyavene.”
Avasamalia vingi vakhamwedekha pakhuva khululagelo ulwa dala ole avale khunchova ne mivele, “Ovekhambulile imbombo nchooni inchine khavombile.”
Pakhuva Avasamalia vavile vinchile vakhadova okhutama navo pupaninie navene puakhatama khuvene isikhu ivele.
Vuvingi vakhamwedekha pakhuva khumamenyu gavene.
Vakhambula udala ola, “Tukhwekha sio khumamenyu gakho, pakhuva yufwe tupulikhe, leno putulumanyile ukhuta umwene ve mbakha va khelunga.”
Osekhe ogwa vigono vivele, akhakhega nukhuluta khu Galilaya.
Pakhuva yumwene akhanchovile ukhuta venyamalago alevovole ulwedekho khukhelunga khya mwene.
Vuinchile okhukhuma khu Galilaya, ava Galilaya vakhamwupelela, vakhanchiwene imbombo nchooni inchakhavombile khu Yerusalemu mu shelekhe, pakhuva navope vule muvale mushelekhe.
Akhincha tena khu Kana eya Galilaya ukhwa ukhwagewisye amagasi ukhuva inkisa. Palepo nu mbakha oswambe ale intamu khu Kapernaumu.
Vuapulikhe ukhuta u Yesu akhumile khu Yudea nu khuluta khu Galilaya, akhaluta khwa Yesu nu khudova amwokhole omuialeve, avale kholonda okhufwa.
Pu Yesu akhambula, “Umwe mungalekhe okholola ishara ne vidego samukhawesye ukhwedekha.
Ondongonchi akhanchova, “Imbakha ekha pasi khetave omwalevango safwile.”
U Yesu akhambula lutaga omwalevo inkafu, “Umunu ola akhedekha elimenyu alelekhanchoviwe nu Yesu akhekhegela.
Pu avile avavombi vamwene vakhamwopela nukhumbula umwaleve ale inkafu.
Pu akhavavuncha osekhe gule khu akhale khuba. Vakhanda, “Pamikhe akhasekhe akha saa saba ovotamu vokhandekha.”
Pu babaye akhagundula okhuta akhasekhe khala khala akhanchovile uYesu, “Omwalevo inkafu.” Pu mwene na valokololwe vakhamwedekha.
Eye yale ishala ya vele eya vombile u Yesu voakhumile khu Yudea ukhuluta khu Galilaya.
Osekhe ogwalepo neselekhe eyavayahudi, nu Yesu akhatoga okhuluta khu Yerusalemu.
Na khu Yerusalemu khwalekho nelibilikha pandyango ugwa ng'osi, lelekhwelangiwa khu lugha eya Kiebrania Bethzatha, nalyope lwale na matao gakhano.
Enafasi embakha eya vatamu yalemo, ovesilola, ovesigenda, au avavapoosile vavile vagonile mu matao ago. {Pulekhencha: Amamenyu aga vusimbe uwa datu 3 sagivonekha munakala inonu inchakhatale. “Vovigulela amagasi okhunangiwa.”) Payelweli osekhe fula ni unsung'wa akhikha igati mu mbakha nu khunanga amagasi.
Pakhuva, ovale va khwanja okhwingila igati pakhuva amagasi gakhatibikhwe akhavombiwe okhuva inkafu okhukhumana ne khyokhyoni ekhekhamwibite khu sekhe gula.
Nu munu yumo uyakhatamwile osekhe gwa miakha thelathini na minne ale igati mu matao.
U Yesu avile ambwene vuigona igati mu matao pakhuva sakhalumanye ukhuta agonelile mula khusekhe untali u Yesu akhambula, Je vunogwa ukhova nkafu?”
Otamu ola akhanchova, “Imbakha nelevovole umunu, uvakhumbikhela pagati amagasi vugitiboliwa. Vunigela okhwingela omunu oyunge ikhwingela.”
U Yesu akhambula, “Weme otole eligodoro lwakho ulutage.”
Pu munu ola akhapona, akhatola ekhetanda khya mwene akhaluta. Ne sikhu eyo yale Sabato.
Pu Avayahudi vakhambula omunu aveakhaponile, “Elelo sikhu ya Sabato, savulukhusiwa okhogega eligodolo lwakho.”
Akhanda, omwene oveamoni nche vemwene veambumbile, “Tola eligodoro lwakho olutage.”
Vakhavuncha, “Veveni oveatolile 'Tola eligodoro lwakho olutage?”
Inave, ola ovwa poninche sakhamanye, pakhuva u Yesu akhegile khu siri. Pakhuva pale na vanu vingi amaeneo gala.
Pakhuva uYesu akhambona umunu ola mutembile akhambula, “Lola, oponile! “Olekhe okhovomba imbivi tena yuvukhwincha vukhwibatwa ni mbombo imbivi sincho.”
Umunu ola akhaluta nukhuvavola Avayahudi okhuta o Yesu veaponinche.
Evo, pakhuva ni mbombo inchi Avayahudi vakhatesya oYesu, pakhuva akhavombile imbombo inchi pa Sabato.
U Yesu akhambula, “Ubaba vango ivomba embombo impakha leo nayune nivomba imbombo.”
Pakhuva Avayahudi vakhongelencha okhundonda ili vabudesio pakhuva okhudenya eSabato, pakhuva akhamwelanga Unguluve baba va mwene, vuikhevekha sawa ndo Nguluve.
U Yesu akhavanda, “Lweli, lweli, omwana siwesya okhuvomba khyokhyoni pakhuva ekhyambwene obabaye voivomba, pakhuva khyokhyoni akhivomba obaba akhivomba khyu ekhyo omwana khevomba.
Pakhuva obaba aganile oswambe, nukhundaga khela khenu ekhivomba nu khumbonesya imbombo imbakha okhulutelela inchi ili vendelele okhoswiga.”
Pakhuva nduluyelevo obaba voikho vanchosya avafwe nu khuvapa uwumi, ukhulingana nu mwana ikhupa vevoni oveaganile.
Pakhuva obaba sikhong'ega vevoni, olwakhova apile omwana avokhege vwoni
ili voni vamweshimu omwana ndulu mwana ovoikhomweshi Obaba. Ovesikhomweshimu obaba avasungile.
Lweli, lweli, omwene uvipulekha elimenyu lwango nukhunyidekha one uveasukhile alenu wumi uwa sikhu nchoni na sakhakhegiwe. Pakhuva omwene, agendile khuvufwe nu khwingela khu wumi.
Lweli, lweli, nikhuvavola osekhe gukhwincha ugo avafwe vipolekha esavoti eya swambe va Nguluve, vooni avayakha vipolekha vitamaga.
Pakhuva ndu Baba vualenu wumi igati mumwene,
pakhuva ampile oswambi owumi igati mu mwene, nu Baba ampile oswambe onsung'wa pakhuta akhege olwakhuva iswambe va Adamu.
Mlekhe okhoswiga ele, pakhuva akhasekhe khikhwincha akha vafwe vooni avale makabuli ya vipolekha esavuti eya mwene
na vope yavikhuma khunji: Avavavombile amanonu vinchokha khu wumi, na avavombile imbivi vinchokha khuvukhegi.
Saniwesya okhovomba ekhenu khyokhyoni ukhukhuma khulyune nemwene, ndolunipulekha, vuevo vunikhega nu khukhega khwango elweli pakhuva saninogwa wango, pakhuva uvogane owa mwene ovwasukhile.
Inave nikhevombela emivele nemwene, emivele gwango sagyagiva ne lweli.
Khuleyunge oyilola emivele ukhukongana nune nelumanyile ukhuta emivele egevukhumbula mivele gwa ye lweli.
Musukhile khwa Yohana ne mivele gya lweli.
Pakhuva, emivele nupelile sagikhuma khu munu. Ninchova aga pakhuta mupone.
U Yohana ale lumuli ululekhung'ala, mukhale tiali okhokhovokha khu sekhe ontale mulumuli lwa mwene.
Emivele egenelenagwa mivakha ukhulutelele egwa Yohana, khumbombo incho Baba amile khukamelesya. Imbombo incho inchinivomba nchivoneysa okhuta obaba asukhile.
Obaba avasukhile one agewene emivele okhokongana nune, samugele ukhupulikha esavuli eya mwene wala okhulevona eliumbo lwa mwene osekhe gwogwoni.
Lesipali elimenyu elwa mwene ele litama igati ndyumwe pakhuva samu khumwedekha aveavasukhile.
Mukhovololela ovosimbe mwita igati mwene mulenu wumi wa sikhu nchooni, nu vosimbe vunchovela imbombo nchango
samwinogwa okhwincha khulyune muve nu wumi wa sikhu nchooni.
Sanikhwupela ovononu ukhukhuma khuvanu,
pakhuva nelumanyile ukhuta ulugano lusimoli igati mulyumwe omwe.
Ninchile khulitawa elya Baba vango, samukhawesye okhumokhela. Ndo yunge anginche khulitawa elya mwene mukhupokhela.
Je muwesya ndeti okhwedekha omwe yumwe mukhwupela ovononu okhukhuma khwa munu yumo yumo pakhuva samulonda ovononu ovovukhuma khwa Nguluve mwene?
Yamwita one nikhovakhega igati mwa Baba. Oyikhovakonga omweve Musa, oyu omwe muvekhile olwedekho khu mwene.
Inave mungemwedekha o Musa, mukhale mukhonyedekha none pakhuva akhasimbile ihabali inchango.
Inave samukhwedekha ovosimbe vwa mwene, muwesya ndakhekhi okhwedekha amamenyu agango?
Akhasekhe kha imbombo inchi, o Yesu alobile isekhemu incha nyanja ya Galilaya, yikhelangiwa nyanja ya Tiberia.
Ululundamano luvakha lulekhukonga pakhuva vakhalolile embombo inchalekhovomba khuvale vatamu.
U Yesu akhatoga khukyanya impakha uvupanda vwa khukyanya owa khewamba akhatama okhwa navakongi va mwene.
(Vukhutesiwa khya Yesu, nulukhovokhelo ulwa Vayahudi lukhasogelile).
U Yesu akhinula amikho gamwene nukholola khukyanya nu khuvona uvumati vwa vamu vukhwincha khumwene, akhavomba Filipo, “Tuluta ndakhu khugula emikate ili avanu ava valye”?
(Pakhuva o Yesu anchovile aga khwa Filipo alekhugela pakhuva omwene alumanyile ekhivomba).
O Filipo akhanda, “Ata mikate egwa dinari sagekhale gikwela hata munu yumo okhupata ekhepande ekhedebe.”
U Andrea, oninie va vakongi va Yesu olokololwe va Simoni Petro akhavavula
o Yesu, “Khule nudemi ale no mikate gekhano ni somba ivele, pakhuva eye sayikwincha khuvanu avingi ndavandulo?”
U Yesu akhavavula, “Vatamisye avanu pasi” (Pale nelinyasi lingi amaeneo gala). Pakhuva avagosi vale okhuta elfu tano vakhatama pasi.
Pu Yesu akhatola emikate gekhano akhesasaya akhavapaza vavakhatamile. Pu akhavagavila isomba okhokongana nuluvotamile.
Avanu vavile vigwite, akhavavula avakongi va mwene, “Vilundanie ivipande vwa somba ili vile ukhusigala vwokwoni.”
Pu vakhalundanie ivitundu kumi na viwili, vipande ivwa mikate vikhano ifya shayiri- ifikhasa ziwe na vakhasigile.
Avanu vakhavile valolile agavombile vakhanchova, “Lweli oyu venyamalago oviywincha nkelunga.”
U Yesu avile agundyile ukhuta vinogwa okhumwibata ili vambombe ukhuva intwa va vene, akhavakwepa, puakhaluta khukhewamba mwene.
Yevile lwakhemikhe, avakongi vawene vakhikha khu nyanja.
Vakhatogo mungalava valekho lovokha okhuluta khumwambi khu Kapernaumu. (Ekhisi yivile yingile o Yesu avile bado sinchile khuvene).
Osekhe ogwa emepo eng'ali yele khukula, ne nyanja yilekhwendelela okhulama.
Pu avakongi va mwene vavile vatovile amakasi ishirini ama thelathini, vakhambona o Yesu igenda pakyanya pa nyanja ikhogosogelela untumbwi, pu vakhadwada.
Pu Yesu akhavavula, “Nene mulekhe okhodwada.”
Vakhavile tayali okhogega mutumbwi, pu tumbwi gukhafikha pakhelunga upuvalekhuluta.
Esikhu eyekhakongile, ululundamano ulukhemile uvupande wa nyanja vakhavona otumbwi gusi pasi ugunge ila uguvakhatogile avakongi va Yesu ugosavakhatoge pakhuva avakongi vamwene vakhaluta vene.
(Pakhuva, pakhavile ne mitumbwi egegekhomile khu Tiberia karibu ne sekhemu eyivakhalile emikate pakhuva ombakha akhakhu minche emwalemi).
Osekhe ululundamano lukhagundula khukhuta sio Yesu ama vakongi va mwene vakhale okho, vovene vakhatoga mu mitumbwi vakhaluta khu Kapernaumu vovikhondonda o Yesu.
Akhasekhe vavile vambwene uluvafu olonge lwa nyanja vakhambuncha, “Rabbi winchile ndeli khono?”
O Yesu akhanda, akhavavola, Lweli, lweli, mukhondonda one, sio pakhuva mukhagawene imiujiza, pakhuva mwalile emikate nu khwiguta.
Bekhela okhokhevombela ekhwakholwa ekhekhinangikha ila mukhevombele ekhyakhula ekhyakhudumu isikhu nchooni ekheikhovapa omwaleve va Adamu pakhuva u Nguluve Ubaba avekhile ung'uli pakyanya pavene.”
Pu vakhambula, “Pukhenukhekhi khinogiwa okhovomba imbombo incha Nguluve?”
O Yesu akhanda, “Eye yu mbombo ya Nguluve: Khukhuta mumwedekhe omwene avasung'ile.”
Basi puvakhambula, “Ncho mbombo nchilekhu inchiyakhavuvomba pakhuta tukhonchedekha nukhunchivombela? Vuvomba ekhekhi?
Avababa veto vakharile imanna khu polini, “Avapile emikate ukhukhuma khukyanya ili valwe.”
Pu Yesu akhavanda, “Lweli, lweli, si ve Musa uyakhavapile emikate ukhukhuma khukyanya, pakhuva Obaba vango ve ikhovapa emikate pakhuva gikhuma khukyanya.
Pakhuva okate ugwa Nguluve gukhuma khukyanya, nukhuleta uwumi nkerunga.
Basi vakhambula, “Imbakha utupe ekate ego isiku nchooni.”
U Yesu akhavavula, “Onene ikate gwa wumi, omwene uvikhwincha khulyune salava nenjala nukhwedekha salavona kiu tena.”
Pakhuva nekhavavulile ukhuta, mumbwene, pusamukhwedekha.
Vooni avavikhoma Obaba vikhwincha kholyune, vevoni uvikhwincha khulyune sanikhutaga sikhu khonji khabisa.
Pakhuva nikhile okhukhuma khukyanya, sio khwa khuvomba ovogane wango, pakhuva ovugane wamwene ovuakhasukhile.
Nuvo vuvugane wango uvonesukhile, khukhuta nerekhe okhotaga hata yumo avamile, pakhuva nelavanchusya esikhu eyamwisho.
Pakhuva uvu vuvugane vwa Baba oveasukhile, khukhuta vevoni ovilola mwana nu khumwedekha ave nu wumi wa sikhu nchooni; nayune nikhonchosya esikhu eya mwisyo.
Pu avayahudi vakhasikhitikha ukhukongana nukhuta akhanchovile, “One nekate ugu gukhumile khukyanya.”
Vakhanchova, “Oyo sio ve Yesu omwana va Yusufu, uve ubabaye nu mamaye tumanyile? Yivile ndakhekhi leno inchova, 'Nikhile okhukhuma khukyanya?”
O Yesu akhanda, akhavavula, “Mulekhe ukhukuta igati yumwe.
Asikholi umunu oyikhwincha kholione inave salusiwe nu Baba vango ovesung'ire, nayone yani khunchusya ekhegono khya mwisho.
Pakhuva yesimbiwe muvaragonchi, 'Yuvidemiwa nu Nguluve.' Khela uveapulikhe efundisye ukhukhuma khwa Baba, ikhwincha kholyune.
Sio ukhuta khule munu uvambwene Obaba, pakhuva omwene oveakhumile khwa Nguluve- ambwene Obaba.
Lweli, weli uvikhwekha alenu wumi uwa sikhu nchooni.
One ne kate gwa wumu.
Avababa venyo vakhalile imanna khurijangwa, na vakhafwa.
Ugo gu kate ugugukhumile khukyanya, ili umunu ale enafasi eya mwene alekhe ukhufwa.
Une ne kate ugogutama ugogwikhile ukhukhuma khukyanya. Inave umunu ilwa okate ogwa itama esikhu nchooni, ukate uguyakha nikhomwa imbele gwando khunjila eya wumi wa khelunga.”
Avayahudi vakhakaranchava vavo khuvavo vakhanja okhusutana nukhunchova, “Umunu oyo iwesya ndeti okhutupa ombele ugwa mwene tulinchage?”
Pu Yesu akhavavula, “Lweli, lweli, mungalekhe ukhulya nu khunywa unkisa ugwa mwene, samukhave nu wumi igati ndyumwe.
Vevoni uvilya umbile gwang'o nu khunywa unkisa gwango ale nu wumi uwa sikhu nchoni, na yune yanikhunchosya esikhu eya mwisyo.
Pakhuva ombele gwango khwa kholwa khwa lweli, nu nkisa gwango mgasi ga lweli.
Umwene uvilwa ombele gwango nu khunywa unkisa gwango itama igati mulyune, na yune mumwene.
Inave Obaba uveale nu wumi via sukhile, ndolunitama pakhuva ya Baba, nu mwene ayitama pakhuva yango.
Ugo gukate ugogwikhwikha okhukhuma khukyanya, sio nduluva Baba vakhalya vakhafwa, omwene uvilye vakhafwa, omwene uvilye okate ogo alenu wumi owasikhu nchooni.
O Yesu anchovile imbombo inchi vuale mulisinagogi avile ikhuvamanyesya khu Kapernaumu.
Pu vingi vavakongi va mwene vakhagapolekha aga, vakhanchova, “Ele limanyesyo ligumu veni iwesya okhupelela?”
O Yesu alumanyile ukhuta avakongi va mwene valekhumikha embombo eye, akhavavula akhata embombo eye yikhovapenja?
Yayiva ndakhekhi vomukhombo na omwana va Adamu voikhwikha ukhukhuma ukhwale ulutanchi?
Ve Mepo ovikhomya uwumi. Ombele sagupata ekhenu khyokhyoni. Amamenyu aganenchovile khulyumwe ve mepo nu wumi.
Pakhuva khulenavanu igati mulyumwe avasa vikhwedekha.” Pakhuva o Yesu alumanyile ukhukhuma palutanchi uvesiwesya okhwedekha umwene avale ikhobela.
Akhavavula, pakhuva khulugendo olu asikholi umu uvikhwincha kholyune pakhuva apeviwe nu Baba.”
Akhasekhe akha avakongi vingi vakhavuyilesincho khusana pusavakhakongana nave tena.
O Yesu akhavavula vale kumi na wawili, “Je mwemwe munogwa okhokhega?”
Simoni Petro akhanda, “Imbakha tuluta khwani khulyuve khuvule uwumi wa sikhu nchoni,
twedikhe nukhukera ukhuta uve ve mbaranche va Nguluve.”
O Yesu akhavavula, “Je one sanikhavachagule omwe, pu paninie yumo mdugo?
Leno pwalekhunchova okholenga khwa Yuda, omwana va Simoni Iskariote, pakhuva ale vemwene ale paninie na vale kumi na wawili, aveale ikhubera o Yesu.
Akhasekhe kha mbombo nchoni o Yesu akhaluta leno khu Galilaya, pakhuva sakhanogwe ukhuluta khuvuyahudi pakhuva avayakhudi valekhovomba amipango egwakhubuda.
Leno olonemele olwa Vayahudi, olonemelo olwa vitembe, vwale pakhufikha.
Pu avalokololwe vakhambula, “Khega apa ulutage khuvuyahudi, khuta avakongi va mwene valole imbombo inchivomba.
Asipali uvivomba lyolyoni khu siri pakhuva yuhwa inogwa ukhuvonekha pavuvalafu. Inave vuvomba imbombo inchi, evonesye yuve khuvakhelunga.”
Ata avalokololye sa vakhamwedekha.
Pu Yesu akhambula, “Akhasekhe khango sakhafighe bado, pakhuva akhasekhe akhenyo khela sekhekhale tayali.
Ekherunga sakhiwesya ukhuvakalalila omwe, pukhikhong'ararena one pakhuva nikhuvavoneswa isivombo pakhuta utovombo tuvivi.
Tagaga mulutage khulonemero; one saniluta khurunemero olo pakhuva osekhe gwango sagukwelile bado.”
Osekhe ogwa khunchova imbombo incho khuvene, akhanchiga khu Galilaya.
Inave evo, avalokorolwe vavile valutile kholonemelo, navope puakhaluta, sio pavuvalafu nukhwefikha.
Avayahudi valekhundonda upuvale palonemelo nukhunchova, “Ale ndakhu?”
Pale na mamenyu mingi igati mululundamo ukhulingana nu mwene. Vingi vakhanchovile, “Munu inonu.” Avange vakhata, “Hamuna, ikhoruyancha ululundamano.”
Hata evo akhasipali uvekha nchovile pavuvarafu ukhukongana nukhuva dwada Avayahudi.
Ulunemelo luvile lufike pagati, o Yesu akhatoga pakyanya patembile nukhumanyisya.
Avayahudi valekhuswiga nukhunchova, “Khu njila elekhu umunu oyo anchimanyile imbombo nyingi? Sasomile mwee.”
O Yesu akhavanda nukhuvavula, “Olumanyisyo lwango sio lwango, pakhuva lwamwene uyasukhile.
Inave vevoni ovinogwa okhovomba ovuvalanche vwa mwene, ikhulumanya ulumanyisyo olu, inave gikhuma khwa Nguluve, inave ninchova khulyune nemwene.
Uninchova gikhuma khumwene ilonda uluginwo ulwamwene pakhuva uyilonda oluginwo ulwa vasung'ire, umunu uyo va lweli, mugati mumwene pasipali okhovomba elweli.
U Musa sakhavapa omwe ululagero? Pakhuva asipali ate yumo igati indyumwe uvivomba ovulagelo. Khekhi munogwa okhumbuda?
Ululundamano lukhanda, “Ulene lipepo. Veni inogwa ukhukhubuda?”
O Yesu akhavanda akhavavula, “Nevombile embombo yemo, na yumwe muswigire pakhuva ya mwene.
U Musa avapile etohara (Sio ukhuta yikhuma khwa Musa, pakhuva yikhuma khuva baba), ne Sabato mukhotahili umunu.
Inave umunu ikhwopelela etokhara esikhu eya Sabato khukhuta ululagero ulwa Musa lulekhe ukhung'ararera one pakhuva nevombile umunu ukhuva inkafu pa sikhu ya Sabato?
Mulekhe okhokhega okhokongana nu luvonekho, bali khegaga khu ye lweli.
Pakhuva eyavene yikhuma khu Yerusalemu puvinchova, “Sio ve oyo ovevikhondonda ukhubuda?
Lola, vuinchova pavuvalafu, na savinchova khyokhyoni khumwene. Sayiwesekhana ukhuta avalongonchi valumanyile elweli ukhuta oyo ve Klisiti, yiwesya ukhuva?
Tulumanyile umunu oyo ikhomila ndakhu. Uklisiti voikhwincha, pakhuva evo asipali ovealumanyile ukhuyakha ikhoma.”
O Yesu akhatoja elimenyu elwa mwene khutembile, akhamanyisya nukhunchova, “Omwe mwe voni mumanyile one nukhunikhoma. Sanekhinche khu nafsi yango pakhuva aveasukhile vwali ne lweli, pu mumanyile omwene.
Nemanyile omwene pakhuva nekhumile khumwene veasukhile.”
Vakhagela okhomwibata, pakhuva akhasipali ata yumo uvakhagera ukhwinura ekhevokho khukyanya pakhuva akhasekhe khamwene khale bado sakhafikhe.
Hata evo, vingi mululundamano vakhamwedikhe. Vakhanchova, “Oklisiti alava ikhwincha, ayivomba imbombo nyingi khulikho inchavombile umunu oyo?”
Avafalisayo vakhapulekha avanya rurundamano vovivunguma imbombo incha Yesu, avavakha na valongonchi vavafalisayo vakhavasukha avanu khulikho mwibata.
Pu Yesu puakhanchovile, “Nele nakhasekhe khadebe nepupaninie numye, pongera puniluta khumwene uve asukhile.
Yamukhondonda samukhambone; ukhuyakha niluta.”
Pu Avayahudi valekhonchovanchova, “Umunu oyo puayiluta ndakhu tulekhe okhupona? Ayiluta khu Vayevanikhe pagati pa Wayunani nukhuvamanyesya Avayunani?
Limenyu likhi elya nehovile, 'Yamukhundonda samukhambone; okhuyakha niluta samukhawesye okhwincha'?”
Pu leno akhasekhe akhamwisyo, akhasekhe akhavakha akharonemelo, o Yesu akhima akhatoncha esavoti, akhanchova, inave vevoni alenekhyumila inche anywe.
Omwene uvikhumwedekha, ndu vusimbe vovinchova, ukhukhuma igati mumwene yagikhwikha amagasi aga wumi.”
Pakhuva akhanchovile aga ukhukongana nu Mepo, avavi khumwedekha voni vamwopelile; Omepo ale bado sakhumenchiwe pakhuva o Yesu sakhinoliwe bado.
Pu ululundamana, vavile vapulikhe amamenyu aga, vakhanchova, “Lweli oyo venyamalago.”
Avange vakhanchova, “Oyo ve Klisiti.” Pu avange vakhanchova, “Khekhi, Klisiti iwesya ukhukhuma khu Galilaya?
Uvosimbe savunchovile ukhuta u Klisiti ukhuta Klisiti ayikhumele ekhekoro khya Daudi nukhukhuma khu Bethlehemu, ekhejiji ekhe alemo u Daudi?
Evo, pugukhakhumila ugavanye kho pagati parurundamano olwa Yesu.
Avange pagati pavene vakhale vikhomwibata, pakhuva akhasipali oyakhakhusinche ekhevokho khokyanya khumwene.
Pu ava ofisa vakhavuya khuvavakha vavalongonchi Avafalisayo na vope vakhavavola, “Pu khekhi samundetile?”
Avaofisa vakhanda, “Asipali umunu ovagelile okhonchova nduyu kabla.”
Pu Avafalisayo vakhanda, “Nayumwe musanchiwe?
Pukhwale vevoni muvalongonchi ovikhomwedekha, au vevoni Uvamafalisayo?
Pakhuva avalulundamano avasalumanyile wrulagelo - vaberiwe.”
O Nikodemo akhavavula (Omwene uviakhandundile o Yesu khatale, ale paninie na Vafarisayo),
“Je urulagero lweto lukhung'ega umunu pakhuva vikhopulekhencha tale nukhulumanya ekhivomba?”
Vakhanda nu khumbura, “Na yuve vukhumela khu Galilaya? Olonde nulole ukhuta asipali onyamarago aveakhomile khu Galilaya.”
Pu khela munu akhaluta khunyumba yamwene.
Unkoludeva alutile pakhewamba khyo Mizeituni.
Akhalava panavosihu akhincha khutembile na vanu voni vahandotela; akhatana nukhuva manyesya.
Usimbi avandisi usimbaji va Mafalisayo vakhatwalela udada uyibatiwe khumbombo ya voligu vakhambeha pagati.
Povakhambola u Yesu, “Umanyesi, udala uyu ibatiwe huvuligu, ikhohevomba elyeli.
Leno, hulu lulagelo, u Musa atuvulile alile tuvapondange amawe avanu ndava, wita ndakhehi khumwene?
Vakhanchovile aga ukhugela leno vapate enjela ya khung'ega, u Yesu akhinama pasi akhasimba pakhelonga khuhedole khyamwene.
Vavile vendelile uhumbuncha, akhema nokhuvavola, “Uyunchila mbivi avevakhwancha ukhutaviwa amawe.”
Akhinama tena pasi, akhandikha khuhedole khya mwene.
Vavapidikhe ago, akhahega yumo bada ya yumo, ukhyanjela ugogole. Humwisyo u Yesu vakhandeha mwene, nu dala uyuvavile pagati pavene.
U Yesu akhima nuhuvavola, “Un'dala, avahuhekile valindahu? Asipali khata yumo uyahuhegile?”
Akhan'chova, “Asikholi khata yumo Itwa.” U Yesu akhanchova, “Ate une sanikhohohega lutaga injela yaho; ukhuma lene nukhwendelela usite uvombe imbivi.”
U Yesu anchava na vanu akhata, “Unene nene lumuli lwa n'gelunga; Yuywa ihofyata sigenda muhisi poiva nulumuli ulwa womi.”
Avamafalisayo vahambola, wihesuhudela yuve; uvosuhuda wakho sio wayelweli.”
U Yesu akhajbu akhavavola, “Ndaneve nikhesuhudela yune, nekhumanyile ukhunehomile nuhuniluta, ulwa khova umwe samukhumanyile uponikhoma nakhohwa nilota.
Umwe mwikhega umbele, unesanikhega yeyoni.
Une ndanekhege, uwakhegi wango wayelweli ulwa khova sanelenemwene, ulwa khova tulenu baba uya suhile.
Ilweli, nululagelo lwenyo lusimbiwe uhuta uvosuhuda wa vanu vavele wilweli.
Une nene nikhesuhudela wa vanu vavele wolweli.”
Vakhambola, “Uwiso vaho alendahu?” U Yesu ukhanda, “umwesamumanjile oda ubaba vango samumumanyile; muamuvinchage mumanyile une, ndani mumanyile ubaba vango.”
Akhanchovile amamenyu aga akhavilejilani ne hazina ahavile imanyesya pa tembile, akhasipali khata yumo uyamwibite ulwakhova usekhe gwa mwene ngovile bado san'gofihe.
Akhavavola hange, “Niluta inchango; yamukhondonda nayamwifwa mumbivi ngenyo. Uhuniluta, samukhawesye uhwincha.”
Avayahudi vakhachova, “Ihebuda yuywa, yuywa ahachovile, 'Ukhuniluta samuhawesye uhwincha'?”
U Yesu ahannchova, “Mhuma pasi; une nihuma hukyanya. Umwe mlevakelunga ekhei une sio nelevangelunga ekhe.
Ulwahova, nawavolile uhuta mwifwa ni mbivi nchenye. La sivyo munyamini uhuta UNENE NENE, mwifya musambi nchenyo.”
Po wakhambula, “Uwe veve veni?” Yesu akhavavola, aganevavolile ukhuhuma khuvutengolelo.
Nelena mambo mingi agakhanchova nuvukhegi hulwomwe. Ata eve, uyasuhile vayelyeli; na mambo aganepolihe ukhuhuma khumwene, amambo aganinchova khuvakelunga.”
Savahamveliwe uhuta alenkonchova ukhuhusu Udada.
U Yesu akhachova, “Upoyaheva mukhomwinula umwana va munu, poyamuhumanya ukhuta nene, nuhuta sanivomba lyo lyoni khunafisi yange.
Ulyahovo udada afundisye, ninchava amambo aga. Yuywa asuhile alepopaninye nane, nu mwene sandehile nemwene, ulyahuva khela isekhe nivamba agaganeliwa.”
U Yesu woichova amambo aga, vingi va khamwedihe.
U Yesu akhachova uvayahudi avamwedikhe, “Munganogwe ndimenyu lyango, pomwiva vasyole vango elweli,
numwe muhuyemanya elweli, yihuvaveha hulu.” Vakhanda,
“Ufye tulevaholiva va Ibrahimu nasatugele tuve pasi ya wotumwa wayeyoni, “Twiva hulu?”
U Yesu akhanda, “Lweli, lweli, ukhuta, yuywa ivamba imbivi iva itimwa va mbivi.
Utumwa sitama hukaya umuda gwani; umwana itama isihu nchoni.
Ulwahova, umwana ikhovaveha hulu, mwiva hulu elweli.”
Nelumanyile uhuta umwe mlevaholiwa va Ibrahimu; Mulunda ukhumbuda ulwahova elimenyu lyango lesimoli lelevovole enafasi ingati ndimwe.
Ninchova amamba gago negawene nu dada vango, nayomwe velevote muvamba amambo agamupolihe uhuhuma khwa dada venyo.”
Vakhanda nuhuvavola, “Udada veto ve Ibrahimu.” U Yesu akhanda, mwamuvinchage vana va Ibrahimu, muhamuvumbaga imbombo ncha Ibrahimu.
Ata leno mulonda uhumbuda, umunu uya vavolile uvolyeli uhuta akhapolikhe uhuhuma khwa Nguluve. Uabrahamu sahavombe evo.
Mvombe imbombo ncha Dada venyo.” Vahambola, “Satuhoheliwe mboligu, tuleno Dada yomo, Unguluve.”
U Yesu ahavavola, “Ingave Unguluve vedada venyo, mhale muhongana une, ulwahova nchomile khwa Nguluve; sanchinche hunafsi yango, umwene vyahasuhile.
Hekhi samuhugeliwa amamenyu gango? Ulwahova samuhawesye uhufamelela uhugapoleha amamenyu gango.
Umwe malevadada venyo, utavangwa, namwinogwa uhuvomba uvonogwe wadada venyo. Ahavile ibadi uhuhima hwutengolelelo nasahawesye uhwema huvoyelweli ulwahova uwoyelweli vosimoli igati mumwene. Uluichova uvadesi lohova uhuhuma huasili yamwene ulwahova idesi nubabaye idesi.
Hata leno, ninchova yeyo yelweli, samuhonyamini (samuhunyedeha).
Veni kati yenyo iyihoshuhudele uhuta nele ni mbivi? Ingava nichova uvolweli, mbana samuhonyedeha?
Uyalenu Nguluve ipoleha amamenyu ga Nguluve; umwe sampoleha ulyahuva samleva Nguluve.”
Avayahudi vahanda nohumbula, satunchovile uvolweli uhuta uveve ulesamalia nole no mepo?”
U Yesu ahanda, nilivovole ilipepo ulwahuva nihumwesimu udada vango, numwe samuhonyesimu.
Sanilonda ulyonginyo lwango; khwale yomo iyilonda nuhuhega.
Nihovavola, nihovavola, uhuta, uyaheva yeyoni iholibata elimenyu lyango, sihuvovona uvofya habisa.”
Avayahudi vahambola, “Leno tulumanyile uhita ulenelipepo. U Abrahamu na vanyamalaga vahafwile; ulwahuva winchova, 'Ingave umunu ihulipata ilimenyu lyango, sihovova uvofye'.
Uveve sidembaho luliko udada veto Abrahamu uyafyule, avanyamalago vope vafyile. Uwe powihefyanya veve veni?”
U Yesu akhanda, “Nengave nihetoja yune, khwetoja hwango hwa vovole; u Dada vango valionoja - yuywa muhunchova uhuta ve Nguluve venyo.
Umwe samumanyile umwene, une nemanyile umwene. Nengave nichova, 'sanemanyile,' niva kama umwe, vadesi. Ata leno, nelumanyile namamenyu gamwene negibite.
Udada venyo u Abrahamu ayihovaha yaheva ihoyevona isihu yango; ahayawene ahahovaha.”
Avayahudi vahambula, “Sofihinche ulimuli wa miaha hamsini bado, nuve umbwene u Ibrahimu?”
U Yesu ahambola, “Nihovavola, nihovavola, nichova, tangu U Abrahamu saholiwe, UNE HUNELE.”
Povahahola amawe vanje uhutova, po u Yesu ahefiha nahahoma hunji hutembile.
Usekhe, u Yesu wigenda, ahambwene umunu uyusilola khuma iholiwa.
Avasiole vamwene vakhamboncha, “Rabi, veni ayavambile imbivi, umunu uyu au avahonohi vamwene, ipakha akhaliwe silola?”
UYesu akhanda, “Sio umunu oyu wala avakhoji vamwene vavombile imbivi, ili embombo ya Nguluve yepate ukhuvonekha ukhugendela khumwene.
Yinogiwa ukhovamba embombo yamweni uyasukhile usekhe vabado musi. Eikhisi yikhwincha usekhe gugwa hakuna uyakheva iwesya uhuvomba embombo.
Ulwahova ekhelonga, une nene lumumuli lwa khelunga.”
Ulwakhanchovile amamenyu aga, akhabekha pakhelunga, avekha elidope khumate, akhabaha umunu ula minukho nelidope.
Akhambula, ulute ukhoge ikhesiva kha Siloam (Uye yitafisiliwa kama 'uyasuhiwe').” Umunu uywa akhaluta, akhakalava, akhakilivokha, ilola.
Avajilani va munu uywa avalikhombona ukhuma khuvotengolelo ukhumbona kama idofi vakhachava, Uyu! sio vemunu uyakhatamaga idova?” Avange vakhachova, “Ve mwene.”
Avange vakhachova, “Ate, ila ikhwanana numwene.” Lakini alengonchava alen'kota, “Nene.”
Vakhambola, “Isainchi amikho gakho gafumbiliwe nekhehi?”
Akhanda, umunu uyuikhuelangiwa ve Yesu akhaveha alidope nukhubaha amikho gango nukhumbula, “Luta khu Siloam ukhakalave.' Ponekhaluta, nekhakalava, nekhavona nilola khange.”
Vakhambola, “Alendakhu?” Akhanda. “Sanelumanyile.”
Vakhan'gelekha umunu uywa uyagele ukhuva silola khuvamafalisayo.
Yekhale sikhu ya Sabato po u Yesu akhatengenisye ilidope nukhufumbula amikho gamwene.
Avamafalisayo vahamboncha tena ukhugahile ndakhehi ipakha ukhalola. Aliwaambia, “Aliweka tope katika macho yangu, nikanawa na sasa naweza kuona.”
Avange Avamafalisayo vakhachova, “Umunu uywa sakhomile khwa Nguluve ulwakhova sibite Esabato.” Avange vakhanchova, “Yiwesehana ndakhehi umunu unyambivi ivomba imbombo inchi?” Pe vakhaga venyekha vawo.
Po vakhambon'cha uyusilola ukhepofu khange, “Wita ndakhehi khomwene ulyakhova akhafumbwile amio gakho?” Ukhopofu akhachova, “Inyamalago.”
Ipakha isaliin'chi avayahudi sava khedekhe ukhuta silola navope apatile ukhulola ipakha avelangile avakhon'chi vamwene uyawesije ukhulola.
Vakhavovoncha avakhonchi, Je, uyu mwana venyo uyumwichova ukhuta akhaholiwe silola? Agakhile ndakhehi ukhulola?”
Avakhonchi vamwene vakhanda, “Tulumanyile ukhuta uya mwana venyo naakha khaliwe silola.
Ndakhehi leno ilola, satolomanyile, navopo uya dendwile amikho gamwene, satomanyile. Imbon'che yuywa. Munu imbakha. Iwesya ukhweyelesya yuywa.”
Avakhon'chi vamwene vakhanchova amambo aga, ulwakhova vakhadwada Avayahudi ulwakhova Avayahudi vakhavile vedekhine tayali ukhuta, angave yeyoni ikhwedekha ukhuta u Yesu Klisiti, itengiwa ne Tembile.
Ulwa khuva, uvakhon'chi vamwene vakhachovile, “Munu igoge imbakha imbonche yuywa.”
Ulwa vele, vakhamwelanga umunu ula uyegelile ukhuva silola nukhumbula, “Ipe u Nguluve uluginyo. Tulumanyile ukhuta umunu uyu inya mbivi.”
Umunu ula akhanda, “Angave inya mbivi, une salumanyile. Ekhenu khemo ekhenelumanyile: Nekhale sanetekholola, isaliichi nilola.”
Po vakhambola, “Akhovambile khehi? Akhadendela amikho gakho?”
Akhanda, “Nekhavavolile tayali, numwe samukhapolekhenche! Khehi mwinogwa ukhupolekha khange? Numwe samwinogwa ukhova vasite vamwene, eti?
Vakhadokha vakhanchova, uveve ulevasiole vamwene, ufyefye tolevasiole va Musa.
Tulumanyile ukhuta u Nguluve akhanchovile nu Musa, khomunu uyu, satokhomanyile ukhwikhoma.”
Umunu ula akhanda nukhuvavola, “Kwa nini, ele lijambo lwakhoswigencha, Unguluve ikhopolekhencha.
Tulumanyile ukhuta u Nguluve sikhova polekhencha avanya sambi, ingave umunu idova khwa Nguluve ivomba umwanogile mwene, Unguluve ikhopolekhencha.
Ukhuma khitengola ikhelunga sayegele yekhomele wala ukhupolekha ukhuta yeyoni alalile amikho gamunu uyakhalwe silola.
Ingave umunu uyu sakhahuma khwa Nguluve, sakhaivomba khokhoni.”
Vakhanda vakhombola, “Ukhaholiwe mumbivi hani, buve vukhutumanyesyaga ufye?” Po vakhaswema ukhutembile.
U Yesu akhapolekhe ukhuta van'genchinche ukhutembile. Akhombona nukhumbula, vukhu mwedekha umwana va munu?”
Akhanda nukhuchova, “Veni, Intwa, nayone nemwedekhe?”
U Yesu akhambula, “Umbwene, uyuwinchova nave vemwene.”
Umunu ula akhanchova, “Intwa, Nikhwamini.” Pokhamwinamela.
U Yesu akhanda, “Khuvakhegi ninchile in'kelunga umu vavo savilola valolage navavo vilola vavenchage savilola.”
Avange Avamafalisayo vakhale popaninye vape vakhapolekha amamenyu ago vakhamboja, “Na yofye satulola?”
U Yesu avavola, “Mukhemvinchage samwilola, samukhale mwiva ni mbivi. Ata leno, mwinchova, 'Twilola,' imbivi nchenyo nchitama.”
Nikhovavola, Nikhovavola umwe uyusikhwingela ukhugendela mdwango gwa khevaga ikhya n'gosi, ulwa khova igenda khunjela eyenge, umunu uywa indwasi nayoipokha.
Uyikhwingela mndwango idema ngosi.
Khumwene uyikhondelela undwango ukhodendolela. In'gosi nchipolekha isawati ya mwene nukhunchelanga in'gosi ncha mwene khomatawa gavene nokhovakhamwa khonji.
Yakheva ikhomwa khonji avavile vamwene ivalongola, ne n'gosi yikhokonga, ulwakhova vayemanyile esavoti yamwene.
Savakhafuate ugeni vikhwanja ukhunge gala, ulwa khuva savanchimanyile isawoti ncha vageni.”
U Yesu akhanchova ufyano ugwa khuvene, ulwakhova savalekweliwa amambo aga, agalen'konchova khuvene.
U Yesu akhanchova navo khange, “Nikhovavola, nikhovavola, umwe, une nene ndyango gwa n'gosi. Voni avalongwile valyasi navavo vipokha, ulwa khova in'gosi sanchikha vapolekhenche.
<range>
Une nene ndyango. Yeyoni uyikhingela ukhugendela une, ikhwokholiwa; ikhwingila igati nukhukhuma vapo ikhepatela ukhulwa.
Undyasi ikhincha ukhencha, ukhubuda, ukhwangamencha. Ninchile vapate uwomi vave nawo wingi.
Une neledemaji inonu. Ndemaji unonu ikhomwa wamwene khongosi.
Umbombi uyasukhiwe, nayoywa sio idemaji, yuywa ingosi sio nchamwene, ikhonchiva na imbwa incha mwinyasi vondukhwincha ikhonchilekha nukhunyila in'gosi.
Ni mbwa incha mwinyasi nchikhwibata nukhusambasya inyila ulyakhova imbombi vakhwajiliwa sikhonchijali in'gosi.
Une neledimi inonu nevamanyile avango, navavo vavile vango vamanyile une.
Udada amanyile, nayone nemanyile Udada, nayone nikhumya uwami wango khon'gosi.
Nelenancho in'gosi nyingi vava sio vakhevaga ekhe. Navo, yinogiwa ukhuvalete, navape vikhoyepolekha isawati yango ili pavepo ilikundi lemo nudemaji yumo.
Yu sababu eyo udala anganile: Nekhwomwe uwomi wango alafu newotole khange.
Hakuna uyusitola ukhuma khulyone, une nikhomya yone. Nelenago amadalakha agakhumya, nelenago amadalakha agakhotola, khange. Nepokhile ululagelo ulu ukhukhuma khya Dada.”
Ukhutengana khukhakhoma khuvayahudi khumamenyu aga.
Avingi vakhanchova, “Ale nelipepo nekhenchaa. Khekhi mukhopolekhencha?”
Avange vakhanchova, “Aga sio mamenyu gamunu uyibatiwe na mapepo. Elipepo liwesya ukhudendola amikho gago sagilola?”
Po yekhincha eselekhe yakhovekhiwa vanonu Eyerusalemu.
Gokhale isekhe gwa mepu, u Yesu alenkugenda khutembile mbekumbi wa Selemani.
Avayahudi vakhandongola nukhumbula, “Ipakha ndeli vukhatuvekha masyakha? Kama ulekhelesiti, tuvule pavo valafu.
U Yesu akhavavola, “Mbona nevavolile samukhonyedekha. Imbombo nchonivomba kholitawa lya Dada vango, incho nchisukhudela kholyone.
Ata leno samukhonyedekha ulyakhova umwe samule n'gosi nchango.
In'gosi nchango nchipolekha esawoti yango; Nevamanyile, navope vikhifyata une.
Nevapile uwomi wasikhu nchoni; Khakheva ivatola ukhuma mavokho gango.
Udada vango, amile avo, imbakha khovani, khakunakhata yomo uyavile novowesyo ukhuvatola ukhuma mavakho ga Dada.
Une nu Dada tuleyomo.”
Vakhagega amawe ilivatove khange.
U Yesu akhanda, “nevavanisye imbombo inonu ukhuma khya Dada. Khumbombo nchilekhu mvinogwa ukhunava namawe?”

UYesu akhanda, “Sayandekhive mululagelo lyenyo, 'Nekhanchova, “Umwe mwe va Nguluve”?”

Mukhonchova yuywa akhangominche Udada nukhusukha ikelunga, 'Wibeda,' ulya khova akhonchovile, 'une nele mwana va Nguluve'?
“Nengave sanivomba embomba ncha Dada vango, musite ukhunyedekha.
Ata leno, nenga nivamba, khata kama samukhunyedekha, munchimanye imbombo ili muvesye ukhulumanya ukhuta u Dada ale agati ndyone nayone nelengati mwa Dada.”
Vakhegela ukhumwibata u Yesu, akhakhega ukhuma mavokho gavene.
U Yesu akhuluta khange khumwambo ya Yordani esemu yeyo uyokhana alekhuonda tasi akhatama ukhwa.
Avanu vingi vakhadega khya Yesu. Vakhendelela ukhunchova, “Uyohana vopo sakhavombe eishara yoyoni, amambo goni aga nchovile uyukhana khunu hu uyu gavolweli.”
Avanu vingi akhamwedekha u Yesu apo.
Po umunu yumo elitawa lyamwene ve Lazaro akhale itamu. Akhakhomile kho Bethania, ikhejiji khya Mariamu na dada vamwene u Martha.
Akhale ve Mariamu yuywa akhabakha Untwa amafuta nukhufuta amalunde gamwene kho jwele ncha mwene yuywa ulokololwe va Lazaro akhale itamu.
Po avadada ava vakhasukha endomi khya Yesu nokhochova, “Intwa, ulole ugane vakho itamu.”
U Yesu akhapolekha akhachova, “Uvutamu uvo sio wakhufya, ulwakhova, uwa voyane wa Nguluve uswambe va Nguluve agimive kho votamu.”
U Yesu akhanganile u Martha nu dada vamwene u Lazaro.
Avile apolikhe ukhata u Lazaro itamu, u Yesu akhatama isikhu ivele upwakhale.
Popoele akhavavola avasyole vamwene, “Tuvokhe khovoyahudi khange.”
Avasyole vakhambola, “Imanyesi, vangagele ukhututa na mawe, nuve vunogwa ukhukilivokha ukhya khange?”
U Yesu akhanda, “Amasaa gapamusi galekumi na mbili? Umunu ungenda pamusi siwesya ukhyekovencha, ulukhuva ilola khulumuli lwa pamusi.
Hata evo, angagende pakhelo, ikhyekovencha ulyakhova ulumuli lumoli igati mumwene.”
U Yesu akhachova amambo aga, baada ya mambo aga, “Urafiki vato u Lazaro ugonelile, nilota khukhusisimula ukhuma mutulo.”
Po avasyole vakhambola, “Intwa, inave agonelile, isisimokha.
Usekhe ugwa u Yesu alegonchova ikhabari ncha lofye wa Lazaro, avene vakhata inchova ikhabari ncha toro.
U Yesu akhanchova pavovalafu, “U Lazaro afyile.
Nekhowikhe numwe, sanekhalepo ukhu ilimpate ukhunyedekha. Tuvokhe khumwene.”
Po u Tomaso, uyakhelangiwo lipancha, akhavavola avasyole vamwene, “Nayofye tevukhe tukhafye popaninye nu Yesu.”
U Yesu voinchile, akhavono u Lazaro tayari alendipomba isikhu inne.
Yope e Bethania yakhale kalibu ne Yerusalemu uvutali ikilomita arobaini na tano ulu.
Avingi Avayahudi vakhincha khwa Martha nu Mariamu ukhuvasuvancha khya ajili ya lukololwe vavene.
U Martha akhapolekha ukhuta u Yesu ikhwincha, akhaluta akhagane nave u Mariamu akhendelela ukhutama khukaya.
U Martha akhambula u Yesu, “Intwa, ukhale uvinchage apa, ungancha vango sakha ifya.
Ata leno, nelumanyile ukhuta lyolyoni eleyakheva vudova ukhuma khya Ngolove, wipata.”
U Yesu akhavola, unyanchavo isisimukha khange.”
U Martha akhambola, nelumanyile ukhutu isisimokha isikhu ya mwisyo.”
U Yesu akhambola, “Une nene wofufuo howomi; yuywa ikhonyedekha, atakama isisi mokha, ataleno itamaga;
yuywa ikhonyedekha une ifya. Ukholyamini ele?”
Akhavavola, “Sawa, Intwa mkhokhwedekho uveve veve Klisiti, Mwana va Ngolove, uyikhwincha nkelunga.”
Avile achovile ile, akhaluta khukhomwelanga udada vamwene u Mariamu khesili. Akhachova, “Umanyesi aleapa khokhwelanga.”
U Mariamu avile apolikhe eve, akhema khembe ve akhaluta kya Yesu.
Nu Yesu akhava sijile tayali ikhejiji, akhavile bado khukhya vagine nu Martha.
Avayahudi vakhale nu Mariamu munyumba navavo vakhalemo visovancha, vavile vikhombona ikhyinokha khembeve ikhoma khonji, vakhakonga; vavile vatile vilota khulipomba khyilela ukwa.
Po u Mariamu, avile afikhe pala u Yesu akhambona, akhagwa pasi pamalonde gamwene nukhumbula, “Intwa, ukhale uvinchage apa, ulukololyango nda safyile.”
U Yesu avile ambwene ilela, nawayahudi avinchile papaninwe valen'kolela voni, akhalola munumbula nukhusikhitekha;
Akhanchova, “Mgoninche ndapi? vakhambola, Intwa, ancha olole.”
U Yesu akhalela.
Po Avayahudi vakhanchova, “Mulole wagonile u Lazaro!”
Avange vakhanchova, “Sio uyu, umunu uyabungwile amikho uyusilola, akhaiwesya ukhumbekha umunu uyu asite ukhufya?”
Po u Yesu, woilela munumbula mumwene, akhaluta ndipomba, yekhale manga, iliwe livekhwiwe pakhyanya pamwene.
U Yesu akhanchova, “Khencha eliwe.” U Martha, udada vamwene no Lazaro, yuywa afyile, akhambola u Yesu, “Intwa, khusekhe ugu, umbele gwiva govolile ulyakhova avile muvofye khosikhu inne.”
U Yesu ambola, “Sanekhavavole ukhuta, inave ukhunyedekha, wukhovovono uvovakhuwa Ngolove?”
Po vakhakhencha eliwe. U Yesu akhinula amikho khokyanya nukhunchova, “Baba, nimwalencha ulyakhova vakhomulekhencha.
Nelemanyile ukhuta vukhomolekhencha khela isekhe, ulyakhova ukusanyikho gwemile ukhunyedekha ukhuta veve usukhile.”
Avile anchovile aga, akhalela esawoti embakha, “Lazaro, khuma khonji!”
Uyafyile akhakhoma khonji ankongiwe amavokho na malunde, khumikho ankongiwe ekhefambala.” U Yesu akhanchova, “Ifungule alutage.”
Po Avayahudi avingi vavile vinchile khwa Mariamu nukhulola u Yesu ekhya vombile, vakhamwedekha;
Avange lakhaluta khuva Mafarisayo khukhavavola amambo agavombile u Yesu.
