Tungave tukhondekha mwene, voni vikhomwedekha; Avarumi vikhwincha vitola fyoni imali ncheto nekhelonga kheto.”
Ata evo, umunu yumu pavene, ve Kayafa, uyakhale intekheji imbukha umwakha ugwa, akhavavola, “Samkhemanyile khokhoni.
Samusaga ukhuta yifaa kholyomwe ukhuta umunu yumo inogiwa ukhufya khujili ya vanu khulikho ukhufyu ekhelonga khyoni.”
Aga sakhanchove mwene, po umwene, ulwakhova akhale atekheji imbakha umwakha gola, akhalagwile ukhuta u Yesu ifya khokhelunga;
Sio ekhelunga khine, ili u Yesu apate velevole ukhuvakusanya avana va Ngolove avagavanyikhe sekhemu eye neye.
Ukhuma esikhu eyo nukhyendelela vakhapanga enjela ya khubuda u Yesu.
U Yesu sakhagende khange pavovalafu khuva yakhudi, akhakhega pala nokholota khohelunga jilani nolokove usekhemu yikhwelangiwa Efraimu. Apo akhatama na vasyole.
Ekhakho khya Vayahudi khekhale jilani avingi vakhatoga ukhuluta khu Yerusalemu khonji ya khelunga wosakhefikhe ekhaha ili vapate ukhwesukha vavo.
Valenkondonda u Yesu, nukhuchova khela muu vovemile pakhekalu, msaga khehi? Ukhuta sikhwicha khushelekhe?”
Usekhe ugwa avavakha va vatekheji na Vamafalisayo vavile, vakhominchi ululagero ukhuta ave yomo ikholuma u Yesu upwalepo, inogiwa ukhumya endomi ili vamwibate.
Isikhu sita kabla ya ikhaha, u Yesu akhaluta khu Bethania, ukhyakhale u Lazaro, uyakhanchosinehe ukhuhuma khuwofye.
Po vakhamwandalela ekhatio lya ekhanalyakhemikhe ukhya, nu Martha akhambombela, usekhe ugwa u Lazaro akhale paninye vavala vakhatamile pakhyakho lya paninye no Yesu.
Po u Mariamu akhatora elati ya mafuta gago gatengenesiwe nardo enonu, yeyo yelenesamani embakha, akhabukha u Yesu mmalunde, nukhupukhuta mmalunde khunjwele ncha mwene enyumba yoni yekhadega ekharufu ya amafuta (amanukato).
Yuda Iskariote, yumo va vasiole vamwene, yuywa uyakheva ikhosaliti u Yesu, akhanchova,
“Khekhi amafuta aga gakhagagonchiwe khukhela dinali mia tatu vakhavapewiwe avaganchu?”
Vope akhaganchova ago, sio ikhova kolela ekhesa avaganchu, ulyakhova akhale indyesi: umwene veibite upakho gw khela alekotola baadhi ya vifyo vivekhiwe umwa khojili ya mwene.
U Yesu akhanchova, “Indekhe avekhe ekhyalenakho khojili ya sikhu ya khosiela kholyone.
Avaganchu mwiva navo isikhu nchoni; lene samukhave nune isikhu nchoni.”
Po elipoga elivakha lya Vayahudi povakhalumanya khuta u Yesu aleukhya, navakhincha, sio khwa Yesu tuu, ila vambone u Lazaro yuywa u Yesu akhasielyule ukhukhuma khuvofye.
Navope avavakha va vatekhenchi vakhedekhana ili vabude u Lazaro;
maana khiyili ya mwene avingi Avayakhudi vakhaluta vakhamwedekha u Yesu.

vakhatola amatawi ga mibekhe ga matende nokhokhoma khinji ukhuluta khu khopokhela nokhotova ekelele, “Khosana! Asayiwe uyikhyincha kholitawa lya Ntwa, Umbakha va Israeli.”
U Yesu akhapata umwa punda; kama uluyandekhiiwe,
“Usite, ukhudyada, ng'enja Sayuni; lola, Umbakha vakho ikhwincha, etogile emwana- punda.”

Po lela elipoga lya vanu vavo vakhale popaninye nu Yesu vova mwelangile u Lazaro ukhuma ndipomba, vakholola khuvange.
Po yekhale khosababu eye ukhuta elipoga lya vanu vakhalotile khukho pokhela khusababu vakhapolikhe ukhuta akhavombile eishara eyo.

Po avange avayunani vakhale miongoni mwa vala avakhale valekolota khu khesaya khu shelekhe.

Ninchova, ninchova, nikhovavola, epunje ya ngano yegasite ukhugwa ikelunga yakhafya, yitama ekhali yela yela yene, po yengafye, yikhala isekhe imbakha.
Umwene uyavoganile uwomi wa mwene ikhovoyancha; khoba uyikalala uwomi wa mwene ikelunga uma ikheponya khata uwomi wa sikhu nchoni.
Umunu yoyoni uyikhombombela une, ang'onge; uponelepo une, po nayosukhya vango ivapwale. Umunu yeyoni uyakheva ikhombombela, udada ikhoginya.
Leno inumbula yango yesikhitikhe na yone nenchove ndakhekhi'? 'Dada, unyokhole isaliinchi'? Khulugano ulu nefikhe isainchi.
Daada, leginiwe elitawa lyakho.” Po esawoti yekhencha ukhuma khokyanya nokhonchova, neligininche nayone nikhdeginya khange.”

U Yesu akhanda akhanchova, esawoti eye sayekhinche kholyone, bali kholyomwe.
Leno uvokhegi wa khelonga ekhe khovole: Umbakha va khelunga ekhe itagiwa khonji.
Nayone nengotojiwe khokyanya ikhelonga, nikhovakwega voni kholyone.”

Po u Yesu akhavavola, ulumuli lungave popaninye numwe usekhe idebe. Mulutage ulukhova mule nulumuli, ekhisi yiwesya yevibate. Uyilota mukhisi salumanyile ukhyilota.
Ulyakhova mnchige nulumuli, mulyedekhe ulumuli ulya mpate ukhova vana va lumuli.” U Yesu akhanchova ago po akhaluta akhefikha vasite ukhumbona.

ili letimele elimenyu lyanyamalago u Isaya, elyakhonchovile: “Intwa, veni uyanchipolikhe ikhabali ncheto? Nekhevokho khantwa afunuliwe veni?”

“Avabudile amikho, ayevikhile ngafu inumbula yavene; vasite ukhulola khomikho gavene navakhalumanya khunumbula ncha vene, ayavikhwokhokha na yone nikhovaponya.”
U Isaya akhanchova amamenyu ago ulya khova akhavowene uvovakha wa Yesu nakhanchova ikhabari ncha mwene.
Ulyakhova, ata avavakha vingi vakhamwedikhe u Yesu; ulyakhova Avamafarisayo, savakhedekhe ukhuta ayavitengiwa na avamasinagogi.
Vakhanogile uluginyo ulya vanu khulikho uluginyo ulolukhomana nu Ngoluve.
U Yesu akhatoncha esawati no khonchova, “Yuywa ikhonyedekha une, sikhonyedekha une tuu bali nayoywa akhasukhile une,
navope uyikhombona une ikhombona yuywa asukhile.
Une ninchile kama lumuli ikelunga ili khela munu uyikhonyedekha une asite ukhutama mkhisi.
Ingave umu yeyoni ikhogapolekha amamenyu gango lakini asite ukhugibata, une sanikhon'gega; maana sanekhinche ili nekhege ekhelunga, bali nevokhole avakelunga.
Yuywa ikhobela une nayoywa sikhyedekha amamenyu gango, nayoywa ikhongega: elimenyu ilyo lelyo nenchovile lyulyene lelangega esikhu ya mwisyo.
Une sanekhenchove khunumbula yango tuu. Ve Dada uyakhan'gelikhe yuywa umwene andaginche aga yakheva ninchova.
Na yone nelumanyile ukhuta ululagelo lya mwene lya womi wa sikhu nchoni pogago ninchova une - kama Udada umwa mbolile, ponikhovavola avene.”
Po leno kabla ya sikukuu ya pasaka, ulyakhova u Yesu akhalumanyile ukhuta esaa lyamwene yeyo ikhega ikelungo ekhe ilota khwa daada, ingave avaganile avanu va mwene vavo vakhale ikelunga, akhavaganile sana.
No tavangwa avile avekhiwe tayari munumbula ya Yuda Isikariote, umwana va Simoni, ukhusaliti u Yesu.
U Yesu akhalumanyile ukhuta udaada avekhile ifinu fyoni mumavokho gamwene nukhuta akhomile khya Ngolove naalekolota khange khya Ngolove.
Akha sisimokha mkyakholya akhata ndekha pasi umwenda ugwa khonji. Akhatola ilitawalo akhekonga yoywa.
Akhavekha amagasi mbakholi akhanja ukhuvakalafya amalunde avasiole vamwene nukhuvafuta ne litawolo lelyo akhekongile yomwene.
Akhincha khya Simoni Petro, nu Petro akhambola, “Intwa, winogwa ukho ng'olyafya amalunde une?”
U Yesu akhanda nukhumbula, elenilomba solemanyile isalinchi, wikhweliwa pongela.”
U Petro akhambola, “Sakhasukhe amalunde gango khani.” U Yesu akhanda, ingave sanikhokhosukha, sukhave sekhemu paninye nune.”
U Simoni u Petro vakhombola, “Intwa, usite ukhusukha amalunde gango tuu, bali namavokho nuntwe gwango.”
U Yesu akhambola, “Yeyoni yoywa tayari ogile sinogiwa ukhwoga isipokua amalonde gamwene, na avile isafi umbele gwa mwene gwoni; umwe muvile safi, lakini sio mwevoni.”
Ulyakhova u Yesu akhalumanyile yoywa ikhosaliti; eye yosababu akhanchovile, sio mwevoni mle safi.”
Uwokati u Yesu avile avasukhile amalunde gavene naavile atolile umwenola gwa mwene nukhutama khange, akhavavola, “Je Mweliwe khekhyo nevavombile?
Mukhonyelanga une “Imanyesi” Intwa uyu mnchova volyeli, ulyakhova mnevelile.
Engave une Intwa na imanyesi, nevasukhile amalunde genyo, nayomwe mnogilye ukhuvasukha amalunde avayenye.
Ulyakhova nevapile ufyano ili ukhota nayomwe khange muvombe kama une ulunevombile kholyomwe.
Ninchova, Ninchova, nikhuvavola, usukhwa siimbakha kholikho untwa vamwene; wala yoywa asukhiwe imbakha khulikho yoywa asukhile.
Ungave ulumanyile amambo aga, usayiwe ungagawombe.
Saninchova kholyomwe mwovoni, ulya khova nevamanyile avanevanchagwile - ila ninchova aga ili ukhuta uwosimbe wo wowese ukhutimela: 'Yoywa ilya ukate gwango anyemekhinche ekhesukhululu khwa mwene.'
Nikhovavala ele kabla salekhomile ili yakheva lekhomile, muwesye ukhunyedekha ukhuta une NENE.
“Ninchova, ninchova, nikhuvavola, uyuikhomokhela une, ikhopokhela yuywa nikhosukha, nayoywa ikhopokhela une ikho pokhela yuywa asukhile une.”
Po u Yesu avile anchovile aga, akhatesekha munumbula, akhalulola nukhunchova, “Ninchova, ninchova, nikhovavola ukhuta umpo venye ikhosaliti.”
Avasyole vakhalolana, vakha swiga akhanchovile khwani.
Vakhale pa mesa, yumo uvasiole vamwene egime ikefuva khya Yesu yuywa akhaganile.
U Simoni Petro akhamboncha uvasiole uywa nukhunchova, “Tuvole veni yuywa khomwene ikhonchova.”
Uvasiole yuywa akhegime ikefuva kha Yesu akhambola, “Intwa veeni?”
U Yesu akhanda, “Khu yuywa ninyofya ekhe pande khya kata ni khopa.” Avile anyofinche ukata, akhapa u Yuda umwana va Simoni Iskariote.
Baada ya kata, Usetani akhamwingila. U Yesu akhambola, “Khekho winogwa ukhuvomba ukhevombe khembeve.”
Po leno khakuna umunu pa mesa akhalumanya esababu ya Yesu ukhunchova elijambo ele khumwene.
Ange vakhatile upakho gwa khela, u Yesu akhambola, “Ugule ifinu ifitwinogwa kwa ajili ya Sikukuu,” au inogiwa akhomye ekhenu khu ganchu.
Baada ya Yuda ukhupokhela ukata, akhakhuma khonji khembeve, yekhale pakelo.
U Yuda avile akhegile, u Yesu akhanchova, “Leno umwana va Adamu inoliwe, u Ngoluve aginiwe khomwene.
U Ngolove ikho ginyu khu mwene, na ayaikhoginya khembeve.
Avana avadebe, nele numbe usekhe idebe. Mukhondonda, nalulya nevavolile Avayahudi, 'Ukhunilota, samukhawesye ukhwincha.' Leno nikhovavola umwe, khange.
Nikhovapa ululagelo ulupya, ukhota mganane; kama une ulunekhavaganile umwe, nayomwe, khange nayomwe mgananage yomwe khwa yomwe.
Kho ele avani vitambolaga ukhuta umwe mole vasiole vango, mgave mlenologano khokhela yomo nu yunge.”
U Simoni u Petro akhambola, “Intwa, wilota ndakhu?” U Yesu akhanda, “Esekhemu eyenilota lene samukha wesye ukhufyata (ukhung'onga), lakini mkhong'anga pongela.”
U Petro akhambola, “Intwa, khekhi nesite ukhukhukonga khata leno? Une nikhomya uwomi wango khijili yakho.”
U Yesu akhanda, “Je wikhomwa uwomi wakho khokili yango? Ninchova, ninchova nikhokhuvola, elikongove yukheva livekha vobelile mara khadatu.”
Usite ukhoyelukhusu enumbula yakho ukhukhangayekha. Vukhumwedekha u Nguluve mwedekhe na yone.
Munyumba ya Daada vango mlenembombo nyingi ya khutama; kama yekhale yivinchage, nakhale nikhokhovula, ulya khuva nilota khojili yakho.
Kama niluta khukhovandalela amakhali, nikhwincha khange khukho vakhalibesya kholyone, ili amakhali bakho nelepo nyomwe mvepo.
Muyemanyikle enjela amakhali ukhuniluta.”
U Tomaso akhambola u Yesu, “Intwa, satolumanyile amakhali upowilota; Je! Tukhoyemanya ndakhekhi enjela?
U Yesu akhavavola, “Une nene njela, yavolweli, nu womi; asikholi uyiwesya ukhwincha khya Daada isipokua ukhugendela kholyone.
Mukhale munchage mumanyile une, mukhale mwiva mumanyile Udaada vango khange; ukhwanjela isaliinchi nukhokhyendela mumanyile numumbwene umwene.”
U Filipo akhambola u Yesu, “Intwa, tuvonesye Udaada, neyo yiva yetokwelile.”
U Yesu akhavavula, “Sanevile paninye numwe khusekhe itali, bado somanyile une, Filipo? Yeyoni uyambwene une ambwene Udaada; winchova ndakhekhi, 'Tuvonesye Udaada'?
Samulumanyile ukhuta une nelegati ya Daada, nu Daada alegati ndine? Amamenyu aganincho khulyomwe sanincho kho khusuda yango yone; badala ya mwene, yo Odaada uyoitama igati ndyone uyoivomba embombo ya mwene.
Inyadikhe une, ukhuta nelegati ya Daada, nu Daada alegati nalyone; mwovoni inyedekhe une khosababu ya mbombo nchango khasa.
Ninchova, ninchova, nikhovavola, yuywa ikhonyedekha, une imbombo nchila inchonivomba, ikhonchivomba imbombo inchi khange, na ayaivomba imbombo imbakha ulya khova nilota khya Daada.
Khokhoni ekhe mudova kholitawa lyango, ekhyonivomba Udaada awesye ukhu giniwa khu Mwana.
Kama mnfadove ekhena khokhoni kholitawa lyango, elyo nivomba.
Kama mwinogwa, mwikhwibata ululagelo.
Na ayanikhodova Udaada, Navape ikhovapa usaidizi uyonge ili ukhuta awesye ukhuva paninye isikhu nchoni,
Umepo va yelweli. Ekhelunga sakhiwesya ukhupokhela umwene ulwakhova sawukhombona, au ukhumanya umwene, ata ewo umwe, mmanyile umwene, kwani itama popaninye numwe naiva igati ndimwe.
Sanikhovalekha mwevene; Nivuyakho lyomwe.
Khosekhe idebe, ekhelunga sakhikhombona khange, umwe mukhombonaga, ulyakhova nitama, nuyumwe mtama khange.
Kho sikhu eyo mlalomanya ukhuta une nilegati nu daada, nayomwe mlegati ndyone, nayone nelegati ndyone.
Yeyoni uyikhwibata ululagelo lwango nukhuluvomba, veyoywa uyanganile une; na yoywa anganile une iganiwa nu Daada vango, naayanikhogana naayanikhevonesya yune nemwe khomwene.”
Yuda (sio Iskariote) akhambola u Yesu, “Intwa, Je! Khenukhehi ekheyakha khohomela ukhota vukhevonyesya yuve kholyofwe na sio khokhelunga?
U Yesu akhanda akhambola, “Kama yeyoni uyanganile ikholibata ilimenyu lwango, u Daada vango ikhogaza, natukhwincha khomwene tuvekha ukhutama puninye nave.
Yeyoni yoywa sanganile une, sikhibata amamenyu gango. Elimenyu lyelyo mkholepolekha sio lyango bali lya Daada yoywa asukhile.
Neganchovile amambo aga kholyomwe, uwakati nitama numwe.
Khata eve, ufariji, Umepo umbalanche, yuywa Udaada ikhusukha khujili yango, ikhova ikhovamanyesya amambo goni ikhovamanyesya mkombokhage goni aganenchovile kholyomwe.
Eamani nikhovapa eamani yango umwe, sanikhovapa khama ekhelunga uwokhinogwa. Msite ukhuvekha inumbula yenyo ukhakhangayekha.
Mkhapolikhe ulunekhavavolile, 'Niluta inchango, na ayanivaya kholyomwe, mkhale mnganage une, mukhale mwiva nolukhekhelo ulyakhova nilola khya Daada, ulyakhova u Daada imloakho kholikho une.
Lene nevavolile kabla sayekhomile ili ukhuta, yengakhomele, muwesye ukhunyedekha.
Sanekhanchove numwe amamenyu mingi ulya khova umbakha vakhelunga ekhe iva inchile. Umwene alevovole amakha kholyone,
ili ukhota ekhelunga khelumanye ukhuta nenganile u Daada, nivomba khekhyo asukhile une, kama ulyamile ululagelo, tukhume aponu apa.
Une nele usabibu ugwa lweli nu dada vango indemaji vaa usanbibu.
Hela ulusiamba lulegati ndiune ulusafi siwa hela usiamba ulusalu hola isehe ihuluhecha ili lupate uhuhola sana.
Umwe lenu mvile vanonu msababu mvile vasuhwa uhuva nevile nevavulile.
Mtame mgati ndione nayune netame gati ndiumwe kama ulusiambalulwa saluwesia uhu hola luene isio uhuva usanbibu nayumwe mnasitu uhutama igati ndiune.
Une nele usanbibu umwe mlelusamba uveidumu mgati ndiumwe umnu uyu ihola isehe nyingi uhuva pasipo une samhaweze uhuvomba imbombo yuyoni.
Inave umnu yuyoni sivemo gati ndiune itagiwa kama ulusiamba nuhuuma avanu yavi kusanya amasamba nuhutaga humoto, nuhutehetela.
Mnave mtama gati ndiune na kama amamenyu ya gitama gati ndiune dova lelioni ilimwinogwa numwe mvombeliwa.
Huele udada vango ihwinuliwa yamwi hola isehe nyini nuhuva vasiule vango.
Kama udada vango umwa nganile une nayune nevaganile umwe; mdamage mlugano lwango.
Mnave mhwibata indagele chango mtama mlugano lwango kama umni batile indagelo icha dada yangu nuhutama mvugane wamwene.
Nenchovile aga hulemwe ili uh hovuha hwenyo huve gati ndiune ili uhuhovona hwenyo hevombehe ehele kamilifu.
Ulu lulu lagelo lwango uhuta mganane yumwe hwa yumwe kama umone vaganilune.
Hakuna umnu uvale nulugano ulu vaha hulihune ehumiee uvutamo uwa mwene hwa ajili ya lafiki avanine.
Umwe mlelafiki vango mnave mvomba aganihuvasuha.
Sanihuve langa kama vatesiwa uhuva utesiwa sihwelewa hehuva utesiwa sihwelewa hehwo ivomba umbaha vamwene nevelangile kama malafiki uhuva nevavulile amambo goni aga uhuhuma hwa Dada.
Samwa njagule une bali une navachagiile umwe nuhwasuha mlute isehe nisehe chenyo chipate uhuhola isehe nesehe chenyo chipate uhu tama hela ehe mwinogwa uhudova hwa Dada mdove hulitawa ilengo ihuvapa.
Amambo aga nihuvasuha hela mnu agana nage na vanine.
Kama ehelunga hihuvakala lela welewe uhuta umwe mngalalile une kabula saheva kalalile umwe.
Inave mwale va helonga ehelunga hehale hihuvagana umwe leno uhusa sio mlevahelunga uhuva nava chagile uhuhuma mhe lunga ndi ehelunga hihuva kalalela.
Kumbuha elimenyu elenavavulile uviteseha siwesia uhwa mbaha va mwene uhuva vanesiche une vihuvatesi nayumwe kama mwaibite amamenyu gango vahale vihwibata naga genyo.
Vavombiee amambo goni hulitawa iliango uhuva samhwelewa uveasuhile.
Kama nenga site uhwicha uhuva vula ndaleno, savavombile uvutulanongwa; lakini usehe ugu savahabeche uvutula nogwa wavene.
Uviihung'alalela une ihukala lela Udada pia.
Nenave sanevombile embombo mvene ambapo asipali yumo uveavombile vahale viva nu vutula nongwa ule leno va vombile goni gavele vambwene nuhung'alalelaune nu Dada vango.
Ele lihumla ili elimenyu letimela lelwo lesimbiwe hululagelo luavo: 'Vihungalalela une bila sababu.'
Wakati ubembelesaji ichile uvepile nihusuha hulimwe uhuhuma hwa Dada, uyu vemepo uvalweli uvihuma hwa Dada ihusuhudela.
Umwe pia mhusuhudela uhuva mvile pamoja nune tangu huvutengulilo.
Nevavulile amamba ago ili msite uhukwaseha.
Yavihuva humia mmasinagogi uhuva usehe ya gufiha uve ipya ihuvabuda ayisaga uhuta ivombe inono hwa ajili ya Nguluve.
Yavihuvavombela amamba aga savi helewa udada uhuva savamanyile une.
Nevavulile amambo aga usihe gulafiha vuaga gahumile yamweswa uhuga kumbuha na mneva vulile yumwe sanavavule amambo aga uhuhuma pavutengulilo uhuva nele pamoja numwe.
Uhuva usehe ugu niluta huyuywa asuhile; lakini hakuna katikati yetu uvihumbocha, “Wiluta ndahu?”
Uhuva nechovile amamenyu aga huliomwe amasago gadegile munumbula.
Hata leno, nihuva vula uvu yelweli nilononu huliumwe nenahege, uhuva nenasite uhuhega uvibembe liesiasahiche; lakini nenahege nihusuha huliomwe.
Aniche uvibembeleswa ayihuva manya uhuhumana nuvutula nongwa uhuhumana nuvuyelweli nu huhumana hegiwa.
Uhuhumana nuvutulanongwa uhuva savanyamini une,
uhuhumana nu vuyelweli uhuva niluta mwa dada, nasamhambone tena;
nuhuhumana nuvuhegi uhwa vuvaha wa helunga iva ahegiwe.
Nelenago mingi agahuvavula, lakini samhagelewe ino.
Lakini, Umepo uvaye lweli aniche ihuva dema huga yelweli goni uhuva saha chove hwa ajili ya mwene, lakini gugoni agapya ipuleha goni ayichova amambo ago ayihuga chova amambo agapya gihwicha.
Umwene ayihunginia une uhuva ayitole amambo gango ayihuvavula umwe.
Ivinu vyoni ifialenavyo Udada vyango; uhuva nechovile humepo itola amambo gango ayihuva voneswa umwe.
Bado usehe ufupi samha mbone tena; na baada ya usehe ufupi tena, yamhumbona tena.”
Baadae avasiule vamwene vaha chovana henuhehi ehihotovula, “usehe ufupi, ita samhambona uhuva niluta hwa Dada?”
Hwa hiyo vahachova henuhehi ehihu tuchova, 'Bado usehe usupi'? Satu hwelewa ichi chova.”
U Yesu alulile uhuta avavinogwa uhumbucha, navope ahavavula, “Mhevucha mwevene uhuhusu ele, umnechovile,'Uhuta bado usehe usupi, samhambone tena na baada ya usehe usupi mhumbona tena'?
Edeha, edeha, nihuvavula, yamwilela nuhueleleswa, lakini ehelunga yahihuva dega yamwiva na masago lakini amasago genyo ya gipendoha nuhuhovoha.
Udala iva nuluvavo wakati avile nuluvavo (au amasago) wakati wa huho lahufihe; leno apila ihola umwana, isamwa tena uluvavo husababu ya huhuvoha hwamwene uhupata umwana uvahuliwe mhelunga.
Umwe msaga leno, lakini nihuvavona tena; ni numbula chenyo chihovoha hakuna umnu uveipia ihuvahecha uhuhovoha hwenyo.
Esihu eyo samlambucha amaswali. Edeha, Edeha, nihuvavula, mne saye lilioni hwa Dada, ihuvapa hulitawa eliango.
Ipaha usehugu samhesaya lilioni hulitawa eliango esaye mwipata ili ohohovoha hwenyo hukamimilehe.
Nechovile numwe hu lugha iyesaye yelevihe, lakini ulu usehe gufihe upusanehachove hu lugha eyesio yihweleveha lakini baada yaleno ni huvavula waziwazi uhuhusu Udada.
Isihu eyo yamhesaya hulitawa eliango nasanehava vule uhuta yanihesaya haajili ya Dada venyo;
uhuva Udada venyo avaganile uhuva mnganile une uhuva mnye dihe uhuva nehumile hwa Dada.
Nehumile hwa Dada nichile huhelunga; tena, nehega mhelunga naniluta hwa Dada”.
Avasiule vamwene vahambula, “Ulolile uhuta wichova wasi wasi sautumela amafumbo.
Ulu leno, tulumanyile uhuta uga manyile amambo goni sawinogwa umunu yoyoni ahuvuche amaswali uhuva tuhwamini uhuva uhumile hwa Ngolove.
U Yesu ahajibu, “Usehugu mmanyile mhunyamini?”
Lula leno usehe gufihe sawa usehe gufihe ambapo yampechela lanila hela yumu na huvene mhundeha nemwene. Lakini sio nelene mwene puale Udada ale nune.
Nihuvavula amambo aga ili mve nulu no chehecho mhelunga mle na fujo (mlena matata), lakini mweyepe enumbula nesindile ehelunga.
U Yesu achovile amambo aga; ahinola amiho gamwene uhuluta hukianya ahachova, “Dada, usehe gufihe uminule umwana navope ahwinole uvewe -
kama umpelile uvuvaha hukianya huoni ivia mbile ili avape uludeva ulwa hukianya vala avoni vavo uvapile.
Uvu vuvu tamo uwa hukianya uhuta vahumanye uve ve Nguluve vivalueli yuve, mwene nuve usuhile u Yesu Klisiti.
Nahuinuile apa pahelunga nuhuye kamelesia embombo iyeuhamile neyevombe.
Dada, unyinule leno pamoja nuve vemwene ulueyinulo ulunale nalwo pamoja nuve kabula ya ehelunga uhuvumbiwa.
Navavonise ilitawa eli vanu uvuwamile pahelunga vale vanu vaho; lakini wang'abiswe unie vaibete amamenyu gaho.
Ululeno vihwelewa uhuta hela henu ehumile hehumile huliuve,
humamenyu gala uguvile umile une nevapile vavo amamenyu ago. Vapokhile yelweli vahalumanya uhuta une nihumile huliove vahaminzi uhuta veve usuhile.
Nihuvadovela avene. Sanihuva dovela ehelunga bali vala uvuumile uhuva vaho.
Ifinu vyoni iviango nifiaho na fiope iviolenavyo uve fiango na yune nihwinoliwa huifio.
Une nesimoli tena mhelunga basi avene vuvale helunga nayune ni huicha huliove Dada vevalweli vatunje hulitawa eliaho lela elu umile ufwe ili tuve nu vumoja, kama une nuve umtuvile nuvu moja.
Nalitenele navo, navalolelile hutita waelewa mile navalendelile, hakuna umnu atayumo uviayagile isipokuwa umwana uviheyacha ili uvusime vutimele.
Ululeno nihwicha huliove ulu leno nichova ili ehelunga hehovohe igati mvene vavo.
Nevapile elimenyu liaho ehelunga hevakalalile uhuva avene sio vakelunga, kama une leno nuvunevile sio vakelunga.
Sanihuvasaya uhuvahecha mhelunga bali uvalendelele ni mbombo imbivi.
Avene sio vahelunga kama une sio nelevahelunga.
Uvaveve huvuyelweli huli uve vemwene katika uvuyelweli; elimenyu lwahoni layelweli.
Uhasuhile mhelunga nayune nevesuhile mhelunga.
Hwa ajili yavene une nihehumia huli uve ili navope vehumie huvuyelweli.
Sio ava avanihuva dovela bali navala ava pia vihunyedeha uhugendela mlimenyu elivene,
ili vope vave nuvumoja, kama vile uve Dada, kama umovile gati ndiune nihuva dove lauhuta vope vave gati ili ehelunga hepate uhwamini uhuta veveusuhile.
Uwinuhe vula uvuumile une - nevapile vavo, ili vave nuvumoja -
Une igati mvene navope gati ndiune, ili vaweswe uhukamelesiwa katika uvumoja; ili ehelunga hepate uhwelewa uhuta uve veve usuhile nuhuvagana, kama uhuvagana nduvu nganile, une.
Dada, hela ehiumile une - Ninogwa vope vave pamoja nune mahali upunelepo vawese uhumbona uvuvaha wango, vula uvumile: uhuva uve wanganile une sana kula ya uhuvumbiwa ehelunga.
Dada venyahaki, ehelunga sahiehumanye uveve, navaeliwe uhuta wasuhile.
Nehavombile elitawa lelevehe huliuve nayanivumba lelevehe ili ulugano ulumile une luwesie uhuva igali mvene nayunene vemgati mvene.”
Baada ya uhuchova amamenyu aga, ahegile navasiule vamwene uhuluta hulivende elia Kidron, umule ne bustani, ambaho avasiule ingile igati mmwene.
Ululeno u Yuda, uvanogwaga uhu uhuchongela vabude navope a eliwe esehemu eyo tena u Yesu alutaga lutaga esehemu eyo navasiule vamwene.
Nu Yuda, avile apatile kundi la avalendeleli na avasomi (avembi) avavaha avalongochi vahicha ni nulumli kulunzi ni silaha.
Nu Yesu, salwe hela henu hehio helenu umbeha hwa ajili yamwene aha humile huvu longolo ahavavucha, “Mhundonda uveni?”
Navene vahajibu, “Yesu Mnazareth.” U Yesu ahava vula, “Une nene” Nu Yuda usaliti aemile pamoja navasihali.
Hwa iyo nihuvavula, “Une nene” apa vahakilivoha hesana sana nu hugwa pasi.
Ahavavucha tena, “Veni uvemhu ndonda? navope vahajibu tena “Yesu mnazareth.”
U Yesu ahajivajibu nemalile uhuva vula uhuta nene apa kama mhundonda une, valehe avange awo valutage.”
Aga gahale mamenyu ili atimele papo achovile katiha wale uvuwa mile sana vayache hata yumo.”
Ndipo Simon Petro, alene mndu ahayekwega nuhugeda embaha huto eya kulia undongochi umbaha nelitawa eliamwene undongochi liale ve Malko.
U Yesu ahambula u Petro, “Kilivula emundu yaho husito yaho hwanini uhuta nenyele ehekombe hea ihia mile Udada?”
Basi lela elikundi eliavalende lechi avavaha navalongochi Avayahudi vahambata u Yesu nuhukunga.
Navene vahandongocha hwanza ipaha hwa anasi uhuva umwene aledala va Kayafa, amaye alevembaha sana humwana ugwa.
Usehe ugu Uhayafa vemwene avapile uvusauli Avayahudi uhuta yehanogiwaga umunu yumo afwe huajili ya vanu.
U Simoni Petro akongile u Yesu, vulevule avasiule uyunge. Nula uvasiule amanyihe hundongochi umbaha numwene ahingela pamoja nu Yesu katika engalawa eyandongochi umbaha;
lakini u Petro aemile hunje hundiango basi uvasiule uva manyile nondongochi umbaha ahahumela hunzi ahanza uhuchova nu dala vaundongochi uvaalendelelaga undiango nu humwingicha u Petro igati.
Basi ufanyakazi uvalehu lendelela undiango ahambula u Petro, “Siuveve yuve ulenjela vavasiule vauyu umnu?” Navope ahachova, “Une sio.”
Na vala avalongochi na avavaha vahema maha pale vakochiche umoto ugwa namna hwale nemepu ataleno vale huota umoto ili vapate amafuhe nu Petro alenevene alehuota umoto ahava achige emile.
Undongochi umbaha ahambucha u Yesu juu ya avasiule avamwene nulumanyesio uluamwene.
U Yesu ahajibu, “Nehevulile ehelunga wazi une nemanyiswe mala kwa mala mamasinagogi na mmatembile papo Avayahudi vikusanyiha nayune saneha chova lulioni husili.
Hehi ulehumbucha? Vavuche avale humlehecha hehio nele huchova. Avanu ava vagamanyile amambo gagonelehuchova.
U Yesu avile achovile evo umbaha vavavaha ahava emile ahatova u Yesu huma voho gamwene, “Je, vuyitahiwa uhujibu undongochi umbaha?”
Nu Yesu ahajibu, “Kama nechovile elimenyu lioni elivivi basi uve sahidi hu ajili ya mbivi, kama nechovile vunonu hwa nini vuhunova?
Ndipo Anasi ahagega u Yesu hwa Kayafa undongochi umbaha ahava akungiwe.
U Simoni Petro ahavile emile alehupasia amafuhe mwene. Avanu vala vahambucha vahata. “Je, uvesio mlemamoja navasiule vamwene becha ahachuva “Une sinene.”
Yumo undongochi umbaha hale lukololwe va gosi amaye Petro agedile embuluhuto ahachova, “Je sio veve nehuwene hubustani?”
U Petro ahabele tena, na mala elikongove lehaveha.
Kisha vahatola u Yesu kwa Kayafa ipaha hu Praitorio. Yale manavusihu sana avene vavo savahingile mela Praitorio ili vasite uhweyingecha humbivi nu huyelwe epasaka.
Hwa iyo u Pilato ahaluta ahachova ahata nongwa nyihi eyehegiwa umunu uyu?”
Vahajibu vahambula, “Kama umnu uyu alavebila mbivi tuhale satahale tuhundeta huliuve.”
U Pilato ahavavula, “Itole yumwe mwevene, mhahege uhulingana neselia yenyo.” Navayahudi vahambula, “Eselia saye hutu luhusu uhubuda umunu yoyoni.”
Vahachova evo ili elimenyu letimele elimenye eliachovile elelihufu uhufwa hwa mwene.
Basi u Pilato ahingela tena Praitorio ahamwelanga u Yesu ahambula, “Je, veve mbaha vavayahudi?”
U Yesu ahajibu, “Je, uve vuhumbucha eliswali uhuva winogwa uhwelewa uhuva vingi vahusuhili uhuta umbuche une?”
Nayu Pilato ahajibu, “Une sanele Nyahudi, au sivyo?” Ehelunga hiaho navo vombi avavaha vuhaha huleta huliune uve uvombilehehi?
U Yesu ahajibu; “Uvaha wango sio wahelunga ehe, kama uvuvaha wango wa vuve nesehemu katika ehelonga ehe aviteseha vango vahale vihunga nganela ilinesito uhuhuwa huvayahudi hwuyelweli, uvuvaha sawihume apa”
U Pilato ahambula ahata, “Je, uve vevembaha?” U Yesu ahajibu, “uve ndivyo wowichova uhuta une nelembaha uhuva une naholiwe, sababu eye une nichile ielonga ili neve sadi vavuyelweli yuyoni uvalenuvuye lweli ipole hecha esavuti yango.
U Pilato ahambocha, “Uvuyelweli vululehu avile i chovevo ahaluta huva yahudi ahambula sanihulevona lulioni umnu uyu.
Umwe mle nuvutamaduni uvuvuvomba nefungulele ukongwa yumo usehe gwa pasaka. Je mwinogwa nefungulele avayahudi.”
Kisha vahatova ekelele vahachova siyo uyu tudendolele Baraba alepohaji.
Basi u Pilato atolile u Yesu nu hutova.
Vala avasihali vahasohota amatoni nuhutengenesia elitaji. Vahaveha hukianya hutwa ugwa Yesu nu hufualecha umwenda ugasamalawe.
Vahamwichela nuhuchova, “Uve veve imbaha vavayahudi! navahatova humavoho gavene.
U Pilato ahumile hunji na huvavula avanu, “Lola nihuvaletela umunu uyu huliumwe ili mmanye uhuta alebila nongwa yuyoni.”
U Yesu ahumile hunji afwalile amavuva gamatoni nemienda egwa sambalawe. Ndipo u Pilato ahavavula, “Lola umnu uyu apa!”
Usehe ugwa ndongochi umbaha vavile vambwane u Yesu, vahatova ikelele vahata, “Isulubeswe, sulubeswe.” U Pilato ahavavula, “Itole yumwemha sulubeswe uhuva une sanevu uvutula nogwa mgati mmwene.”
Avayahudi vahajibu Pilato vahata, “Ufwe tule bila seliya, neseliya tule vuvule eya hunogwa uhubuda uhuva umwene ahefanyile uhuta mwana va Nguluve.”
U Pilato avileipoleha amamenyu aga ahanja uhuduada,
ahingela Praitorio tena nuhumbula u Yesu, “Uve uhumile ndahu? hata hivyo u Yesu sahajibu.
U Pilato ahavuliwa, “Je, uve sawichova nune? Je, uvesulumanyile uhuta une nelena mamlaka ga huhufungula na mamlaka ahuhu sulubisia?”
U Yesu ahajibu, “Ahata suhale wiva ni ngofu uhusidi hulione kamauhale sitolile hukianya. Ivyo umnu uva ang'echiche huliove alenimbivi imaha.”
Uhuhumana nelijibu eli, u Pilato ahanogwa uhundeha hulu, lakini Avayahudi vaha tova ekelele vahachova, “Kama vuhundeha hulu uve sio ule lafiki va Kaisari: Hela uvivomba henyune hundongochi umbaha iva henyume nu Kaisari.”

Basi ula uvasiule uve aganile u Yesu ahambula u Petro, “Ve Nguluve.” Navope u Simoni Petro avile ipuleha uhuta ve Nguluve ahekunga eligwanda limwene uhuva alehebwinda ahetaga mnyanza.

Vulevule avavombi vango na vavombi vango avakhenja khusikhu incho, niduda Inumbula yango, wope yuvitabiri.
Yunivonesya maajabu khukyanya ni ishara pasi pakhilunga, ukhisa, umwoto, na mafusho ga liosi.
Nilinchuva libadelesiwa ukhuva hisi nu mwenchi gyiva ikhisa, vubadu sayin'chile esikhu imbaha iya ajabu iya Ntwa.
yuyiva ukhuta khila munu uwikhulilangelo ilitawa li Ntwa ikhokha.'
Mwiva va Israeli, pulihincha amamenyu aga: Yesu wa Nazareti, munu uvyatambuliwe nu Nguluve khuliumwe khumbombo iyivombiwa na maajabu, uguigendela Unguluve pagati paliumwe, umwe yumwe mulumanyile-
Ulwakhuva upango kwatenguliwe pakhwanja na malifwa ga Nguluve, ahumen'chiwa numwe, khumavokho ga vanu avawafu, mwasulubisye nu khubuda,
uvingave Unguluve amwinuile, akhavuhen'cha uluvavo ulwakhufua khumwene, ukhuva sayawesakhanaga khumwene ukhumilikhiwa nuwa.
Ewo uDaudi in'chova ukhuhusu yuywa, 'Nambwene Untwa lweli khuvulongolo khumiho gango, umwene mwale mukhevokho khango ikhakhudia leno sanikhegelen'chiwa.
Leno inumbula yango ya howikhe na lulimi lwango. Lwahuvokhilwe nagumbili gwango gutama vononu.
Sukhayelekhe inafsi yango yelute khuvufwe, tena yokhanduhusu umwedekhi vakho ukhulola uvuvolile.
Uve unyaminisye une injila ya wumi; vukhumbomba nedige uluhovokho khuvulongolo khumiho gakho.'
Lukolo lwango, niwesya ukhun'chova khuliumwe khumakha ukhuhusu dada veto Daudi: umwene afyule akhasyeliwe, nilikabuli lya mwene lili paninie nufwe ipakha elelo.
Ewo, ale imbombi alumanyile ukhuta Unguluve ambekhile lweli khuvuyelweli wa mwene, ukhuta ivekha yumo mumbuhon'chi wa mwene khukhikiti khya milele.
Aliwene ili imbivi nakhan'chova ukhuhusu ukhun'chukha khwa Klisto, 'salekhiwa wafuile, na gumbele gwa mwene sagwalekhiwe ukhovola.'
Uyu uYesu - Unguluve afufule, ufue twivoni tulivasaidi.
Lenu, vuinuliwe mukhevokho ikha khindia ikha Nguluve, wapokhile iahadi ya Mepo Umbalan'che ukhuhuma khwa Dada, umwene amimine iahadi, yeyo umwe mwilola nu khupulikha.
Kkhekhi uDaudi saayoge ukhuluta khukyanya, lino inchova, 'DADA an'chovile khwa Dada wango,
“tama khivokho khyango khya khundio, ipakha upukhe vanivomba ava aduvi wakho khigoda khumalunde gakho.
Lino inyumba yoni iya Isirahili nayelumanye khwaleli ukhuta Unguluve ambombile umwene ukhuva Vitwa na viKelesto, uyu Yesu yuywa mwasulubisie.”
Linu vuvapulikhe ago vakhanyiwa munumbula n'chavo, vakhambula uPetulo na vamitume avange, “Lokolo, tugakhendeti?”
Nu Petulo akhavavula, “Mupele na Mwon'chiwe, khila munu vunyo, khulitawa ilya Yesu Kilesto ukhuva musyekheliwa imbivi n'chenyo, na mupokhela izawadi Umepo Umbalan'che.
Lweli iye ahadi na khuvana venyo na vala voni avalikhutali, avanu vingi Untwa Unguluve veto upukhiva ikhuvilanga.”
Khumamenyu mingi avavulile nukhuvadova; akhajova, “Mwiyokhole muhume mukhizazi ihi ikhinangi.”
Puva khagapokhela amamenyu gamwene vakhongesekha khusikhu iyo avanu elufu tatu.
Vakhendelela khu mafundisyo aga mitume vale pupaninie, pakhumenyula ukhate na pakhwisaya.
Hofu ikhin'cha mugati, na maajabu mingi ne ishara nchikhavombekha ukhumela khu mitume.
Voni avaamini vale paninie ni finu fyavene pupaninie,
na vagun'chin'che ifinu fya vene nu khugavania khuvoni ukhukongana numu ikhiinogwa.
Ewo isikhu baada ya sikhu vaendelile vakhava nililengo limo khutembile, puva menyula ukate mu kaya, ikhyakhulya khuluhovokho nuvunyenyekhefu wa munumbula;
vasifile Unguluve na vakhava nikhibali avanu woni. Untwa akhavaongelen'cha sikhu khwa sikhu vala vavo valikhokholiwa.
Pakhuva u Petro nu Yohana vavile vilola khutembile osekhe ugwa khwesaya, akhasekhe akha saa tisa.
Umunu uyonge, ondema okhuma okhukholiwa, alekhupapiwa osikhu jonii alekhugona pa ndyango ugwatembile onony palekhuhuma khudova enekhelo iya vanu avavalekhuluta khutembile.
Upwavawene uPetro nu Yohana vale pakhufikha pa tembile, akhadova enekhelo.
U Petro, vuikasya amikho, paninee nu Yohana, akhanchovile, “Utulolage ofwe.”
Ondema akhavalola, akhakhuvela okhupewa ekhenu ukhuhumya khu mwene.
Ulwakhu uPetro akhanchovile, “Ikhela nulutalama one nelevo vole, pakhuva ekhenelenakhyo nikhumwa ulwomwe. ukhugendela nditawa elwa Yesu Klisiti uvakhu Nazarethi, gendaga.”
U Petro akhatola khukhevoho khwa mwene khwandwa, akhapemba khukwanya: Usekhe gumuamalunde ga mwene ififundo ifwa machege agavene fikhapatile amakha.
Akhanyelile khukyanya, umunu ondema akhemile nu khutengula ughugenda; akhingela mutembile pupaninie nu Petro nu Yohana, vu igenda, vuinyela, nu khuginwya uNguluve.
Avanu voni vakhambwene vo igendo nu khuginwya uNguluve.
Vakhalumanya vemunu ula uvekhale idova enekhelo pandwango ononu ngwa tembile, vakhadenchiwe nukhuswiga ulwa khuva ekhekhakhumile khumwene.
Ulwa khuva avibatelile oPetro nu Yohana, avanu voni pupaniniye vakhanyilelile khulinyumba elwa Sulemani, vakhaswiga sana.
U Petro avile alewene ele, '“Omwene vanu vakhu Israeli, pakhuva khekhi muswigaa? Pakhuva khekhi mukhelekha amikho genyo khulwumwene nu vuchaji weto?”.
U Nguluve va Ibrahimu, nu va Isaka, nu va Yakobo, uNguluve uva Dada veto, amwinule ombombi va mwene u Yesu. Oyo ve mwene mukhambekhile nu khubela pa mikho aga Pilato, ulwa khuva umwene akhapangile ukhumbekha mwavukhe.
Mukhabelile umbalanche nu vayelweli, pakhuva mukhanogilwe ukhuta ubudi avekhiwe mwavukhe.
Umwe mukhabudile unkuludeva uvawumi, uvekha nchusinche uNguluve ukhukhuma khuva nchukhile - Ufwe fwe vemelenehi va ele.
Leno, khu lwidiko ndi tawa lwa mwene, umunu uyo uvemu khumanya nukhumbona, avombiwe ukhuva na maha. Ulwidiko ulalugendela mwa Yesu lupile umwene eafya endagafu, khuvulongo khulwumwe mwe voni.
Leno, valokolo, nelomanyile ukhuta mwavombile mbukonyofu, vuvakhavombile na valongonchi venyoo.
Pakhuva imbombo inchakhavavulile u Nguluve na mbeve mu milomo ugwa valagunchi vavoo, ukhuta u Klisiti ayiteswkha, leno agamalile.
Ulwa khuva, pelaga nu khuswelukha, ili imbivi nchenyo nchikhenchiwe khabisa, ukhuta khinche akhasekhe akhwe nemela ukhukhumana nu vuwepo uwa mbaha.
Ulwa khuva iwesya ukhusuha u Klisiti uyachagoliwe khu lugendo lwenyo, Yesu.
Ulwa khuva umwene vevikhupokhela khukyanya impakha akhasekhe akhakhukhelekha ivinu vwoni, ulwa khuva uNguluve akhanchoovile khusana ne milomo egwa vala gunchi avavalanche.
Ulwa khuva uMusa ahanchovile, 'Umbakha u Nguluve alambikha undagunchii ndone ukhukhuma khuvalokolo l wencho. Mukhopulekhencha khelakhenu ekheyava ikhu vavula umwe.
Yayikhumele ukhuta umunu uyu sikhupulekhencha undogunchii ayiteswa nukhubeliwa pa vanu.'
Lweli, na valagunchi vooni ukhukhuma khwa Samweli nava khakongile pasana pamwene, vakhanchovile nu khwenesya isikhu inchii.
Umwe mulevana va valagunchii nulwedikho u Nguluve avombile paninie na vakukhu, ndulwa khanchoovile hwa Abrahamu, 'Mu mbeyu eyako inyumba ne hooni incha nkelunga nchikhwinohiwa.'
Pakhuva uNguluve amwimvile ombombi va mwene, akhasung'a khulwumwe lale, ili avasaye umwe nukhu badelikha ukhukhuma khumbivi nchenyo.”
Akhasekhe akha Petro nu yohana puvalekhunchova na vanu, avalongonchi na valendeleli awatembile na masadukayo vakhavalutile.
Pakhuva vakhakarile sincho uhwakhuva u petro nu yohana valekhumanyisya avanu ukhumanya uyiesu nu khwenesya ukhunchukha khwamwene uhkukhuma khuvafwile.
Vakhavibata nukhuvavikha murigelresa impakha esikhu eyeyekongire, uhwakhuva yikhalelwa khenikhe.
Pakhuva avanu vingi avakhapolakhe uvufumbwe vakhedikhe, pakhuva enafasi eyavagosi avakhedikhe vale elfu tano.
Puyekhafikhe vukhelo esikhu eyikhonga, ukhuta avavakha vavene, avagogoro na vavisimba, pupaninie vakhelundamana khu Yerusalemu.
U Anasi ondongonchi umbakhaalepo, mukayafa, nu Yohana, Isakanda, na voni avavale bokoro nu ndongonchi umbakha.
Puvakhavavekhile o Petro nu Yohana pagati pavene, vakhavavonchinche, “Khuvuwesyo vulekhu, au khulitawa lelekhu muvombile aga?”
Ohwakhuva, o petro, andehwiwe omepo umbarache, akhavavula, “Umwe mwevavakha va vanu, na vagogoro.
Inave ufwe esikhu eye tovu nehiwa pakhuva embomboenonu yevombiwe khumunu utamuoyo khuchila yelekhu umunu oyo - khuchila yelekhuumunu oyo avombiwe ukhuva inkhafu?
Navonelemanyekhe elwa khuvanu voni avakhu Israel, ukhutakhulitawa elya yiesu kristi uvakhunazareti, uvengave mukhatesinchi uvunane unguruve anchusinch ukhukhuma khuvafwe, pakhuva khulugendo ulwamwene ukhuta umunu oyo ayikhwema pavolongolo pabyumwe iva nu wumii.
O yiesu kristi liwe elevabedile ava vinchenga, uhwakhuva levombiwe ukhuva liwe livakha lwa parukanchi.
Vusipali uvolokhole khu munu uyunge yeyonii, olwakhuva lesipali elitawa elenge pasi pakherunga eletupeviwe twe vanu, elyunave khu elyo tuwesya ukhwedikhiwa”.
pakhuva vavile valolile ovojasi owa petro nu Yohana, puvakhe riwe ukhuta vanu va khawaida avasavimbii, vakhaswigile, vakhavu manya ukhuta o Petro nu Yohana vale pupaninie nu Yiesu.
Pakhuva vakhabwene umunu uya khaponile emile paninie navene, vale vovole ekhenii ekhyakhune hoova khu ele.
Pakhuva vavile vamwile ukhuta avasuhiwa vakhege pavorongoro palulundamano ulwanongwa, vanchoovile venekhuvene.
Vachoovile, tikhuvagakhandakhekhi avanu ava? vuyweli ukhuta amazingara gavombikhe uhkugendele khuveneguma nyikhe khela munu uyitama khuyerusalemu; satuwesya okhurebera ele.
Pakhuva, elevombiwe ele lesite ukhugenda muvanu, zekha tuvalole valekhe okhonchoova tena khumunu vevoni ukhugendela elitawa ele.
Vakhavelangile o Petro nu Yohana igati nukhuvavola ukhuta valekhe okhunchoova nukhumanyisya khu litawa lwa Yiesu.
Pakhuva o petro nu Yohana vakhavavulile ukhuta, “Inave hoeli pa mikho aga nguruve ukhuvedekha umwekhuriko Nguruve, kheganiaga yumwe.
Pakhuva ufwe satuwesya ukhube khera ukhunchoova imbombo inchu tumchimwene nukhupulekhba “.
Usekhe ugwakhuvavunga sineho o petro nu Yohana, vakhavalekha valutange, savakhawesye ukhupata eyira uwwakhuvatovela, ulwakhuva avawu vowi vavokhupatagiwie u Nguruve khu khela ekhikhavo rubikhe.
umunu uvakhupelile ekhuedego ekhupona nesigono arobaini.
akhasekhe akhavavikhere vavokhe, o Petro nu Yohana vainchile khuvanu vavene nukhuva gooni avalongonchi avavakha na vagogoro agavavovile.
Vuvapulikhe, vakhatoncha nguruve nukhunchova, “vimbkha, vemwene vewavombile khukyanya ne kherunga ne nyanja ni vinufyoni ifiregati.
Vemwene ukhata, khumepo umbarache, khundomo ungwa dada vetu udaudi, umbombi vakho, anchovile, “pukhekhi avanu avakhe rungavavombile eghasia, avanu vasagile imbombo inchisanchino geranile?
Avatwa avakherunga vemilepo paninie, navavakha valundaminie pupaninie umbakha wayu kristi va mwene”.
Je lweli, vooni o Herode nu Pontio Pilato, paninie na vanu va nkerunga na vanu va Israel, vakherundanie pupaninie pakherunga ekhenundongonchi vaakho u Yiesu umbala nche, uvikhabakhile imono.
Vakharundaminie pupaninie ukhuvomba gooni gago ekhevokho khwakho nuwegane wakho vulamwile ukhukhuma pawancho pakhuva sagakhakhumile.
Leno umbakha, lolaga uvudwado avu, ukhavalongonche avavombii vakho ukhunchoova elimwenyu lwakhokho vujasi wooni.
ukhuta vuvukherekha ekhevokho khwakho khuponya, ifinu ifwakhudega viwesye ukhukhumila ukhugendela nditawaelwa ndongonchi vaakho umbalamehe u Yiesu '".
Vuvamalile ukhwesaya, esekhemu eyiv khalundeminie pupaninie yikhasukhanikha, khukhuta vanchoovile elimenyu elwa Nguruve nu vujasi.
Akhasekhe khavakhu avavedikhe valene numbula yemo nu mepo yumo, pakhuva asiparina umo muvene uyanchovile ukhuta khyokhyoni ekhewibite khwale khwamwene yuywa, pakhuva vale ni fiinu vyooru paninie.
khumakha gooni avasuhiwa pakhuva valekhunchova ludagano lnchakhunchukha khwa mbakha o Yiesu, nu luhungu uluvakha lukhale pakwanya pavene vooni.
Sapalepo numunu vevoni pagati pavene evesinogo uvuhitiji, pakhuva avanu vooni vale nu vuweso uwamjumba, vakhagonchi nche nukhu leta ikhhela incha vinu ifivakhago nchinche.
Nu khufivekha pasi pavasuhiwa mulugavo lukhavombikhe ukhule ngana nu keresiti, ukhulengano nu vunogwe wa khela munu.
O Yusuphu, ondawi, umunu ukhukhuma kipro, apeviwe elitawonve Barnabas na vasuhiwa (eyo ikitafasiriwa, ve mwana va lukhungu).
Ale ne khwale, agonchicnhe akha leta ikhela, avekhile pasi pa vasuhiwa.
Ewo, umunu yumo ikhielangiwa Anania, nudala va mwene uSafira vakhagoja esekhemu ya khumali,
akhafikha esehemu ya khele eyevagonchinche (udala va mwene akhalemanyile ele), akhagega esekhemu eyesigile nukhuyiveli ka malunde ga sukhwa.
Po uPetro akhanchova, “Anania, khehi usetano(utavangwa) ayedenchiche inumbula yakho ukhunchova uvudesi kho Mepo Umbalanche nukhufikha elieneo la khyoma khyalo?
Wosalegojiwe sakhekhave khima khyaho? Nawoyegonchiwe, yekhale ndakhehi elijambo ele usage munumbula? Sio uvasyovile avanu, usivile Unguluve.”
Avile ipokhela amamenyu aga, uAnania akhagwa pasi akhadumukha enumbula uwasiwasi uvovakha vokhavinchala vani vavo vakhapolikhe ele.
Avademi vukhincha khovolongalo khukhombekha msanda vakhangelekha khoji khukhosiela.
Usekhe gwa masaa gadatu, udala vamwene akhingela igati, asite ukhulumanya khekhyo khekhomile.
U Petro akhombola, “Imbole mukhogonchinche ekhalo khulela eyo.” Akhachova, “Ee, khu samani eyo.”
Po uPetro akhombola, “Yevile ndakhekhi ukhuta mpatane popaninye ukhugela Umepo va Ntwa? Ulole, amalunde gavavo vasyelile ugosi vakho gale pandyango vikhogega vikhokhelekha khonji.”
Gafula akhagwa mmalunde ga Peturo, enumbula yekhagedekha, avademi vala vakhincha igati vakhambona afyile. Vakhagego ukhung'omya khunji, nukhusiela jilani no gosi.
Ekhofu embakha yekhicha khotembile engoge, navani avapolikhe amambo aga.
Amambo mingi gatekhomela khovanu ukhugende mavokho ga syukhwa. Vakhale popaninye mbokumbi wa Sulemani.
Ulwakhuva, akhasikholi umunu uyunge tofauti uyakhate nuvonchasili uwakhwibatana navo; ata ewe, vakheshimikhe sana na vanu.
Ata ewe, avedekha vingi valekyongesekha khu Ntwa, esekhemu embakha yavagosi na vadala,
valegovagega avatamu mitaa, nukhuvagonya vitanda na makochi, uPeturo wigenda ekhanchinchimela khyamwene khikhe khovene.
Apo, avanu vingi valekwincha ukhuhuma esekhemu yeyoyenchongolile eYelusalemu, nukhuvatwala avatamu navava vanchanga nikhiwe ni mepo imbivi, novoni vakhapona.
Poutekhenchi umbakha akhinokha, navo ni avakhale popaninye (vavo vakhavile valizekhebe lya masadukayo); vakhadegile no wivu
vakhanyosya amavokho gavene vakhavibata avasukhwa nukhuvavekha igati mundibalasa elya moja khya moja.
Usekhe gwa pakelo avasukhwa ua Ntwa vakhedendala imilyango egya balasa nukhuvalongoncha khonji nukhunchova,
“Mulutage mukheme khutembile nukhuvavola avanu amamenyu ga Womi uvu.”
Vavapolikhe evo, vakhingela khutembile wekhwikya nukhumanyesya. Po utekheji umbakha akhincha na vani avakhale nave injela, nukhulyalanga elibalasa lyoni popaninye navasekhe voni vavanu va Izilaeli, nukhuvasukha khulibalasa khuvatola avasukhya.
Poavavombi vavovalutile, savakhavavone ndibalasa, povakhavuya khukhumya etalifa,
“Tuwene ilibalasa ledendiwe vononu navava vilendelela vamile pandango, votovile tudendola, satukhambone umunu igati.”
Poliseke umbakha vatembile nutekheji umbakha vovapolikhe amamenyu aga, vakhingeliwa ne khofu embakha khovene visaga yiva ndakhekhi embakha khovene visaga yiva ndakhekhi elijambo ele.
Yumo akhincha khukhovavola, “Avanu vavo mukhavavekhile ndi balasa vemile khutembile vikhovamanyesya avanu.”
Ewo ujemedari lumbakho akhaluta popaninye na vavombi, vakhajivatwala, savakhavombe efujo, vakhavadwada avanu vakhaviwesya ukhuvatova na mawe.
Vova jikhovatolile, vakhavavekha khovolongolo khubalasa. Utekheji umbakha akhavavoncha
akhachova, “Tukhavabelile msite ukhufundesya khulitawa ele, bado mudenchinche eYelusalemu khulifusyo elenyo, namunogwa ukhuleta ukisa gwa munu uyu khalyofye.”
Po uPetro bu vasukhya vakhanda, “Lazima tumwedekhe Unguluve sio avanu.
Unguluve va dada veto akhanchosinche uYeesu, uyumukhabudile, nukhumbekha khukyanya khu bekhe.
Unguluve akhaginga khokhevokho kya mwene khyakhege, nukhumbakha ukhuva Imbakha vagombonchi, ikhomya ulyeyisyo khoisilaele nolosikhelo lya mbivi.”
Ufye tulevashahidi va mambo aga, nu Mepo Umbalan'che, yuywa Unguluve akhominche khovavo vikhomwedekha.”
Avajumbe va balasa vovapolekhe evo, vakhibatiwa ne lyoyo vakhanogwa ukhuva buda avasukhya.
Ufalisayo uyelangiwe Gamalieli, umanyesi va lulagelo, uyikhweshimiwa na vanu voni akhema nukhuvavola avasukhya vatoliwe khonji khusekhe idebe.
Akha vavola, “Avagosi va Isilaeli, muvinchage makini nekhenu ukheyakheva mukhovavombela ava.
Ulyakhova, khate sana, uTheuda akhinu kha nukhyedai ukhuva munu imbakha neidadi ya vanu vakhakonga, vakhale mia nne valekhokanga. Akhabuda, na vanu vavo valekhomwedekha vakhasambalate kha vakhayaga.
Puu munu uyu, uYuda mgalilaya, akhema esikhu yela yakhosimbiwa esensa, akhakwega avanu vingi khusana. Na vope vakhayaga navoni avakhakongaga vakhayaga.
Nalola nikhuvavola, mweyeposye na vanu ava muvalekhe vene, ulyakhova kama upango ugu au embombo ege yavanu yitagiwa.
Kama ya Ngolove, samukhawesye ukhuvabencha, muwesye muvone msindana nu Nguluve.” Ewo, vakhedekha na mamenyu ga mwene.
Po vakhavelanga avasukhya igati nukhuvatova nukhuvavola vasite ukhunchova ilitawa lya Yeesu, vakhavalekha valutage.
Vakhakhega khovolongolo kholi balasa vakhowikhe ulyakhova vakhesabilwe nu khunogiwa nukhutesekha nukhuginiwa khuli Litawa elyo.
Kho evo, khela sikhu, igati mtembile na enyumba khadi enyumba vakhendelela ukhumanyesya no khulumbelela uYeesu ukhuta ve Mesia.
Leno isikhu inchi, eidadi ya vasiole vikhongesekha, elilalamekho lya Vayakhudi na Kiyunani vakhategwile ipakha Avaeblania, ulyakhova ugovo vavene vale kosamiwe vovigava ugovo gwa khya kholya.
Avasukhya kumi na mbili vakhavelanga khulikusanyekho lyoni lya vasiule nukhunchova, “Sio ulyeli khulyofye ukhulelekha ilimenyu lya Ngolove ukhudumela emesa.
Po, valokolo, nchagula, avagosi saba, ukhuhuma khulyumwe, avana avanonu, avadegile, enumbula nekhekima vavatuwesya ukhuvalekhela embombo eye.
Nayofye, tukhendelelaga dama ukhudova nakhombombo ya limwenyu.”
Ekhitabu yavene yekhanogela pakutano guvoni. Apo, vakhanchagola uSitefano, umunu uyudegile ulyedeho nu Mepo Umbalanche, nu Filipo, Prokoro, Nikanori, Timoni, Parmena, na Nikolao, utakatifu ukhuhuma kho Antiokia.
Avaumini vakhava twala avanu ava khuvolongolo khuvasukhya, vakhodova pongela vakhavavekhela amavokho gavo.
Ewo, elimenyu lya Ngolove lekheneile; eidadi ya vasiole yekhongesekha ukhya khu Yelusalemu; eidadi embakha ya vatekheji vakha yedekhe eimani.
No Sitefano, uyadegile ulyedekho ni ngofu, alenkovomba amaajabu ne ishara imbakha khuvanu.
Po apo lekhinokha avanu avange avafuasi va sinagogi likhyelangiwa Sinagogi lya Mahuru, elya Wakirene nelya Waeskandelaa, na vange ukhuhuma khu Kilikia na khu Asia. Avanu ava valen'kovonchana nu Sitefano.
Po, savakhawesye ukhusinda nekhekima yo Mepo yeyo akhalenayo uSitefano ayekohumela ukhunchova.
Po vakhasonga avange avanu khu vutitu ukhuta “Tupolikhe uSitefano inchova amamenyu gakufulu zaidi ya Musa na zaidi ya Ngolove.”
Vakhavatesya avanu, avasekhe, navasimbi, nukhundutela uSitefano, vakhamwibata, nukhutwala khuvulongolo khulibalasa.
vakhavaleta avasakhidi va vodesi, vavovakhanchovile, “umunu uya sibekhela ukhunchova amamenyu amavivi zaidi ya lieneo ele elitakatifu lya lulagelo.
Mbona tupolikhe voichova ukhuta uYeesu va Nazaleti ikhopananga aponu apa nukhubadelesya(mila) destuli inchatupile uMusa.”
Khila yomo uyakhale ndibalasa, vakhalola amikha gavo khya Sitefano, navope vakhavovona khumikho khya mwene vuvile kama vouso wa sukhwa(malaika).
Utekhen'chi umbaha akhachova imbombo in'chin'cha leli”?
U Sitefano akhan'chova akhata, “Valukolo lwango numwe va baba vango, mumulehen'che une: Unguluve va vudwadwa an'gulume ubaba vito u Abrahamu walipa Masopotamia, vabadu satamile khu Halani,'
uhege mukilunga kyakho navalukololo ulutage khukhilunga eikhi ya khiva mkhokhovonesya'.
Puu akhahege mukilunga kya Ukaludayo alukhutama khu Halani, ukhuhuma apo, ubaba va mwene vu afuile, Unguluve akhandeta mukhilunga eikhii eikhi vitama lino.
Sakhampa khinu nduvu hale wa mwene, sapale nei nafasi ei ya khuvikha amalunde. Pakhuva uAbrahamu avuliwee vubadu sapatile umwana ukhuta ipata ikhulunga ukhuva vahale wa mwene na vana va mwene.
Unguluve akhan'chova nave akhata avaholiwa va mwene vakhali vatamaga eikhulunga kya vageni, nukhuta avaholiwa va ukhu vikhu vavikha ukhuva vatumwa nukhuvavombela fivi usikhe gwa miakha ei mia nne.
Nu Nguluve akhata nihega ikhilunga eikhi yakhuva khikhuvavikha vatumwa, pakhuva vihega nukhuiei saya uluvalu ulu.'
Puu akhampa uAbrahamu ulwidehano nukhukeketa, uAbrahamu akhava baba va Esikaka akha nkenketa ei lichuva lya nane; u Esikaka akhava baba va Yakovo, nu Yakovo akhava baba va vakukhu vito khechigo na vavili.
Avakukhu yetu vakhamboneha uwifu uYusufu vakhagucha khu Misili, nu Nguluve akhava paninee nave,
akhanpokha pa tabu(sida) ya mwene akhampa nuluhala pamiho ga Falao unbaha vakhu Misili. U Falao akhambekha akhava imbaha vava Misili nei nyumba ya mwene yoni.
Pu khukhava nee njala ei mbaha nee tabu ei mbaha khu Misili na khu Kanani, nava baba veto savakhapata ukyakhulwa.
Pu uYakobo vuapulikhe ukhuta khuli kyakhulwa khu Misili, akhavasuha ava baba veto ututan'chi.
Ulwavile uYusufu akhivonesya khuva lukololwe eikhivumbukho kya Yusufu khikhamanyikha khwa Falao.
U Yusufu akhavasuha avalukololwe ukhuluta khukhumbula uYakobo ubaba yevo in'che khu Misili, paninie navalukololwe, ekhikalo kya mwene vale avanu sabini na vahano.
U Yakobo akhikhe khu Misili; akhafya paninwe nava baba yeto.
Vakhatoliwa khu Shekemu vakhasyiliwa mulipumba eilwu udada yavo uAbrahamu agulile nii hela n'cho khuhuma khuvana va Hamori ukhuu khu Shekemu.
Pa khasikhiei akha Unguluve aedihine nu Abrahamu vu ahegelile pa vanu, valikhwongelela khu Misili,
usikhiei ugwa akhima undogon'chi uyunge khuu Misili, undogon'chi uvisa manyile uYusufu.
Undogon'chi uyunge uywa akhavasiova avanu vito nukhuvavombela imbivi avadada yeto, nukhuvataga avana vavene avadebe valekhe ukhutama.
Khu sikhei ugwa uMose akhaholiwa; ale nonu pamiho ga Nguluve, akhaleliwa eimin'chi gedatu munyumba yadadaye.
Usikhei uguatagine ung'echa vakhwa Falao akhatola akhagega nduu mwana va mwene.
U Mose akhamanyeisiwa amafundisyo goni aga khu Misili; vu alina makha na mamenyu ni mbombo.
Vua fikhile eimiakha alubaini gakhamwin'chila amasage gakhu vagendele avalukololwe avanya Isilaeli.
Vuambwene Umwisilaeli ivomba imbivi, uMose akhakolela eikhisa nukhuhomben'cha uvuvivi khwaula uviukhutova uva khu Misili:
akhasaga ukhuta avalukololwe vikhuvumanya ukhuta Unguluve ukhuvapokha mukhivokho kya mwene, pakhuva savamanye.
Eilin'chuya eilikongile akhaluta khuvanya Isilaeli avavatovanaga akhagela ukhuva sayaniwa; akhan'chova,' Vahego, Umue mulilokolo; mbona mwilwa yumwe khwa yumwe?
Ula uvaakoseminche ula uvivale paninwe akhakulugila khuvutali, nukhun'chova, 'Veni akhuvikhile uvetavala nukhuva eing'igi veto?
Uve winogwa ukhumbuda nduvu kha mbudile uMisili pamuhe?”
U Mose akhakimbila vuapulikhe in'cho; akhava eigeni mukhilunga kya Midiani, akhava baba va vana vavilei.
Vug'isilile ei mikha ulubaini usuhwa va Nguluve akhambonekhela mulukongu lwa kyamba kya Sinai, mukhiei situ mugati gukhwakha umwoto.
Vu uMose alolile umwoto alikhunyomokha nukhukenyemukha khu khila ikhiei ikhukhivona, pu alikhuhegelela alole, eisavuti ya Nguluve eikhin'cha eikhan'chova,
'Une nene Nguluve va baba vakho, Nguluve va Abrahamu, uIsakha, nu Yakobo'. U Mose alikhutetema nukhusita ukhulola.
Unguluve akhambula akhata, 'Fula ifilato apa upuwimile pavalan'che.
Nelolile eisida ya vanu vango khu Misili; Nipulikhe ukhulamwa khwa vene, numwe mkhilenei vapolikhe; lino win'che, nikhukhusuha uve khu Misili.'
Uyu uMose uvaabelile ukhuta veni akhuvikhile uve imbaha nukhuva indamun'chi veto?'_ viuyu Unguluve ambikhile ukhuva imbaha nuvuvupoli. Unguluve akhasuha khukhivokho kya suhwa uviang'umile uMose pakhisitu.
U Mose akhavalongon'cha ukhuhuma khu Misili vu avombile ifiswigo vya khuswiga khu Misili na munyanja ya Shamu, na katika jangwa mukhasikhikha miakha alubaini.
U Mose viuyu avavuule avanu va Isilaeli ukhuta, 'Unguluve ukhuve mikhila undogon'chi uyonge ukhuhuma mukhivumbukho kyenyo, undongon'chi ndune'.
Uyu vei munu uviale pa khipuga nusuhwa mulukongu uvianchovile nave pa kyamba kya Sinai. Huyu ndiye mtu ambaye alikuwa na baba zetu, huyu ni mtu ambaye alipokea neno lililo hai na kutupatia sisi.
Uyu vi munu uvi ale na vababa vito vabelile ukhumwedikha; vakhakulugila khuvutali, munumbula n'cha vene vakhasyetukhila khu Misili.
Pu usikhi ugwa vakhambula uHaluni.'ukhuta ututengenesehen'che ei minguluve egywa khutulongon'cha. U Mose, uviakhatulongon'chaga khu Misili, satumanyile n'chi n'chi mbwene.'
Vakhatengenesya eisenga isikhu in'cho puvakhahumya ne sadakha khuusenga iyo vakhahovoka pa mbombo n'cha mavokho gavene.
Unguluve akhapindula akhavapa inondwa n'cha khukhianya, nduvulisimbiwe mkhitabu kya vanyamalago, 'Ye Mungumehin'che une einekhelo ya senga einchimuhinjile ndukungu musikhi ugwa myakha ulubaini, munyumba ya Isilaeli?
Mweidikhe munyumba ya kwaganila nu Moleki ni nondwe n'cha minguluve gwa refani, nifihwani ifi mutengenisye nukhuisaya khu fiene: nikhuvahilekha khuvutali saidi yakhu Babeli.'
Avababa yito vale ni nyumba yakhwaganila mundukungu, nduvu Unguluve avavulile avile an'chovile nu Mose, ukhuta akhale in'chega ndeikhihwani khila eikhi mukhakhiwene.
Eiye yu nyumba uvu avababa vagegiwe nu Yosua. Eiye yahumile usikhi ugu vaingile khutavala khuvanu vavo Unguluve avasweimile vubadu avadada yeito. Eye yale ewo mupakha akhasikhe kha Davudi,
uyu vii akhavile uluhusa khumiho ga Nguluve akhadova khwa Nguluve uva Yakovo.
U Selemani akhan'chengela enyumba ya Nguluve.
Pakhuva uvialikhukianya sitama inyumba n'chi van'chengile namavokho; eye vinduvu an'chovile unyamalago,
Khukyanya khigoda kyango kya vutwa, ne khilunga luvafu lwa khukanya amalunde gango. Nyumba yilindakhikhii eiyakhiva mukhunjengela?, in'chova Ubaba: ndapi apa khugatalukha?
Mavokho gango agavombile ifi vyoni?'
Umwe mwei vanu mwiei vanya singo ng'afu umwei samnon'chiche inumbula nii mbulukhutu, kila misikhi mukhubela Umepo Umbalan'che,' mvomba nduvu vakha vombaga ava dada yenyo.
Nyamalago veni uviava dada yenyo sivatesin'che? Vavabudile avanyamalago va badu sin'chile Umwene unya Leli,'na lino muvile vachova fivi nuvubudi khumwene,
umwe mwei vanu umwei mupokhile indagilo in'chilagililwe nusuhwa samukhun'chibata.”
Puu avavaha va balasa vuvapulikhe imbombo in'chi n'chiikhavahoma inumbula n'cha vene vakhagwegwedulila amino uSitefani.
Pakhuva umwene adigile Umepo Umbalan'che alolile khukianya vunonu nukhuvuvona uvu dwadwa wa Nguluve,' nukhumbona uYesu eimile eikhivokho ei kyandwo eikya Nguluve.
U Sitefani akhan'chova, “Niluwene uludeva ludindwikhe, nu Mwana va Nguluve eimile eikhivokho kyandwo kya Nguluve.”
Puu avavaha va ndagilo vakhaywega nukhudinda imbulukhutu vakhanyalila pupaninie,
vakhan'taga khunji nukhutova na mawe: navasaidi vakhafula eimienda gwa vene eigwa khunji vakhavikha pasi pamalonde ga Savuli.
Vuvitova na mawe khuva Sitefani, akhendelela ukhwiimwilanga Udaada nukhun'chova, “Uvii vi Yesu, upila ei numbula yango,”.
Akhafugama nukhwilanga khu savuti eimbaha, “Baaba, usite ukhuvavalilei inongwa eiyee. “Vu an'chovile n'chi, akhafywa.
U Savuli ale pamidihano nuuvuufye wa mwene. eisikhu eyo pu akhanja ukhuvatesya nduvusayiliwo eitembile ya khu Yelusalemu; navakilisiti voni avava yaganikhe mumajimbo ga Yudea nakhu Samalia, isipokuwa mitume.
Puu avanu mwidikhe Unguluve vakhasila uSitefani nukhundilila ikhililo ikhivaha.
U Savuli anangila pavaha eitembile einyumba nei nyumba nukhuvatesya avadala na vagosi, nukhuvakunga mujiela.
Pu avakilisiti avavakha yaganikhe vakhendelela ukhulumbilila eilimenyu.
U Filipo akhikha khu Samalia nukhunchova eilimenyu lya Yesu ukhwa.
Puu ululundamano vululolile nukhupulikha ifihwani ifi avombile uFilipo vakhavikha mug'ati munumbula eikhi anchovile.
Ukhuhuma apo avanu vingi avavapulikhe, eimepu imbivi in'chi humile khuvanu ukhwa vakhalila fin'cho navingi avavalemilwe navalema vakhapona.
Puuu khwale nuluhekhelo uluvaha mu mitava.
Pu alipo umunu yumo mutava ugwa eilitawa vei Simoni, yuywa avombaga fincho uvuhavi; uvu avasigenchaga fincho avanu vakhu Samalia, vuita umwene munu inonu fincho.
Avasamalia voni avavaha navadebe, vakhapilehin'cha; nukhuta;”umunu uyuu gumakha ga Nguluve amavaha.”
Vakhapulehin'cha, pakhuva avaswiginche usikhi untali nuvuhaviwa mwene.
Vuvapulikhi uFilipo alumbilile in'cha ludeva lwa khukianya ulwa Nguluve vakhedikha nukhwon'chiwa, avadala navagosi.
Nu Simoni vope akhidikha vuon'chiwe akhava panin'wee nu Filipo; vualolile ifiswigo ifivombekha.
Pu avasuhiwa va khu Yelusalemu vuvapulikhe ukhuta khu Samalia vupelile elimenyu lya Nguluve, vakhavasuha uPeteli na Yohani.
Vuvikhwikha vakhavadovela ukhuta vapokhele Umepo Umbalanc'he.
Khu sikhi ugwa, Umepo Umbalan'che akhava badu savikhile ete yumo; va on'chiwe khulitawa lya Bwana Yesu.
Pu uPeteli nu Yohani vakhavavikhila amavokho, vope puvakhapokhela Umepo Umbalan'che.
Vu uSimoni alolile Umepo ahumile ukhugendela amavokho navasuhiwa; akhanogwa ukhuvapa ehela,
Akhata, “Mume nayune amakha, vunivikha amavokho khu khila munu upililage Umepo Umbalan'che.”
U Peteli akhambula akhata; indalama n'chakho paninwe nuve fiyage khuvutali, pakhuva utile eikhikungilwa kya Nguluve khivonekha ni ndalama.
Ulin'chila luvafu ne mbombo eiyee pakhuva einumbula yakho sayile vononu pamiho ga Nguluve.
Pu yinogiwa upile inongwa n'chakho nukhudova Unguluve pamo ukhukhusyikhila inongwa ncha numbula yakho.
Pakhuva nivona ulie mugati muluvipo lwa vutulanongwa.”
U Simoni akhanchova akhata, “Mudove Unguluve khujili yango, pakhuva imbombo nchoni inchimunchovile n'chiwesya ukhuhumila.
Puu uPeteli nu Yohani vuvalumbilile eilimenyu lya Nguluve, vakhavuya khu Yelusalemu khu njila eyo; valumbilile eilemenyu mu fijiji vingi ifya Samaria.
Puu usuhwa va Nguluve akhanchova nu Filipo na kusema, “Ulole khusikha einjila ya pasi ya khu Yelusalemu ukhuluta Gaza.” (Einjila eiye yelindukungu).
Akhalola nukhuluta. Lola, pakhava nu munu vakhu Ethiopia, utowasi unyavulamun'chi uvuvaha pasi pa kandase; umbaha pakhianya pakhibana kya mwene kyoni; vope alutile khu Yelusalemu khukhwisaya.
Alikhuvuyatamile mumutukha ya mwene ukhwemba eilivangili kya Isaya.
Umepo akhanchova nu Filipo, “Hegelela pa mutukha eiyee ulutagenayo.
“U Filipo akhanyila uluvilo, akhambona ukhwemba elivangile khwa Isaya; akhata, Ukhimanyile eikhivukhwimba?”
Umwethiopia akhata, “nialesya ndakhekhi umunu vusandongwin'che?” Akhadovo uFilipo eipakhile eimutukha atame paninwe nu mwene.
Lino elivangili uli ukhimbaga Mwethiopia lwu ile; alongon'chiwe ndei ng'osi ukhuluta khuhenjiwa; ndei ng'osi eiyin'chige myee; na kama kondoo alinyamaza kimya, sayidendiwe undomo:
Palususuvalo lwa mwene uvuhigi wa mwene vukhahega: Veni alen'chova ikhivumbukho kya mwene? Uvutamo wa mwene vahegile mukhilunga.”
Puu utowashi akhambun'cha uFilipo, akhata, “nidova, veni unyamalago uviinchova imbombo n'cha mwene, ewo n'cha munu uyunge”?
U Filipo akhanja ukhunchova eikhulongwi ya limenyu lya khwa Isayi ukhulumbilila eilimenyu lya Yesu.
Vuvali munjila, vakhafikha pamagasi,' utowashi akhata, “Apapali namagasi khekhi khikhusiga nesite ukhuonchiwa?,
amamenyu aga, “Uumwethiopia gakhakola “akhata nedikhe ukhuta uYesu Kristi Mwana va Nguluve,” aga gasimuli mulivangile ilitan'chi). Pu Umwethiopia akhimikha ei mutukha.
Vakhaluta pamagasi nu Filipo nu towasi, uFilipo akhamwon'cha.
Vuvahumile mumagasi, Umepo va Nguluve akhang'ilekha khuvutali uFilipo; utowasi sakhambona akhagenda einjila ya mwene nuluhekhelo.
Pu uFilipo akhahumila khuu Azoto. Akhagenda mukhilunga khila nu khulumbilila eilimenyu mu fijiji vyoni akhafikha khu Kaisaria.
Puu uSavuli, akhendelela ukhunchova nuvukali uwawufye khuvakongi va Yesu, akhaluta khu tekhen'chi umbaha
nu khudova eikalata khuajili ya masinagogi ukhu khu Demesiki, pu ukhuta angambone umunu avedala, ave gosi avapinye nukhuvagega khu Yelusalemu.
Hata vu igenda alipa khufikha khuu Damesitiki lukhambona ulumuli ukhuhuma khukianya,'
pu akhagwa pasi nukhupulikha einyilango eiyita,”Savuli, Savuli, khekhi vukhung'alan'cha?”
U Savuli akhata, Veve veni Dada? Pu uDaada akhanchova, “Nene Yeisu yune vukhung'alancha;
Pu lino ema, ulutage khujini, nuve vuviliwa eikyakhuvomba
Puu avanu vala avuvale paninwe nave nu Savuli vakhan'chiga myee nukhupulihen'cha ei savuti, nukhusita khumbona munu.
Puu uSavuli akhima ukhuhuma pasi vuandendwile amiho sakhakhivona khinu, vakhamwibata eikhivokho vakhagega eikhivokho vakhagega khu Damesitiki.
Ifigono vidatu silya na khukhunywa.
Puu alepwale ukongi yumo khu Damesitiki eilitawa vii Ananiya, Unguluve anchovile nave munyivonelo(munjosi), “Ananiya.” Akhata, “Tazama, nili apa, Baba.
“Unguluve akhambula akhata eima ulutage mutava ugugwikhilangiwa ugolofu munyumba ya Yuda ukhavun'che umunu uve ahumile khu Tarso eilitawa vei Savuli; manyabadu ipidova;
ambwene munyivonelo umunu uvivivta Ananiya akhingila nukhumbikhila amavokho akave ukhulola.
U Ananiya akhata, “Daada, nepulikhe inogwa nyingi in'cha munu uyu in'chi avombile imbivi khuvavalan'che va Nguluve avakhu Yelusalemu;
Apa alenululagilo ukhuhuma khutekhen'chi umbaha ukhumwibata khila munu uviinchova eilitawa lya Yesu.
Puu Unguluve akhambula, “Akhata lutaga khila kyombo khihaliwa khuliune, alitole elitawa lyangu khu Vanyapanji na vatwa na vana vanya Isilaeli.
Manya nikhuvavonesya inyingi in'chi khumbona nukhutesekha khulitawa lyango”.
U Ananiya akhaluta, akhingila munyumba; Akhambikhila amavokho akhata, Lukololwango Savuli, U Yesu, ula uviakhuhumile khunjila yila eiyukhagendaga vii uyu asuhile ukhave ukhulotu khavili indin'chiwe Umepo Umbalan'che.
Puu vikhagwa ifinu ukhuhuma mumiho ndamaganda, akhanja ukhulola, akhima akhon'chiwa akhalya eikyakyulya akhakava amakha.
Akhatama paninwe navakongi isikhu nchunyingi khu Damesitiki.
Uusikhi ugwa alikhun'chova uYesu mumasinagogi, ukhuta uYesu Mwana va Nguluve.
Na voni avava pulikhe valikhuswiga nukhun'chova, “Umunu uyu sii ula uve akhava nangile avanu avakhalin'chovaga eili Tawa eili khu Yelusalemu? Napa akhinchile khunjila ya khuvakunga nukhuva heilikha khuvatekhen'chi.”
Puu uSavuli atangiliwe nukhukava amakha nukhulumbilila nukhuvavikha Avayahudi avavatamaga khu Damesitiki van'changa nyikhiwe nukhuta uyu vii Yesu Kelisiti.
Vuu usikhi gulutile, Avayahudi vakhavomba eilivuto lya paninie vambude.
Puu eli vuto lya paninie vambude. Puu elivuto lya vene likhavonekha nu Savuli. Vakhagonela pakilo na pamusi vakave ukhumbuda.
Puu avakongi va mwene vakhantola pakilo vakhamwisya mu huimato pasi mukheikapo.
Nu Savuli vuafikhe khu Yelusalemu, akhagela ukwii lungana vakongi lakhini valukhudwada savalukhukela ukhuta vape ikongi.
Puu uBarnaba akhantola akhang'ulikha khu vasuhwa akhavavuli umuambonile uYesu munjila nu Yesu vuan'chovile nave, nuvu uSavuli alumbilile na makha eilitawa lya Yesu khu Damesitiki.
aagine navo vuvingile nukhuhuma khu Yelusalemu. Akhan'chova nuvukifu khu litawa lya Yesu Kelisite,
akhavun'chana na Vayahudi ava Khiyunani kila misikhe valikhulonda ukhubuda.
Vu avalokololwe valumanyile eimbombo eye vakhantole mpakha khuu Kaisaria, vang'ilekhe atutage khu Tarso.
Puu eitembile yoni vakhu Yahudi, Galilaya nakhu Samariya, yale nulunon'chehe yikhan'chengiwa nukhugenda mumbwa yilweli ura Nguluve nulunon'chehen'cho lwa Mepo Umbalan'che, eitembileyikha kula nu k'yongelela eimbalilo.
Pu yikhahumila uPeteli vu in'chungula khunu na khunu mu mikoa, akhavagendela avakilesite ava vitama Lida.
Akhambona ukywa umunu vii eilitawa vii Ainea, umunu uyura atamile mukhihaga eimikha nane; manya ale ndemale.
U Peteli akhambula akhata, “Ainea, uYesu Kilesiti akhuponwe; Sisimukha utandikhe eikhihaga kyakho, “Pu akhasisimukha.
Pu avanu vani avakhatamaga khu Lida nu Sharoni vuva mbwene umunu uywa, vakhapindukhila Unguluve.
Puu alikho ukongi khu Yafa uvii khwilangiwa Tabita, eilelefasiliwa ukhuta “Dorcas” Udala uyu adigile imbombo inanu nulusikhilo uluavombaga khuvalemale khuvagan'chu.
Yahumile usikhi gumo akhatamwa akhafya; vuva mwon'chinche vakhambikha khukhianya khu golofywa vakhagonwa.
Pakhuva eLida yale pipi ne Yafa, navakongi vuva pulikhe ukhuta uPeteli ali ukhu vakhavasuha avanu vavile khumwene, vadove alute khuvene khimbive”.
U Peteli akhasisimukha nukhuga paninie navo vuafikhe vakhagega khukhiyumba kya khukianya. Nava fyile vono vakhima paninie nu mwene vakhalila nukhumbonesya amakoti ne mienda eigi akhavapinchaga Dorcas avahonele vualipaninie navo.
U Peteli akhava humya voni khunji khukhiyumba, akhafugama akhisaya, akhagusetukhila umbile, akhata, “Tabita, sisimukha”. Akhadendula amiho vuambwene uPeteli akhatama pasi.
Puu uPeteli akhampa eikhivokho akhamwinula, vuavilangile avedikhi nave fuele akhavapa akhava mwumi
Ee lijambo eili likhavonekha khu Yafa yoni, na vanu vingi vakhakonga Unguluve.
Pu yikhahumila uPeteli akhatama isikhu n'chunyingi khu Yafa paninie nu munu uve vita vi Simoni, uviihona ingwembe.
Khwale nu munu yumo mutava gwa Kaisalia, eilitawa Kornelio, alie imbaha va khipuga kya Khiitalia.
Ale munu va Nguluve nukhukonga Unguluve nee nyumba ya mwene yoni; ahumin'che ihela n'chuu nyingi nukhudova Unguluve eemishe gwioini.
Usikhei gwa saa tisa pamusi, akhalola einyeivonelo usuhwa va Nguluve ukhwin'cha khu mwene. Usuhwa akhambula “Kolinelio!
U Kolinelio akhandola usuhwa ale nuludwan'chi uvuvaha akhan'chova “Eekhei khekhi imbaha?” Usuhwa akhambula akhata “Eiisayo n'chakho ni sawadi n'chakho khuvagan'chun'chiitogile khukianya ndulukumbuhinchoo khumiho ga Nguluve”.
Lino suha avanu ukhuluta khu Yafa ukhugega umunu yumo uviikhwilangiwa ve Simoni eilenge vii Peteli.
Itama nukhuhona ingwembe uviikhwilangiwa vei Simoni einyumba ya mwene yilikhulukanji khunyanja.”
Vuu usuhwa uviakhan'cho vaganave ukhuhega, uKolinelio akhavilaga avavombi va mwene vavili, nu sikhali uvii uyu ali khumwidikha Unguluve pagati pa vasikhali avakhambombelaga.
U Kolinelio akhavavula n'choni einchihumile nukhuvasuha khu Yafa.
Ee sikhu eiyekongile usekhe gwa pamusi(pa saa sita) vuvale munjila valipakhufikha khujini, uPeteli akhatoga khukianya khudali khudova. (khukhisaya).
Ale nei njala alondaga ei khinu kya khulya, vuavanu vitelekha eikyakhulya avone siule einyivonelo,
akhavona khukianya khudendwikhe, nekyombo khikhwikha ndu mulenda mbaha gukhwikha pasi pakhilunga ingutu n'choni n'chuline.
Mugati mukyene mulale ni fikanu vyoni ifinya malune gane, haitigenda pasi nifinyela khukianya.
Nee savuti yekhan'chova khumwene, “Sisimukha, Petro uhenje ulye.”
Pu u Perto akhata, “Ate, Bwana sanigelile ukhulya eikhinu khukhoni eekhi vivi neikhin'chafu.
Pu eisavuti yekhin'cha khumwene mala ya vile “Eikyasayile Unguluve usite ukhuta khivivi nu vun'chafu.”
Eiye yekha humile mala khadatu, eikvombo khila khikha toliwa khavile khu kianya.
Nu Petro ale musikhe gwa khwihanjile hanwaa pa nyivonelo n'chivonesya khekhi, pu avanu vakhava vasuhiwe nu Kornelio vakhima khu vulongolo khundiango, vakhavun'cha einjila ya khuluta khunyumba.
Vakhilanga nukhuvun'cha ukhuta ndavi Simoni uviikhwelangwile Peteli akhatamaga pala.
Usikhe ugwa u Peteli vuisaga pa nyevonelo, Umepo akhachova nave, “Lola avanu vadatu vikhukhulonda.
Sisimukha wikhe pasi ulutage navo. Usite ukhudwada ukhuluta navo, pakhuva nevasuhile.”
U Peteli akhikha pasi nukhunchova navo une nene mukhundonda khekhi mwin'chile?”
Umbaha yumo eilitawa vi Kornelio, umunu vavu yelweli inogwa ukhumwimikha Unguluve, na vanu vikhun'chova vunonu ikhilunga kyoni eikyakiyahudi, avali ule nusuhwa va Nguluve ukhunyumba ya mwene, pu apuliheonchi eikhulonguva ukhuhuma khuliuve.”
U Peteli akha vakalibisya ukhwingela mugati nukhutama paninie nave. Vukhilu akhasisi mukha alukhuheta paninie na valukololule vadebe ukhuhuma khu Yafa vakhalongo n'chana nave.
Eisikhu ei yekongile vakhin'cha khu Kaisaria. Nu Kornelio alikhu vagulila; pu avei langile avalukololwe navamanyani vamwene avalipipi.
Usikhei u Peteli ingile mugati u Kornelio akha kalibisya nukhwinama pasi pamalunde ga mwene nukhue muleimikha.
Pu u Peteli akhamwinula nukhun'chova ukhuta nayune neilimu.”
akhasikhe Upeteli ein'chova nave, akhaluta mungati akhavona avame vei vungani n'che pupanei.
Akhavavula yumwe mwei vene mulumanyile ukhuta indagilo n'cha khiei yahudi ukhwi vungani pu panei nukhugendelanila nu munu yuywa savakhikolo eikhi pakhuva u Nguluve ambonisye une ukhuta sani nogiwa ukhumwilanga umuntu vivoni ukhuta imbivi ewo ichafu.
Kyvu ngave nin'chile khesita khuben'cha, vunei suhiwe khujili ya in'chi nevavun'che khekhi musuhiwe khuujili yango.”
Ukornelio akhata, “Isikhu nne in'chilutile, usikhei ndugu nulikhwesaya usikhei gwa saa tisa pamusi mugati munyumba yango; Nikhavona umunu aimile afualile eimienda eimivalafu,
Akhambula “Kornelio inyesayo n'chakho n'chifikhe pamiho ga Nguluve, nei sawadi n'chakho khuva lemilwe nchivile vukumbuhincho khuvulongolo khwa Nguluve.
Pu lino suha umunu khu Yafa akah mweilange umunu yumo eilitawa vei Simoni in'che khulive eilitawa eilengeve Peteli. uvei itama khung'ona Ngulembe yumo eilitawa vei Simoni einyumba ya mwene yeilekhulukanji khuu nyanja.
Zingatia: Mmstari huu, “Nu mwene veikhwincha in'chova numwe,” haumo kwenye maandiko ya kale.
uPeteli akhadundula undomo gwa mwene nukhun'chova “Lweli, niedikhe ukhuta Unguluve in'chila vapendelelo.
Ukhuva khila munu uviikhumwidikha nukhuvomba imbombo n'cha lweli ikhwiidekhiwa khumwene.
Ulumanyile ukhuta ee khulongungwi yeihumile khuvanya Isilaeli, vuipulisya eilimenyu lya lunon'chehen'cho lwa Kilisiti uviuyu vii Daada va voni-
yumwe mwevene mulumanyile eilele humile eilihumile khu Yudea yoni leitengulie khu Galilaya, palwon'cho ulu an'chovaga uYohani.
ee khulongwi yeilekhundonda uYesu Kelisiti uvi Unguluve abakhile umono khuunjila ya Mepo Umbalan'che na makha. Akhaluta akhavomba inonu nukhuponwa voni avatesiwe nu setano, pakhuva Unguluve ale panie nave.
Ufye tulivasaidi vambombo n'choni inchi vombikhe khu khilunga kya khu Vuyahudi nakhu Yelusalemu- uyu vei Yesu uvivabudile nukhutulikha mubikhi.
Umunu uyu Unguluve an'chusin'che eisikhu ya datu nukhupa ukhumanyikha,
syoo khuvanu voni khuvasaidi avahaliwe nu Nguluve. - yufye twiivene twaalile nave tukhanywa nave vusan'chukhile ukhuma khu vufye.
Atulagile ukhulumbilila khu vanu nukhusuhudila ukhuta uyu vi uyu Unguluve ang'alile vandamunchi vavumi navafuile.
Ukhugendela umwene avasuhwa voni van'chova, khila munu uvei ukhwedikha ukhugendela umwene ipokhela uvusyekhilo wa mbivi ukhugendela eilitawa lya mwene.”
Vu uPeteli ikhwendelela ukhunchova n'chii, Umepo Umbalan'che akhadiga khuvoni avavapulihin'chaga eilimenyu lya mwene.
Avanu vala avihusikha neikhepuga kya viidikhi na vasaiule- vala voni avavin'chile nu Peteli- valikhuswiga pakhikungilwa kya Mepo Umbalan'che uviadudeliwe khu vanyapanji.
Pakhuva vapulikhe avanya panji ava vinchova einjovele eiyinge nukhu mwidikha Unguluve. U Peteli akhata(akhanchova),
“Khuli munu vivnoni iwesya ukhusigila amagasi avanu vasite ukhwon'chiwa, Avanu ava vapokhile Umepo Umbalan'che ndufye?”
Puu akhavaluhusu vonchiwe khulitawa lya Yesu Kelisiti. Puvakhadova atame navo isikhu ndebe.
Avasuhwa na valukolo avavale khu Yudea vakhapulikha ukhuta avanyapanji vupilile eilimenyu lya Nguluve.
U Peteli vu ein'chile ukhu khu Yelusalemu, eikhipuga kya vanu avagolofu vakhanja ukhuben'cha, Nukhun'chova,
“Wibatine na vanu avasavagolofu nu khulya navo!”
Pu uPeteli akhatengula ukhunchova eilihumile; akhata,
“Nele khweisaya mkhilunga kya khuu Yafa, nei khalolo einyevonelo mu kyombo fikhwikha pasi nduu mwenda umbaha ugugukhwikha ukhuhuma khu kianya ingutu n'choni a'chwine. Khikhwikha khuliune.
Nikhalola nukhusaga pakianya pa kiene. Nei khavona ifikanu ifinyamalunde gane ifitama pasi pakhilunga nifikanu mwinyasi nifikanu itifi khwa fula ni fidege ifya khukianya.
Nikha pulikha eisavuti yin'chova nune, “Sisimukha, Peteli, un'chinje ulye!”
Nikhata, “Siyo ewo, Daada, mundomo gwango sakhingile eikhinu kyu kyoni eikhivivi neikhi n'chafu”
Pu eisavuti yekhan'chova ukhuhuma Khukianya, kheila Unguluve avalin'che savuwesya ukhuta kheivivi,
Ei ye yakhahumile mala kha datu, khila khinu khekhatoliwa khu kianya khavili.
Ukhulola, avanu vadatu vimile khuvulongolo khunyumba umutwale vasuhiwe ukhuma khu Kaisalia ukhwincha khuliune.
Umepo akhambula ukhuluta navo, neisite ukhukalan'chana navo. Ava gosi sita vakhaluta paninie nune lwalutile munyumba ya munu yumo.
Akhativula umwambonile usuhwa va Nguluve umu eimile munyumba ya mwene akhata(akhanchova), ““Nitume Yafa nisuhe khwa simoni uyu eilitawa eilenge vii Peteli.
Inchova eilimenyu khuliuve ei limunyu eilelikhukhupokha uvene nyumba yakhoyoni.”
Vunetangule ukhun'chova navyo, Umepo umbalan'che akhadega khuvene nduvu ainchile khuliufye khuvutengulilo.
Nikhumbukha amamenyu ga Nguluve, agaan'chovile, “uYohani aonchaga na magasi, leno nkhwonchaga nu Mepo Umbalan'che.”
Nduvu Unguluve ahumin'che eisawadi nduvu atupile ufye vatweidikhe mwa Kelisiti uYesu, une nene veni, niwesya ukhuben'cha Unguluve?
Vuvapulikha imbombo n'chi, savakhavuncha, vakhagimwa Unguluve nu khun'chova, “Unguluve ahumin'che uvusyikhila khuvanjapanji vope”
Puvakhidikhi eitabu eiyatengwile ukhuhuma khuvofye khwa Sitefani vayaganikhe ukhuhuma khu Yelusalemu- aveidikhi ava vakhaluta khutali, khuu Foinike, Kipro nakhu Antiokia. Vakhavavula eilimenyu lya Yesu mwene khuvayahudi nasyoo khu vanu avange vuvoni.
Pa khuva avanu avange vahumile khu Kipro na khu Krene, vainchile khu Antiokia nukhun'chova navayunani nukhundumbilila uYesu.
Nikhivokho kya Nguluve kyale paninie navene, na vanu vingi vakhedikha nukupindukhila Unguluve.
Imbombo n'cha vene n'chii khafikha mumbula khutun'cha tembile yakhu Yelusalemu: nukhusuha uBarnaba alute khu Antiokia.
Vu einchile nukhulola eikhikungilwa kya Nguluve akhahovokha nukhuvapa amakha voni ukhusigala nu Nguluve munumbula n'cha vene.
Pakhuva alie munu iinonu adin'chine Umepo Umbalan'che vakhongelela mwa Kilisti.
Pongela uBarnaba akhatuta khu Tarso khukhombona uSavuli.
Vu ambwene akhagega khu Antiokia. Yikhava umwakha uguge vakhalundamana paninie nei tembile nukhuvamanyisya avanu vingi. Na vakongi vakhilangiwa vakelesiti avatan'chii khu Antiokia.
Pu isikhu in'cho avasuhwa vakhikha ukhuhuma khu Yelusalemu vakhafikha khu Antiokia.
Uninie yumo vi Agabo lyu litawa lya mwene, akhima nukhuvuliwa nu Mepo ukhuta khuiva ne njala eing'ala yihumila mukhilunga kyoni. Eiyei yihumila usikhe gwa Kraudio.
Pu khila ikongi yumo uvei anogile alamwile ukhumlekha uvutangili khuvalukolo lwe avalekhu Vuyahudi.
Vavombile ewe; Vakhahumya ihela khukhivokho kya Barnabva nu Savuli.
Usikhei ugwa Untwa akhagolosya eikhi vokho khu vala avalundamine alikhunogwa ukhuvatesya.
Akhabuda uYakovo ulukololwe nu Yohani nei mundu.
Vualelele ukhuta yeva ganile Avayahudi, akhamwibata nu Peteli khavili. eiye yale usikhe gwa mikata eimin'chila khuve.
Vuamubite akhadindila mulugadun'cho nukhuvikha ifipuga vine ifya vasikhali findolelage vu igulile ukhung'iukha khuvanu vuyisilile eiPasakha.
U Peteli akhavikhiwa mundugadun'cho inyeisayo n'chikhavombekha namakha nulundamano lwa vanu khunjila ya mwene nu Nguluve.
Akhasikhi uHelodi salutile khukhung'umya, Eikilo iyo uPeteli agonelile pagati pavasikhali vavile khunu apinyiwe nei miinyololo gevile navasikhali pavulongolo pa ndiango valikhulindilila ulugadun'cho.
Pu usuhwa va Nguluve akhahumila nulumuli lukha ng'ala mugati. Akhatova uPeteli paluvafu nukhusisimula akhata(akhachova), “Sisimukha khimbevi.”pu eiminyololo eifevakhakunjile gikhadumukha mumavokho ga mwene.
Usuhwa akhambula akhata, “Fuala emienda gwakho ni filato.” U Peteli akhagaha ewo. Usuhwa akhambula akhata, “Fuala umwenda gwakho ung'ongange.”
Pu uPeteli akhakonga usuhwa akhahuma khunji. Salukhukela eikhivombikhe nusuhwandaa lweli. Akhata pamo igogwa njosi(magonafivi).
Vu agendile eikhilindokua khwanja nei kyavile vakhafikha paligeti la kyumaeilya khwingila khu jini ukhadendukha lyene khujili ya vene. Vakhahuma panji vakhikha mutava, Nusuhwa akhandekha.
U Peteli vueiwene, akhanchova akhata, “Lino neidikhe ukhuta Unguluve usuhile usuhwa va mwene ukhuta ang'enche mukevokho kya Helode, na masage gooni aga vayahudi.”
Vuagamanyile aga akhinche khu nyumba ya Mariamu umamaye va Yohani uviivii Markho; Vaeivunganin'che nukhweisaya(ukhudova).
Vu ahodin'che pa ndiango ugusigiwe, umbombi yumo ei litawa vei Roda akhincha khudendula.
Vualumanyile ukhuta eisavuti ei yeya Peteli, nuluhekhelo akhalemwa ukhudendula undiango; badala yake, akhanyila mugati mkheyumba; nukhuvavula ukhuta uPeteli eimile panji Pandiango.
Puvakhata khumwene, “Uve un'changanyikhiwe” akhandelela ukhuta vimwene lweli. Vakhata “Uyu visuhwa va mwene.”
U Peteli akhendelela ukhudindin'cha vuvadinduule undiango vakhambona nukhuswiga. U Peteli akhava nunan'cha ni khivokho kheimyemye vakhavula na Unguluve vu ang'umin'che mundugadun'cho(akhata),
“Muvavuli eimbombo n'chei uYakobo navalukololwe.” Pu akhahega akhaluta khuvunge.
Vuvukhile khukhava nulususuvalo khuvasikhali ukhuhumana na khila eikhei humile khwa Peteli.
Vu uHelode andondile ambwene akhavavun'cha avasikhali akhalamula ukhuta vabudiwe. akhaluta khuvuyahudi akhafikha khu Kaisalia akhatuma ukhwa.
U Helodi ali neilioyo na vanu vakhu Tiro nakhu Sidoni, vakhaluta pupaninei khumwene vakhava muvumanyani nu Brasto untangili va ntwa, avatange, vakhadova nulunon'chehencho pakhuva ikhilunga kyavene kya pokhile eikyakhulya ukhuhuma khu ntwa.
Eisikhu eiyenogiwe uHelode akhafuala eimienda gwa vuntwa nukhutama pakhiigoda kya vutwa, nukhuvavula.
Avanu vakhaywega, “Eiyee savuti ya nguluve syoo savuti ya munu!”
Puu usuhwa va Nguluve akhantova pakhuva saa ampe uvudwadwa akhaliuva ni chango akhafywa
Pu eilimenyu lya Nguluve likhakula nukhwenela.
Pu uBarnaba nu Savuli vuvamalesinche eimbombo vakhahuma pala vakhaluta khu Yelusalemu, vakhantova nu Yohani uvi eilitawa lya mwene ulyakhuholiwa vei Marko.
Leno mutembuile ya khu Antiokia, palena vasuhwa na vamanyisi. Vale uBarnaba, Simeoni(uviaei languvaga Nigeri). U Lukio uva khu Kirene, Manaeni( ulikoloeun'chila kisa gwa Helode undogonchi va koa), nu Savuli.
Vuvalipakhukonga udaada nukhudinda, Umepo Umbalan'che akhan'chova, “Mumbeikhile palukhanji uBarnaba nu Savuli, vavombe ei mbombo eiyunivilangile.”
Vu ei Tembile yeidendile nukhudova, nukhuvikha amavokho pakianya pa vanu ava, vakhavalekha valutage.
Pu uBarnaba nu Savuli vakha mweidikha Umepo Umbalan'che vakhikha ukhuluta khu Seleukia; ukhuhums ukhu vagendile munyanje ukhuta khu kisiva kya Kipro.
Vuvalimkhilunga kya Salam, valiei khun'chova eilimenyu lya Nguluve mu Masinagogi ga Vayahudi. Vale pupaninei nu Yohani nu Marko nduu ntangili vavene.
Vuvalutile mukhisi va kyoni eikya Kipro vakhambona umunu ung'avi, Unjahudi undagunchi va vudesi, uvei eilitawa lya mwene ale vei Bar Yesu.
Ung'avi uyu vale paninie nu Liwali Sergio Paulus, ale munu einyaluhala. Umunu uyu avakaribisye uBarnaba nu Savuli, pakhuva anogwa ga ukhupulikha eilimenyu lya Nguluve.
Pu uElima “ung'avi vulele ulo eilitawa” (ya mwene alukhuvabencha) agelile nukhupendula uliwali ahege mu ndweidikho.
Pu uSavuli uviaeilangiwaga Paulo, adin'chiwe Umepo Umbalan'che akhakaseihein'cha amiho
