Lisiasi, likhuludeva, ainchile akhantola khumakha mumavokho gietu, na mumbusimbe uwavighwle vunonu uwakhatale).
Ungambunche upavuli kyumbmboinchi sakhalumanye khulikhikhi akhinu eikyuvikhung'iega”.
Avayahudi vope vakhansitakha upavuli, v akhata imbombo inchi nchikhale ncha lweli.
Untwa akhinula ikhivokho ukhuta upavuli anchove, upavuli akhamula, “nilumanyile ukhuta khwu mijiaka imingi ukhale ndamuli vakhilunga iekhi, nilienuluhekhelo ukiviyelesya yune khulyuve.
Vukhuluanya ukhuta safilutile ifighoono khinchigo na fivile ukhuhuma upunalutile khukwiesaya kuyelusalemu.
Vuvambwene muntembile, sanakanihane numunu, khange sanavombe uvugalo mnkutano, numumipelela na munkilunga;
Na savakhawesye ukhunchova vwayile khunongwa iinchuvikhung'iega une.
Ulwakhuva paiele nikwiedika khulyuve, ukhuta khulungendo lula uluvaeilangile umpelela, khulungeendo lululwa nikhumbombe laga u Nguluve uvadada veitu. une nilimwiedikhi khugooni agaalindlagielo na mbusiimbe uwavanyamalongo.
Nilienamakha galagala khwa u Nguluve, uguu na vope vikhunchuka uwavafwile, khuvoni avalivuvuli imbivi na avalienimbivi voni;
khwu ilie nayune ni vomba imbomba khuta nive ninumbu inchiilambivi pavulongolo wa Nguluve napamiho pavano ukhugeendele imbombo nchoni.
Leino vugielutile imyakha vugielutilile ninchile kuleta ulutangielo nkiilunga kyago nukhuvonola nindalama.
Navile nievombile iewo, avayahudi avange avakhu asia vakhambona vunielinduhekhelo ulwa wumi mungaati mutembile, vuvasipali avanu vingi khange pakhava myiee.
Avanu ava uvuvakhanogile ukhuva pamiho ghakho lieno ulwa vanchove ukyuvalienakyo ikyango ndavalienesela ayavinchaga.
Apange avanu ava vanchove eikyuniekhanangile iekyuvakhiwene khulyune vuneimile pavulongolo pavuhigii uwa va yahudi;
Ukhuva nikhanchovile iekhinu khimo khumakha upwuniekhimile pagati pavene, “ulwakhuva uvuchukha uwavafue umwe mukhung'iega.”
Ufeliki akhavuliwe vunonu injiela, pwakhae lulekha ululundamano akhanchova “lisia nkuludeva akhiva itolga ukhuhuma khu yelusalemu pwuyunilamu ukhuhiegiwa khulyume.”
Pwu akahalamuta untwa andolelage upavuli, hange ave nunsiekhi alekhe umunu uvakhuvabencha avamanyani vamwene ukhuta valekhe ukhuntanga hange valekhe ukhungeendela.
Vufilutile ifighono fidebe akhincha undala vamwene u-dlusila uviale injahudi, khasuha khukhumwianga upavuli apulihinche amamenyu agalwidiko mungaati wa klisite uyesu.
Upavuli vuvinchovana numwene mumbulweli, ukhuleka ukhulutilila akhiva vilamula pavuhighi uvukwincha, ufeliki akhava nuvundwanchi akhamula, “lutaka khuvutali lino, nienghapate unsiekhe nikhukwilangha.
unsiekhe ugwaa ahuile ukhuta upavuli ikhumpa indalama pwa akhamwilangha khanghe akhachova nave.
Imyaka ghewile vughisilile, upolkio ufesto akhava nuntwa khandekha efeliki, ulwakhuva ufeliki unogwa ukwihegelencha khuvayahudi, pwakandekha upavuli mwondyongomencho.
Vuu ufesto ainghile mukhilungha khila watmile ifigono fidatu pwakhaluta khu kaisali akhafika khu yelusalemu.
Untwa umbaha uva va yahudi undwanchiwa vakhang'elikhila inongwa iya pavuli khwa festo, pwu vakhanchova vakholehencha nchoninamakha khwa festo.
Vakhandoova ufesto nikhisa khu mamenyu agha pavuli ukhuta amwielange khu yelusalemu ukhuva vinogwa ukhumbuuda upavuli munjiela.
U Festo akhavavula akhata upavuli akhungiwe mukaisari, nukhuta navope ayivuya khukhukwa imbieve.
Anchovile “ulwakhuva, vala aviwesya, ukhuluta ukwa nufwe. inave khukhile ikhinu ikhivivi khumunu uyuu, mlondiwa ukhung'iega.”
Vuvatamile ifighono nane nukhulutila, akavuya ukaisari. ikhighono ikyankongile akhatama pakhighoda ikyavuhieghi nukhulamula ukhuta vandete upavuli khumwene.
Avile afikhe avayahudi ukhuhuma khu yelusalemu vakhima pawipi, pwu vakhanchova imbombo inongw inchieluteilile inchakhumbikha mbuhiegi vvuvivi nchimanyile.
Upavuli akhabela akhanchova, sanchakhulitawa ilya vayahudi, sanchakesari, nivombile imbivi.'
Ulwakhuva ufesto anogwagwa ukhuta avoneeke inonu kuvayahudi, pwu akhamwanda upavuli akhata, nawigwa ukhuluta kuyelusalemu khuhiegiwa nune khumbombo inchi?
Upavuli akhanda akhanchova, “nikwiema pavulongolo pakhigoda ikyavuhieghi ikya kaisari upwupilondiwa une ukhuhighiwa. sanievakhosehinche avayahudi nduvulumanyile.
Inave nielininongwa pwu ienghave nivombile nilondiwa ukhuhigiwa ukhufwa, sanibela ukhufwa. ulwakhuva uvuhieghi wa veine khulyune vusikhuli, asikhuli umunu uviwesya unkhunglielikakhuvene. nikhundova ukaisali.
Ufesto wa nchovile navahiegi akhamula, “vukhundova ukaisali, uyuwiluta khwa kaisari.”
Vufilutile ifigoono, untwa uaglipa nu belnike vakhincha kukaisalia, ukhugeendela ufesto.
Vuvatamile apo ifigono fingi, ufesto akhahilikha inongwa ya pavuli khu ntwa, akhata, “umunu yuoma vakhandekhile apha pha feliki ndumunu uvakhungiwe.
Upwunikale khuyelusalemu avantwa avavaha na avaghogholo avakivu vayahudi vakhaleta inongwa incha munu ouyu khulyune, navene pwuvaliekhuvuncha ukhuhigiwa khumuuyu umuvahigiele.
Une nikhavamula nikhata salulaghilelo ulya valoma ukhung'umya umunu vusapanogilele ukhung'umya.
Pwu vavile vinchile apa pupaninie, saniekhawesye ukhupulikiela, apange ikhigono ikhikhankongile nikhatama pakhigoda ikyavuhiegi nukhulamula ukhuta umunu uywa vagheighe mughati.
Unsiekhi avansitakhagha vuviemile nukhunchova, nikhasaga nikhata nchisikhuli inongwa imbaha inchakungliegha nchincho valetiele inchakhung'ega umunu uyu.
Puvakava, nukhubenchana numwene khulwiedikho ulwavene ulwa yesu uviafwile, hange upavuli akhavavula ukhuta mwumi.
Niekhale ninisisilile ukhunchinghahiencha ienongwa ieyi, nikhambuncha iengave ayiluta khu yelusalemu khuhiegiwa khunongwa inchi.
Upavuli vuielangiwa ukhuva vambikhe pavuloleili vuvipulikhila uvulamunchi wa ntwa.
Uaglipa akhanchova nu Festo “nikhanogilwa ukhumpulihiencha umunu uyu” ufesto akanchova, akhata “khilavo uyuvukhumulihincha”.
pwu intondo, uaglipa nu belnike vakhincha nuluhekhelo lwingi; vakhafika khuliboma ilyavavaha avasikali avaligoha, na vanu avanyamakha pakhiluga. nu ufesto wahuminche ululagielo, ulwakhundeta upavuli khuvene.
Ufesto akhanchova, “untwa uaglipa, na vanu voni vavo pwuvale apa pwupaninie nufwe, mukhumbona umunu uyu; ululundamano lwoni ulwa vayahudi ulya khu yelusalemu napa vanogile ukhuta nivatange, na vene pwu vakhatoncha ilimenyu ukhuta umunu uyu vakhufwa.
nikhavona sakhavombe khinu ikyakhunanga ukhuta nifwe; ulwakhuva amwilangi untwa, nikhalamwile ukhumbika khumwene.
Nilivuvule khitu ikyakwandika khuntwa. ulwakhuva une niendetile khulyuve uve, vintwa viegbipa, ukhuva nive nikhinu ikyakhusimba khunongwa ieyi.
Ulwakhuva nilola nivona sakhulikhinu ikyakhuhilika unkungwa walivuvule inchakhung'iega ukhuhiegiwa.
U Aglipa pwakhambula uPavuli, `Akhata lieno vuwesya ukhunchova. 'Pwu uPavuli akhinula ikhivokho kyamwene akhitetela.
“Akhata nikhipuliekha luhekhelo, Mumbwumi wango, Vitwa Eglipa, ukhuva eilelo puninchovanikhetetela inongwa nchango inchuava Yahudi vakhang'iegaga une.
Ulwakhuva uve uliemanyi unchimanyi indagielo ninchu vivuncha. Pwu nikhukhudova wiemuliekhenche nukwiyumilincha.
Lweli, Avayahudi voni vamanyi uune ukhuhuma uvudebe namumikhulile gyango mukhilunga kyango khu Yelusalemu.
Une vamanyile ukhuhuma khuvutengulilo vanogiile ukwidika ukhuta undumbilieli, mumpelela ugulinulwedienkho ululuti mumbuklisiti wienyo.
Leino nimile aapa pakhuhigwa ulwakhuva une nilola ululagielo ulwa Nguluve avombile khuvadada vetu.
Ulu lululagielo lulwa ifikoolo fwietu khinchigho nifivieli fihuvile ukhupokele inave fikwupilila ienava finkhumwidikha Unguluve nukwiyumilincha pankhilo na pamusi. Ni kwa ajili ya tumaini hili, mfalme Agripa, kwamba Wayahudi wananishitaki.
Khukhuta khikhi muugaati ndyumwe musaagaa ukhuta nchiva ncha khudegha ukhuta Unguluve inchusya avafwile?
Unsiekhi ugwinge nasagiele yune ni mwene ukhuta ninogiiiwe ukhuvomba imbombo nyingi incha litawa ilya Yesu uva mu Nasaleti.
Nivomba inchi mu Yelusalemu; Navakhungile aveidikhi avingi avavalanche nikhava na makha agaakhutamula ukhuhuma khuvavaha va vatekhenchi vuvibudiwa une nene niliekhulamula.
Papingi navatesinche vuvali mtembile nchavene ukhuta vabelaghe ulwidiko ulwavene. Nikhava nilyoyo ilaluvipo ulukali khuvene khange nilikhuvaswema munkhilunga ikya khuvugeni.
Vunivombo inchi, nalutile ku Dameski, vunielina makha nindagielo ukhuhuma khuvalumbili avavaha;
vunielimunjila pamusi, Untwa ninkhavona ulumuli ululuti khulinchuva lukhamulikha ukhunjula une na vanu uvutwa geendanga nnjela nune.
Twivoni tukhagwa pasi, pwuniekhapulikha ilimenyu linchova nune munjovela iya Khieblania: `Savuli, Savuli! Khikhi ikyuvukunesya? Khupala khulyuve ukhuvanya nilivalo khunchokoo.
Pwu nikhanchova, 'Uve veveni, Nkuludeva?' Unkuludeva akhamula, 'Une nene Yesu yuune vukhuneesya.
Lino wieme na malunde ghakho; ulwakhuva uvunogwe wango une nievonike khulyuve, niekhuhalile ukhuva imbombi nukhuva inchovi khumbombo iyuyimanyile ieyango lino nie mbombo nchincho uyuniekhukhuvonesyaga pavulongolo;
khange nikhukhupoka khuvanu uwayikhiva nikhukhusuha Avankilunga ukwakhiva nikhukhusuha,
ukhuvadiendula amiho gaavene nukhuvahencha iehisi ukhuloncha khulumulu nukhuhuma khumaka agaa ntavangwa ukhuta vamwidikhe Unguluve; ukhuta vupiliele ulusyiekhilo ukhuhuma khwa Nguluve uvusyiekhilo uwa mbivi nuvuhale.
Ulwakhuva, vintwa Eglipa, saninkilwe une unkhujileka ienyevonelo incha khukyanya,
ulwakhuva, khuvala avakhatamaga khu Damesika, nakhu Yelusalemu na avankhilunga kyoni ikya Yudea, na vanu avange avafikholo ifinge, nikhavalumbilile ukhuta vanchileke imbivi vasayiwe vasyetuke vankonge Unguluve, vavombage imbombo inchikuvavonesya ukhuta vikhudwada Unguluve.
Kumbombo incho Avayahudi vakhanyibata mutembile, valikhunogwa ukhumbuda.
Unguluve anangile puunoefikhile aapa, pwu nikwima nukhunchova khuvanu voni avanini na vavaha khu nchila inchuvachovile avanyamalago nu Musa vanchovile ukhuta inchi nchilavoneka;
ukhuta uKlisite alatesekha hange alatala ukhunchuka ukhuhuma khuvufwe nukhuvonesya ulumuli khuvavu Avayahudi na khuvanu amufilunga.
U Pavuli wamaliele ukhunchova ukwipala, uFesito pwakhanchova akhatoncha ilimenyu ilievaha, 'Pavuli, ulienulunkwale! uluhala lwako uluwiembile lukhupiele ulunkwale.
U Pavuli akata, Une sanielinulukwale, Fesito; vindwanchiwa ulwakhuva winchova incha wanyielweli nchene.
Ulwakhuva vintwa ulumanyile khwu mbombo inchii; pwuninchova saniedwadwa khumwene, ulwakhuma nilumanyile ukhuta khiesikuli iekhefihime khumwene, ulwakhuva eile salikhavombekhaga kuvutitu.
Te, uve Pavuli, vukhuvidikha avanyamalago, Untwa uAglipa? Nielumanile ukhuta vukhumwidika.
'U Aglipa akhambula uPavuli, 'Khwu nsiekhe udeebe vuwesya ukhunchova nune ukhuta nipiendukhe ukhuva Nklistie?
U Pavuli akhanchova, '“Nikhundova Unguluve ukhuta, khunsiekhi unsupu apange untwali, syo uve viemwene, avanu voni avinkhumolieka ielelo vave ndune, hange savakhave niendegehe incha mukheikhungwa.”
Untwa pwa akhima, nu mbombi, nu Bernike, vope navakhatamile pwupaninie navo,
wuvuvahegiila valikhunchova vavo valikhuta, 'Umunu uyu sapanogile ukhuta afwe nakhukhukhungiwa.'
U Aglipa akhambula uFesito akhata, “Umunu uyu akhalondiwa alekhe ukhuloleliwa ave ndunonchehencho akhale uvuvopolwa khwa Kaisali.”
Vakhavile valamwile khuta uyutugeenda mumagasi ukhuluta khu Italia, pwu vakambikha uPavuli navankhungwa avange vakhampa umbaha valighoha ilya Kiloma uvivatinchaga vie Julio, uvakhipuga ikya Agusitani.
Tukhatoga mungalava ukhuhuma khu Adlamitamu, lyageendaga mundunkhanji munyanja iya Asia. Pwu tukhingila khunyanja. U Alistako ukhuhuma khu Thesolanike iya Makedonia akhaluta pwu paninie nufye.
Ilinchuva ilyakhongile tukhima khu Sidoni, khukwa uPavuli ambombile uwipa pwu akhantavula ukhuluta khuvamanyani vamwene khukwupila uwipa wavo.
Vutuhumile apo tukhageenda munyanja tukhanchungula ikhiesiwa ikya Kiplo ikya diendile ukhuluguto, ulwakhuva unkhuluguto gwale pwuguli.
Vutugeendile mumagaasi agaale pawipi nakhu Kilikia na khu Pamfilia, tukhincha khu Mira, ikhielunga ikya Lisia.
Pala umbaha valigoha ilyo Kiloma, akayivome ingalava iyihumile khu Alexandlia yiyo yikhale yakhuluta khu Italia. Akhatupakhila umwa.
Twageendile malamola amanchuva galutilile ulugeendo ukhava luvivi salwanogelanile tukhahegelela khu Kinidasi, unkuluguto gwale mmbaha tukhalemwa ukhugeenda, pwu tukhageenda mundukanji kanji pasi pa Klete tukakhingila khu Salmone.
Twageendile mulukhanji munyanja khuvutatamu, pwutukhingila ukhuvita Fali Haveni ukwa khuliepawipi niekhilunga ikya Lasi.
Twangeendile amachuva mingi inoo, unsiekhi ugwa Avayhudi vaielekhilwa ukhulya unsiekhi ugwakwielekela ukhulya guukhava gulutile. Pwu khukava nuvudwanchi ukhuva tungeendage. Pwu uPavuli akhatukhilivula,
akhanchova akhata, “Mwivagosi, nilola nivona ulugeendo ulututengula uyuyiva mbivi hange uyuyiva yakhuyaga, sanita ifivo ifyutugeegile nie ngalava navuwumi weitu.”
Umbaha valigoha ilya Khiloma umbaha vamwene nu munu unyangalava, akhajilekha ukhunkonga nchila inchuanchovile uPavuli.
Ulwakhuva upwuvafikhile sapanogiele ukhutama unsiekhe ugwa mepu, avavombambombo avamungalava tugeenda ukhufikha ukhu, tungietange ukwingiela khukhilunga ikya Foinike, tukhatame ukhu unseikhe ugwa mepu. Khu Foinike khulikhulukanji khu nyanja khu Klete, yilkola khunena khuvuhumo na khusikha khuvuhumo.
Imepo incha kusika vunchitengwile ukhupula malamola, avavombi va munyanja vakhasaga vakhata vakhavile khila ikyuvakhalondaga. Vakhahencha ingalava vakhatengula ukhughenda khulukhanji khu Klete ukhuhegelela khu maghasi amadhebe.
Vutukhinile padebe gukhatengula unkhuluguto, ugwuvatili gwu gwa kunene khuvuhumo, gwukhakhula khumakha.
Pwu ingalava yiekhalemwa ukhugeenda ukhuva ukhulughuto gwale mbaha, tukhidiehana nienchihumila gwukhatutola nayufwe.
Tukhanyila uluvafu ulunghe khukhisiva ikyuvatichaga Kauda; twatigile ieno ukhupoka uwato.
Vuvawesinche ukhuhwega, nululeghehe uluvakhungile mungalava. Vadwadile ukhuta tukhale twiluta khunsanga ugwa Syiti, vakhimikha vakhatoliwa vule vule.
Twatoviwe nu mbele, twavile tugonile pavusikhu avavombi va mngalava vakhatengula ukhutaga iminchigo khunji ukhuhuma mungalava.
Ikhigono ikyadatu avavombi vamungalava vakhatengula ukhutuma magasi namavoka gaavene.
Ilinchuva nie nondwe sanchavonekhe khufigono fingi, ukhuluguto nu mbelo guuliekhukhula tukhava vanu vakhata ukhupona khusikhuli.
Vuvatamile unsiekhi intali khisita khulya ikyakhula, uPavuli pwa khima akhata, “Vagosi, mukhale mumulihienchage une samukhale mwihencha ingalava ukhuhuma khu Klete, ukhungaikha kyoni khukhale kyuvi khusikhuli.
Lino nita muve vanu vakweikhasya ulwakhuva asipali umunu uvyakhiva iyaga ingalava yuyinangikha.
Ulwakhuva ikhilo iyielelo unsung'wa va Nguluve, yuywa une nilievamwene, hange une vininkhusana vyakhimile palukhanji palyune
alikhuta, “Uladwadaga Pavuli. Upwu wukwimaga pavulongolo pa Kaisali, hange ulole, Unguluve khukhisa kyamwene akhupile avanu voni uvumugeendanjila nuve.
Mwie, vagoosi, mwikhasyage, ulwakhuva nikhumwidiekha Unguluve, ulwakhuva uyunchiva nduvuniekhavulile.
Khumbe tutakhiwa totoviwe khufisiwa ifinge.”
Vuyiefikhe iekhilo iya kumi na nne, avavombi vamungalava vutwiyuuga ukwa nukiwa khunyanja iya Adlatik, pakhilo pagati avavomba mbombo avamungalava vakhasaga vakhata apange tuliepakhufika khukhilunga ikhilievuvule amagasi.
Vakhavombela ilimenyu ukhulihania ukhulola uvutali pasi pamagasi vakhavona ikhipimilo khita salasini na sita, vakhalihania khange vakhavona ifipimilo ishilini na saba.
Vakhatala vakhadwada ukhuta uyuutukhietika mulunalawe vakhisya ifyombo fine ukhuma uluvafu ulwakwimiencha puvalikhudova ukhuta vukhale vukhinchage iembeevi.
Avavomba mbombo vamungalava pwu valiekhulonda ukhuyielekha ingalava palapala, vakhisya uwato uwakhuvapoka ukhufwa, vakhava vilaha khuvulongo khuwato.
U Pavuli pwalikhuvavula avalonghonchi avalighoha ilya Khiloma na vasikhali, “Samukhawesye ukhupona hange avanu ava visigala mu ngalava”.
Pwu avasikhali vala vakha dumula iemilegeehe igya wato vakhavulekha vukhagwa mumagasi.
Vuvuliepakhukya, uPavuli akhavadova voni valye ikyakhula. Akhanchova, “Eekhi khigono kya khinchigho nifine mwikhina khitalya khinu.
Nikhuvadova mtote ikyakhula khidebe mulye, ulwakhuva khuvupokhi weinyo, ulwakhuva asikhuli umunu yuywa akhiva lwihega uluywiele lumo khuntwe.
Avile anchovi eiwo akhatota, akhatota eikhisyesye akhansana Unguluve pamiho pavene. Akhamanyula ikhisyesye akhatengula ukhulya.
Voni vakhanogwa pwu vakhatola ifinu vakhalya.
Mungalava twate twivanu 276.
Vavile valile vakhigwuuta, valikhutola einganu valikhutaga munyanja ingalava yilikhuva mepe.
Yuvile yievile musi pwu vakhalalumnya ukhuta valikhukhilunga inkhincha magasi hange pwu valikhuvona ikhilunga ikhingile mugaati magasi ikhili nunsanga umwingi.
Pwu valikhunchova ukhuta inave viwesya ukhugeendencha ingalava ukhuluta ukhwa. Pwu valiekhuhudula iendeghehe nukhunchilekha munyanja. Unsiekhi ugwa valikhudula indeghehe incha ngalava nukhupiemba khuvulongolo ukhuluta ukhuyileikho imepu, pwu valiekhuhegelela khunsanga.
Vakhahegela khuvulongolo vakafika aponu upwu amaga agaa inyanja ivieli nchagiine. Ingalava pwu yikhima yiliekhulemwa ukhugeenda pwu yikhatengula ingalava ukhudenyeekha ulwakhuva umbelo gwale mbaha.
Avasikhali vanchovine ukhuvabuuda avankungwa voni, ulwakhuva akhee iva asipali umunu yuywa akhale iwesya ukwogela nukhuhega aponu apo.
Ulwakhuva unsikhali valigoha ilya Kiloma alikhunogwa ukhumpoka uPavuli, pwakhimikha inchuvasagiile; pwa akhatavula vala aviwesya ukwogela, vanyele ukhuhuma mungalava vatale ukhuluta ukhugasikhuli amagasi.
Pwu avagosi avange valiekhulonda umwakhumile ukwieyibatilila mumbavo na mufinu ifinge ukhuta vahume mungalava. Vavile vagahile ewo pwu vakhapona voni vakhahuma vunonu khunji khukoa amagasi gasikhuli.
Vutughendile vunonu, putukhalumanya ukhuta ikisiva khila vitambula ukhuta malta.
Avanu avaponu pala vakhatupokhela nu lughano ululutilile, vakhakhoncha umwoto vakhatupokhela nie niemepu ni fula yiliekhutima.
Upavuli akhahagala inyagala unjigho akhakhoncha pa mwoto, munjigho gwa nyagala yale muyile injokha iyeilinugoda unkhali yiekhakhuma munyagala khumafuke ghaa mwoto, pwu yikhienianga mukhievoko kya mwene.
Avanu avenyeji va pala, vuvawene injokha ijielumbela mukhivoka, vakhavulana vavo vakhata, “lweli umunu uyu iva imbudi atolwikhe khu nyaja, sapanogile ukhuta atamage nkilunga.”
Pwu upavuli akhayitahita injokha iela mumwoto khange sayandume.
Avene valiekhulolela ukhuta khifimba ikhivoko pwu ingwa nukhufwa imbievie. hange vuvalolile khwu nseikhi untali vakhavona sakhuliekhinu ikhihumila khumwene, vakhatengula ukhusaga vuunge nukhunchova ukhuta akhale Nguluve.
Upavule pala pawipi pale nikyalo ikhivaha kyale kya mbava va khisia uvivahtambulaga ukhuta vie pablio, uviatupokliele vunonu nukhutuliesya amanchuva gadatu.
Udadaye ua pablio akhatamwa liliekhuvava eilitumbu alikhuhaliesya. upavuli akhaluta khumwe akhadoovela, akahavieka amavoko pantwe gwa mwene akhapona.
Vuvalolie inchi inchihumile, avanu avingi avamukhisiva khila avale vatamuvakhaluta vope vakhapona.
Avanu valiekhutudwada khulisima ilivaha. vutwikhola ukhuhega tugeendage, vakhatupa ifinu fyoni ifyutwalonga.
Vugiesilie imyeenchi geidatu tukhageenda mungalava iya isakanda yiyobomoliwe niemepu pala pakhisiva, yiyo avalongonchi vayene vale mapasya vavile uyunge ale vie kasta nu polukusi.
Twavile tufikhe khukhilunga ikya silakusa, twatamile pala amachuva gadatu.
Ukhuhuma pala tukhageenda tukhafika khukhilunga ikya legio, vulilutile ilinchuva limo imepo iya khusikha yiekhincha imbieve, tukhagenda manchuva gavili tukhilkunga ikya putoli.
Ukwa tukhavavona navalukhololweto, vakhatupokhela vunonu tukhatama nawo amanchuva saba pwutukha hegha ukhuluta impakha khu roma.
Avalukhololwetu avakhu loma vuvapulikhe inongwa nchitu, vakhincha khukhotwupilila khuliguunchi ilya apiasi upwuvieta “migahava giedatu”. vakhansana u Nghuluve.
Vutufikhe khu loma, upavuli vakhatavula ukhutama mwene nundindilinchi uviandolelaga.
Vughlutile amanchuva ghudatu upavuli akhavielanga avaghosi uvuvale valongonchi muva yahudi. vuvinchile paninie, akhanchova akhata, “valunkololwangwa une sanienangile khinu khulyumwe khuvanu ava apange ukhuvomba umusavakhanogwagwa mumigeendele igya dada vienyo avatalile, une vanoili ndunkungwa ukhuhuma khu yelusalemu ukhugugaa mumavokho agavaloma.
Avene vuvikhumbuncha valikhuvona nilievuvule einogwa valikhunogwa inchikhumbiekha ukhuta niehigiwe ukhufwa.
Ulwakhuva avayahudi vakhanchova vakhapiendula umuvienogwa avene, une pwuniekhadova kwa kaisari, khuta inongwa yango yilutage kuvulongolo, ulwakhuva sanaleta inongwa ya nkilunga kyango.
Ulwakhuva natile inongwa yango yillutaghe kuvulongolo, pwunikhadova ukhuta nienchove numwe. ulwakhuva uluhuvilo lwa islaeli lukhungiwe nunyololo.
Vakhambula vakhata, “satwupilile inkhalata ukhuhuma khuvayahudi iyiekhukhunchova uuve, hange asikhuli ululkololwo uvieinchile kwinchova eilimenyu eilivivi eililoncha khulyuve.
Leino pwutwinogwa ukhupulikha khuluyve vusaga khihki khuvanu ava, ilwakhuva guupuliekhikhi khwoni ukhuta savikhwidihana ukhukhongana.
vakhavika ielinchuva ilyakhuchova nu vanu, avanu valikhutunga valiekwincha upualeikhutama ukhuma vuwikya ukhuduga iyakhimihe, pualikhuvavula inongwa incha yesu ni ncha ludeva ulya Nguluve, ukhuma mundagielo incha mose navanyamalago.
Avanu avange wu valikwidihana nagiichoviwa avange valiekhubela, savaliekwidihana.
Vuvalemilwe ukhupuliehana vavo vakhahega, vavile vihega upavuli akhanchova ilieminyu limo “umepo umbalanche anchovile vunonu khuvadada vienyo ukhugendela unyamalango uisaya incha ntwa uyesu.
Akhata, ulutage khuvanu ava ukhatiinchage, “khumbulukhutu nchiento mupulikhagha hange samukhanchimanyage; khumiho gienyo muiolaga hange siimukhanchinovage.
Ukhuva inumbula incha vanu ava ndekhedekhe, imbuluukhutu nchaveni sanchipulika vunonu, amiho gavene, nukhupulikha khumbulukhutu nchavo, inumbua nchavo nchilumanyage nukhusyetukha une nikhuvapokha.
Pwu mulumanye ukhuta, uvupokhi uwa Nguluve vulutile khuvanyapanyi hanga uyuvikhumpuliekha.” (Unchingahienche: uvusimbe uvu
Unsienkhi uguuvavulanga amamenyu aaga, avayahudi vakhahega, vakhava nienchakwievuncha imbava mumbene).
Upavuli atamili munyumba yieyo yale sayamwene imyaakha gievile, alikhuvapo khela voni avaluutaga khukhuombona.
Avombaga ukhulumbiliela uvuntwa uwa Nguluve hange aliekhumanyisya inongwa incha ntwa uyesu klisite khumakha goni, akhava asipali uviekhunsinga.
Ne Paulo, nembombi va Yesu Klisite yune nilaghiwe ukhusuhiwa, nukhulekhehana ne livagili lya Nguluve.
Ele lyu livangili ililyanchoviwe khatali na vouyamalango vamwene mumbusimbe uvuvalanche.
Nchinchova umwana va mwene, uveakholiwe mukhivumbukho ikhya Daudi khunjila eya mbili.
Umwene anchoviwe ukhuta Mwana va Nguluve khuu makha ga mepo umbanche khuluvoneklulo lwa vafwele, u Yesu Klisite Dada veto.
Khugendela umwene tupokhile uvupokhi wa kusuhiwa nu wedesi uwa lwidekho panie nekhe khelunga, khulitawa lya mwene.
Pagati pa khilunga ekhi, nayumwe mwelagiwe ukhuva va Yesu Klisite.
Ikalata eye ya mwevoni yumwe mtama khu va Rumi, vagane nu Nguluve, mwaelagiwe ukhuva vanu vavalanche. Ulukhugu luve kwenu, nu lugano ukhuma kwa Dada veto na khuswambe uYesu Klisite.
Mumbologolo nikhundemya uNguluve vago khwa Yesu Kliste khuliumwe mwevoni, ulwakhuva ulwedekho lulombeliliwa mukheluga vyoni.
Ulwakhuva u Nguluve isaidi vango, uvenikhumbombela ni numbula yango, kulimeyu ilya mwana va mwene, nduwu nitama ukhuvatambula.
Daima nchoni nidova muyesayo nchago ukhuta khujela iyavenchaga ninche nive numwe khukya khulya mwe.
Ninogwa ukhuvavona, ukhuta nevape efikhogelwa fya numbula, ninche nivayilenche.
Pwu ninogwa nekhave amakha paninie numwe, khunjila iya lwidekho lwa khila munu.
Lino valukholo, saninogwa mlemwe ukhulumanya ukhuta, ukhuta imesekhe mingi nesagile ukhincha khulyume, lenosesigiwe. Nikha nogwaga lino ukuva nisekhe khulyumwe ndawuyelekhu vanu ava khilunga.
Nidayiwa na vayunani na vahesya, avalemale na vapelwa.
Ulwakhuva une nilitayari ukhulumbelela elimenyu khulimwe nayumwe mwemulekhu Roma.
Ulwa khuva sanivona soni khulimeyu, ulwakhuva makha ga Nguluve ukhutopokha khukhila munu uveekhwedekha, khua vayahudi avakhwanda na khuva Yunani vope.
Ulwakhuva wayelweli wa Nguluve vuvonikhe ukhuma ulwedekho, mpauha ulwedekho, nduwuyesimbiwe, “Unya lwidikho itamaga nulwidikho.”
Ulwakhuva uvuhegi wa Nguluve vuvonikhe ukhuma kukhyanya ni mbivi nuvutola nogwa woni uwa vanu, uvuvivi wifikha uwayelweli.
Ulwakhuva, goni givonekha khwa Nguluve galipavuvalafu khuvene. Ulwakhuva uNguluve owavulile.
Imbombo ncha mwene enchosanchi vonekha vunonu nchivile pavuvalafu ukhuma khiliwa ulimwenguni. Khikwelevekha ukhugendela ifinu ifipeliwe. Imbombo incho makha ga mwene khihumana nu vufwa uwa khukhuma kuvutegulilo wa vuNguluve. Ukhuma, avanu ava viva vanchila vulegefu.
Ulwakhuva, va mayile uNguluve, savandolelage umwene khama Nguluve, savalikhusana, vavile vakhoyofu khumasage gavene, ni numbula nchavo incha vukhoyofu yaigile ekhisa.
Valikhwiyilaga veuiyaluhara, vakhava vapelwa.
Vakhalwandulania uvufwa wa Nguluve uvunchila vunagi khuvihwani khya munu uveanagikhe, ndiefidege, amakhanu akhayama lunde gane, ni fikhano ifikhwa fula.
U Nguluve akhavalekha vakhogage uvunogwe wa numbula nchavo imbivi, emivili givo kilikubediwa.
Na vene vayadwile elweli ya Nguluve ukhuva vudesi, valikhwesaya nu khugevombela imiguluve igige vakhandeka upelivavo, uviekhwi mekhiwa isikhu nchoni. Amina.
Ulwakuva, u Nguluve avalekhile vakhogage imbimbi nchavo enchiyasoni, ulwakhuva vaandulinie imbombo encha khatali vakha nchilekha incha khatali.
Vulevule, avagosi vakhanchilekha imbombo nchao ncha khatali khuvehe vavo nu khuva nu vuligu khuvene vavo. Ava vagosi khuva gosi ewavombaga inchi sancho nogelanile, valikhutole ulukoto khumbombo nchavo.
Ulwakhuva vabelile ukhuvanu Nguluve khuluhala lwavo, avalekhile vakhogage lyale, nchao imbivi, vavombage imbombo incho sanchinogelanile.
Vadigile nuvutulanogwa, uvuvivi, uvunogwe uvuvivi, vadigile uvunogwe, uvubudi, imbancha. Uvusyovi, na amasage amavivi.
Vavo vavile vasyovi, ava khehi navi khukalalila u Nguluve. Avayambancha, amatingo, ulwiginio, avene vavombo imbivi, nu vusavikhuva dwada avahonchi vavo.
Avene vanchila lukhala, savikhwidekha, vanchila lugano ulwa khwanda, vanchila lugano.
Vanchimayile indagilo ncha Nguluve, ukhuta vala avivombo imbombo incho, vanegiwa vabudiwe. Inave vivombo imbomob incho pwu viva vikhweelehana na vavo vivomba imbo incho.
Ule vovole uluhusa, yuve wikhega inungwa, ulyakhova yuve wikhega agavanino wikefunga yuve, ulyahuva yuwe wikhega wiwomba gagago.
Ulyahova tulumanyile khota uvokhegi wa Nguluve wayelyeli khuvavo vivomba amambo kama aga.
Uvewe usage uele, uvewikhega khuvawo vivomba imbombo incho nayove wiwomba amambo gagago. Poyowukhepa uvokhegi uwa Nguluve?
Apange wisaga sana khunyingi inchavombile uNguluve, ukhuncheliwa khuadhabu ya mwene, nuwovumefu wa mwene? sulumanyile ukhuta uvononu wamwene, wukhuhuvula khuhusayiwa?
Khuvogumu wa numbula yakho ugulevovole ulyesayo, wikhevehela yuve eakiba ya uwoheyi ukhisu uvukhegi khusihu yela yawo wonesiwa wa wokhegi yawolyeli ya Nguluve.
Umwene ikhopinchaga khela munu ekhepimo sava ninogwa ncha mwene.
Khuwawo valenowoyelweli na mambo amanonu vilonda esifa uludwado nukhunangekha, ikhuvapa uwomi wa sihu nchoni.
Kuvawo vihetenga, vavo savidwada uwoyelyeli vinogwa uhupoliwa uwukhegi nelyoyo elikali yikhwincha.
U Nguluve ayitwala etabu khumunu uyivomba imbivi, khunchandi tasi, numyuna tena
Ulyeginye, uvodyado eamani yikhuja khumunu iyivomba inonu, khumuyahudi na nyunani.
Uluva khosiholi ukhupendela, ulugano khya Nguluve.
Khuvange vakasinche ululagelo viyaga bila lulagelo, khuvale avange vakosije ukhukosa ulu lagelo, ayavikegiwa khululagelo.
Avavipoleka ululagelo avanya wolyeli kuvulongolu khwa Nguluve, vavo viwomba ululagolo yavivaleliwe uvuyelyeli.
Kuvanu vakelungu, avalevovole ululagelo vivomba kutabia ululagelo, avene vavile lulagelo kunumbula nchaivwo, avene valevovole ululagelo.
Yivoneka ukuta amambo khululagelo ghandechiwe igati munumbula nchavene. ezamili, yavene yikhovahega avene, amasage gavene vavo au ukhuvahega vikhuvedema vavo.
Nukhua Nguluve. Aga ayagikhomela khosihu inchiyaha ikhega inogwa ncha vanu voni, sawa nelimenyu lya mwene, khwa Yesu Klisite.
Tunchove tute wikheyelanga yuve myahudi, uyatamile mlulagele, usangelela ukhusifu uNguluve.
Ulumanye ulugano lya mwene, ukhupina amamba uguletofauti nago khuliho ukhulagenchiwa nu lulagelo.
Tunchove tute ulekhafu khuyuve vemwene ulendongoji khepofu, ulumuli khuvavo va lemuhisi,
uyisahihisya avanchila lohola, umanyisi va vana, nukhuta ulenalyo ululagelo nuvumanyisi uwayelyeli.
Yuve, vukhondombelela uyunge sawihemanyisa yove? Yuve wilombelela ukhuhencha, uveve savukhencha?
Yuve winchova ukhuta savuvomba uvuligu, savuvomba? yuve wikalala ekhehwani, savuhencha khukanisa?
Yuve wikheginya khululagelo, savuhonyongonyola u Nguluve khwa hudenya ululagelo?
Khulimenyu lya Nguluve eliwenyu linangekha huvanu va kelunga husababu yeto,” ndowayandikhiwe.
Ukhuhakikisiwa khwawoyelyeli hunogiwa ungakongongage ululagelo, ungawe savukonga ululagelo, ukhoha khwaho khwivasio khwohoha.
Angave umunu asayiwe, ikhwendelela ukhwibala ululagelo, ukhwesaya khwa mwene hiwva sahuvoneha ukhuta ikwesaya.
Nu mwene iyikhwesaya khuasili alalakhegiwa angatimesye ululagelo? Uwo wosimbe uwaandekhiwe ne tohara bado ulesaliti va lulagelo.
Umwene sio myahudi uya vile vahonji, uhutahiliwa sio khuahonji tu kumbele.
Umwene Myahudi uva gati ne, tyesoyo lya gati, munumbula sio ndimenyu, ulyeginyo ulya saluhumana na vanu lyukhoma kwa Nguluve.
Pwu Myahudi ikhava khehi? Ukhukhekhetiwa khwikhava khehii?
Lononu fincho khela njela. Khuvwutengulilo, avayahudi vapevilwe ulovonekhelo ukhukhuma khwa Nguluve.
Pwu yayiva ndeti ingave Avayahudi avange valevovole ulwedekho? ukhu sitakhwedekha khwavene khukhokhovekha uvugolofu wa Nguluve ukhuva vovivi?
Ate padebe, ulwa khuva, nndekhe Nguluve avonekhe ukhuta va yelweli, ndayeve khela munu nn'desi. Ingave umuyasimbiwe, “Ukhuta pwu uvonekhe ukhuva ulevayelweli mu mamenyu gaakho, ukhulotelela vwuvukhwingela pa vukhegi.
Engave imbivi nchetu nchivonesya elweli eya Nguluve, pwu tute khekhi? uNguluve si mbivi vwu ikhumya elyoyo lya mwene khukhuta ale evo? Ninchova ukhukhumana na lweli yavwu munu.
Ate! ndakhekhi u Nguluve umuyakhiva ikhikhekhega ekhilunga?
Engave lweli ya Nguluve ukhugendela uvwodesi vwango ikhumia ulwiginio khu mwene, khekhi nipi khegiwa ndu ntula nongwa?
Khekhi tunchove ndu vovya tudeteliwa na avange vikhwedekhana ukhuta twinchova, “Tuvombe imbivi, pwu ginche amananu? Uvukhegi khuvene vwa yelweli.
Khenu khehi? Ukhwetetela yofwe? Losikhuli, ulwa khuva ufwe tuvadetile avayahudi na Wayunani voni paninie, ukhuta vale pasi pa mbivi.
Ele ndavovwalesimbiwe: Asikhiwi uvayelweli, nu uve aliyumo.
Asikhuli umunu yuywa ikhweliwa. Asikhuli umunu uveikhondonda u Nguluve.
Voni vasyetwikhe, voni paninie wakhosinche ulwedekhano. Asikhuli uveivomba inonu na aleomo.
Emisingo gya vene vuguli uvole mwanchi. Indimi incha vene nchidetile, ugoda gwa njokha guli pasi mumilomo gya vene.
Emilomo gya vene gedekhile ulukhoto nu luvavo.
Amalunde ga vene ginyilela ukhududa ukhisa.
Uvunangi nu vukhuvilwa filimnjila ncha vene.
Avanu ava savayemanyile enjela ya lweli.
Lusimuli uludwado lwa Nguluve pa mikho gavo.”
Leno tulumanyile ukhuta khyokyoni ekhenchoviwa nu lulagelo, khinchova khuvavo valepasi palulagilo pwu khela ndomo gudendiwe, pwu ekhelunga khyoni khendondage u Nguluve.
Ulwa khuva gusipali umbeli uguyakheva guvaleliwa vwa yelweli khu mbombo ncha lulagelo khu mwene. Ulwa khuva ukhugendela mu lukhwincha ulukhala lwa mbivi.
Ulwa khuva leno bila lulagelo, elweli ya Nguluve yemanyikhikhe, yavonikhe khululagelo lwa vanya malango.
Eye yu lweli ya Nguluve ukhugendela elweli eya Yesu klisite khuvavo vikhumwedekha.
Ulwa khuva voni vavombile imbivi nu khuva nu uvuvalanche vudebe uvwa Nguluve.
Vavaleliwe uvwayelweli vulevule khu lukhungu lwa mwene khu njila iya vupokhi vuvwa vule mwa Klisite Yesu.
Ulwa khuva u Nguluve ang'ominche u Klisite Yesu ave lusayano khu njila ya yelweli mu nkhisa gwa mwene. Ang'ominshe Klisite ndu ntangeli va yelweli eya mwene, ukhunchisye khela inongwa inchilutile.
Pa khwiyumilincha pamwene aga gone gakhumile pwu elweli ya mwene yevonekhe khu misekhe ege. Eye yale pwu ivonesye uvwa yelweli vwa mwene, pwu livonekhe ukhuta ikhombalela umunu alavenchaga elweli mwa Klisite.
Pwu khulindakhu ukhwiginia? khulekhekhine khu mbombo ilekhu? Ulutu lwa mbombo? Ate, ulutu lwa yelweli.
Pwu tumalela ukhuta umunu ivaleliwa elweli khu luhungu hetavomba imbombo incha lulagilo.
Tute uNguluve avile Nguluve va Wayahudi vene? Umwene savile Nguluve va vanu va khilunga khyoni? Eena va khilunga khyoni.
Yengave ya lweli u Nguluve aleyomo, alavavalela elweli avakhekhetiwe huluhungu, na vavo savakhekhetiwe khu njila eya luhungu.
Pwu ufwe tukhulwandula ululagilo lwa luhungu, ate ufwe tukhulwedekha ululagilo.
Twichova khikhi khwa Abrahamu, ubaba veto khunjila ya mbili, avomnikhe?
Pakhuva u Abrahamu avalilewe ei lweli khunjila ya mbombo akhali eva nekhinu kya khwigin'wa sio khumiho ga Nguluve.
UAbrahamu amuidikhe u Nguluve akha valili wa ei lweli ukhuva lweli.
Lino khumunu uvivomba ei mbombo uluhombo lwa mwene saluvaliwa ukhuva lusayo, ila gwiva ikole.
Nakhumunu uvivomba ei mbombo nukhumwidikha ula viavaheliwe ei lweli, yuywa sio igolofu, ulwidekho lwa munu uywa luvalili wa ukhuva haki.
U Daudi vope inchova ulusayo pakianya pamunu uvi uyu u Nguluve ambalile ei lweli khunjila ya mbombo.
Achovile, “Vasayiwe vala avaimbivi ncha vene n'chisekheliwe nisambi n'cha vene n'chigube khiliwe.
Asayiwe umunu ula uvi u Nguluve sikhu mbalila uvutula nongwa.
Puulusayo ulu lwa vanu ava keketwe vene, emo khuvala avasava keketiwe, pakhuvatwi n'chova, khwa Abrahamu ulwidikho lwa mwene luvaliliwe ukhuva lweli.”
Pu avaliliue ndeti vu badusu keketiwe, ewo vusaakeketiwe? Salemumbu kegete vu badu sakeketiwe.
U Abrahamu apokhile alama hwani eikhwa khusita ukhu keketiwa gula gwali ei ng'uli gwa vuvilweli wa lwidekho uluale nalo tayari, vabadu sakeketiwe uluvonekhelo ulu vale njila ya khuvonekha ukhuva baba va voni. Avi khwidikha hata ndava ngave badu sava keketiwe.
Eyi yavonisye ukhuva uAbrahamu avombikhe ukhuva baba va vukeketie sio khuvala tu avavinogwa ukhu keketiwa bakhoila kuvala avavikhu n'chi konga ingendele n'cheto n'cha baba vito u Abrahamu. nulu lwidekho uluake nalwo khuvala ava savakeketiwe.
Pakhuva salwale lulagilo ululwa home n'chiwe khwa Abrahamu na vana va mwene, ulwidehano ulu salwale ukhuta viva nuvu halie wa khilunga, ila lwale ukhugendela ei lweli ya lwidiko.
Eingave vala ava ndagilo vuva vu hale, ulwidiko lwiva lusipali ei ahadi yave yebadelekhe.
Pakhuva indagilo n'chileta uluvipo, pakhuva pala upu ululagilo ukhupulikha khu sikhuli.
Khunjila eiye luleta ulwidikho ili luve khukhisa, pwu ululagilo ulu lwiva pavuvalafu pakhi vumbukho khoni navaholiwa ava sio vala avan'chi manyile eindagilo, ila vala ava lwidekho lwa Abrahamu. Pakhuva umwene vibaba veto twivoni.
Pakhuva vegiwe ei lwakhuta ni khukhuvikha u veve ukhuva baba vavingi ukhu konga khila eikhinchoviwe u Abrahamu ale uvo, pande waula ava amwidikhe yaani uNguluve uvikhuvapa avafyile uwomi nukhugavikha agasipaliukhwa pugale.
Paninei nicho n'choni n'cha khunje, u Abrahamu ale nuvu kifu amwidikhe uNguluve khusikhu n'chi khwincha akhava baba va vanu vingi, ukhukongana na khila ekhi n'choviwe,” Vuyiva khukhi vumbukho kyakho.
Umwene ale pepe ndwidiko. UAbrahamu aidikhe ukhuva umbele gwa mwene yuywa gwa silile ukhu fya, ale ne miakha mia yimo. Pia alikubaliana na hali ya kufyakwa litumsu lwa Sara.
Ulwakhuva uNguluve alagile, uAbrahamu akhava mwidehin'chi akha va amagha mundweidikho nukhuginwa uNguluve.
Alumanyile ukhuta kila eikya lagile uNguluve alei nuvuwesyo uwa khutimesya.
Eiye yuya vahiwe khumwene ukhuva lweli.
Sio gasimbiwe ukhuva faida ya mwene ukhuvaliliwa khumwene.
Lwasimbiwe khwaajili yeto, nakhuvala ava avavavaliliwe ei mbalelo nufye avavikhwidekha ukhuta an'chusinche udada vito uYesu Klisite ukhuma khuvana avafule.
Uyu viula uvi ahumenchiwe khunjila ya nongwa ncheto, nukhunchusiwa ili tukave ukhuvali hiwa ei lweli.
Ulwakhuva tuvalilive khuuchila iyalwidikho tulinulwi elikho ulwidikho nu Nguluve munjila ya Ntwa vitu uYesu Klisite.
Ukhugendela inchila iyi na yufwe tulinusikhi ugwa lwidikho nu luhungu mugati nukwima. Tuhovokha nu vunonu uvu ikhutupa uNguluve khusikhi, uvunonu uwakhulundamana, imbuvalanche uwa Nguluve.
Ulwakhuva tuhovokha nu vukhuvilwa weto tukhulumanya ukhuta uvukhuvilwa wihola uvugatalufu.
Uvugatalufu wihola ukwidikhiwa nu khwidika ukhuhola uvukhifu uwa nsikhi.
uvukhifu uvu savugatala ulwakhuva ulugano ulwa Nguluve lududiwe munumbula nchito ukhugendela mumepo umbalanche, uvya huminche khulyufwe.
Uputwale vapepe khusikhi ugu mwa Klisite afwile khunanya mbivi.
Yiva ng'afu ukhufwa uwuno umo uviifwa nu wayilweli alekhe ukhufwa umunu unonu.
Lugave ulugano edikhile yuywa ukhutwale vanya sambi, iyi ng'afu yumo ukhufu khu nyalwidikho.
Ukhuva khugoni tuvaliwe nu suyilweli mukhisa gwa mwene twipona ukhuhuma khuluvipo ulwa Nguluve.
Usikhi ugutwale nu ndugu, u Nguluve, uNguluve akhatusyikhila khu nchila iya vufwe, uwa mwana va mwene, pasikhi ugu amalile ukhutusyikhila akhatupokha nu vutamo wito.
Lino syo nduvu, pu tuhekhela nu Nguluve ukhugendela khutwa u Yesu Klisite, umwene uvi lino twupilile uvugatalufu uvu.
Lino ukhugendela mumunu imbivi nchaingile mukhilunga khunchela iya vufwe, nu vufwe vukhalutilila khu vanu voni, ulwakhuva voni vavombi isambi.
Ipakha lino ululagilo, lwa nogwa wale wa nkhilunga, lino imbivi sanjivaliwa vivusikhi ugwa lulagilo lusikhuli.
Na vulevule uvufwe ukhuhuma khwa nyakhatale u Adamu ipakha usikhi u gwa Mose, khuvala avasavavombe imbivi, ukhusita ukhwidika uvuvivi akhale ikhwincha, vingi va fwile khukhisa kya Nguluve nu vunonu wa khisa wa munu, Yesu Klisite vulutilile ukhulutilila khuvingi.
Uvunonu twupilile vuvule khuvuvwi, ulwa khuva uvutulanogwa uwayumo vingi vafyile, vuvule khu khisa khya Nguluve nu khutupa uvunonu mukhisa vuvule ikhya munu yumo, u Yesu Klisite ilutilile khuvingi.
Ukhusana sakhulihewuile ndu muwu uvyavombile imbivi. khuluvafu ulunge uvuhigi nu lukhungu lwa inchile uluvofu ulunge, ikhi khungilwa kya vuvule, ikhihihuma ukhuvaliliwa nu vulweli wainchile mvimbuvivi.
Uvulweli wa imbivi incha vufwe uwa munu umu wa endelile ukhulutilila na vala avikhwupilila uluhungu ulwingi pupavunye ni khikhungiwa ikyalweli vikhikhungiwa ukhugendela mumivele igwa Yesu Kliste.
Linu ingave inogwa incha yuwu ni ncha vanu voni vainjile khuhigiwa, ukhugendela mumbombo yimo iya lweli satwavaliliwe mumbili ugwa lweli mumbanu voni.
Ulwakhuva ukhugendela mumunu nu khusita ukhwidikha yumu, vingi vavombeliwe inongwa, ugendela ukhusita ukhwidika khwa yumo nu khuvikha na lweli.
Lino ululagilo lwaingile pupaninye ni mbivi ukhuta njendelelage. Nu vuvivi wolikhuongesekha, na uluhungu lwope lulikhwongesekha.
Iyi yahumile ukhuta isambi umunchongesikhe, nu khufwa, khukhuta ikisa khiwesya ukhulutilila ukhugendela muvulweli ni mivele khigieto khusikhu njoni ukhugendela mupokhi u Yesu Klisite Utwe veto.
Khumbe tunchove khihi? Tughendelelage ukhuvomba imbivi ukhuta ulusayo lyongelele?
Bakhoo. Ufwe twafwile mumbivi, tuwesya ndakhikhi, ukhutama umwa khange?
Tee samulumanyile ukhuta vala avonchiwe mwa Klisite vaonchiwe mumbufwe wa mwene?
Twasyieliwa pupaninie nu mwene ukhughendela khulwonoho mumbufwe. Ile lyavombike ukhuta u Klisite waghiniwe ukhuma khuvufwe ukhughendele uvutwa wa Dada, ukuta nayufwa tuwesyaghe ukhughenda mumbupya wa khutama.
Ulwakhuva tuhungile pupaninie nu mwene khukhihwani kya vufwe uwamwene, pwu tulahanga pupaninie mumbunchuka uwamwene.
Ufwe tulumanyile ndee uvumunu wietu uwakhatale wavungiwe pupaninie nu mwene, ukhuta umbile ugwa mbivi ghunangeikhage eile lyahumile ukhuta tulekhe ukhuva vasuhiwa va mbivi.
Umwene uvyafwile aviekhiwe ukhuva vayilweli ukhukongana ni mbivi.
Ukhuva tufwile pupaninie nu Klisite, tukwidikha ukhuta tutamaga pupaninie nu mwene.
Tulumanyi ukhuta uYesu anchukhile ukhuma khuvufwe, nukhuta samunu uvyafiwile tena. Uvufwe savukhunkonga kavile.
Khuvufwe uwafyelile khu nongwa incha mbivi, afyile khamo ukhuvafyela voni. Nakhukhutama ukhuitama, itama mumakha nga Nguluve.
Khunjila iyo yiyiyo, nayumwe khulondiwa avanu avafwile ukhuva avanu avafwile mumbivi, ulwakhuva kwa Nguluve mwa Yesu Klisite.
Kwu baako ukhuta ukhunogwa kwa mbieli khulekhe ukhukwile imbivi ukhuta umbilie gwukongage umuguunogela uvunonu uwakhunogwa.
Ulekhe ukhughava uluvafu lwa mbili gwakho khumbivi nifivombelo ifisafinogiwa, pwu twihumiaghe yufwe khwa Nguluve, nda vumi avahumile kwa Nguluve.
Tulekhe ukhuta imbivi ukwutumilila, ulwakhuva samliepasi pa fyombo ifya lweli kwa Nguluve.
Khikhi khumbe? Tuvombe imbivi ulwakhuva tulipasi pa ndageilo, ila pasi palusayo? Kwu bakho.
Samulumanyile ukhuta khumwene yuywa uviikhuminche yuywa ukhuva imbombi vei mwene umwe mulivavombi va mwene, umwene vipanogile ukhumpulikhincha? Iye lweli nupwu mungave umwe mulivavomba mbivi inchikhuvahilika khuvufwe, apange mlivasuhiwa avakwidikila ukuvahilika kuvufwe, apange mlievasuhiwa va wayilweli.
Pwu aginiwagwe uNguluve! ulwakhuva mukhale vavombi va mbivi, ulwakhuva mwidikhe ukhuma munumbula ukhukongana nulumanyisyo ulumwapokhile.
Muviekhiwe mumbwavukhe ukhuhuma kwumbivi, khange muvikhiwe vavombi va vuyilweli.
Ninchova ndumunu ulwakhuva yavudekhe dekhe wa mivile gyitu. Ulwakhuva mukhahuminchi mumivili gyinyo ukhuva vasuhiwa vayilweli kuvu vanche.
Upwumukha vasuhiwa va mbivi, mukhale mbuleghefu pavutali ni lweli.
Kwuu nsieki ugwa mkha ni niesekhe yilikhu kwu kumbombo iyumukhuyivona leino mwivona soni khuieyo? ulwakhuva khuvusilo wa mbombo incho wiwa vufwe.
Ulwakhuva lino vavavikhile mumbwa vokhe khuvutali ni mbivi na muvikhiwe vasuhiwa kwa Nguluve, mlieniseke mbuvalanche. Khuvusililo uwumi wasikunchoni.
Ulwakhuva uvivomba imbivi iekhigavilo kya mwene uvufwe, khange iekhikhungilwa ikya vuvule ikya Nguluve uwumi uwa kusila lusiku mwa Yesu Klisite untwe vetu.
Au samulumanyile, valokolo lwango (olwakhuva nijova na vanu avalumanyile urulagero), khukhuta urulagero lukhundo ngoja umunu vobado inkafu?
Olwakhuva udala avatoliwe akungiwe nululagelo khwa gosi va mwene, vunkafu mave ogosi va mwene ifiwa iva avikhilwe ukhuva mwavukhe ukhukhuma na nurulagero lwa khutolana.
Nevetwita, osekhe ugosi va mwene witama, inave nogosi uyunge, ikhelangiwa indigu, inave ogosi va mwene afwele, iva mwuvukhe nululagero, evo siva ndigu angave itama nu gosi uyunge.
Ulwakhuva, valokolo lwango, umwe mwavombiwe ukhuva wafwe nurulagero khu njila iya Klisite. Evilendete uhutama pupaninie nu ninoo, khu mwene uyakhanchukhile ukhukhuma khu vufwe ili tuwesye ukhung'olela u Nguluve isekhe.
Ulwakhuva vutukhale pa hali iyambele, uvunogwe uwambivi fikhasi simwile ifikhancho fweto khunjila iya lugalero nukhu vuholela uvufwe isekhe.
Ulwakhuva tudenduliwe ukhukhuma mu rulagelo. Tuyefwelile iyekhube jekhana. Ili tuvoese ukhuvombekhe uvupya mwa mepo, nufwe uwahatale uwa vusimbe.
Tutekhekhi? ululagero ulwa mbivi? La hasha. Inave evoo, sananikhulumanya imbivi, waleusite ukhuva munjila iya lulagero. ulwakhuva sananikhulumanya ukhuno gwa inave ululagero salwalwinchoova, “Olekhe okhonogwa.”
Olwakhova imbivi nchapeviwe indagero nu khuleta igati indyu ne khela namna iya khunogwa. Ulwakhuva imbivi khesita rulagelo nchifwile.
Nayune nale mwumi pavulongonchi uwa ndagero, upuyainchilem dagero, imbivi nchapewiwe uwumi, one nafwe.
Ululagero ululwale lwa khukhu khelekhela uwumi lwapendwi khe ukhuva vufwe khulwune.
Ulwakhuva imbivi nchapeviwe akhavalelo pa lulagero ulwa vudesi. Ukhugendela ululagero, nafwile.
Leno ululagero luvalanche, ulwakhuva indagero nchivalanchiwe, yalweli nu vusalaama.
Ulwa khuva iyiyale nonu khulwune wale vufwe khulwune? Isite ukhuva eve mwee. Ulwakhuva imbivi, ili yevonekhe ukhuta mbivivi yinogiwa yegendele munonu, yevekhu uwufu igati ndyune. Yale ukhugendela ululagero imbivi nchikhwendelela ukhuva sinchoo.
Ulwa khuva tulumanyile ukhuta imbivi nchikhuma nukhutengulile munumbula ulwakhuva one nelemunu va mbele. Nigonchiwe pasi pa vulongonchi mwambivi.
Ulwakhuva ilenivomba, sanikhweliwa liwa hoeli. Ulwakhuva eleninogwa ukhuvomba, sanivomba, na ele elekalalile, lwuelyo elenivomba.
Ulwakhuva nengavombe elesani nogwa, nikhwedekhana nululagero ukhuta ululagero lunonu.
Ulwakhuva sio nene ne nikhogo avombela ago, ulwakhuva nchu mbivi inchinchilekhulwune igati.
Ulwa khuva nelumanyile ukhuta igati ndyune, ila sanikhule vombela.
Ulwakhuva elinonu eleninogwa soni khulevombela, ila elivivi ele saninogwa lwunikhulevombela.
Leno kama nivomba elesanino gwa, sinene yune nikhulevomba, ulwakhuva yu yila embivi iyeyitama igati ndyune.
Nelumanyile, mwele indagero igati ndyune iyakhunogwa ukhuvomba amanonu, ulwakhuva uvovivi nuvule igati ndyunee.
Ulwakhuva nikhurukhovokhela ululagero ulwa Nguluve igati ndyune.
Ulwakhuva nivona imbinu inchiilivonge muvikhanjo ifya mbele ugwango. Yietova hubancha embombe enya eyahekhara lwango. Yikhumbikha une neledovwava mbivi inchili vikhancho ifyambele gwango.
Une nele munu va lukuto! veve ni uyaha ikhonyokhora nu mbile ogu ugwa vufwe?
Inave ukhu mwale khwa Nguluve nu Yesu Klisite umbaha vetu! Leno. One nemwene nulukhala lwango nikho lovombela ululagelo ulwa Nguluve. Pakhuva, khumbile nikhunchivombela embombo imbivi.
Yesipali ehukumu ya viboko havalemwe Yesu Klisite.
Uhuva eshelia ya numbula ya hukianya hwa Yesu Klisite yembwene une nivile hulu ni mbivi nuvufwe.
Uhuva eshelia yichile mbali ni mbivi yalemilwe uhuvomba uhuva naamu umbile uNguluve avombile asuhile umwana yumo avenesadaha eya mbivi ahayehega embivi ya mbivi.
Avombile ivo masuhano ga ndagelo yetimizwe igati yeto ugwe tusite uhukonga umbile lakini avavikonga enumbula.
Vavo vikonga umbile visaga amambo gambile leno avikonga amambo ganumbula vovi saga amambo ganumbula.
Uhuva amalengo gambile ga vufwe bali ama lengo ganumbula uwavuhe.
Uhuva amalengo gambile gale nuhukalala nu Nguluve uhuva sayihedeha idagelo icha Nguluve wala sayiwesie uhudeha.
Vala avikonga umbele saviwe sia uhugana uNguluve.
Hata leno samlehumbeli bali mlehunumbula kama mle hunumbula mutama gati lakini kama mle hunumbula mutama gati lakini kama munu alebila nembula ya Klisite uywa sio vamwene.
Kama uKlisite alegati ndiomwe umbele gufwile humambo ga mbivi bali numbula yeehige nonu.
Uhuva enumbala ya yula uvia chusiche uYesu uhuhuma huvufwe itama gati mliomwe yuywe achu siche uYesu Klisite uhuhuma huvufwe wamivele gienyo egi vufwe uvi tama munumbula chenyo.
Ululeno valukololiwanga ufwe tulenu kole, lakini uvwe tutamaa simbile.
Kama tutama numbile mle kalibu uhufwa lakini umnave hunumbula mwiviha engendelo ulwa mbilemtama.
Nduvovi vibuwo nsoswa ne numbula ya Nguluve avo vuvana va Nguluve.
Uhuva samwa pohele inumbula ya mateso ate uhuduada badala mwapohile enumbula yahuva vana tulela, “Abba, Baba!”
Enumbula yeyeni yehwelewa pamoja ne numbula pahuva tule vana va Nguluve.
Tunave tulevana tulisile hwa Nguluve uvwe tulisili pamoja nu Klisite tunave tuteseha nu Klisite ili tupate uhuginiwa nu mwene.
Uhuva ni valela amateso agawakati uvu uhuva ufwe twelungile nuvuvaha uwa tuvonehile huliufwe.
Uhuva iviumbe fioni vilola yuywa uhuvoneha kuvana ava Nguluve.
Uhuva uvuumbaji wavombiwe nnbiki sio huhiali yeto ilakwa sababu yayuywa na hutesemela.
Uvuvumbaji uwa mwenye vulavehiwa huru nuhuhuma humateso ga vuvivi nu hwingila mbovuhulu wa vana va Nguluve.
Uhuva tuhwelewa uvuvumaji nuhuteseha nuvu chungu hata leno.
Siyo yufwe tuliona malipuko ya numbula ufwe tutamwa hunafasi cheto vutugojela uhu vombiwa humivele gieto.
Uhuva twa pohiwe lakini ehenu hihio nekonihe uhuva nehe wene vani ugojela ehehivoneha?
Bali tuhuhepulehela tuhegojela kwa saburi.
Hunjela yeyeyo enumbula yope yehututana uvusaifu weto uhuva samanyile usaya jinsi umyinogela uhwesaya lakini enumbula yihutudavela huhwa sahudoveha.
Na mwene uviichungusiva inumbu uhuyelewa uluhala lwa numbula sababu vidova huniaba ya vene ava vihwamini idova huniaba yao vaamini humapenzi ga Nguluve.
Nufwe tuhelewa wote avaganile uNguluve umweneivomba embombo pamoja huvunonu huvanu avihelangiwa humalengo gwa mwene.
Husababu voni ava avavamanyile tangu hatale na avacheguile tangu hatale vahwanane nufuno ugwa mwana va mwene i umwene aholiwe ave vya hunza miongoni mwovalukolo vingi.
Na vala avavachagwile ako avelangile navala avavela ngile avavalile uvuyeleli navala avavalile uvuyelweli avo avaginiche.
Tuchove hehe juu mambo aga? uNguluve angave uvupate weto veni uvale hukianya huliufwe?
Uvepila sihundeha umwana va mwene bali ahuniche huzili yeto tuvanu twevoni iweza uhu kosia uhutu tanga na mambo goni pamoja nufwe?
Veni uve ilvesia uhuva sitaha uNguluve vemwene ihuva valela uvuye lweli.
Veni uvepia ihukahega adhabu? Klisite Yesu veafule hu ajili yetu nuhuvahuago umwene alifufuka umwene itavala mahali pa heshima na tena viihuto dovela.
Veni uve ihutu gava nuvugane uwa Klisite Yesu etabu, au amateso, au enjala au hebwinda au hatali au emundu?
Kama umoyasimbiwe kwa faida yaho tuifwa imsi yoni twavaleliwe kama ngosi ya hubudiwa.”
Katika mambo ufwe tule vasiti vavasindi katika yeya uvatu ganile.
Uhuva na malile uhukela kwamba wala uvufwe wala uludeva wala usuhiwa wala mamlaka wala ifinu ifilipo wala ifinu vivyozavyo wala amaha,
Wala agalehukianya wala agale pasi wala kiumbe hio hioni sahehaweswe uhutugava nulugano la Nguluve ambaye ve Klisite Yesu utwa veto.
Ninchova icha yelweli mwa Klisite. Saninchova uvudesi, ni nyievonelo nchengo nchikhumbula paninie nune mumepo umbalanche,
Ukhuta khulinulusu valo uluvaha nuluvavo ulusalwisila ngati munumbula yango.
Ukhuta nale ninogwe une nie mwene ukhukotoliwa nu khutengiwa patali nu Klisite khunogwa ya valokolo lwango, uvuvahwani nune khimbili.
Avene vanya Israeli, uvalivumbikhe vana, va vuvalanche, nu lwokhelo lwa lutagilo, ukhwisa ya khwa Nguluve nu lwokhelo.
Avene vuvalongonchi u Klisite wa inchile kwu lisima ukhofwala umbili ugu - umwene vi Nguluve va fyoni. Navope agini vwage imiaka. Amina.
Khange sakhukhuta ulwidihano lwa Nguluve lukemilwe ukhutimila. Ulwakhuva sakhilo munu uviavile inya Israeli vi muIsrael lweli.
Ate ne khikhipapo kya Abrahamu ukhuva vana va mwene lweli, “Pwu ukhugendela kwa Isaka ikhipago kyoko khikhwelangiwa.”
Ukhuta avana va mbili savana va Nguluve. Pwu avanu va lwidihano viloliwa ukhuva khipapo.
Uhwakhuva ili lyu limenyu lya lwidiheno: “Mwu misinkhi haya nikhwincha, nu Sara iva nu mwana.”
Salili vuvule, nayu Rebeka ukhukhava unchigo khu munu yumo, u Isaka udada vitu-
Ukhuta avana vakhasigalile ukhu holiwa khange sakha vomba imbombo yoyoni inonu apange imbivi, apange uvunogwe wa Nguluve ukhukongana nu vuhale wime, sio khu mbombo, ulwakhuva ukuta.
Lyanchovile khu mwene, “Umbaha ikhumbombela udebe.”
Nduvuyisimbiwe: U Yakobo naaganile, pwu Esau ansulile.”
Pwu lino pwu twinchova ikhikhi? Khuli vuvivi khwa Nguluve? Ata.
Ulwakuva inchova kwa Mose, “Niva nikhisa kwulo uvinikwu nsyikhela, niva nu lusyikhilo kwa ula uviya nikwu n'syikhila, khange niva huruma khu yule uvinikwusyikila.
Pwu lino sayivile umwene uviinogwa khange sa lwakuva inyile uviivonesya ikhisa.
Ulwakuva uvusimbe vwita kwa Farao, “Khuvunogwe uvu uvuvamana nikha khwimikha une nivonesye amakha gango khulyuve, nukuva ilitavwa lyango linchovivwage ikhilunga kyoni.”
Pwu lino uNguluve iva ni khisa khumunu yoni uvyaganile, na uvyaganile, ikhumbikhe ukhuvanya ngani.
Pwu yawita khulione, “Pwu khikhi vupilola uvuvivi? Pwu alikhi uviegumilinche uvunogwe vwa mwene?”
Vi munu veve veni vi vukhumbulo vunge uNguluve? vwiwesya ukhulumanye ikhinu ikyu vumbile ukunchova kwu munu uvya khivumbile, “Khekhi ukhambikhile evwo une?”
Khukhu uvivumba inchila vwa yelweli kwu ng'anga ukhuvumba ikhivombelo ukhumana nu ng'anga gula gule, ni khyombo khinge khu mbombo yi figono fyoni?
Ndakhekhi ingave, uNguluve, uvi alinuvunu vwa khuvonesya uvuvivi vwa uvuvivi vwa mwene nu khuvomba ne makhaga mwene ukhuvoneka, akhanogile ukwiyumilinche, iatbu iyuyivikhiwe kwa khuyancho?
Ndakhikhi ingave avombile evo avonesye uwingi vwa vulancha vwa mwene kwu fyombo fya khisa, ifyo ifi fikhavikhilwe kwu vuvalanche?
Ndakhikhi ingave akhavombile khuvanu va khilunga?
Nduvwichova khange khwa Hosea: “Nikhuvilanga avanu vango uvuvale savanu vangu nu ngane va mwene uvisakhe ngane.
Khange yayiva ukhuta pala upwa khanchovivivwe kuvene, 'Umwe samlivanu vango,' pala vikhilangiwa 'vana va Nguluve umwumi.'”
Uyisaya ilila ukhukongano ni Israeli, “Ingave imbalilo ncha vana va Israeli ncha chivenchage ndu nganga ugwa nyanja, igiva gu melagalila legu giva masigalila uvu yavipokiwa.
Ulwakhuva unkuludeva ayikulitola ilimenyu lya mwene pakhanya pakhilunga, khimbivi nu uvukwilanile.

twita khekhi lino? Ukhuta avanu va nkilunga uvu savalikhulonda uvwa yilweli, uvwa yilweli wa lwidincho.

Nduvuyivile yisimbiwe, “Lola, nivikhile ilivwe lya kwi kuvancha mSayuni nu umwene uviikhwidikha salasukha.”

Ukhuva ni khuvavula ukhuta vale nembombo ya Nguluve. Leno sio ukhuta valenu welewa.
Ukhuva Sara yemanyile ilweli ya Nguluve, vilonda ukhujenga elweli yavene vavo. savale videkhi khuvulyeu wa Nguluve.

Inava ilule yivonekha nu ulwidikho vun'cho lweli, “Usite ukhujova munumbula yakho, 'Vani ukhutoga khukianya?' (Khu khu ndata uKlisite pasi).
