Linu khuva Israeli ukhun'chova, “Isikhu joni nanyosinche amavokho gango khuvala avasavikhumulikha na khuvanu vango.”
Pu leino niita, pu, uNguluve avabeilile avanu vamwene? Ndeili na padebe. Ulwakhuva une nayune neili Mwisraeli, eikhivumbukhu khya Abrahamu, vakhikolo eikhya Benyamini.
UNguluve savabele avanu vamwene, uvuavamanyile ukhuhuma khuvulenguleilo. Pu samlumanyile uvuveige wiita khiikhi ukhukongana nu Eliya, umuasimeleihinche khwa uNguluve savuli ya Vaisraeli?
“Ntwa vavabudile avasuhwa vakho, navene vanchinanginie inekhelo nchakho, une nei mwene nene niesiigile, navene vilonda uwumi wango.”
Pu uwamule wa Nguluve wiita khiikhi khyulyuve? “Neileiveikhile savuli yango avaalufu saba yango avusavikhufugameela amafugamilo uBaali.”
Paninie neiyo, usiekhe ugu leino pu khuvaale uvuvasigile savu ya vuhale wa luhungu.
Pui leino yiengave savuli ya luhungu, pusayiva mumivombele. pu apo uluhungu pusalwiva luhungu.
Khyu khinu khikhi leino? eikhyu uIsrael alikhulonda, sakhivone, pu avahaliwa vakhiwene, na vaange vakhasya.
Nduvuyeisimbiwe: “Unguluve avapile einumbula eiyavubungefu, amiho ukhula valekhe ukhulola, ni mbulukhutu ukhuta valekhe ukhupuleikha, pupakha eilelo eiye.”
Vape uDaudi iita, “Nchilekhe imesa nchavo nchive nyaafu, neimitego gwa khwipeinja, nukhwitavuleila khuvene.
Galekhe amiho gavo gave niehisi pu valekhe ukhulola. Ukhavinamye emisana gyavo khitaduga.”
Leino niita, “Puvei, kuvinche nu khugwa?” Yelekhe ukhuva ewo lusikhu. Puleino ukhulemwa khwa veene, uvupokhi vufikhe khuvapanji, ukhuta avene vavo vavone wifu.
Leino einave ukhulemwa khwavo vukaviwa khilunga, nu puyiengave uvufuve waavo vukavi wavapanji, pukhigelelo khiekhi eikhilutelile puyeve khunkwila nila khwavo?
Na leino leino ninchova numwe mwie vunu va panji, neivile isuhwa khuvanu avajilunga ifinge, nikhigineihincha eimbombo ya vutangeli wango.
Pamo yanikhuvapela uwifu avaleimbeili gumo nune, pano ya tukhuvapokha vaninie.
Pu eingave ukhubeliwa khwavo lweideha no lwa khilunga, ukhyupeileiliwa khwavo ya khwiva ndakhikhi pu uwumi uwakhuhuma khuvunchukha?
Einave isekhe itanchi khibana vuyileiwo khu nongeya vutine. Einave undela khibana pu amasasi nagope wuwuwa.
Pu einave amasasi maninie gageidewe, uve, lisasi lya msitu lya Mzeituni, ugugwavyaliwe muvene nu pungave waleepyo paninie navene eimilela gya vukani wa Mizeituni.
Ulekhe ukhwiginia mumasasi, pu unave vukhiginia saveve yuve vukhugitanga emilela, pu emilela gikhukhutanga uve.
Puleino ayawita, “Amaswato gagidiewe ukhuta neivuliwe mukhikolo.
Eiyo lweli, savuli ya khusita ukhwideekha khwavo vagedeiwe, pu uve wa eimile ulukangafu savuli ya lweideikho lwakho. Ulekhe ukwisageila yuve pakyanya fincho pu dwaadage.
Pu ulwakhuva eingave uNguluve sagalekhe lenche amaswato amatengule, sakha khuhigile uve na yuve.
Lola, leino, imbombo inonu nu vukali wa Nguluve. Khuluvafu lumo, uvukali wa inchile khuva yuta vala avagwile. Pu khuluvafu ulunge, uluhungu lwa Nguluve lukhwincha palyuve ungave yawinchiga muvunonu wa mwene. Einave ate uve nayuveayavubeiliwa.
Na eingave savakhendelelage mukhusitakhwideekha kwavo, yavi valiwa khange. Ulwa khuva uNguluve alei na makha agakhuvyaleila khange.
Pu ulwakhuva umwe mungave mwageidewe khunji khugugwa gwa mbutengulielo Mzeituni gwa msitu, puleino eikyavulenguleilo khileivunge Mzeituni unonu pu sayiva fiva ukhulutilila fincho ava yuta?
Ulwa khuva valokolo saninogwa msite ughulumanya ukhukongana ukhu kongana nei siri eiye, ukhuta mulekhe ukhuva nu luhala mumisagiele gyienyo yumwe. Ei siri eiye khukhuta uvukafu vuhumile mu Israeli, imakha ukhunchikwilanila khwa filunga yakhiva khwinchile.
Puleino ava Israeli vooni yavipokhiwa, ndu unyeisimbiwe: “Ukhuhuma khu Sayuni ikhwincha upokhi, pu ayihencha uvuvivi ukhuhuma khwa Yakobo.
Na eili puyaliva ndagano pu paninie na veene useikhi uguyakhiva nihencha imbivi nchaavo.”
Khuluvafu lumo ukhu kongana neilivangeili, vivipeiliwa savuli yienyo. Khuluvafu ulunge ukhukonga na vuhale wa Nguluve, vavyaliwe savuli ya vankukhu yavo.
Ulwa khuv uluhombo ni nyeilango yu Nguluve sayigevukha.
Ulwakhuva pakhwanda umwe mwale vagolo va Nguluve, puleino mulyupeilile uluhungu lwa Nguluve savuli ya khugalukha kwavo.
Khunjila yeiyeiyo, leino ava yuta ava vagalwikhe, pu eilyu leivonikhe khukhuta savuli ya khisa ikyu muhungukhiwe umwe mvahile ukhwambeilila uluhungu.
Ulwakhuva uNguluve avadeindile avanu vooni muvugalukhi, ukhuta pwava vonele eikhisa vooni.
Umunchi velile mbaha uvukavi nu luhungu nu vumanyi wa Nguluve! Savunchingakhimchi wa uvuheigi wa mwene, ni njeila ncha mwene sanchi manyikhikha!
“Pu veini uvyakhavu manyile uvufumbwe wantwa? puveini va masago khumwene?
Pu veini taasi agelieli ukhupa eikhinu uNguluve pu ahombiwe khange?”
Ulwa khuva ukhuhuma khumwene, na khunjila ya mwene na khumwene, ifinu fyooni pufile, khumwene luve ludwando isikhu nchooni. Amina.
Mwi evalunkidwangwa, niekhuvadova, khukhisa ikya Nguluve, muhumyie eimivieli gyienyo yieve nekhelo ienyumi, imbalanche, iyienoghelanile pamiho agha Nguluve. Ulwa lwu lyesayo lyenyo ulunonu.
Mlakhikhonga ikheilunga eikhi, musyetukhe ukhuva vapya vamusango ghienyo. Muyiemanye eilweli iyalugano ulwa Nguluve uluunonu, ulunoghelaniele nukhwidihana.
Ulwa khuva ulusayo uluniekhaviele nikhumbula khila munu uvyaliekhulyumwe alekhage ukhunchova amavaha aghalutilile nduvugakhanughiwagwa, avinchage nukhwilola nukhuduga, nduvu uNguluve aghavile khila munu eikhighavilo lyueidikho.
Nduvuwu umbieli ghumu ghuliniefi ifilungielo fingi, ifilunghili ifi safiliene imbombo yeimo.
Nayufye tulievinigi, tulie umbieli ghumo mwa Klisiti, na yufwe khila munu alienikhilungielo ikya mwene khunine.
Tulinifikhungielwa ifisafi hwanine khiela munu ukhukhongana nulusayo ulutukhavile.
Tungave mukhutangiela tutangielage, avanyakhumanyisya vamanyisyaghe.
Unya khuvunga, avungaghe, unyanumbula ienonu avombaghe khunumbula, uvilongoncha alongonchaghe na makha, unyakhisa avoneisyaghe ulukheghelo.
Ulughano lulekhaghe ukhuva lwa vudetelenchi; uliekhalalielaghe ielivivi, wibatieliele eilinonu.
Muughananage yumwe khulughano ulwa khilukholo. Khulughano muvalongonchaghe ava yienyo.
Mlekhaghe ukhuva voolo, muvinchaghe nukwiyumilincha, munumbula vumukhumbombela Untwa.
Khuluhuvielo, muhovokhaghe mumbupala vumupuliekhiela, mukyiesaya, mwieyumilienchage.
Vukhundiwa khuvavalanche vumunkhonga uvudekhedekhe, ukhuvupieliela avagheni mwintangaghe.
Muvasayaghe avikhuvaviphiencha; muvasayaghe mulekhe ukhuva kholola.
Muhovokhaghe navihovokha numwe, mulielaghe naviliela numwe.
Muphuliehanaghe mutamaghe ndunonchehencho navayienyo. Mlekhaghe ukwieghienia, muvinchage vanu vakhuvatanga avalemilwe. Khange mlekhaghe ukwieghinia ukhuta mukhimanyile khila khinu.
Mulekhaghe ukhung'omba umunu uvuvivi khu khuvuvivi. Muvombaghe inonu pha miho ghavanu voni.
Ulwa khuva uluvafu ulunghe khulyumwe, muntamaghe nulunonchehencho na vanu voni.
Vaghane, mulekhage ukhuhomba imbivi, hange muhenaghe uluviepho lwa Nguluve. Ulwa khuva liesimbiwe, 'Uluhombo luliepakyanya palyune; Une nielahomba,' inchova Untwa.”
“Khumbe unduguu vako angave nienjala undiesye. Angave nikyumiela, inywesye. Ulwa khuva ukhughaha eiwo wiva vukhuntumiela amakhalasiela agha mwoto pantwe pamwene.”
Vulekhaghe ukhukhutola uvuvivi, humbe vulemwaghe uvuvivi khuvunonu.
Khila munu eidikhaghe khuvantwa avavaha, ulwa khuva vusikhuli uvuntwa uvusawihuma khwa Nguluve. Uvuntwa woni uvupwuvule wihuma khwa Nguluve.
Hange uvieibela khu vantwa pwu ikhilana nululaghilo ulwa Nguluve; voope aviekhilana valakhava uvuhieghi.
Ulwa khuva avantwa savidwancha khuvanu avivomba inonu, vidwancha khuvanu avivomba imbivi. Pwu wienogwa ulekhe ukhiwadwada avantwa? Pwu uvombaghe inonu vope pwu iekhukhughiniaga.
Ulwa khuva avilongoncha vavombi va Nguluve ukhuvomba inonu. Hange ungavombaghe imbivi, pwu udwade, ulwa khuva sawighegha eimundu vuvule. Umwene vie mbombi va Nguluve, unsuhiwa va Nguluve viivomba ukhuvunga khuvala avivomba imbivi.
Khoumbe tuvankhongaghe ukhuviediekha avalongonchi, tulekhe ukhuwada uluvungo lulwa yaluhumila, khaumbe khumasago gheitu.
Pwu musonga eisongo. ulwa khuva avantwa vavombi va Nguluve, vavo unsiekhi gwoni vivomba imbombo eiyakhulongoncha.
Umpinchaghe khila munu khiekyo ikhikhumela: ungave vudayiwa iesongo ukhasonge; inave khusongencha ukhasongenche, uvinogiewa uvudwanchi, iindwanchi, uvie ilondiwa eilisima weimphe ielisima.
Ulekhe ukhuva nunkhole numunu, mughananaghe, ulwa khuva uvianghanile uniene iva ankhongile ululaghilo.
Ukhunchova ukhuta, “Ulalieghupagha, ulahienchagha, ulabudagha, ulanogwagwa,” inave pwunchile iindagielo inchiinghe nchihangile mululagielo ulu lumo: “Ughane uvyaliepawipi nuve nduvuwieghanile yuve.”
Ulughano salukhumbomba uvyalipwipwi nuve uvuvivi, ulughano lulwidihiene nululaghilo ulwa ndaghilo.
Ena, tungaluma ukhuta unsiekhi, ugwa khusisimukha ukhuhuma mumbuughono uwa tulu gwinchile. Ulwa khuva uvupokhi wieto vuliepawiephi nufwe upwu tukhatengwile ukhumwiedikha.
Eikhilo yiepienchighe eno, eimusi yieheghelile. Pwu tufule imbombo inchamuhisi, tufwale ifilweilo ifya lumuli.
Umuyiekhuvelile iemusi, vutuvinchage eiwo nukhusana, tulavichagha nuntoli, nuvughanchi, khuvulyasi nuvulieghu, ukhulekha ukhulwa niekhitule.
Pwu tumfwale Untwa uYesu Klisiti, tulekhaghe ukhulola umbieli, nukhukhonga uvunogwe uwa mbieli.
Umwene uvyalienulwiedikho lupepe, mung'eghelehenchage, mulekhaghe ukhung'iegha amasago aga mwene.
Umunu yuomo alienulywidiekho, ilya fyoni, hange undekhedekhe ilya eimboga.
Umwene uvieilya alekhaghe ukhumbeda yuywa silya. Hange yuywa silya alekhaghe ukhungiegha yuywa ilya. Ulwa khuva uNguluve amwidikhile.
Uve veve veni yuve vukhung'iegha umbombi uyuonge? Khumbaha vamwene yuywa umwene ikwiema apange igwa. Mwene, ulwa khuva Untwa iwesya ukhumwimiekha.
Umunu yumo ivomba nchincho sajinchinogelanile khila lienchuva. Uyuonge ivona amachuva ghoni ghalihanile. Khila munu alumanyaghe munduhala lwa mwene yuywa.
Umwene uvieikhuyimiekha ielinchuva, ikhumwiemiekha unkhuludeva, vope uvieilya ilya khunkuludeva. Hange uviesilya, silya khunkuludeva, hange vope ienkhunsana uNguluve.
Ulwa khuva asikhuli umunu munghati ndyufwe uvieitama mumakha ghamwene, hanghe asikhuli uvivomba mumakha aghamwene yuywa.
Ulwa khuva inave tutama, tutama khu nkhuludeva, apange tunghafwe, tuliekyuma kya Nkuludeva.
Ulwa khuva uKlisiti afwile hange akhava mwumi, pwu avile inkhuludeva va voni avafwile na vumi voni.
Uve pwu khekhi, vukhung'iegha ulukhololwo vakho? Aphanghe uve khekhi, mbona vukhumbeda ulukhololwo? Ulwa khuva ufwe twivoni tuleima pavulongolo pakhighoda ikyavukhighi ikya Nguluve.
Ulwa khuva lisimbiwe, “Nduvinietama,” ienchova unkhuludeva, “Khila lifughamielo lilafughama pawlongolo palyune.”
Ulwa khuva ewo, khila munu alahumya indaghielo incha mwene pavulongolo pa Nguluve.
Pwu twielekhelwe ukhuhieghana, huba tukhenche uvuhieghi uwu, umunu alekhaghe ukhuviekha ikhienu ikya khumbiepiencha ulukololwe au eikyakhugwiesya.
Nilumanyile hanghe undienganiche mwa Yesu Klisiti, ukhuta khisikhuli eikhinu iekhivivi, khumwene ikhienu khiela khivivi.
Ulukhololyo angave nuluviepho niekyakhulya, alulekhile ulughano. Khu kyakhula kyakho ulekhe unkhunanga umunu yuywa uKlisiti afwile khunongwa incha mwene.
Humbe uvunonu wienyo vulekhe ukhutambuliwa khuvivi.
Ulwa khuva uludeva lwa Nguluve salwakhulya aphange ukhunywa, pwu wayilweli nu lunonchekhencho nuluhekhelo mwu mepo umbalanche.
Ulwa khuva uveikhumbombela uKlisiti mumbombo incho inkhung'ovosya uNguluve hange iekwidiekhiwa na vanu.
Yiengave ewo, munkhonge imbombo inchalunonchencho ni mbombo inchilondiwa ukhwimiekhana.
Khunongwa iyakyakhula ulekhe ukhunanga imbombo ya Nguluve. Lweli fyoni finonu, fiva fivivi khumunu uvieilya nukwihiega.
Lwiva lunonu ukhulekha ukhulya ienyama nukhunywa uvueghiembie hange nukhuvomba ikhinu khikyo ulukhololyo vakho khikhundemancha.
Ulwiedikho lulwa ulienalwo munumbula yakho luve lwakho pavulongolo pha Nguluve. Amebairkiwa umunu uviesikhihigha mumbwumi wa mwene khulimenyu lielyo alilyedikhe.
Hange yuywa sidiekhe ikwilamwa, angalye, ahieghiwe ukhuta alie nienongwa, ulwa khuva akhalile pasita kwidikha. Khila mbombo iyievombiwa vulusipali ulwiedikho wiva vutulanongwa.
Panogile yufwe tuliena makha tupiembe uvuvivi wa vavo valievavule amakha.
Khila munu mughati umwu panoghile ukhunoghele paninie uvyali pawipi nu mwene, upielile uvunonu akhavombeliwe.
Ulwa khuva uKlisiti vope sakhanoghele mwene. Nduvuliesimbiwe, “Amadusi uguvakhakhudukhile uve nikhaghupielile une.”
Ulwa khuva ghoni aghatalile ughusimbiwa ghasimbiwe ukhuta tumanyilaghe ufwe, ukhuta tuvinchaghe nukhununala nulunonchekhencho ulwa vusimbe tukhave ukhununala.
UNguluve uvyalie nuluhuvilo nukhununancha avatange ukhunchova pwu paninie yuomwe khwa yuomwe ukhungonga uKlisiti uYesu.
Khunumbula yeimo na khundamo guumo muve vakhughinia uNguluve Udada va Nkhuludeva veitu uYesu Klisiti.
Pwu mwupielilanilage yumwe khwa yumwe, nduvu uYesu Klisiti avupielile, ukhuta uNguluve aghiniwagwe.
Ulwa khuva ninchova niita uKlisiti avombikhe intangieli va kwiedihana ukhukhegheta pavuyielweli uwa Nguluve. Ukhuta nchidulukhe iendaghilo inchuvapokhile avadada veto,
hange ukhuta avanyampanji vamwiemikhaghe uNguluve khu khisa kya mwene. Nduvuliesimbiwe, “Ulwa khuva nilakhusana pa vanyapanji nune nielemba ilitawa lyakho.”
Hange ninchova, “Muhovokhaghe, mwievapanji, pwu paninie navanu avamwene.”
Hange, “Umwe mwievanyapanji, munghiniaghe unkhuludeva, umwe mwievanu mwivono mumwiedikhaghe.”
Hange u Isaya inchova, “Khila khumila ikhikho ikya Yese, umwene vyalaluta khulongoncha. Avanyapanji vu avanyapanji vikhunguvilagha.”
Umwene uNguluve vivaluhuvilo avadienche ulunonchehencho mukhwidikha, mughendelelaghe nduhuvielo, mu makha agha Mepo umbalanche.
Valukholo lwango nikhuvavula ukhuta nielumanyile ukhuva mudieghile ulughano. Mulienuluhala lwoni hange mukhiemanyile ukhuvungana.
Hange nikhuvasiembiela ukwietanga uluvafu ulwa kalata iyie, nikhuvakhumbusya khulusayo ulunupielile khwa Nguluve.
Ukhuva nive munu valutanghielo khuvanyapanji, nielievombele ielivangili ilya Nguluve imbombo iya vutekhenchi, ukhuva avanyapanji vave nekhelo iyiediekhiwe, yienga valanchiwe nu Mepo umbalanche.
Khumbe nienoghile ukwieghienia mwa Klisiti u Yesu pavulongolo pa Nguluve.
Ulwa khuva saniekhaghele ukhutambula eilimenyu lielyo savombile uKlisiti khu mbombo yango, avapanji viedikhaghe khumamenyu na khumbombo,
khumakha aghakhuvonesya ifidegho, mu makha agha Mepo umbalanche. Ukhuhuma khu Yerusalemu, na mundokhanji khanji, ukhudugha khu ililiko nimalile ukhulumbilila eilivangili ilya Klisiti khuvuvalanche.
Nienghetange ukhulumbilila ielivanghieli, nielekhe ukhulumbiliela upwu ilitawa ilya Klisiti vamalile ukhulitambula, ulwa khuva uyuninchengagha mundwuto ulwa munu uyuonghe.
Bakho nduvuliesimbiwe ukhuta, khuvala vavo savalie phulikhe ielimenyu ilya mwene vikhulievonagha, hange vavo savalumbielieliwe viekhulimanyagha.”
Inchi nchunchikhaviekhile ukhuta une vansighaghe ukwincha khulyumwe.
Ukhuva lino, nielievuvule unsiekhi khunu, hanghe iemyakha minghi nikhale nuvufumbwe uwakhwincha khulyumwe.
Unsiekhi gwoni ugwakhiva nieluta khu Hispania, (pwu yunikwincha khulyumwe) ulwa khuva nihuvila ukhuvavona umwe vunighenda nu khukheliekhiwa numwe, enumbula yango yighute khulyumwe padebe.
Leino niluta tasi ku Yerusalemu nikhavatange avanyapanji.
Ulwakhu panoghile khuvanu avakhu Makedonia nava Akaya ukhuvomba ukhuhanghilanila khuva vavalanche avaliekhu Yerusalemu vavo vaghanchu.
Ena, panogile, hange vavile nuonkhole khuvene. Ulwa khuva avanyapanji vahangile ukhuvomba imbo inchavene incha munumbula, panoghile ukhuvavombela imbombo inchavene incha mbielie.
Pwu ninghamale imbombo eiyo, nukhuviekha ikhimanyilo isekhe ieyo, nighendela khulyumwe, ukhuluta khu Hispania.
Une nilumanyile ukhuta nienhinche khulyumwe, nikwincha nikhuvagheghela ulusayo ulwa Klisiti.
Valukholo lwango, nikhuvadovela khu Untwa veitu u Yesu Klisiti, nulughano ulya Mepo, mwietangaghe pwu paninie nune ukhundovela khwa Nguluve.
Ukhuta niepokhiwe paninie navala avasavikwiedhikha khu Yudea, hanghe uvuvombeli wango uvunielienawo khu Yerusalemu wiedhiekhiewe na vavalanche.
Pwu nienche khulyumwe nuluhekhelo, nduvuinogwa uNguluve, pwu nikhaghatalukhe paninie numwe.
UNguluve uvalunonchehencho avinchaghe numwe mwevoni. Amina
Nikhuvapa umwe uFibi ulumkholo lwienyo umbombi va ntembiela iya khu Kenkrea,
mumwupilile munditawa ilya Ntwa. Nduvupanoghile mwievavalanche, mukhantanghe imbombo nchoni ienchakhiva inogwa ukhuta muntangaghe umwe. Ulwa khuva umwene akhale intanghili va vanu avingi, akhanangha nayune.
Mumponiaghe u Priska nu Akila, vavombaghe imbombo nune mwa Klisiti uYesu,
vakhiedikhe ukhughiediwa eimintwa khumbombo yango. Une nikhuvasana, saniekhuvasana ywone nie mwene naghiemipelela na vanyapanji voni.
Mumonehenchaghe nie ntembile iyielie munyumba yavene. Mumponie uEpanieto, ughane vangho, yuywa avile nekhelo ya Asia khwa Klisiti.
Mumponie uMariamu ivyahayiekhe eino khunongwa yeinyo.
Mumponie u Androniko Yunia, avamanyani vango vavo tukhakhunghiwe pwu paninie nune, vavo vakhabeliwe muvankhonghi, vuvakhale mwa Klisiti une vusanietengwiele.
Mumponie uAmpliato, ughane vango mu Ntwa.
Mumponie u Urbano, umbomba mbombo paninie nune mwa Klisiti.
Mumponie u Apele, umwene iediekhiwa mwa Yesu Klisiti. Mumonehenche na vanu avalimunyumba iya Aristobulo.
Mumponie u Helodiani, umanyani vango, muvaponie avanu avaliemunyumba eiya Nalkiso, vavo valie mu Ntwa.
Mumponie u Tlifaina nu Tlifosa, yuywa akhitangi mu Ntwa,
Mumponie u Lufo, uvyahaliwe nu Nunkhuludeva, nuvanina, yuywa vi jyuva vango nayune.
Mumponie u Asinklito, Flegon, Helme, Patloba, Helima, na valukholo lwango voni vavo valiepwu panienie na vene.
Mumponighe u Filologo nu Yulia, nu Nerea nu ng'anchave, nu Olimpa, na vavalanche voni vavo valiepwu paninie.
Mwieponighe pakhiefuva ikhighatalufu. Mumpelela gwoni ugwa Klisiti muvaponiage.
Valukholo lwango, nikhuvadova, mwielolehge khuvala avisonghelehania nie mbombo inchakhulemencha ukhusyetula ulumanyisyo ulumanyile. Muvinchaghe pavutali navo avanu avo.
Ulwa khuva avanu ava savikhumbombela Untwa veitu uYesu Klisiti, vivombele amatumbu ghavene vavo. Khumamenyu amadekhedekhe khanghe aghanoghile vuvikhesyova vene munumbula inchavanu avagholofu.
Ulwa khuva uwiedhiehinchi wienyo vufikhe khuvanu voni. Pwu niehovokha khulyumwe, hanghe ninogwa umwe muve vanu va luhala ukhuvomba imbombo ienonu, nukhuva vakhonyofu khumbombo imbivi.
UNguluve uvalunonchehencho vieikhumwibatagha undughu na mbievie pasi pamalunde ghienyo. Ulusayo lwantwa veito uYesu Klisiti nuvinchaghe paninie numwe.
U Timotheo, umbomba mbombo nune, ikhuvaponia, nu Lukio, nu Yasoni nu Sospeter, avamanyani vango.
Une, nie Teltio, nene nisiembile ibalula iyie, nikhuvaponia munditawa ilyantwa.
U Gayo, yuywa akhamokhile mu mpelela yoni ikhuvaponia. U Elasito, uvieilolela uvunchenge, ikhuvaponia, nayu Kwalto ulukhololwe.
(Ulusayo lwa Ntwa vetu uYesu Klisiti luvinchaghe numwe mwievoni. Ameni.”
Lino aghiniwagwe umwene uviikhuvapa amakha aghalihanile nielivangili ilyango ukhundumbilila uYesu Klisiti, ukhukhwanana nuluvonekhelo ulukhafihime lukhale khuvutitu ukhuhuma khatale ukhusila lusikhu,
lukhavonekha khusiekhi ughu khuvusiembe uwa vanyamalago, vukhavonekha khuvanyapanji voni ukhuta wanchovile uNguluve vakhusila lusikhu, ukhuta viedikhile ulwiedhiekho.
Vie Nguluve unyakhisa mwene, uvuntwa alienawo uYesu Klisiti, ukhusila lusikhu. Amina
Paulo, uveelangiwe nu Klisite Yesu ukhuva nsuhiwa khu lugano lwa Nguluve, nu Sosthene ulukholo lwetu,
khu mpelela ugwa Nguluve ugule khu Korinto, khu vavo vemekhiwe ndi tawa lya Yesu Klisite, vavo velangiwe ukhuva vanu vavalanche. Tukhovasimbela voni vavo viholetambula elitawa lya Nkhulude va vetu Yesu Klisite poponi, Nkhuludeva vavene nufwe.
Ulukhungu nu lulundamano luve khulyomwe ukhuhuma khwa Nguluve dada vetu na Nkhuludeva vetu Yesu Klisite.
Amanchova gooni nikhonsana uNguluve vango, khulyomwe ulwa khuva uluhungu lwa Nguluve yeyo u Klisite avapile.
Avavekhile ukhuva vakhavi munjila nchoni, mu njovele na masage gooni.
Avavekhile avakhavi, ukhuva vatangeli khwa Klisite ukhuta emekhiwe ukhuva va yelweli mu ndyomwe.
Ulwa khuva samsigalile khekongelwa fya mepo, ndu mlenuvonogwe uwa hugulila uluvonekhelo lwa Ntwa vetu Yesu Klisite.
Alavakhangancha umwe isikhu nchoni, msite ukhudukhiwa palinchuva lya Ntwa vetu Yesu Klisite.
U Nguluve anyakhesa yoywa avaelangile umwe ndulundamano lwa nswambe Yesu Kliste Untwa viitu.
Leno nikhovadova valokolo vangu numwe vakhancha vangu, mu litawa lya Ntwa vitu Yesu Klisite, ukhuta mwedekhe vuve vwusipali uvwusongelekhani khulyomwe. Nikhovadova ukhuta muve pupaninie nu uvunogwe.
Avanu avambujeenge uvwa Kloe vambolile ukhuta kuna mgawanyiko unaoendelea miongoni mwenu.
Vambolile ukhuta, “One nele va Paulo,” apange “One nele va Apolo”, apange “One nele va Kefa” apange “One nele va Klisite”.
Khukhuta u Klisite alepo pingi? Khukhuta u Paulo atoveleliwe pa khidaming'ani? apange mwaonchiwe khulitawa la Paulo?
Nikhondemya uNguluve ukhuta sanamwonche umunu uve avinchaga, nikhumbukha Krispo nu Gayo.
Ele polele ukhuta asipali uveyakheva inchova ukhuta mwaonchiwe khulitawa lango.
(Navonchinche avambujenge uvwa Stephania. Sanikhumbukha ukhuta namwonchiche umunu uveavenchaga).
Ulwa khuva, uKlisite saansukhe khukhuoncha, nasuhi khulumbilela elimenyu. Saansukhe khulumbelela khu mamenyu aga lukhala lwakhe munu, pwu amakha aga kidaming'ani khya Klisite gasite ukhukhenchiwa.
Ulwa khuva elimenyu lya kidaming'ani libediwa khu vavo vifwa. Khuvavo u Nguluve ikhovapokha, makha ga Nguluve.
Ulwa khuva yesimbiwe, “Yaninangania ulukhala lwa vamanyi. Yaninangania uvumanyi vwa vanyalukhala.”
Alendakhu umunu unyaluhala? Alendakhu umwembi? Alendakhu unchofi uva khelunga ehee? U Nguluve syaasyetwile ulukhala lwa khelunga ehe ukhuva vwukhonyofu?
Ukhuhuma nkhelunga khevile mu ndokhala lwa kyene savamanye uNguluve mbu khonyofu vwa vene uvwa khulumbelela nu khuvapokha vavo vikhwedekha.
Khu Wayahudi vivoncha ifikhwani fya khudega khu Wayunani vilonda ulokhala.
Tukhundo mbelela u Klisite yoywa khepencho khu Wayahudi nu khu Wayunani vokhonyofu.
Pwu khu vavo vaelangiwe nu Nguluve, ava Yahudi na ava Yunani, tukhondombela u Klisite nda amakha nu lukhala lwa Nguluve.
Ulwa khuva uvokhonyofu vwa Nguluve vule nu lukhala khu vanu, nu uvusitamakha uvwa Nguluve vule na makha ukhulotelela khu vanu.
Lolaga ulwelango lwa Nguluve khulifwe, luwaoho nuve vakhancha vango. Sa mle vingi yomwe mwale nu lukhala ulwakhe vwu munu. Sa mle vingi yomwe mwale na amakha. Sa mle vingi yomwe mwaholiwe nu uvuvakha.
Ulwa khuva u Nguluve akhalile ifinu ifikhonyofu ifya nkhelunga ili fisusiwe ifinya lukhala. U Nguluve akhalile ekhe vula makha khya nkelunga ukhukesosya ekhenya makha.
U Nguluve akhekhalile khekhyo khya pasi khekhyo khyabediwagwa nkhelunga. Afikhalile ifinu fifyo safyavaliwe ukhuva finu, nu khufivekha ifinu ifya gaalama.
Avombile evwo pwu ave asipali uvakhweyinula pamikho ga mwene.
Pwu ikhyakhevombile Nguluve leno mlegati mwa Klisite Yesu, yoywa avombikhe mmanyani ukhukhuma khwa Nguluve. Ale lweli khulyofwe, uvovalanche nu uvupokhi.
Inave uluvonekhelo, ndavovwa elimenyu linchova, “Uvikheginia, eginiage mu litawa lya ntwa.”
Ulunainchile khulyomwe valokholo na vakhancha vango, saninchile khumamenyu ga wegane nu ulukhala ndavovwa navalumbelile elweli eye fikhime eya Nguluve.
Nalamwile ukhusita ukhu khemanya khyokhyoni ulunale numwe apange u Yesu Klisite, nu umwene uveatesikhe.
Pwu nale numwe bila ya amakha, na mumbodwado, nu khutetema.
Elimenyu lyango nu hulumbelela khwango sakhwale mu mamenyu ga vwugane nu lukhala lwa khuva, gale ukhumbonesya umepo na amakha.
Pwu ulwedekho lwenyo yesite ukhuva mu ndukhala lwa vanu, love mumakha aga Nguluve.
Leno twenchova helukhala na avanu avavakha, syo ndukhala lwa khilunga ehe, apange avalongonchi ava misekhe ege, vavo vilota.
Ulwa khuva twinchova ulukhala lwa Nguluve mu yelweli yeyo eyefihiwe, ulukhala lulwa lufihime ulwa alokhalile u Nguluve vwosagefikhe emisekhe egya vuvalanche vweto.
Asikhili ondongonchi yeyone uvaemisekhe ege yuywa alumanyile ulukhala ulu, vale valumanyage emisekhe gela, ndalino savantesye Untwa va uvalanche.
Nda vovwa yesimbiwe, “Embombo nchicho lisikhuli embolokhuto eyepulikhe, amasago sagasage, imbombo nchincho Nguluve anchitesaninche khuvavo avaganile umwene.
Inchi ncho mbombo incho u Nguluve anchigubatwile khulyofwe khugendela umepo, ulwa khuwa umepo ikhongela khila khenu, na nchimbombo incha Nguluve.
Ulwa khuva veni agamanyile amasago ga munu apange u mepo va Nguluve.
Ulwa khuva satwaambelele emepo ya khelunga, u mepo uveakhomile khwa Nguluve, pwu tulumanye khu vwudekhe imbombo nchicho twambelile khwa Nguluve.
Twinchova amamenyu aga gago ulukhala lwa munu saluwesya ukhumanyisya gago u mepo ikhotumanyisya u mepo iganula amamenyu aga he mepo khu lukhala lwa mepo.
Umunu uvealevovole umepo sikhupela imbombo incha mepo va Nguluve, ulwa khuva ago gahekonyofu khumwene. Siwesya ukhugamanya ulwa khuva gimanye khekha he mepo.
Uva mepo ekhega imbombo nchoni, vope ikhegiwa na vange.
“Veni iwesya ukhugamanya amasago ga Ntwa, veni uveiwesya ukhumanyisya umwene?” Pwu tulenamasage ga Klisite.
Nayone, vwalokholo numwe vakhancha vangu, sananchove numwe ndukhuta mule vanu va mepo, ndavanu vwa mmbele. Nda avana avadebe mwa Klisite.
Nawanywesinche ulukhama sanavalesye enyama, ulwa khuva mwasigalile ukhulya enyama. Na leno msigalile.
Ulwa khuva umwe mle vya mbele. Ulwa khuva ekhefuule nu lweginio fivonekha khulyomwe. Pwu, samtama ukhukhongana nu mbele, pwu samgenda nda vanu?
Ulwa khuva yumo inchova, “Nikhonkhonga u Paul” Oyonge inchova ukhuta “Nikhomkhonga u Apolo,” samtama nda vanu?
Apolo veveni? nu Paulo veveni? Vwukhongi vwa yuywa mukhomwedekha, khila munu yoywa Untwa ampile ululagelo.
Une navyalile, u Apolo akhadudela amagasi, u Nguluve akha khuncha.
Leno sio uveavyalile, apange uveadudelelaga amagasi ale nekhenu khyokhyoni. Ulwa khuva u Nguluve uvefifikho nchiche.
Leno uveivyala nu uveidude lela amagasi vwoni valekhanile, pwu khela munu alakhombiwaga ukhokhongana ne mbombo eya mwene.
Ulwakhuva ufwe tulevavomba mbombo va Nguluve, umwe mle khyalo kya Nguluve mbujenge uwa Nguluve.
Ukhukhumana nu luhungu lwa Nguluve ulunepeviwe une nale fundi umbakha, navekhile unsingi, nu uyonge inchenga pakhyanya. Pwu unyakhunchenga avinchage nu lyunchi umwa khunchengela.
Ulwa khuva asikholi uyunge uviiwesya ukhunchenga unsingi ugunge ukhulutelela khu khugwa gunchengiwe gugwa ve Yesu Klisite.
Leno, enave yumo inchenga pakyanya nu lutalama, ikhela, amawe aga hela, amabekhe, elinyasi apange amani,
embombo ya mwene yivonekha, ndu muli ulya pamusi yalukhevonesya. Yayikhevonesya mumwoto. Umwoto gulagela uvwunonu vwa mbombo ya khela munu yeyo avombile.
Inave khyokyoni ekhyanchengile umunu khisigala, umwene alapata uluvonolo.
Ulwa khuva embombo ya munu yengavukhelele, ipata ehasara. Pwu umwene ipokhiwa, ndu khwepokha khu mwoto.
Samulumanyile ukhuta umwe mletembile ya Nguluve nu Mepo va Nguluve itama mugati mu ndyomwe?
Angave umunu ikhoyenanga etembile ya Nguluve ikhonanga umunu uywa. Ulwa khuva etembile ya Nguluve mbalanche, vovwa na yomwe.
Umunu alekhe ukhwesyova yoywa, inave uveavenchaga isaga ukhuta nyalukhala khu misekhe ege, ave ndu munu “Umpelwa” pwu iva nu lukhala.
Ulwa khuva ulukhala ulwa khelunga ekhe khumikho gaa Nguluve vupelwa, ulwa khuva yesimbiwe, “Yikhovibata avanya lukhala khuuvupelwa vwavo”
Untwa alumanyile amasage ga vanyalukhala ukhuta vukhonyofu.”
Umunu alekhe ukhweginekhencha uvumunu vwa mwene! Ulwa khuva ifinu fyoni fyenyo.
Angave ve Paulo, au Apolo, au Kefa, au ekhelunga ama uvutamo, ama uvwufwe ama ifinu ifyopofile, ama iviyakheva fivepo.
Fyoni fyenyo, umwe muleva Klisite va Nguluve.
U munu atuvalaghe ndeti ufwe ukhuta tulivavombi va Klisite na valoleli va wayelweli wa Nguluve.
Khuelie ekhinogiwa khudoleli ave va kukhuveliwa.
Khulyone khenu khedebe fineko nikhegiwa numwe uvukhegi uwa khemunu. Pwu sanikhe hega yune ni mwene.
Sanikhega yune nimwene, sio khukhuta une nene golofu. Ve Nguluve uvieghugega.
Pwu muleghe ukhunchova uvukhigi usikhi wusakhufiue, wuakhale ukhwincha Utwa. Aveigega ulumuli inogwa inogwa inchikhuhisi nukhusisimula uvunogwe vwu numbula. Pwu khila munu alapokhelaga uluginio lwa mwene ukhuhuma kwa Nguluve.
Lino, lukolo nuveng'a nchavago, yune nemwene nu Apolo nivombile inyiho inchi khwa ajili yenu. Nilumanyile ukhuta ukhuma khulyufwe muwesya ukhuukhumanye umwa khunchovela, “Muleghe ukukhuluta khuvulogolo vuwkhesimbiwe.” Pwu asikhuli umunu uyange uviekheginia pakyaya nine.
Pwu veni uveilola ukhuta satuhwanine na vange? Khekhi ukhyu linakyo ukhyosawambilile vuvule? Kama wambilile vuvule, kheki mukheginia wu samuvombile ewo?
Lino mlenafyo fyoni ufyo mughanogwa gwa! Ulu muvile nuvutayali mteginle ukhulogoncha nu khunchova khuliko ufyese! Lino nikhuvadovela ukhulongoncha vunonu ukhuta tulogonchage panie numwe.
Lino pwu nisaga u Nguluve atuvikhile ufye tuvasukhwa nukhutuvonesya uvusilelo vwa ndaba ugwa lulundamano ndavanu avakhegiwe ukhubudiwa. Tuvile nde sikuku khukheluga, khu va sung'wa na khuvanu.
Ufye tulivakonyofu kwa Klisite, umwe mulinekhisa kwa Klisite. Tulivadekhedekhe, umwe mle na makha. Mdwadiwa, ufwe tubediwa.
Mpaka lino tulinenjala nekyumila, tulivanchila mienda, tulavanchila vutamo.
Tuvomba embombo na magha, na mavokho geto yufwe, wutubediwa, tukhuvasaya, wututesegha, tukhwumilila.
Vwa tudukhiwa, twivuncha khuvudekhedekhe. Tuvile, tuvaliliwa ukhuta tubeliwe nekhelunga, tulikhakha la kumbombo nchoni.
Sanisimba inogwa enchi uvakoncha isoni umwe, nikhuvakilivula umwe khama vana vago yumwe nivaganile.
Ndamugave mlinava mwalimu vingi makumi elfu khwa Klisite, mnchila va baba vingi. Ulwa khuva kwa Yesu Klisite ukhugendela ilimenyu.
Nikhuvadova mg'ogage une.
Vulevule nasukhile u Timotheo, khuliumwe, vagane vago na mwivana mwivekhe kutwa. khuvakumbusya injila nchago khwa Klisite, nduwunimanyisya khuniipelela.
Lino avange vig'eginia, wovivomba ukhuta sanilincha khulyume.
Nikhwincha khulyume usikhi usupi, u Dada ag'egane. Pwu nikhulumaya sio mameye gavene vavo vikheginia, pwu nilo la amakha gavene.
Ulwa khuva uludeva lwa Nguluve salwiva mumamenyu, wiwa mumakha.
Mwinogwa khikhi? Ninche khulimwe nulubinki au nulugano, ne numbula iya khisa.
Tupulikhe undomo ukhuta khulivuligu panie numwe, uvuligu vuvwa vusikhuli khuvanu avapanchi. Tulikhe ukhuta umunu yumo egona nu dala va babaye.
Umwe mukheginya! mulekhele ukhosu suvala? Ula avyavombile ewo akhenchiwe pagati palyomwe.
Ndanive nisipali paliumwe khembili pwunde numwe khunumbula, nimalile ukhuhegiga umwene uviavombile ewo, nifwana ukhuta pwuniele.
Wumulundamana panie munditawa lya nkhuludeve vetu u Yesu Klisite, nenumbula yango pwuyile khumaka ga Ntwa veto u Yesu Klisite, nimalile ukhungiga umunu uywa.
Nemalile ukhugotola umunu uyu khutavangwa ukhuta umbeli gwa mwene agunag'anie, ukhuta inumbula ya mwene yepone kulinchuva ilya Dada.
Ulwiginio lwenyo sio lunonu. Samulumanyile uvuvivi uvudebe vunag'a ilitonya ga lyoni?
Mwisukhage yumwe mwevene ilitonyaga ilya khatale, pwu live litonyaga ilipya, pwu muve ndu kate ukhusakilulile.
Ulwa kuva, Klisite ve ngosi yetu amalile ukhuhenjiwa. Pwu tukhelage wutwilya, ukheute ukhululile sangu nongiwa ulewa.
Nasimbile ebarua yangu ukhuta mlekhe ukhuhagilikhanya na valigu.
Sanita avaligu avakhilunga ekhi, na vanyavunogwena avanyang'anyi avitekhela navo, pwu yinogiwa mukhege mukhelunga.
Pwu lino nikhuvasimbila mleghe ukhwetimbulania na vitambuliwa ndugu nu ng'ancha vango kwa Klisite, pwu itama mumboligu nu kunogwa, au undiasi, nu vitekhela kumisetano, unyama dusi nu ganchi. Mlekhe ukhulya nave umunu uvandavule.
Lino pwu nitegula ndenti ukhu vahega avalikhunji khupelela? Pwu umwe samukha vahege avali mughati mpelele?
U Nguluve ekhuvakhiga avali khunji. “Mug'enchage umunu umbivi mugati molyomwe.
Umunu yomo angave nulitatizo nunine, inogwagwa ukhuluta ulibalasa lyelyo vanchila nuvolyeli bila yahuluta khovavo vikhwesaya?
Samulumanyile ukhuta avakhelesite vovikhega ekhelunga? Inave mwikhega ekhelunga, samuwesya ukhumula amambo gagosia ga muhimu?
Samulumanyile ukhuta aya tukhega ava malaika? Mukheasi elekhu saidi, tuwesya ukhwamula amambo aga maisha aga?
Khama tuwesya ukhuhega amambo ga maisha aga, khama tuwesya ukhuhela inopigwa khuvaiosa vihesaya?
Ninchova aga khusoni nchenyo asipali unyalukhara khata yumo amambo vonunu ekhekolo nu khekolo?
Ulya khuva umuyevelile isalunchi ukeresite yumo iluta khulibalasa tena nukelesite uyunge, ninongwa incho nchivekhiwa khungega nungwa incho nchivekhiwa khungega hungwa uyusikhwamini!
Uvoyelweli ukhuta khulinama tatisyo uvakhelesite agaletile uvo sumbufu khulyomwe. Khehi uhutesehaga khumavivi? Khehi mukhwedeha ukhusyoviwa?
Leno muvombile imbivi nukhusiva avange, nawo wuwa kaha navadada venyo!
Samulumanyili ukhuta avanchila woyelweli savakhanchitame uvutawala wa Nguluve? Mteukhwamini uvodesi. Avamalaya, avavikhwabudu ekhe hwani, uwoligu, ukhulawiti,
ukhunywa, ekhyoyo, uwogaji, avipoha, avavidukha-asikholi hata yomo khulyomwe uyakheva inchitawa uvotawala wa Nguluve.
Navo vakhavile baadhi yawo yumwe. Ulyahova tayali mwesuhile, tayali mwesuhile, ululyokho va tayali mtengiwe nu Nguluve, ulya khuva muvombikhe uvoyelye khuvolongolo kya Nguluve khulitawa lya daada u Yesu Klisite numbalanche u Nguluve veto.
“Ifinu vyoni sawa khulyone”, ulyakhova siohela khenu helene faida. “Une sanehatawaliwo na hemo khaifyo.
“Chakula ni kwa ajili ya tumbo, na tumbo ni kwa ajili ya chakula,” lakini Mungu atavitowesha vyote. Mwili haujaumbwa kwa ajili ya ukahaba, badala yake, mwili ni kwa ajili ya Bwana, na Bwana atauhudumia mwili.
UNguluve akhatonchosinche uNguluve ayikholochusya nayoeye khungu incha mwene.
Samulumanyile ukhuta emivele gwenyo ilongine nuu Nguluve muwesya ndaheki ukhuhumya fiungo ifya Klisite, nukhuluta khulunganisya nu kahaba? Haiwezekani!
Samulomanyile ukhuta uyilonga na nu kahaba iva mbele gomo nu mwene ndulule nchovile elimenyu, “Vavele viva imbele gomo.”
Uyilongana nu Nguluve iva ivanu mepo yumo popaninye inave.
Munyile uvuligu! “Khela munu uyivomba imbivi khonji khumbele gwa mwene. Umunu ivomba imbivi khumbele gamwene.
Samulumanyile ukhuta imevele nginyo ukhuta nyumba ya mepo umbalanche, uyitama igati ndimwe, yuywa mkhapewiwe ukhuhuma khwa Nguluve? Samlomanyile ukhuta sio yomwe?
Mukhagoliwe khugalama, pomuginye u Nguluve khu mivele khenyo.
Khomamba agamunyandehile: Khulenusehe gogwa inonu ugosi asite ukhugana nudala va mwene.
Ulyahuva khungelo inchange incha voligu khela igosi avenula vamwene, nakhela idala avenu gosi vamwene.
Ugosi yeganiwe ukhupa udala uwo yelyeli ua ndoa, velevote udala khuogosi.
Sio udala uyavile nuvutavala khumbili gwa mwene, nugosi. Velewote ugosi vope aliwowote uwatawala khumbele gwa mwene, udala alenagwo.
Msite uhwimana wamwigona, mwedehanage khusehe ugogu khueleveha. Muwembe evo ili mpate uskhe gwa khwesa ya, pamuwesya ukhukilivokhela nila popaninye, ili undugu asite ukhuvagela khwahosita okhu va sehe.
Mnchuvage amambo aga khohiari nasiyo amri.
Ninoga khela munu ave ndune umunevelile. Khela munu alenembombo ukhuma khwangolove, Uyu alinembombo yela, nuyu alenembo yela.
Avasavatoliwe avafyele nichova nita, lenanu ukhusita khuvene vasigale bila khotoliwa, umune velile one.
Ulyakhuva samuwesya ukhwesiga, vinogiwa ukhutoliwa, yivahoba huvene ukhutoliwa kholiho uvanetamaa.
Poleno vavo vatoliwe nihuva pa urulagelo, sio une vengolove. “Udala asite ukhutengana nu gosi vamwene.”
Ungetenge ukhuhuma khugosi vaha, asigale velevote bila ukhutaliwa au apatane nu gosi. Nu “gosi asite ukhupa udala etaraha.
Khovavo vosigile, ninchovo - one, sio Unguluve ukhuta umunu yeya ni uyalenudala yuywa sio mwedesi alisehe ukhutama na we, sinogiwa vasite uhuchana.
Udala uyalenogosi yuywa sionuve elesi, kama alisihe nave, asite ukhundeha.
Khugosi uyusisayiwa khusababu ya ngosi uyale nuwedesi, avana venyo viva sio vanonu, uwoyeleli asayiwe.
Ulyohova uninye uyancila wedesi angakheye alute, khu namna eye, ukaha au udada sifungwa ni fiapo ifyo. UNguluve atwelangile tutamage nu amani.
Ulumanyile ukhuta, ukhombonaga ugosi? labuda ikhomwohola udala?
Khela munu atame amasha uNguluve ulyavapile, khela munu uNguluve umwa muolngile umwene, eye latiba yangu khutembile nchoni.
Pwale ayavile ataheliwe avile alangiwe muwedesi? Asite ukhugela ukhuhecha et'ohara ya mwene, pwale yeyoni uyelangiwe muwedesi satahiriwe sinogiwa ukhutakhiriwa.
Khude uyataheliwe nayoywasataheliwe elitaso lesiholi. Khehyo khilina matatisyo ukhutii ululayelo lya Nguluve.
Khela munuasigale nuwedesi uwelangiwe nu Nguluve khuwedesi.
Ukhale suhiwa uNguluve wakhela ngile? Usite ukhusaga ungave wiwesya uva huru, vomba ewo.
Khuyumu uyelangiwe nu Nguluve isukhwa, munu huru kho Nguluve. Kama ula, yomo, uyavile huru ulelangiwe isuhiwa va Nguluve.
Tayari mgoliwe khusamani, msite ukhuva vasuhiwa vavanu.
Ndawa kaha na vadada vango, khu maisha goni khila munu weto. Welangiwe khuwedesi, tunchige velevote.
Khuvavo savatolile khabisa, nulivovole amadakha ukhuma khu kinya, ulyahuva nuhuvapa amaoni gango umuavile. Khulusikhelo lya daada ululukhwaminekha.
Ponisaga evokhujili ya wusumbufu, lunonu ugosi asigale umwavelile.
Udendeliwe nu dada huheapo ikya ndoa? Usite ukhunogwa uvohuru ukhuhuma, ulenowohuru ukhuhuma khudala? Usite ukhulunda ndala.
Ungatole savombile imbivi udala angasite ukhuteliwa ivasavombile imbivi, avivona vipata uvosumbu wowoni, nune nikhovepusya.
Niachova nita, ukaha nu dada, usekhe isupi ukhuma nukhundwelela, vawovavile na vadala vatamage kama ndava.
Voni avavile nu huzuni vafyane kama valevovole ekhuzuni, voni avakhowikhe, vavovigola ekhenu khokhonu, kama savakhatavale khyokhyoni.
Navoni avavikhangayekha nukhelunga, vavenchage kama savakha ngayekhe nuvene, ulwa khuva sagisila.
Ninogwa mvenchage tayali nu vusumbufu woni. Ugosi uyusatolile ivomba ifinu ifikhungusu uNguluve, khujili ya uginya umwene.
Ulya khuva ugosi uyatolile, ivomba amambo ga khelunga, khujili yakhundesya udala.
Vagavanyikhe. Udala uyasatoliwe nu ubikila ivomba ifinu ukhusu uNguluve, enamna ya khyetenga nukhwesesya numbele ne numbula. Udala uliotoliwe ivomba n'chakelonga khujili ya khun'gowasya ugosi va mwene.
Nichova evo khu faida yenyo yumwe, sanivekha utego khulyomo. Ninchova ewo khuwo yelyeli, ili mwevekhe vavalafu khwa Nguluve bila khekwaso khyokhyoni.
Khu munu uyivona sikhombombela vononu ungen'cha uyusamanyile ugosi va mwene, ulya khuva isia nchamwene nchilinngovu, indehe alolo vope umwinogwela sio mbivi.
Ulya khuva avambile uwamsi yesikholi, uhuva iwesy ukhunulila ehamu ya mwene, ivomba vononu ukhusita ukhutola.
Khu elyo, uyihotola un'genja uyusamanyile ugosi ivamba vanonu, nuyuywa iyusitola uyusinogwa ukhutola, ivamba vononu fincho.
Udala apinyiwe nu gosi wokafu, ugosi angafye alehulu ukhutoliwa nu gosi yoyoni, nindimenyu lya ngolovetwu.
Ungave muwamunchi wango, ivanulukhekele liwahwutilela angatamage umwavelile. Na yune nisaga ukhuta nilinu mepo va Nguluve.
Vulevule ifyakhulya ifivahuminche isadaka ukhuva khikhwani: Tulumanyile ukhuta “Ufwe twivoni tulinuluhala.” Uluhala luleta ulwivono, hange ulugano lunchenga.
Ingave umunu uvavenchage ita akhimanyile mkhinu ikyavenchage salumanyile umuyunogiwa ukhu lumanya.
Ulwa khuva yingave umunu umo aganile nukhuvagana nu khugana u Nguluve umunu uyu vamanyile na vope.
Lino khumbombo iyakhulya ifyakhula ifi va huminche isadakha ni ikhikhwani: twalumanyile khuta “Khikhwani syokhinu mukhilunga ikhi.” Ulwakhuva asikhuli uNguluve nu vyaliyumu.”
Ulwa khuva avingi avilangiwe khuminguluve igyanekhelo khukhyanya na mukhilunga, ndavuvalivo “avanguluve avatwa vavingi.”
“Ingave khulyufwe khwale uNguluve yumo uvita vidada, veto vyoni fihumile khumwene nufwe tutama khumwene, nutwa u Yesu uKlisite ulwa khuva ifinu fipeliwe nu mwene ukhuhuma khumwene pwale na yufwe putule.
Lino uvumanyi uwa, wasikhuli mugati mwavimunu. Ulwakhuva avange vikhihanja ulwisayo ulwa fikhwani ukhuhuma khatale, lino vilya ivyakhulya ifyo ukhuta khinukhekhi ikhihuminche ifyavupe ni khikhwani. Amasago ga munu uyu giva sagidihine nave ukhuta alye amasago aga ujaji nje nu vujilamakha.
Ulwakhuva ikhyakulyi sakhikhavonekhe ukhuta kya Nguluve. Ufwe twale vavivi lweli ukhuta tulekhe ukhulya, nu vunonu woni vutulile.
Muvenchage nu luhala ulwa khuva uvugatalufu wito vulekhe ukhuva vugatancho nu vupepe khulwidikho.
Iga usage ukhuta umunu uyu avonikhe, nuve viwale, nuve viwale nu vumanyi, wilya ikhya khuliya nu khuhekhela ikhikhwani. Amasago genyo umunu uyu sagikhiwidikhila vulevule nu mwene ukhulya ifinu ifihumile khunekhelo ne khikhwani.
Ulwa khuva uvumanyile uwayilweli wakho ukhuhuma khuvutengulelo uwa khikhwani, udimi nu ng'inja vakho upepe, uva Klisite afwule ukhuyancha ikhilunga.
Upuvuvomba imbivi nu ng'anchovo nu khulema ncha amasago gakho nu vupepe numbula u Klisite.
Ulwa khuva ikhyakhulya khivekha ukhulemancha ung'anchavo, khisita khulya inyama khange, nilekhe ukhumbikha ung'anchavango mundugelo.
Une sanilimbwa vukhe? Sa nielinkhugwa? Une sanambone uYesu Utwa vito? Umwe samlisekhe incha mbombo yango khutwa?
Ingave une nilinsukhwa khuvange, ukhuta usukhwa kulyumwe. Ulwa khuva ukhwiyumilincha nu sukwa vakho khumbombo incha Ntwa.
Uvu vuvutangili wango avikhu ndolela une.
Je tulivuvule uvulweli uwa kulya nu ndomo?
Tulivuvule uvulweli uwakhutola udala uvikhwidikha aga vivomba avakhongi avange, na avalukholo khutwa, nu Kefa?
Une ni mwene nu Barnaba twitunogilwe ukhuvomba imbombo?
Veni uvakhuvomba imbombo ndu nsikhali khu mbombo incha mwene yujuwa? Veni uvivyala uvundoni nu khusita ukhulya isekhe ncha mwene? Veni uvisima ikhipuga alekhe ukhunywa ulukama?
Lino ninjova aga uvuvaha uwavimunu? Indagilo sajinjova aga?
Ulwa khuva nchandikhiwe indagilo nu Mose, “Ulakhunga isenga khundomo vuilya ifinu.” Lweli ukhuta uNguluve isagila isenga?
Lino sinchova aga khulyufwe? Yisimbiwe khulyufwe, ulwa khuva umwene uviilima ifinu yinogiwa ukhulima nukwiyumilincha nukhubena kwa vugolola singo nu khulundamana uvubeni.
Ingave twavyalile ifinu ivya munumbula njinyo lino! Ilimenyu ilivaha khulyumwe tungabene ifinu ifyambili ukhuhuma khulyumwe?
Ingave avange vapatile uvulweli uvu, khuhuma khulyumwe, llino ufwe, pu ufwe satulutilile? Ulwakhuva satwadaye uvulweli. Lino twaikhasinche ni mbombo njoni incha khuhiga ilivangili lya Klisite.
Satwalumanye twivoni avavombaga imbombo mutembile vigaviliwa ikhwa khulya ukhuhuma mutembile? Samlumanyile ukhuta voni avivomba imbombo khunekhelo, vipata fidebe ifivihumya khunekhelo?
Ulwa khuva Utwa alagile ukhuta twivoni avavikhuvavula ilimenyu vinogwa vatamage mukhilunga ukhuhuma mulivangili.
Lino sanidaya uvulweli vwoni saniviga aga goni ukhuta livombekhe khulyune. Huba nifwe ni munu khulikho ukhuhangaikha nu khukwiginya khulyune.
Ulwa khuva nilumbilila ilivangili, nilivuvule uvufubwe uwakhwiginya vimivomba. Ni saga ningave sanilumbilila ilimenyu.
Ni ngave nivomba ukhuva khwigana nilapata uluding'olila ulwa vumi. Lino ningave nivomba khisita khwigana bakho nilyeni mbombo iyakhuva nu vunyamalago.
Lino uvunogwe wango vuvulikhu? Ukhuva vunilumbilila, yunihumya ilimenyu ilya vuvule ikhisita ukhuvomba nu wajelweli wango uvunilwavo mundivangili.
Ulwa khuva niligatalufu khuvoni, navombile ukhuva isikhwa khuvoni nu khuvupila vavingi.
Une ni Nyahudi nale ndu Nyahudi, ulwa khuva ava vali pasi pa ndagilo, nale ndumunu yumo imbene pasi pa dagilo nivibate avalipasi pa ndagilo. Navombile evo ulwakhuva une nimwene sanale pasi pa ndagilo.
Anale khunche khu ndagilo, nale paninye nuva khunche khundagilo, ulwakhuva une ni mwene, sanale khunji khu ndagilo ya Klisite. Nukhuvibata avalipasi pa ndagilo.
Avakhungiwe nikhava ikhugwa ukhuta niwibate avakhugwa. Nivile mumbombo nchoni na vanu voni, khu njila nchoni nibate ukhuvapokha avange.
Une nivomba imbombo nchoni khulivangili, ukhuta nupilile nukhusayiwa. Pakhunyila vinyila voni pwale uvilongola nu nyakhukhava ulusayo alyuma? Lino nyila imbilo mwuopilile ulusayo.
Hamjui ya kuwa katika mbio wote washindanao hupiga mbio, lakini apokeaye tuzo ni mmoja? Hivyo pigeni mbio ili mpate tuzo.
Uvamikhino ikhisiga khumbombo nchoni avo vivomba evo ukhuta vupilile uludulikho ululunangikha, ulwa khuva ufwe twinyila ukhuta twuopilile uludulikho ulusalunangikha.
Ulwa khuva une sanimyila nu khutoana imbanja incha mepo.
Lino nikhugatancha umbili gwango nu khuguvikha ukhuta isuhiwa nukhuta ningamale ukhuvalumbilila avange, une ni mwene nilavenchaga vakhubeliwa.
Ninogwa umwe mlumanye vavaha veito na vahancha veito, valukololweito ukhuta avadaada yeito valenasi pamaveingo na vooni vagendile munyanja.
Vooni vaonchiwe vave va Mose mugati mumaveingo na mugati munyanja,
vooni valiile eikhyakhulya khilakhila eikhya mepo.
Vooni vanywile amagasi galagala aga mepo. Ulwakhuva vanywile ukhuhuma muliwe lya mepo leilyo lya vakongaga, nei liwe eilyo lyale vi Klisite.
Pu uNguluve sanogwe fincho uwingi vwavo, ni mifimba gyavo gyaihasinie mundunkunyu.
Pu aga gooni gaale khihwani khyieto ukhuta ufwe tulekhe uva vaanu vakhunogwa imbivi nduvu avene umuvagahile.
Mulekhe ukhwisaya mufihwani, nduvu avange umuvagahilaga, eiyie yeivile nduvuyiesimbiwe, “Avanu vatamaga pasi vale khulya nukhunywa puvaleikhwima khwinema mbunogwe vuligu.”
Tulekhe ukhuvomba uvumalaya ndavingi mwavo umuvagahilaga, vakhafwa eisikhu yeimo avanu amalongo ga veili na vaalufu vadatu savuli ya eiyo.
Hange tulekhe ukhugela uKlisite nduvu avingi mwavo umuvavombeile vakhanangiwa ni njokha.
Pu khange mulang'utaga, nduvu avingi muveene vang'utaga nukhunangiwa nu suhwa vavufwe.
Pu ago gavoombikhe ndi khihwani khulyufwe. Gakhasimbiwa ukhuta gatuvungage ufwe - ni misileilo gya khatale.
Puleino ula uveikhivona eimiile ave miho ayivookha igwa.
Lusikhuli ulugelo lulwa luvafikile umwe ulusa luleimumbu nchoovele wa vanu. Pu uNguluve igolofu. Sakhavalekhe ukhuluteila amakha geinyo. Paninie nulugelo umwene ikhuvapa undyango gwakhuhumila, ukhuta muve na makha gakhwikangancha.
Puleino vagane vango, mkimbile inyeisayo ncha fihwani.
Ninchoova avanya luhala, pu nekhe mulumule pa leila eilyuninchova.
Eikhikombe khya lusayo eikhyutwisaya, salyupei leilo lwa kiisa gwa Klisite? Eikhisyesye khila eikhyutumanyula, salyupeileilo lwa mbeili gwa Klisite?
Ulwa khuva eikhisyesye khilikhimo, ufwe twetulivingi tuliembeili ngumo. Ufwe tweivooni tukhyupeila eikhisyesye khila khimo pupaninie.
Muvalole avanu vamu Israeli: Pu! Vala vooni avavilya eisadakha ya nekhelo savikhyupeileila pa nekhelo?
Pu ninchoova khinukhi leino? Ukhula eikhihwani khinu? Ewo ukhula eikyakhulya eikhyukhihumenchiwe eisadakha khukhihwa ni pu khinu?
Puleino niita pa finu fila ifyuvihumya eisadakha avanu avakaya avankilunga, pu ukhuta vihumya ifinu ifi khumanguluve pusavi humya kwa Nguluve. Nune saninogwa umwe ukhuva pupaninie na manguluve!
Pusamwegela ukhunyweela eikhikombe khya Twa nie khikombe eikhya manguluve.
Ewo putukhupela Utwa uluvaavo? Tuleinamakha ukhulutiila umwene?
“Ifinu fyoni finogelanile,” puleino safinonu fyooni. “Ifinu fyoni finogelanile,” puleino safyoni fikhuvanchenga avanu.
Asikhuli na yumo uvi ale eilonda amanonu gamwene mwene. Puleino, khila munu ale alondaye amanonu aga nine.
Pusamwigela ukhulya ikhinu khila ukhyukhigu nchiwa khusokhoni pasita khuvuuncha -vuuncha savuli ya nyievonilo.
Ulwakhuva “eikhilunga khyuma khya Twa, ifyufi deigile.”
Nu munu uveisikhwi deikha anaveilange khwilya numwe mwinogwa ukhuluta, mulinchage khikyooni eikhyuikhuvapa khisita khwivuncha einyievonelo.
Pu leino umunu angavavule, “Eikhyakhulya eikhi khuhumile ni sadakha ya nekhelo ya vapanchi,” mulekhe ukhulya. Pu eiye savule ya ula uvie avavuliele, hange savuli ya nyievonelo.
Na yune saniita einyievonelo nchienyo, pu einyievonelo ncha incha yunge. Pakhuva khiikhi uvulegefu wango vuheigiwe ni nyievonelo incha munu uyunge?
Nei ngave une nivombeila ikyakhulya savuli ya lusano, pukhiikhi neidukhiwe khu khinu khiikhyo neisanile khueikyo?
Pu leino khyukhyooni eikhyumwilya ewo eikhyumwinywa ewo khyukhyooni eikhyumuvoomba, muvoomba gooni savuli ya kudwaadwa wa Nguluve.
Mulekhe ukhuvayancha ava Yuta ewo avayunani ewo upeleila gwa Nguluve.
Mugelage nduvu une neigeila ukhuvahovosya avanu vooni khumbombo nchooni. Sanilonda uvukavi wango yune pu uwavingi. Na yune nivoomba ewo ukhuta mkave uvupokhi.
Mung'onge une nduvu nikhukonga uKlisite.
Leino nikhuvaginia ulwa khuva eimivombele nduvuniavapeile umwe.
Leino ninogwa mulumanye ukhuta uKlisite veitwe gwa gosi yuyooni na vope ugosi veitwe gwa daala, nukhuta uNguluve veitwe gwa Klisite.
Khila gosi uvidoova, ewo uveihumya amalago vuagubeikhe utwe ikhu gukoncha isoni utwe gwa mwene.
Puleino udala yuyooni uvidoova ewo uvei humya amalago vu utwe gwa mwene gulipavuvule ukhugukoncha isoni utwe gwa mwene. Ulwa khuva puyiehwanine nukhuta aketiwe.
Pu eingave udala safwalile utwe gwa mwene, pu akete inchweili ncha mwene nchive supi. Ulwa khuva yeingave ncha soni udala ukhuke inchwiele ewo ukhugida pu agubeikhe utwe gwa mwene.
Ulwa khuva sayienogile ugosi ukhugubeikha ufwe gwa mwene, khihwani khya vudwaadwa wa Nguluve. Pu udala veivudwaadwa wa gosi.
Ulwa khuva ugosi sa humile nu dala, pu udala veiahahumile nu gosi.
Hange ugosi sapeliwe savuli ya dala. Pu udala veiapeliwe savuli ya gosi.
Eiyei khumene udala panogile ukhuva khimanyielo khya vulongonchi pafwe gwa mwene savuli ya vasuhwa.
Hata ewo, khutawa, udala uvyaliemwene mwene khinchila gosi asikhuli, na yugosi ukhuva khinchila dala.
Nduvuyielievyo udala ahumile khugosi, ni finu fyoni fihuma khwa Nguluve.
Muhegage yumwe: Te! lunonu udala adoovage uNguluve vu utwe gwa mwene sagafwalile?
Te nuvumanyi uwakhuholiwa savukhuvamanyisya ukhuta ugosi angave ni ninchweili inali nchasoni khumwene?
Te navuvumanyi uwavuholwa savukhuvamanyisya ukhuta udala angave ni nchwieli inali wimekhiwa khumwene? Ulwakhuva apevilwe inchwiele inali nchiila ndu mwenda ugwa khufwala.
Puleino umunu anave inogwa ukhubeigana pa eili, ufwe tuleivanchila ncheila eiyeinge, nagimipe lela gya Nguluve gwope.
Mundageilo inchikonga, unesanikhuvaginia, manya upumulundamana, samlundamana mbukavi wa lweideekho pu mulundamana mbufuve wa lweideekho.
Puleino, nipuleikha ukhuta upumulundamana mutembile, pumulekhehana yumwe, khwa yumwe, uounu nikhweideikha.
Ulwa khuva lusutu ukhukatukhilanila yumwe khwa yumwe, ukhuta vala vavo veideikhiwe vamanyiekhikhe khyulyumwe.
Pakhuva vumulundamana, ukhwyumwilya sakhya khulya khyantwa.
Vumwilya khila munu ilya eikhyakhulya khya mwene yuywa avange vuvakhale ukhulya. Pu uyu aleinienchala, nuyu agalile.
Pu muleivanchila kaya inchakhuleila nu khunywela? Pu mukhugu beida upelela ngwa Nguluve nukhuvafweeyula vavo valeinchila khinu.
Pakhuva niaupeile ukhuhuma khuntwa, khila eikhyu niavapiele umwe ukhuta untwa uYesu, ikilo yiela yiela upuangalandu khiwe, akhalola eikhisyesye.
Aviile eisayile, akhamenyula nukhuta, “Ugu gu mbeili ngwaango unyu nikhuvapa umwe. mgahage vulevule mumbukumbuhincha wango.”
Pu vulevule akhatola eikhikombe vavile valile, pu akhata eikhikombe eikhi yu ndagano eimya mu kisa gwango. Pu mugahage vulevule eimiseikhi gyooni vumwinywa, vu mukhung'oumbukha.”
Usiekhe vumwilya eikhi syesye eikhi nukhunywela, pumukhuvunchova uvufwe wantwa impakha yakhiva ikhwincha.
Pu leino khila munu uveilya eikhisyesye nukhunywela eikhikombe eikyo eikhya ntwa umusayinogiwa, pu iva eipeliile uvunangi wa mbeili nukisa gwa Ntwa.
Umunu eivolunche yuywa taasi, puleino alye eikhisyesye, nukhukhinywela ikhikombe.
Ulwa khuva uveilya nu khunywa khisita khwi vuuncha munumbula nu khwilola umbeili, pu iva ilya nu khunywa uvuheigi wa mwene yuywa.
Eiyie yu savuli avanu vingi mulyumwe vatamu nukhulegeha legeha, na vaninie mulyumwe vafwile.
Pu tungeivunche yufwe satukhahegiwe.
Leino uputuhigeiwa nuntwa, lwiva lwakhu kilivukhila ukhula tulekhe ukhuheigiewa pupaninie nikhilunga.
Pu leino valukolo lwango, upumuluundamana ukhuta muve pakhulya muyuleilanilage.
Umunu angave nei njala, alinchage khukaya ya mwene, ukhuta vu mukhwaganila yeisite ukhuva vuheigi nukhukongana ni mbombo inchinge ugu musimbile yunikhuvavula yakhiva nikhwincha.
Ukhukongana nifikungilwa fya munumbula valukolo lwango saninoywa msite ukhulumanya.
Mulumanyile ukhuta upu mukhale vakaya nukhagende lelaga ukhukonga ifihwani ifipunjiwe, khunjeila nchu nchooni mukhalongonjiwaga nincho.
Pu leino ninogwa mulumanye ukhuta asikhuli na umo uveinchova mufikungilwa ifya mepo va Nguluve, umunu vuita, “UYeisu akotoliwe.” Asikhuli uviyakhiva iita, “UYeisu viNtwa epo yinave mwa mepo umbalanche.
Leino khulifikungilwa ifilipapingi pu umepo vei yula yula.
Pu khuli vutangeili levulei papingi, pu uNtwa alei yula yula.
Pu khulei mbombo inchili papingi, uNguluve alei yula yulauveikhunchivomba imbombo nchooni muvooni.
Pu khila munu ikhyupeilila uluvonekhelo lwa Mepo mbu kavi wa vooni.
Pakhuva umunu yumo apevilwe nu mepo elimenyu eliavumunu pu uyunge elimenyu eilya vumanyi khu Mepo yulayula.
Pu uyunge ikhupa ulweidukho khu Mepo yuywa ula, na khuyunge ekhikungilwa eikya khuponia khu Mepo umo.
Khuyunge emivombele eminonu, nu yunge uvunyamalago, na uyunge ukhuganulania eiMepo kyunge ukhuganula einjo veele.
Pu uMepo alei yula yula uveivomba inchi nchooni ukhupa khila munu ikhikungilwa ukhukongana neikhiegelelo khyavulamunchi wa mwene yuywa.
Ulwakhuva yieleihine ndumbeile gumo nagyoope gulienifimagikha fingi, ifimagikha fyooni fya mbeili gula gula vuvavwa nayu Klisite.
Pakhuva mu Mepo umo ufwe tweivooni twa onchiwe ukhuva eimbeile ngumo, ukhuta tulei va Yuta, ama vayunani, tuve tulivavanda ama tuleivalegefu pu tweivooni Twa nywesiwe uMepo umo.
Ulwa khuva umbeili sagulikhimagikha khimo pufingi.
Pu khingave eikhilunde khiita, “Ulwa khuva une sameili khivokho, pusanilikhimagikha khya mbeili, pusayipela ukhuta khive sakhimagikha khya mbeili.
Pu eingave eimbulukhutu yiita, “Ulwa khuva une saneileliho, une pusaneile khimagikha khya mbeile eiyo pusayipela ukhuta yieve sakhimagikha khya mbeili.
Pu umbeili gyooni gunave liho pukhukhale khwiva ndakhu ukhupulekha? Pu eingave umbeili gyooni gwiva mbulukhutu pukhukhale khwiva ndakhu ukhunusya?
Pu leino uNguluve aveikhile pasima khila khimagikha eikhya mbeile nduvu asagile yumwene.
Pu eingave fyooni fyale five khimagikha khimo umbeile pugukhale gwiva ndakhu?
Pu leino humbe ifi magikha fingi pu mbeile guleigumo.
Eliho salienogile ukhuta khukhivokho sanili nu vufumbwe nuve pu naguntwe sagukhate khufilunde sanilinu vufumbwe numwe.
Pu leino ifimagikha fya mbeili ifyufivonekha ukhuta fikhwimekhiwa padebe fyu filondiwa ukhulutiila.
Nifimagikha ifya mbeile ifyutusaga ukhuta fikhwimekhiwa padebe tukhufyimekhaga fincho.
Pu nafifimagikha fyieto ifisafivonekha finonu safili navufumwe uwakhwimekhiwa ulwa khuva fimalile ukhwimekhiwa, pu uNguluve afilunganinche ifimagikha fyooni pupaninie hange afyimekhe fincho fila ifisafikhwimekhiwa.
Agaile ewo ukhuta pulekhe ukhuva nukhulekhehana mumbeile, pu ifimagikha fyooni fitanganaga ndugano lumo.
Nu pu useikhi ugu eikhi magikha khimo khilemile pu ifimagikha fyooni fiva fiva filemile, pu vulevule ikhimagikha khimo khingimikhiwe fyooni fiva fyimekhiwe.
Pu ifimagikha fyooni fihovokha pupaninie umwe leino muleimbivi gwa Klisite nu muleifimagikha khila khimagikha khili khyene.
Nu uNguluve aveikhile taasi mupelela avavanda, puaveikhile na vanyamalago, avamanyisi puleino vala vooni avivomba imbaha pu nafifikungilwa ifya vuponi, vala avitungila vala avavivomba imbomboeiyakhulongoncha na vala ava leininchovele inchilipapingi.
Pu ufwe tweivoni tulivasuhwa, tweivoni tulivanya malago, ufwe tweivoni tulivamanyisi? pu ufwe tweivoni tuvomba imbombo incha fidego?
Pu ufwe tweivoni tulinikhikungilwa eikya vuponi? Ufwe tweivoni tweinchova munjovele ufwe tweivoni tuganula injovele.
Mlondage fincho ifi kungilwa ifivaha pu une yanikhuva vanesya injila einonu ukhulutiila.
Neingate ninchova munjovele inchavanu ninchavasuhwa pu neingave neilimbula lugano, puniva neivile khyuma eikhikuta vuvule.
Nukhuta neilineikhikungilwa eikhyavunya malago nuvumanyi uwayieilweli uvuleikhuvutitu nuluhala, nukhuta neilinu lweideekho ulwa khuhamya ifyamba. Puleino neingave neilenchila lugano une pusaneilikhinu.
Putute nihumya ikhyuma khyango khyooni nukhuvmisya avaganchu nu pungave nikhunumya umbeili gwango punienya nyiwe umwoto, puneingave neilembula lugano sayikhu mbumbuleila khinu.
ulugano lwisipa hange lutungila salukhiginia. Salukhito ncha luleinchila matingo.
Luleinchila vugalagala salulonda imbombo incha lwene lwene. Salwivawa khimbeivembeive hange saluvalila uvuvivi.
Saluhovokha uvusyovi puleino luhovokha mumbwayie lweli.
Lelugano lwisipa gooni lukhwi deekha gooni, luleinuvukifu khumbombo nchooni hange lukhwidehana khu mbombo nchooni.
Ulugano salwiduga eingave khulinuvumanyi wa malago wooni wiluta, eingave khuli njovele nchiduga eingave khulifyavumanyi filuta.
Ulwa khuva tukhimanyile panini, tuvomba uvunyamalago panini.
Puyakhiva yiekhwincha yiela eiyinogelanile, yiela iyiesayienogelanile yiluta.
Upuniale deebe nia njovaga ndu mwana, niliekhusaga ndu mwana, niavile neivile munu mbaha neikhagaveikha aga khuvulali agavudebe.
Ulwa khuva leino twilola ndeikhilolelo ndeisula eiya muhisi puleino useikhi gula yatulolanaga khumiho, puleino neikhimanyi padebe pu useikhi gula yanikhukhimanya fincho nduvu une neima nyikhikhe fincho.
Pu leino aga gadatu yagita maga ulweidekho, uluhuveilo nulugano, puleino elivaha ukhulutiila gooni ulugano.
Mululondage ulugano nukhunogwa fincho eikhikungilwa khya munumbula, ukhulutiila fincho muve vanyakhuhumya amalago.
Manya umwene uveinchova munjovele sinchova na vanu pu inchova nu Nguluve. Manya asikhuli uveikhulumanya ulwa khuva inchova gago galighu vatitu mu Mepo umbalanche.
Puleino umwene uveihumya uvanya malago, inchova na vanu pakhuva kangancha mulweidekho nukhuvanchesya.
Umwene uveinchova munjovele eikhikangancha yumwene, pu leino ula veihumya uvunya malago ikhugukangancha upelela.
Pu leino ninogwa ukhuta umwe mwivooni mnchovage munjovele. Pu ukhulutiila khugoni muhumyage uvunya malago, umwene uveihumya ihumya uvunyamalago imbaha fincho ukhulutiila ula uveinchova munjovele (Pupanonu aveipo unyakhuganula) ukhuta upelela guve nuvumanyi.
Pu leino valukolo lwango neinginche khulyumwe nukhunchov munjovele panikhuvatanga khiikhi? Pusanigela epo humbe neive ninhova numwe khunjeila ya luvonekhelo ewo ya vanyamalago ewo khunjeila ya vumanyisi.
Eingave ifinu ifilinchila wuumi ndei khiwiwi ewo ikhinubi finave safikuta mukhusutana, puyimanyikhikha ndakhikhi khyukhileikhu eikhinemiwa?
Ulwa khuva ulukelema lwihumya isavuti eiyisayimanyekhikha pu umunu ikhulumanya ndakhikhi ukhuta gwu seikhi gwa khwisavala khuligoha?
Vavawa nayumwe mungahumye khululimi eilimenyu eilesali khwelevekha, pu umwunu ikhulumanyaga ndakhikhi eikhyumwinjova paasikhuli uveikhukhimanya eikhyumwinjova.
Sanisanisya ukhuta khulinjovele nyingi mukhilunga hange yeisikhuli na yimo eiyeitava nonu.
Pu leino neingave sanieyimanyile eigenji khyala uveinjova munjovele navope eikhyuinchova munjovele eiva igenji khulyune.
Vulevule nayumwe pakhuva mwinogwa ukhuvumanya uwayeilweli uwa Mepo, munogwe fincho ukhuta mtigage ukhugukanganja upelela.
Leino ula uveinhova munjovele adovage avepo avepo unyakhuganula.
Manya neigadove munjove einumbula yango yeidova, pu uluhala lwango luleimbula sekhe.
Nei gahe ndakhiikhi? Nidova khunumbula yango, pu nidova khuluhala lwango khange. Nikhwimba khunumbula yango, puyanikhwimba khuluhala lwango khange.
Pu ungaginie uNguluve khimumbula pa ula ugeni pwikwanda ndakhiikhi ukhuta “Amina” Uve wuvusana, umwene vusalumanyile ugu winchova?
Pu lweli uve vusana vunonu, puleino uyunge ulesikheipulikha.
Nikhuginia uNguluve ulwa khuva ninjova munjovele ukhulutiila umwe mwivoni.
Puleino mupelela huba neinjove munjove amamenyu gahano mumbumanyi waango ukhuta puneivamanyieye avange, khulikho ukhunjova amamenyu ava elfu kumi munjovele.
Valukolo lwango mulekhe ukhuva vaana mukhusaya khwinyo. Pu leino ukhukongana nuvuvivi, muve ndavana avafyele, pu mukhusanga khwinyo mukhave vanu vadulufu.
Yei sembiwe mundagilo, “Khuvano avanjovele eiyinge na khumilomo gya vagenji ninchovaga na vanu ava pu savakhamuliekhage,” inchova uNtwa.
Khukhuta eindimi khihwani, pu sakhuveidekhi, pu khuvala avasaveidekhi. Pu ukhuhumya uvunya malago khihwani, pu sa khuvavo avasavikhidekha pu savuli yavo aveidekhi.
Eena eingave upelela gyooni gulundamine pupaninie navooni vanchovage inchovele, na vagenji navatava veidekhi vingile, pasavakhate umwe muleinu mkwale?
Pu leino eingave mwivoni mwihumya uvunya malago nuvitava mwidekhi ewo eigenji pu akhingila, pwayikhwidekhila na gala ugwipuleikha. Ayihegiwa ne gooni aginchoviwa.
Aga munumbula giva pavuvalafu, puakhole igwa nukhufugafuga nu khwisaya khwa Nguluve. Ale ikhwidekha ukhuta uNguluve alei pagati na gati indyumwe.

Eingave yuyoni einchova munjovele, vave epo vavili ewo vadatu na pu khila munu mukhavalelo khamwene. Nu munu lusutu aganule eikhinchoviwe.
Pu eingave asikhuli umunu uvakhuganula, pu khila munu muvene avavinchova munjovele vanchige khimyemye mu pelela, pu khila munu anchovage mwene khwa Nguluve.
Pu navanya malago vavili ewo vadatu vanchove na vange vapuveihinche nu khuganu khila eikhinchoviwa.
Pu leino uviatamile angavonekhiliwe nei lininie mumbu vombeli, ula uvi akhanchovaga munjovele anchige mye.

Ulwa khuva inumbula incha vanyamalago chili pasi pavuloleli wa vanyamalago.

Eingave khuli khininie vinogwa ukhumanyila, pu vavavunchage avagosi vavo khukaya. Ulwa khuvu ncha soni khudala ukhunchova mutembile.

Pu angalekhe ukhulumanya aga, mundekhe aleikhe ukhumanyikhikha.
Pu leino, valukolo lwango munogwe fincho ukhuhumya uvunyamalago, pu mulekhe ukhubeincha umunu uveiavenchaga ukhunchova munjovele.
Pu gooni gavombekhage mbunonu na ndwidehano.
Leino nikhuvavula valukolo eilivangeil eilwunivalombeilile, eilwumwapulikhe nukhwima mu eilyo.

ukhukongana nuvusimbe akha syieliwa, nukhuta anchukhile eikhigono eikhyadatu.
Nukhuta ambonekhile uKefa, na vala kumi nava veili.
Puakhavavonekhela pu akhavavonekhela useikhi gumo avanu vuvingi avamia vahano napakyanya. Avingi mwavo vipitama impakha leino, vaninie mbeene vagonelile itulu.
Pu akhambonekhela uYakobo na vakongi vooni.
Muvumaleilo wa ngooni, akhambonekhela une ndakhu mwana uvyaholiwe museikhe ugusngunogile.
Ulwa khuva une niele deebe muvakongi. Saninogile ukhwilangiwa ikongi, pakhuva niagunkuvinche upelela gwa Nguluve.
Muluhungu lwa Nguluve pyunile nduvunileiwo, nu luhungu lwa mwene khulyune sayale vuvule. Puleino neilikhutiga ukhuluteila vooni saniale nene luhungu lwa Nguluve lulwa luleimgati ndyune.
Pu leino eingave nene ewo vuvene tulumbeiliela ewo hange tukhwideekha ewo.
Leino eingave uKlisite alumbeilile nduvianchukhile ukhuhuma khuvunchukha puyielindakhikhi avange ndyumwe viita uvunchukha vusikhuli?
Pu yeingave uvunchukha wavufwe vusikhuli, pu nayu Klisite sanchukhe.
Pu eingave uKliste sanchukhe pu ukhulumbeilela kweito sakhuli na khinu.
Putu vonikhe ukhuta vatangeili va vudeesi uvikhunchova uNguluve twanchoveile vunge uNguluve anchusinche khwa Klisite vusanchukhile.
Pu einave avafwile avafwile savinchusiwa uYeisu vope sanchusiwe.
Pu eingave uKlisite sanchusiwe, ulwedeeko lweinyo luleivula khinu pumwiva mnchige mumbivi nchienyo.
Puleino navala vala avuvafwile mwa Klisite vope vungamile.
Eingave mbutamo uvu wene tuleinuvukifu wa seikhi ugwikhwincha mugati mwa Klisite avanu vooni, ufwe tulieva khuhegiwa ukhulutiila avanu vooni.
Puleino uKlisite anchukhile ukhuhuma khuvufwe, uvu wuvu beeni uvutanchi wa vala avafwile.
Ulwa khuva uvufwe wainchile ukhugende mumunu, pu ukhugendela mumunu khange vunchukha wa vala avafwile.
Ulwakhuva einave ukhugendela mwa Adamu vooni vifwa, pu vulevule vooni viiva vwumi ukhugendela mwa Klisite.
Ulwa khuva khila munu mumasage ga Klisite, vubeeni uvutanchi, pu leino vala vavo va Klisite yavipoliwa vuumi useikhe ugwa khwincha kwa mwene.
Pu yawiva vumaleilo pala upu uKlisite upuyakhiva iveikha uvuvaha uvu nkuludeva khwa Nguluve uDaada.
Ekhulongu ndeyi yayiva pala upuyakhiva iduncha uvuvaha wooni nuvulongonchi wooni na makha.
Ulwa khuva lusutu aveindongonchi imbaha impakha yakhiva ikhuvaveikha avalugu va mwene vooni pasi pa lunde ga mwene.
Undugu uvakhuvumaleilo ukhunangiwa vei vufwe. Ulwa khuva “Aveikhile khila khinu pasi pa malunde ga mwene.
Pu yakhiva ifinu fiveikhiwe pasi pamwene pu nayumwana yu mwene ayiveikhiwa pasi pamwene uvyafiveikhile ifinu fyooni pasi pamwene. Puyayiva ewo vimbaha khu fyooni.
Pu ewo leino yavigahandakhikhi vala vavo vonchiwe savuli ya vafwile? Eingave avafwile savinchusiwa lyooni, pukhikhi leino vikhwonchiwa savuli ya veene?

muve nikhigelelo mtamage muwayielweli mulekhe ukhugendelela mumbutula nogwa, ulwakhuva vaninie ndyumwe muleivanchila vumanyi wa Nguluve. Ninchova ewo savuli ya soni nchienyo.

Pu leino umunu uva mepo sainche tasi pu ula uvakhivumbukhu viainchile pwakhincha uvamepo.
Umunu utengunchi ahumile nkilunga, apeliwe nielifu. Umunu uvyakongile ahumile khukyanya.
Nduvu ula uvyapeliwe nu ng'aanga vuvaliewo avapeliwe nu ng'aanga, nduvu aleivyo ula uva khukyanya vuvaleiwo ewo vala avakhukyanya.
Ndu mutugegile eikhihwani khya ng'anga, yatwigega khange eikhwani khya munu uvakhukyanya.
Leino nikhuvavula valukolo lwango ukhuta umbeili nukisa safiha la uludeeva lwa Nguluve, yieve uvunangi ukhuhala ukhusita khunanga.
Pulola! Nikhuvuvula umwe ifya khuvatitu, satukhafwe twevooni putweivooni yatukhwandukha.

ulwa khuva neideinduliwe undyango umwelefu pu avingi vibeiga khulyune.

Paulo, usuhwa va Kilisite khuligano lwa Nguluve, nu Timoti ulukololweito, khupelela ngwa Nguluve unguleikhu Korintho, na khuveideekhi vooni avalie khukhilunga khyooni eikya khu Akaya.

Ulwakhuva nduvu uvunkuvelwa wa Kilisite vukhwongelela savuli yeito, vulevule na lulunchesyo lweito lukhwongelela ukhungendela mwa Kilisite.

Lweli, twale nuvuhigiwa uwakhufwa pa lyufwe. Pu eiyo yatupelega ufwe tuhekhe ukhuva nuluhuveitolo palyufwe yufwe, puleino tuveikhe uluhuveilo mwa Nguluve, uveinchusya avafwile.
Atupokhile ufwe ukhuhuma muvufwe uwa uwaa uwakhufwa, puayikhutupokha khange. Tumeweka ujasiri wetu katika yeye ya kwamba atatuokoa tena.
Aya igaka ewo ndumwe umwumukhutulangeila. Pu vingi yavikhutu saniela savali ya khutuhungu khila uluhunga ulutupe vilwe ufwe mundoovo ncha vingi.
Tukhigineihincha eili: Uvuvooni wa nyievonelo nchieto. Ulwakhuva yielie mbuyumbwe uvunonu nu vunonu wa Nguluve ukhuta twangelelaga yufwe ni ncha nkiluga. Tugahile ewo nayumwe, sayieliewo nduhala lwa nkilunga, pu yieleiewo nduhungu lwa Nguluve.
Satukhuva simbila khukhyoooni khikyo samwigela ukhwimba nukhulumanya. Niliemuvukifu
ukhuta oluunu mumalile ukhulumanya. Pu neileinuvukifu ukhula mulinchuuva lya Ntwa uYise pu lwiva savulil yienyo ukhukongana na matingo ngienyo, nduvuyakhiva mwiva khulyufwe.
Ulwakuva niale nuvukifu ukhukongana nieli, neikhanogwagwa ukhwincha khulyumwe tasi ukhuta pamwupile uvunonu wa khugendeleliwa ulwa veili.
Neili khusaga ukhuvagendela vuniluta khu Makedonia. Khange neikhanogilwe ukhuvagendelela khange vunikulivukha ukhuhuma khu Makedonia, numwe ukhusuha une vuniluta khuVuyuta.
Nikhavile nisaga ewo puniliekhusinana? Punipanga imbombo ukhukongana nikhigelelo khya vumunu, ukhuta niite “Eena, eena” Ndeili, ndeili” khyuseikhi ngumo?
Pu nduvu Unguluve uwavelile igoloofu, satuinchova fyooni “Eena” nei “Ndeili.”
Ulwakhuva umwan va Nguluve, uYiesu Kilisite, uvei uSilvano, uTimoti noune tukhandumbilielaga mundyumwe, ate “Eena” nie “Ndeili.” Puleino umwene useikhi gwooni “Eena.”
Ulwakuva indagano nchooni ncha Nguluve nchu “Eena” mumwene. Puleino ukhugendeela mumwene twita “Amina” mbudwadwa wa Nguluve.
