Pu leino, nikhusiima Unguluve ukhunchova une ukhuta ikhyukyamelile une nesite ukhwincha khu Korintho yaale nilekhe ukhuvapa unchiigo umwe.
Pu eiye sayunjeila eiya khuta twigela ukhunoncha umuhuvelile ulwideekho lweinyo umulunogeliwa ukhuva. Puleino tuvoomba pupaninie numwe savuli ya luhekhelo lweinyo, nduvu mukhwima mulwideekho lweinyo.
Pu lieno ngalamula munumbula yango yune ukhuta niale neilekhe ukhwincha khulyumwe khange vuneilei nuluvavo.
Ni ngave niavapelile umwe uluvavo, veeni uveiale ikhung'ovosya une, pu leino vei ula uvei aleimile nune?
Pu nayune nikhuvasimbeila eilimenyu leileilyo ukhuta yakheiva nikhwincha khulyumwe ukhususuvala navala vavo vale vikhung'ovosya. Neileinuvukifu ukhukongana numwe mweivooni ukhuta uluhekhelo lwango luhekhelo lulalula ulumuleinalyo umwe na yumwe.
Ulwakhuva mumbupala nuvunkuveilwa vwa numbula niavasimbile umwe, hange nukhuleila inyihonchi. Sanianonghwe ukhuvapelela umwe uluvavo lwa lususuvalo. Pwu leino nianonghilwe mulumanye ulunghano ulwanghati uluneileinalwo savuli yeinyo.
Pu ingave khuleimunu yuyoni uveiamelile ulususuvalo, sapelile khulyune kwene, pu leino ukhuta neilekhe ukhunghatala fincho yune pu avapelile na yumwe - mweivooni.
Uluvungu ulu ulwa munu aveialeindavule lunkweilele lula apevivwe navingi.
Pu leino lunonu ukhuta musyeikheile nukhunchesya. Munghahanghe ndavule ukhuta aleikhe ukhulemwa nulunsunsuvalo ululuteilile.
Pu leino nikhuvakanganha pakhuvonia ulughano lweinyo.
Khyumene niavasimbile, pu neivavone umwe ukhuta muviile vanu vakhukonga mumbombo nchooni.
Pu leino eingave mukhusyeikheila umunu uywa pu nayune nikhusyeikheilangha. Leila eilyuneisyeikhile neingava neisyeikhile puniva neisyeikhile savuli yeinyo mwa Keileisite.
U Setano pu alekhe ukhutusyova. Pakhuva ufwe saluleivakonyofu mumbombo ncha mwene.
Unkuludeva andeindulile ulwinchi une niavilke ninchile mumbunchenge uvwa mu Troya khulumbeileila eilimenyu lya Keileisite pala.
Pope syaniale nulunonchehencho mu numbula yango, ulwakhuva sania mbone ulukololwangu uTito. Pu leino niavalekhile neikhakilivukha khu Makedonia.
Pu leino anghinivwangwe Unguluve, uvei uyu mwa Keileisite eimisekhei nghyoni ikhutulongoncha ufwe mumbuluti. Ukhunghendela ndyufwe ivonia uvunonu vwa mwene mwonimwoni.
Ulwakhuva ufwe khwa Nguluve, luleilunusi ulunonu ulwa Keileisite, vooni muvala vavo vapokhivwe na muvala vavo vikhyongomela.
Khu vanu vavo vikhyongomela lunusi lwa vufwe nu vufwe. Khuvala avipokhivwa, lunusi lunonu ukhuhuma mu mbwuni nu vwumi. Veeni uvei anonghile pa finu ifi?
Ulwakhuva ufwe satuleindavanu avingi avilonda uvukavi vwakhyuma ukhunghendela mundimenyu. Pu ufwe vutwinchova eilimenyu nuvunonu vwa vufumbwe, putunchovela mwa Keileisite, nduvutusulivwa ukhuhuma khwa Nguluve, mbele ya Mungu.
Pu twandile khange ukwitujya yufwe? Pamo tulonda ndavange ikalata incha lweinghinio ukwincha khulyumwe?
Umwe mwemwe kalata yeito eiyuyeisimbiwe munumbula ncheito, eiyeimanyeikhikhe na vanu vooni pakhwimba.
Hange pumwivonia ukhuta umwe mulei kalata ukhuhuma khwa Keileisite, eiyeisimbiwe nufwe. Eiyeisimbiwe nu Mepo va Nguluve unyavwumi. Sayeisimbiwe mumawe pu yeisimbivwe munumbula ncha vanu.
Uvu vwuvukifu uvwutuleinavyo mwa Nguluve ukhunghendela mwa Keileisite.
Satukweilanile ufwe yufwe ukhweisangheila eilimenyu lyulyoni ukhuta lyeito yufwe. Pu leino, uvunghelanifu vweito vwihuma khwa Nguluve.
Vei Nguluve uvyatupelile ukhuta tuve vavombi va lweideihano ulupya. Ulu pu lweideihano lwa Mepo. Pakhuva uvuveinghi vwa mukatata vwibuda, pu umepo vei ikhutupa uvwumi.
Leino uvuvombeli vula uvwa vufwe uvuvwasimbiwe pakhipanga pu na vwope vwale nuvudwadwa ukhuta avanya Israeli valekhe ukhulungama amiho ngavo kwa Mose khumiho. Ulwakhuva ale idwadwa, nuvudwadwa avuvwayanghangha.
Pu, leino imbombo ya Mepo pusayeikhave nuvudwadwa ukhuluteila?
Ulwakhuva eingave eimbombo ya vuheinghi yale navudwadwa, pu khaleingi eimbombo yavuyeilweli yeiluteila fincho puvudwadwa!
Ulwakhuva nakheilakheila eikheikhya pelivwe kheidwadwa pavulenghuleilo kheileivula vudwadwa ndavule savuli ya vudwadwa uvululeilile fincho.
Pakhuva kheila kheikhyo khya silangha kheingave khyale navudwadwa, pu ndakheikhi pusakhivwa kheila eikhya sikhu nchooni?
Pakhuva tuleinuluhuveilo ulu leindavule putulei nu vukifu fincho.
Pu satuleindu Mose, uveiaveikhangha uludeingh'uleilo pamiho pamwene, ukhuta avanya Israeli valekhe ukhulola pavamaleilo uvwavudwadwa vuvwa vwale vukhusila.
Pu leino uvumanyi vwavo vwandei ndeivwe. Pakhuva na leino leino mufinghono ifi uludengh'uleilo lula lula vupinchinghe pa vweimbi vwa livangeili lya lweideihano ulwakhatale.
Pu na leino leino, ululangheilo lwa Mose vulukhweimbivwaa uludeingh'uleilo lutama panumbula nchavo.
Pu leino useikhei unghu avanu vikilivukha khwa Nkuludeva uludeingh'uleilo lwihengha.
Pu leino Unkuludeva vei Mepo. Apa leinu Mepo va Nkuludeva, paleinuvulenghefu.
Pu leino ufwe tweivoni ni mbomeila inchilivula ludeingh'uleilo pulukhuvuvona uvwadwadwa vwa Nkuludeva. Putuhambukha mumivele ngheilangheila einghya vudwadwa ukhuhuma pudwadwa nu vudwadwa, vuvuvwa nduvudwadwa uvwihuma khwa Nkuludeva.
Pwu lino, tulinimbombo iyi, nduvu tuyupilile uluhungu, satugatala.
Pwu tubelile injila nchoni inchasoni ni ncho nche yuvelile, satutama ni lyoyo Khange satuvombile uvuvivi ilimenyu lya Nguluve. Upwu tuhilikha iyivile lweli, tukhivonesya yufwe kwu nyivonelo nche munu kuvulongolo kwa Nguluve.
Pwu ingave iliangili lyetu lye yuvelile, lye yuvelile khuvala aviyaga.
Mu vuhaliwa vwa vene, unguluve va pakhilunga lwavo ulusalukhwedikha. Pwu savakhaluvone ulumuli lwa livangili ilivalache lya Kilisti, uvi khihwani kya Nguluve.
Ulwakhuva satukhwenchova yufwe, ila uNkilisti uYesu unkolodeva nufwe twevene tulivavombi vinyo kwa Yisu.
Ulwakhuva Unguluve vi akhanchova, “Ulumuli tumulekha khuhisi.” Amulikhe munumbula nchenyo ukhuhumya uluhala uluvalanche ulwa Nguluve pwu khuvepo khwa Yesu Kristi.
Pwu lino tulinikhibana ikhi mufyombo fya ng'anga lipulikhikhe ukhuta amaka amavaha ficho ga Nguluve sageto.
Tukhatala satuchungutilewe. Twivona masiakho lakini satu khwegwisya nukhuvuye kunsana.
Tuteseke satwiyaga. Tutaagiwa satulemala.
Ifigino fyoni twigega emivili gyetu uvufwe wa Yesu, pwu uvwumi vwa Yesu vavoneke mu mivili gyetu.
Ufwe twituvile vumi ifigono fyoni tuhuminchiwa ukhufwa kwa Yesu, pwu uvumi vwa Yesu vovonekhage mmivili gyetu igya vumunu.
Ulwakhuva uvufwe vuvomba mbombo yetu mgata ndyufwe, pwu uvuvumi vuvomba imbombo mgati ndyumwe.
Pwu tulini numbula yila yila iya lwidikho ukhukhongana: “Nikhidikhe puwu nikhanchova.” Nayufwe khange twikhwidikhe, khange twinchova.
Tulumanyile ukuva ula uvianchusicha unkuludeva uYisu pwu ayikhutunchusya nayufwe paninie numwe. Tunajua kuwa atatuleta sisi pamoja nanyi katika ukhuvepo nu mwene.
Khila khinu pokhile khinyo umwukhivelile ikhisa vukhiluta kwu vanu vingi, imwalimu yikula kwu vuvalanche vwa Nguluve.
Pwu lino satwivuya kunsana ndayive kunje twisila, mgati tuvikivwa uvupya elinchova ni lichuva.
Unsikhi ugu unsupi ugatanchi wa vudebe igikhutuvikha ufwe kwuvwa fikono fyoni uvujitu vwa vuvalanche uvulutelile ifigelelelo fyoni.
Ulwakhuva satwilola ifinu ifivonekha, kufinu ifyu safivonekha. Ifinu ifyo twi tukhufivona ifya nsikhi vuvule ifinu ifivoneka sikhu joni.
Tulumanyile ingave uvutamo vwa nkhilunga ikyututama umu ginangikha, tulinayo inyumba ukhuhuma khwa Nguluve. Yu nyumba iyu sayinchangiwa na mavokho ga vanu, yu nyumba ya sikhu joni kukyanya.
Ulwakhuva mu hema ili twitamiwa, twinogwa ukhufwata ukwa khutama khukyanya.
Vu twinogwa evi ulwakuva ukhufwala satukhavonekhe ukuva vuvule.
Lweli vutuligati mu hema ili, twifamwa vwutugatile. Santwinogwa ukhufuliwa. Pwu twinogwa, ukhufwalinchiwa, pwu ikifwile tumila nu vwumi.
Uvi atuvikhile ufwe kwu khinu ikhi vi Nguluve, uvyatupile ufwe Umepo ndu lwidihano lwa kitu ikyu ya khave kwikwicho.
Pwu lino muve na makha ifigono fyoni. Muve miho ukhuta unsikhi vwu lulikukhaya khi mbili, tulikhutali nu Nkuludeva.
Ulwakhuva tugenda nu lwidikho sio khwa khulola.
Pwu lino lulina makha. Huba tuve kutali ukhuhuma khumbili na kukhaya paninie nu nkuludeva.
Pwu tuvomba uvunogwe wetu, vutwiva kukhaya aukhuvutali tung'ovosye umwene.
Ulwakhuva twivoni tuvonekhage kuvolongolo kwu khigoda ikhya vuhigi ikya Kristi, pwu khila munu upulile ikhinogelanile kwu mbombo inchivombekha khi mbili, khuve khu vononu au khuvuvivi.
Pwu ukhulumanya uvudwachi vwa nkuludeva, tukhuvavula avanu. Umu tuvelile, ivonekha vuvule nu Nguluve. Luhuvilo ukhuva vukhulumanya mnyivoneho nchinyo.
Satwigela ukhuvasonga umwe khange ukhutulola ufwe ukhuva vayilweli. Pwu tukhuvapa umwe ulwakhuva ulwiginio khuliufwe, mvinchage gakhuvavula khuvala avikhiginia mkuvonekha khikhyo sakhili munumbula.
Ulwakhuva ingave tunchumbile nu luhala khunongwa ya Nguluve. Ingave khwutule kuluhala lwito ulunonu ulwito.
Ulwakhuva ulugano lwa risti lukhutukwegelencha: ulwakhuva tulinuvwa yilweli nili ukhuta umunu yumo afwile khu nongwa icha vone pwulino voni vafwile.
Nu Unkristi afwile khunongwa ncha voni, pwu khuta vala avitama valekhe khange kwa ajili ya vene. Pwu vatamage navene uvyavile afwile nukhunchukha.
Pwu lino, ukhutengula lino nukulutelila satukhung'iga umunu ukhukongana ni ikhigelelo kya munu, ndayive khunsa na tulikhundola uKristi ndulu. Lino satukhungiga umunu yoyoni khange.
Pwu lino, ingave umunu yoyoni aligati mwa Kristi, umwene avile munu impya. Agakhatale galutile. Lola, gavile mapya.
Ifinu fyoni ifi fihuma khwa Nguluve. Atunonchinche ufwe kwu mwene ukhugendela khwa Kristi, atupile imbombo ya kusayania.
Ukhu khu nchova mwa Kristi, Unguluve ikhutusayania ni khilunga khwu mwene, mlekhe ukhu inongwa ncha vene. Ivika khulyufwe ilimenyu lya kusayania.
Pwa tuhaliwe ndi g'wa gilinchiwa va Kristi, ukhuta Unguluve alikhuluta khuvulongolo(lufaa) ya mwene ukhugendelela kulyufwe. Tukhuvadova umwe ukhugendela mwa Kristi: “Msayane nu Nguluve!”
Akhambikha uKristi ukhuva nekhelo khu nungwa nchito. Umwene visatule inongwa. Avombile evo tuvombe uvwa yilweli vwa Nguluve khumwene.
Pu leino pavuvombei uvwakhuvomba pupaninie nu mwene, tukhuviitula umwe mulekhe ukhuyupeileila uluhungu lwa Nguluve ndei kheinu eikhyavuvule kheisita khuva ni sekhe.
Ulwakhuva ilita, “Useikhei unghunonghelanile vapokhi niakhutangile.” Pu lola, useikhe unghunonghelanile nghwu unghu. Lola, linchuva lya vupokhi ulu leino.
Satulonda ukhupeindeileila umunu uvei avei nchangha, pakhuva satwinongwa ukhuta ulutangheilo lweito pambombo lulekhe ukhuhovelivwa.
Pu leino putukheinchinghaheincha yufwe mumbuvombeli vweito vwooni ukhuta tuleivavombi va Nghuluve. Tuleivavombi va mwene mumbukifu uvuleipapingi, pavunkuveilwa, mumbupala, na pavufinye vwa mitameile,
hange nukhutovivwa nukhunghungivwa nei minyololo, neinyoveelo yakhusita khupuleihana pa mbombo, na pakhusita khunghona itulu, na munjala.
mumbuvalanche nuvumanyi, nukhweiyu meileincha nuvunonu mwa Mepo Umbalanche, na ndunghano ulwa yeilweli.
Tuleivavombi va mwene mundimenyu eilya yeilweili mumakha ngha Nghuluve. Tuleineikheilweilo eikhya yeilweli savuli yakheivokho eikhyakhundyo neikhya khuheinghei.
Tuvomba eimbombo nukweimeikhivwa nukhubedivwa, nukhubeinghivwa nukhunghimivwa. Tunchovivwa ukhuta tuleivasyovi na humbe tulivayeilweli.
Tuvomba eimbombo ukhuta satumanyei khikhe muvutumanyeikhikhe vunonu. Tuvomba eimbombo ndavanu avifwa humbe tuleivumi.
Tuvomba ndavanu avaleinulususuvalo nu pu tuleinuluhekhelo. Tuvomba ndavanu avasavikhwa kheina nuputwikava.
Tunchovele uwayeilweli vwooni khulyumwe mwei, Vakolito, ni numbula ncheito nchivile mbalafu.
sambaneileinchivwa inghati ndyufwe, pu leino mukheideindeila yumwe mumisangheile nghyeinyo.
Pu leino ukhuta muhombivwe pakheinghelelo khyeinyo eikhyumupevilwe ni nchova numwe nda vana - pumudeindule inumbula.
Mulekhe ukhweipinya akheikwengho avasavikhweideikha. Pakhuva khuleilweide ihano lukhi pavuyeilweli nuvunangi? Na paleilweideihano lukhi nei hisi?
Lweideihano lukhi uKeileisite ivanalyo Beliali? Yeve vei ula uvei ikhweideikha alei nu lweideihano lukhi nula uveisikhweideikha?
Pupalei lweideihano lukhi pwulule pa tembile ya Nghuluve ni fihwani? Pakhuva ufwe tulei tembile ya Nghuluve uvei alei nuvwumi, nduvu Unghuluve inghati muvene nukhunghenda muvene. Nivenchangha Nghuluve vavo navope vivenchangha vanu vango.”
Pu leino, “Muhenghanghe muvene muvenchanghe pasima navene,” vu iita Unkuludeva. “Mulabasyangha eikheinu eikheivivi, punikhuvupeileilangha umwe.
Puni veinchangha Daada yeinyo, numwe muvenchangha vana vango vanswambango navaleivango,” vuuita Untwa unya makha nghooni.
Vanghane vango, ulwakhuva lulei nu lweideihano ulu, putweivalanche yufwe mumbombo nchooni inchikhutupela ukhuva va vwafu mumi veilei nghyeito na mu mepo. Pu tuvoulonde uvuvalanche mundudwaado lwa Nghuluve.
Pu leinomutupinchangha ukhuta tuvenchanghe munumbula ncheinyo! Satunangile umunu uvei avenchangha. Hange kelelukhile munu.
Saniita evwo ukhuta neivaheinginghe umwe. Pakhuva nemalile ukhuta umwe muleimunumbula ncheito, khulwufwe ukhufwa papaninie nukhutama pupaninie.
Neilei nuvukifu vwingi inghati ndyumwe punikheinghinia savuli yeinyo. Nei deinghile ulunonchehencho nuluhekhelo na mbunkuveilwa vweito vwooni.
Twa inchile khu Makedonia, eimiveilei nghyeito sangheileikhukekha puleino twale nuvubaneileinchivwa munjela nchooni munghati kwala neilinghoha khunji pulwale ludwaado.
Pulieno Unghuluve unyakhutunchesya tweilunsunsuvile atunchesinche pakhwincha kwa Tito.
Sakhukhuta Unghuluve atunchesincha pakhwincha khwa Tito nukhwanghanila nave pa leino yale nalulunchesyo ulu u Tito alipeilile ukhuhuma khulyumwe, umwene aluvwene ulunghano lweinyu uluvaha ulumwale nalwo khumwene, ulunsunsuvalo lweinyu nukhunghimba kweinyo savuli yango. Pu lieno neivile nuluhekhelo ukhuluteila.
Na pu yeingave eikalata yango yavapeliile ukhusisunsuvala, une pasanivavwa pa eilyo. puni vavwa pala upunivona eikalata eila yeikhavaveikha umwe nulunsunsuvalo. pope mwale nulunsansuvalo paseikhe udebe vuvule.
Leino neileu nuluhekhelo, saneilei nuluhekhelo savuli mwale nuvupala, pu leino ulwakhuva ulunsunsuvalo lweinyo lwavanghenghile mukhupela inongwa imbivi. Mwakavile ulunsunsuvalo ulwa khe iNguluve, pu leino samwankuveilwe pavuvule savuli yeilo.
Ulwakhuva ulunsunsuvalo ulwakhei Nguluve lwinghengha ulwa khei Nguluve lwinghengha ukhupela inongwa. Nukhukava uvoupokhi pakhusita ukhuva nulunsunsuvalo lwa nkeilunga pu leino lwingheingha uvufwe.
Mulolanghe ulunsunsuvalo ulu ulwa khei Nghuluve lwaholile masangho makhi munghati ndyumwe. Nuvulamunchi vwa masangho ngheinyo vwale ndakheikhi pakhivonia ukhuta samwale nuvunangi. Pu ulusunsuvalo ulwa luvavo lweinyo, pulwale luvaha ndakheikhi uvudwadwa uvumwadwadangha, uvunonghwe vweinyo nuvounsukhwa vweinyo ukhuta uvwayeilweli vulondivwa ukhuvombekha! Mu mbombo nchooni pumweivonisye yumwe ukhuta sandeivanangi.
Na pu yeingave niavasimbile umwe, syaniasimbe savuli yatulanongwa hange savuli yaula uveiakuvilwe mbutula nongwa. Neivasimbile ukhuta ukhweihumya khwa numbula nchienyo savali yeito yeipele ukhumanyeikheikha khweinyo pamiho ngha Nguluve.
Savuli yaeiyei ukhuta tunchesivwa. Na ndunchesyo lweinyo putuleikhuhakhela, ukhuluteileila savuli ya Tito, pakhuva einumbula ya mwene yeihovosiwa numwe mweivooni.
Pu leino neingave nia einghinche khumwene mundimenyu eilyavenchangha savuli yeinyo saniakonchivwe isoni. Pu leino ndumulwavavulile eilimenyu eilwutwanchovile khulyumwe lwale lya yeilweli, Ulweinghinwo lweito ukhukongana numwe khwa Tito yevonesya ukhuta lweli.
Ulunghano lwa mwene savuli yeinyo pu avile imbaha ukhuluteileila, eingave munkumbukha uvweiseikhi vweinyo pakhuvomba, umumwamwambeilile umwene mbudwadwa nukhumweimeikha.
Nihovokha ulwakhuva mumenyu nghooni neilenei numbula eingifu inghati ndyumwe.
Hange valukolo tukhuvavula ukhuta mulumanye uluhungu lwa Nguluve uluvapevilwa avamipelela nghya khu Makedonia.
Pakhuva paseikhi unghuvanghelivwanghwa vupala nubankweveilwa uvaleipapingi puvukhava vwingi vwa luhekhelo.
Pakhuva nikhuva vula nukhivabelela ukhuta valeikhulaha ndumuvanonghilwe ukhukongana neikheinghelelo khya vukavi vwavo, mumbunongwa vwavo avene valuminche neinumbula.
Mumbunonghwe vwavo vatudovile nukhutusima fincho ukhuta tuve pupanie mulunghu ulu ulwakhuvatanga avavalanche.
Pu yavombikhe ewo ndumusatwahuvile ukhuta vuyayiva ewo. Pu leino eilya khwanda vaeihuminche vavo vakhihumya vavo khulyufwe mundunghano lwa Nguluve.
Pu leino tukhupaveila uTito, ukhuluvombela uluhungu ulu khulyumwe nduvu umwene amalile ukhulangula pakhumaleisya akhavombo akha akhavwipa palyumwe.
Pu leino umwe muleinuvumofu uvwa kheinu eikhya venchangha, ulweideikho neinjovela, mumbumanyi, mukhunghimba hange na ndunghano lweinyu khulyufwe. Pu leino mweilole ukhuta na yumwe pumwiva nuluhungu ulu ulwavwipa.
Pusaniita ewo ukhuta luve lulangheilo ndeili. Pu leino neikhuvavula eivwo pakhuva nghela uvungholofu vwa lunghano lweinyo.
Ulwakhuva mulumanyile uluhungu lwa Nkuludeva uYeisu Keileisite. Uveiaipipilile nghanchu savuli yeinyo ukhuta pavunghanchu vwa mwene umwe muve vakavi.
Pu une muleimenyu eilei nikhuvapaveila ulupaveilo ulukhuvatanga. Pakhuva umwakha unghulutile nda pumungave mukhavombile pope nukhukhunongwa khange. Mukhanonghilwe ukhuvomba.
Pu lieno mumaleisyanghe. Ukhuvomba nduvu uvunonghwe umuvuvelile nukhave vanyakhuvomba ukhukongana neikheinghelelo eikhyumuleinakhyo.
Pakhuva uvunonghwe vwa khuvomba ndavule pyuvule pulunonu kange yeikhweideikhivwa ukhukongana ni fyalei nofyo umunu sayikongana nifyalei vuvule umunu.
Pakhuva eimbombo eiyei sayiva eviwo ukhuta avange vave nuvulenghefu avange. Pu avange vabaneileinchivwe.
Pu lieno eimivombele ngheihwanananghe paseikhei. Unghu leino uvwingi vweinyo vuvanonghele pavulenghefu vwavo ukhuta payeivenchaanghe pavwingi vwavo vuvanonghelanghe umwe.
Nduvuleisimbivwe ukhuta; “Uveialundaminie nukhuva nafyo fyufingi saluteililepa na yulayula uvyaleinafyo fidebe saleikhuva nuvunonghwe uvwa finge ifingi.”
Pu lieno anghinivwanghwe Unguluve uvei eiveikha ulunghimbo lulalula mundyumwe nduvwaveikhile khwa Tito.
Pakhuva aupeilile ulupaveilo lweinyo na khunu alikhunghimba ukhukongana ni ndovo ncheinyo. Pu ainchile khulyumwe nuvunonghwe vwa numbula ya mwene.
Paninie nu mwene tulavwile uncheito uyunge uvei ipuleikheikha inonu mundi menyu eilivalanche.
Pumulekhanghe ukhuta apuleikhikhe khunonu kwene, pu mulumanye ukhuta ahalivwe neimipelela ukhunghenda paninie nufwe mu mbombo. Eiya luhungu ulu ukhuta Unkuludeva anghini vwange nukhuvonekha uvutangeili vweito.
Putukheidwancha neilimenyu eilei umunu alekhanghe ukhutukuteila ukhukongana neikheinkungeilwa eikhi eikhya vwipa uvu uvutunghenghile.
Putulongoncha ukhusangha nghala amangholofu hange sapamiho ngha Nkuludeva, pene pu na pamiho ngha vanu.
Pu leino khange tukhutavuleila nukhusuha ulukolo lweito uyunge uvei tumbwene eimiseikhei mingi mu mbombo einchili papingi. ukhuta inghimba. Pu naleinoleino inghimba fincho mumbombo einchalipapingi.
Pu leino mungava mulonda ukhulumanya ikhulongu ncha Tito, umwene imanyani uvyalei paninie nune hange imbombi nchango savuli yeinyo. Ndakhuva lukolo lweito, vasahivwe neimipelela vanu vadwadwa. Navangholofu khwa Keileisiti.
Pu leino mbavonesyanghe ulunghano lweinyo, hange muvoniange nakhumipelela na savuli ya lweinghinwo lweitu savuli yeinyo.
Ukhukhongana nie mbombo iyavideikhi, lwiva lunonu khulyune ukhuvandikhila.
Ulwakhuva nilumanyile uvunogwe wienyo uvunikhie gienikheincha kuvanu ava ku Makedonia. Nikhavavulile ukhuta ei Akaya yikhamalile ukhuhuma umwaka uguukhalutile. Uvunogwe weinyo vuvapile inumbu avingi ukhuvumba.
Leno, nivasuhile mwevalukolo lwango ukhuva ulwiegiinio lwenyo khulyumwe lulekhe ukhuva lwavuvule, mu khee mumivinchage mwietesaninche, nduvuuniekhanchovi mkhale mwiva.
Yiengave iewo, umunu uviva va ku Makedonia anginche paninie nune nukhuvavona mwietesaninche, putukhale twilola inchi — sininchova khinu kulyumwe—khumaka mingi kulwumwe.
Pwu nikhawene nchikhale nchakhugiemba ukhuvadova mwivalukolo ukwincha kulyumwe ukhuvikiela ifinu haanila vyakhusaniela nduvumukhanchovile. Pwu nchivinchaga pwunchile ndulusayo, ndiekhienu khikyo samukalagieliwe.
Ilisage iele; umunu uvivyala fidebe alabeha vulevule fidebe, uveiivyala nukhusagila ulusayo vyalabena ufingi mundusayo.
Pwu khilamunu uviihumya uviihumya ndumwakha sagiile munumbula yamwene. Navope alekhage ukhufihumya nukhuvipa nulususuvalo. Ulwakhuva Unguluve ienogwa khumu uvieihumya nuluhekhelo.
Unguluve ikwongelencha khila ulusayo kulyumwe ukhuta, khila nsienke, mu mbombo nchoni, mwupielilage nchoni inchumwinogwa. Ukhuva muwesyage ukwongelenchiwa khu khilambombo einonu.
Nduvulikhandikhiwe: “Ayevaninche uvumofu uwamwene nukhuhumya khuvagaanchu. Ilweli yamwene yipatamaga kuvunchila lusiku.”
Umwene uviihumya eimbeyu khumbyali ni khisyesye kyakhulya, hange alihumya nukhulutilila iembeyu yienyo iyakhuvyala. Umwene vie vyalongelencha uvubeni uwayilweli wienyo.
Muvinchaga vatayieli va khila khinu pumuvinchage viipe. Ile liigega ulusano kwa Nguluve ukhugeendela ikhigelelo.
Ukhuvomba uvuvombeli uvu vuhegelencha ifilondiwa khuvakilisti. Pwu fikwongelencha imbombo inchakhusana kwa Nguluve.
Ukhugeeliwa umwe nu khudulusya uvuvombeli uvu, pwu munkugieniaga Unguluve ukhunkonga nulweidiko lweinyo ulwa livangili ilya Klisite. Pia mtamtukuza Mungu kwa ukarimu wa karama yenu kwao na kwa kila mmoja.
Nikuvanogwa, nikuvadovela umwe. Vivomba iewo ulwakhuva ulugano uluvaha ulwa Nguluve luliepakyanya palyumwe.
Ulusano livinchage kwa Nguluve khukhikung'eilwa ikyamwene ikhisakhinchoveka!
Nene Pavuli, nene nikuvadova kuvudekhedekhe nie khisa kya Kliste. Une nilienndekhevunieli pavulongo palyumwe, Niengave pavutali numwe pwu niva na makha.
Nikhuvadova umwe ukuta, unsienki ugyakhiva niva numwe, saneikave na makha agaakwidwaja yune. Pwu nisagaa ukhuta nilonda ukuva na makha vunikhuvabencha vala avisaga ukhuta tutama khimbilie.
Ndatugeendage mumbili, pwu satwilwa khimbili.
Ulwakhuva ifilwiilo ifyutulwila safyambilie. Fili namaka agaanguluve agiinanga ilihema. Kywuu giinanga lweli inongwa tsoni inchavuyagi.
Pwu, tunananga lweli khila khinu ikhilinu vutwa ikyukhitoncha mungaati mumaka ga Nguluve. Tukwibata khila khinu mumasage agaakwidika mwa Kliste.
Pwu tupokhela amakha agievonekha nukhunanga imbombo nchoni inchusanchikwidihana nulwidiko lwinyo uludolwike.
Mulole khila khinu ikhilipavuvalafu pamiho geinyo. Inave uvikwidika ukhuva va Klisti, eilole ievunche mwene ukhutu umwene va Kilisite, khumbe nayufwe vutuliwo ukhuva tulivakilisti.
Khumbe ndaniegiinie padebe ukhukongana nuvuloleli weitu, uvu Untwa avuhuminche khulyufwe ukhuvukonga ukhuvuvombela umwe sawakuvunanga, saniekhavone soni.
Saninogwa ukhuta nivadwanchage pa iele khu khalata nchango.
Ulwakhuva avange avanu vita, “Ikhalata ncha mwene chihoma khange nchilinamaka, ulwakhuva umwene khimbili indekhedekhe. Amamenyu agaamwene gielondiwa ukhugaapulihincha.
Pii londiwa avanu awoo velewe ukhuta ikyutwinchova mukalata vutulipatale, viliehanile ndifyutuvomba unsike vutulipala.
Satwiluta khuvutale enoo ndukwilundamania yufwe nduvutukhilihania yufwe ndavala uvuvikhigienia veene. Eingave vuvikhilihania vene navayavo, viva vanchila luhala.
Ufwe, nduvulino, satukhigiiniage ukhulutilila eeno. Pwutungavombage eiwo tuvombaga eiwo wutulimugaati ndugavelo ulu Unguluve atugavile ufive, imaakha inchifikhe khuvutali ndukwienyo vuuguliwo.
Ulwakhuva satukhiyongelenche yufwe uputukadugiele palyumwe. Tukhale vavutengulilo ukhufika kuvutali nduwienyo kulivangiili ila Kiliste.
Satwigieniche ukhulutilila ikhigelelo kya mbombo inchavange. Ulwakhuva tuhuvila ndu ulwidiko lwenyo ulyikhula ukhuta apoonu upumuvombela imbombo pwupikwongelela fincho, hange pisigala iegaati mulupakha ulwalweli.
Tuhuviela kwieli, ukhuta tukhimanyage ukhulumbilila ilivangieli na khukhilunga ikhinge pavutali. Satukhiginiage khu mbombo iyivombiwa mukhilunga ikhinge.
“Umunu uvikhingiinia, ieginiage khunkuludeva.”
Ulwakhuva uveikhinchova yuywa ukhuta inchova limenu vyalanchoviwa. Uviengave unkhuludeva ikhumwimiekha.
Nisaaga ukhuta mwivange mwale mwomileile nune mbunkonyofu. Ilweli mukhiyumilila nune.
Ulwakhuva muleinukhunogwa ukhuvivi yumwe. Neilinuvuvivi uvunonu uwa Nguluve kwa ajili yenu ukhuhuma upunaijyigile khuvutegulani uwa ugoosi yumo. Naijyigila ukhuvagegela uKilisite ndung'inja ugoolofu nyie uugosi ukhuhuma iholiwa.
Ulwakhuva nidwada khuluvafu ulunge, ndie njoka yiyo yadetelinche nkwa Efya khuvusyovi uwavuvivi, amasago geinyo giiwesya ukhuyanchiwa khuvutali ukhuhuma khulwisayo ulwalweli nulunonu mwa Kliste.
Pwuu angahomile uyuunge umunu uvakuvayancha anchoovage inongwa ncha Yesu uyunge uvisahwaninie nula uvitukhandumbililaga. Apange khuvijingahie ncho ukhumpokela umepo uyunge yuywa saliehanile nduvitukhampokile. Apange khukikhwani eikhinge mkhupilila ilivangiili ilienge ililivunge ndiliimukha pokile. Mkhiyumilincha mumbombo inchi vunonu!
Ulwakhuva une apange niliemugati muvala avanchila maka khu avo vitambuliwa vasukhwa-vanonu.
Ndaniengave yune sanimanyile ukwima khulumbilila, vusanieliwo mbumanyi wango. Khu khila khinu pwu tupelile ukhuta umanyikhikhe khulyumwe.
Te, navombile imbivi vunikhiyisya yune ukhuta umwe mwimikhiwagwe? Ulwakhuva na lumbililaga ninumbu bila khudwada khinu ilivangieli ilya Nguluve khulyumwe.
Napokhile imipelela mingi ukwupilila ulutangilo ukhuhuma khuvene nikhale nikhuvatanga ukhuvavombe umwe.
Upunikhale numwe nale munu yune nilonda ulutangielo, saniekhava inchigo khumunu. Ulwakhuva ifyunale nafyo fyakwilanile na valunkolo lwango ukhuhuma khu Makedonia. Khu khila khinu nitagile ukhuleka ukhuva inchiigo khulyumwe,
Kama kweli ya Kristo ilivyo ndani yangu, huku kujisifu kwangu, sakhulanunalikha khuvulafu ulwa Akaya.
Khikhi? Ulwakhuva sanievaganile? Unguluve alumanyile ukhuta nivaganile.
Ukhuva khila ikyunivomba, nikhukhivomba. Nikhukhivomba ukhuta nietange ukhusiga unsiekhi gwa vala avinogwa unsienki ndugwakhuva nduvutuliewo mukhila khila iekyukhigineihincha.
Ulwakhuva avanu vala vasuhiwa va vudeidi na vavombambombo, vasyovi. Vikhisyetula vavo ukhuva vasuhiwa va Kilisti.
Ekhi sakyakudega, ulwakhuva nayusetano ikhisyetula yuywa ndava sukhwa avalumuli.
Inchi sanchakhudega eeno ndavavombi avamwene avikhisyetula vavo ndavavombi avamwene avayielweli. Khuvusililo imbombo nchavene nchilava nduvuvavombile.
Ninchova kavili: Alekhage ukhuva pwale umunu uyunge uvisaga ukhuta une nifuvile. Ulwakhuva mungavombe, mumokhelage une ndumu uvyafuvile une pwu nigiienie padebe.
Khila ikyuninchova khunu ukwikhangancha, nukwigiinia sakhukhegiwa nu Nkuludeva, pwuninchova ndumunu uvyafuvile.
Ulwakhuva avanu avingi vikhigiinia khimbilii, khumbe nikhihiiniaga.
Ulwakhuva mukhagegiinie nukhuluhekhelo niviafuvile, yumwe mwevene pwu mulie nuluhala!
Ulwakhuva mugeegana nu munu angakhuvikhe mbukhungiwa, vie ikhuvaviekha ukhugavika yumwe, angavavombe umwe khuvukavi wa mwene, angieviekhe munkyanya, apange angavatove khumiho.
Pwu ninchova khosoni nchetu ukhuta ufye twale vadekhedekhe fincho ukhovo ewo. Na bado kama yeyote akijivuna— nazungumza kama mpumbavu— mimi pia nitajivuna.
Te, avene vuva Yahudi? Nayune vunielivyo. Te, avene Vaislahieli? Nayune vulevule. Te, avene vakholiwe nkikolo ikya Abulahamu? Nayune vulevule.
Te, avene vavombi va Klisite? {Ninchova ukhuta ulukhala lwango salwale lunonu.} Une nilutilile. Nibile na mu mbombo ing'afu ukhulutilila, ukhuhanga nukhuta nikhale mbukhungwa, ukhutoviwa ukhulutilila, ukhwagana nuvuvi uwavufwe.
Ukhuhuma khu Vayahudi nupielile khahano “ukhuvngiwa mala olobaini uhenche ukhuvungiwa khamo.”
Natoviwe nulubikhi mala khadatu. Natoviwe khamo namawe. Mumeli naponi ukhufwa mala khadatu. Nivombili pakhilo na pamusi munyanja injila khinu.
Nikhale ndugeendo ulunivile nigeenda khila nsiekhi, mungasi inchudwancha, muvanyambuda, ukhughenda muvanu vango yune avavivi, ukhuma khuvanu avavivi avanyapanchi, mumbuvivi uwankilunga, mumbivivi uwamunyanja, mumbivivi uwakhuma khuvalukholo lwango avavudesi.
Nivile imbombo eimala na mumbutamo uvupala, nu mumajuva amingi amapala agasaga khugonelela, munjala nie kyumila, papingi ukhulekha ukhulya, ukhuva mumepu nukhulekha ukhufyala.
Ukhulekha ifinu ifinge, khulimaka agavundwanchi igya mipelela.
Veni udeekhedekhe, nayune sanielidekhedekhe? Viveni uvieagwisincha unine mumbutulanongwa, nayune sanipya mugaati?
Inave lwampinyo niegieniaghe, nikhigiinia khu khila ikhivonesya uvuvi wango.
Unguluve nu Dada uva Ntwa u-Yesu, umwene uveiginiwa khuvusila lusiku, uvyalumanyile ukhuta une sanisyova.
Uku ku Dameska, umbaha va khilunga pasi pa Ntwa uAreta alolelaga ikhilunga kya ku Damaski ukhuta anyibate.
Khange vambiekhile mukhitundu, ukhugeendela pakhidwel ikhilipalwimato, nukhupokhiwa ukhuhuma mumavokho ghavene.
Yiinogiwa nedaye, ilakhesikhuli ekhekhidenchiwa nelyo. Ila nikhwendelela khunyivonelo mwinukhe uwakhukhuma khwa mbaha.
Nemanyile umunu yumo mwa Kilisite uuvalenave miaka kumi na minne egegerutile inave—giva mumbele, au khunchi khumbele, one sanehumanyile, Unguluve alumanyile—akhapembiwe khukwanya khukherunga ekhwadatu.
Tena nelumanyile ukhuta umunu oyo—yingave khumbele, au khunchi khumbele ane saneluumanyile Unguluve alumanyile—
ataliwe khukwanya impakha akhu paradeisi nukhupulekha embombo embalanchee khu munu vevoni uvikhoganchova.
Pakhuva umunu uyale nduyu yu nikhedaya. ila pakhuva ningave nemwene uvupepowango.
Inave ninogwa ukhwedaya, sananiva inkonyofu, ulwakuva naninchoovaga uvutilweli. Ila nibekhela ukhwedaya, ili ave asipali vevoni uvakhusagila fivi pakwanya paago kholikho ekhokhive nekha igati ndyune au ukhupulekhekhe khulwune.
Sanekhedaye ulwakhuva inyivonelo inchoo ajaabu. Ulwakhuva, sanidendiwa na matingo, elitoni lwa vekhiwe igati ndyune, usung'wa va ndugu khukhonesya onenee, ili nesite ukhupendukha ukhuva nulwedayo.
Ifisekhe vidatu nekhanchoovile mumbaha khukhusu ela, ili omwene okhukhencha ukhukhuma khulwune.
Umwene akhambula, “Uluhungu lwango lukwelile khulwune, inave amakha givomba ukhuva ipepe. Inave, nenganogweficha ulwedayo ukhulengana uvupepo wetu, niogwa uvuwesyo uvya Kilisiti vuwesya ukhutama pakwanya palyunee.
Hata evo nikwelanila ukhukongana nu Kilisti, inave uvupepo, mu maganilo, mu taabu, mukhutesivwa, inave bado ulendokuto, ulwakhuva usekhe ugunavile nuvupepo, tena nelena makha.
One nevile inkonyoofu! umwe mwa nyumelinche khu ele, ulwakhuva na niva nimuliwe numwe. Ulwakhuva sanala pasi khabisa khu vale avavikhelangiwa vasikhiwa— vanono, inave one siyo khantu.
Ulwedekho ulwayilweli ulwa vasikhiwa twavombikhe pagati palwufwe nu lweyumilenchoo, nchivonekha nchakhuswiga nemigendelo.
Khulugendo lulekho monogelamile ukhuva pasi pa tembile inchisigile, ila onene sanave inchigo khulwumwe? Musyekhele khunongwa inchi!
Lolaa! one ninogwa okhwincha khulwumwe mara ya datu. Saniva inchigo khulwumwe, olwakhuva saninogwa ekhenu. Nikhuvonogwa omwe. Ulwakhuva avana savinogiwa ukhuvekha ifyapongera. Pakhuva yamwene, avavakha vinogiwa ukhuvekha ifyapongera khwa khuvatanga avana.
Nikhovokha sana ukhutumikha nukhutumekhewa mbunogwe wenyo. Inave nivaganile finchoo, ninogiwa ukhuganiwa padebe?
Ila inave vuyelevo, sanekhavalekhele unchingo umwe. Ulwakhuva one nelemanyi sana, une ne navakolile omwe nale ndo khuva navawene khuvudesi.
Te, nekhatolile nu khwevombela ifyapakwanya khwa vevoni uvenekhasukhile khulwumwe?
Nambulaninche uTito ukhwincha khulwumwe, ne khasung'ile ulokolo ayonge okhwincha pupaninie? Je, uTito avavombile ifinu fihi? Je, satwagendile munjila yila yila? Je, satwagende mulwayo lula lula?
Mutile khusekhe gwoni ugu tulekhwetetela yufwe twevene khulwumwe? Khuvulongolo khwa Nguluve, nu Kriisti, tuvile twinchova khelakhela khunjela iyakhuvemikha omwe.
Inave nele nulutende ukhuta nelava nikhwinchi nesite okhuvavona omwe ndo luninogwa. Nele nulotende ukhuta muwesya msite ukhumbona one ndolo mwinogwa. Nele nulutende ukhuta palava namalumbano, uwifu, umwinukhu ugwa luvipo, uvwegane uvwa vemwene, uvudesi, ekhiburi, na matata.
Nele nulutende ukhuva upuyakhanivuya tena, Unguluve vango iwesya ukhunyisya pavulongolo palwumwe. Nele nulutende ukhuta yuniwesya ukhwelelesya na vingi avava vombile imbivi usekhe ugu, na avasavadovele ulusyekhelo, nu vuligu ni mbombo inchinchivombiwa.
Aha hasekhe kha datu ukhuta nikhwincha khulwumwe. “Khila nongwa au luvonekhelo lwa avasaidi vavile avadatu.”
Nenchovile khu avo avavombile imbivi khusana na khuvange voni akhasekhe vunevile ukhwa mara ya vele, ninchoova tena: Nelava nikhwincha tena, sanikhavapolekhenche.
Nikhuvavula umwe ele ulwakhuva munogwa ukhulonda uwemeleli inave uYiesu inchoova ukhugendela onene. Umwene sio ipepe khulwumwe, pakhuva umwene, umwene vialeni ngufu igati mumwene.
Ulwakhuva atesiwe pa vupepe, ulwakhuva itama pa maha aga Nguruve. Ulwakhuva uwe tule vapepe, igati mumwene, ulwakhuva tutama nave humakha aga Nguruve pupaninie nufwe.
Mwelole mwevene ingave mule mulwedekho lwango. Mmwegelage khumwe. Samulumanyile ukhuta uYiesu alegati indyumwe? Umwene mwale, navone twita ekhekhwanekheneho.
Nele nuvukifu ukhuta umwe ya mukhulumanya ukhuta ufwe twabeliwe.
Leno putudova khwa Nguruve ukhuta mulekhe ukhuvomba khokhoni ekhevivi. Sanidova ukhuta ufwe tuvetuvonikhe tulemwile ingelo, badala yake ninaomba kwamba muweze kufanya kilicho sahihi, Ingawa tunaweza kuonekana tumeshindwa jaribu.
Ulwakuva afwe satukhawesya ukhuvomba lyolyoni khuesana ne hodi, ulwakhuva tuvomba uvuyayelweli tu.
Ulwakhuva tukhovokhea usekhe vutule nuvupepe nayumwe vumulena makha. Tudova ukhuta nuve muvomba ulwedekho.
Nikhwandikha embombo inchvunelekhutali numwe, inave usekhe uguyakha niva numwe nelekhe uvukali. Saninogwa ukhutumila uvuvaha umbaha agahamile one nejenge na sio ukhunanga pasi.
Inave, valokolo vagosi na avadala, khovokhaga! vombaga imbombo nukhuvuja, mukanga nchanage ni numbula, mwedekha ne yumwe khwa yumwe, mutamage nulusayo. Nu Nguluve uvalugano nulusayo iva paninie numwe.
Ponaniga mwevene nukhujibu uvuvalanche.
Avapelela voni vikhovapomwa.
Nene Paulo umbanda sanili mbanda ukhuhuma kuvanu khange ukhugendela kwu munu, une ukhugendele mwa Yesu Klisite nu Nguluve Dada uvya chusi ncha kuhuma kuvufwe.
Paninie na valokolo lwango voni, nikhugusimbila umpelela gwa Vagalatia.
Uluhungu luve khulyumwe nu lwidiko ulwihuma kwa Nguluve uDada vitu nuntwa u Yesu Klisite,
uvyaihumiche mwene khwu nongwa inchito ukhuta atupoke mu myaka igi igya vuvivi, ukhukongana nu lugano lwa Nguluve vetu nu Dada.
Kumwene vuve vuvanche sikhu nchoni.
Ni dega ukhuva msyetuka khimbivi kwu livangili ilinge. Nidegi ukhuva msyetukhila kuvutali ukhuma khu mwene uviavilangile khuluhungu lwa Klisite.
Lesikuli ilivangili ilinge, lino kulivange avanu avikhuvalondela isida nukhunugwa ukhunche nyia ilivangili ililivunge nilyu twa va vulile kuhiumwe akhotoliwage.
Lakini hata kama ni sisi au malaika mbinguni atatangaza kwenu injili tofauti na ile tuliyoitangaza kwenu, na alaaniwe.
Nduvu tuchovile pavutengulilo, khange lino nichova, “Ingave kulimunu ikhuvavula ilivangili ili livunge nilyu mwupilile akhatoliwage.”
Ulwa khuva lino nilonda uvwa yilweli vwa vanu au uNguluve? Nilonda ukhuvahovosya avanu? Ingave nikwendelela ukhugela ukhuvahovosya avanu, une sanili mbombi va Klisite.
Valokolo lwango ninogwa umwe mlomanye ukuta ilivangili ilyo ninchova salihoma ku munu.
Sanaupilile khu munu khange sana manyesiwe. Lwale luvonekelo lwa Yesu Klisite kyulyune.
Mmvile mmupulike imitamile gyango igya kusana udini ya vuyuta, ummuyikhavelile vunikhu ligatancha khuvukali itembile ya Nguluve pakyanya pagelelo nu kuliya ncha.
Une nilikwendelela ni dini ya kiyuta avalokolo lwango vingi vayuta nikhele ne mmaka fincho mmvile gya dada vango.
UNguluve anogolwe ukhung'ala une ukhuhuma mwitumbu mwe mama. Akhanyilanga une ukhugendele mu nduhungu lwa mwene.
Ukhumbonesya unswambe mgati ndyone une nintangasye umwene khuvanu ava panji, khange sanalonde avakunanga khimbili nu nkisa,
nukutoga ukhuluta khwu Yelusalemu kwu vala uvuvale vavanda une vubadu. Une nikhaluta kyu valabu nu khukilivuka kwu Damesiki.
Vugilutile immyakha gidatu nikhatoga ukhuluta kwu Yelusalemu kwu ngendela uKefa, nikhatama nave ifigono kumi na tano
ukwa sanavavone avavanda avange yumwene uYakobo, ulukololwe va nkolodeva.
Lola khuvulongolo kwa Nguluve sanisyova ikyu nikwandika khuliumwe.
Pu nikhalufa ku mikoa gya Shamu na kwu Kilikia.
Sanilikuma nyikhikha kumiho ga tembile iya vayuta ugugale mmumbu Klisite,
valikupulikhe vuvule, “Umwene uvyalikhutu nyanya mikha lino ikhulunchuva ulwidiko lwulwa alikhulu nanga.”
Valikhugina uNguluve.
Imiakha kumi na nne nalutile khavili khu Yelusalemu paninie nu Barnaba. Nitolile uTito paninye nune.
Nikhalutile pakhuva uNguluve aevonisie khuliune ukhuta ni khanogiwa ukhuluta. Navikhile khuvulongolo ilimenyu avapanji nachoviwaga avalongochi navombile ewo ukhuhakekesia ukhuta saninyila au nikhanyilile vuvule.
Vope u Tito, uviakhale paninie nune, uviakhale Myunani, andasimiswa ukhutahiliwa.
Ilijambo ili ukhahumile mkhekolo ikia vudesi vainchile khusile khupelelesia uvu huru uvutwale nao mgati mwa Yesu Klisite. Vanogilwe ukhutuveka pasi pa ndagelo.
Satukhihumia ukhuva pulikha khusekhi gumo ukhuta ilimenyu lya lueli lisigale lijige vulevule lisite ukhubadelekha khuliumwe.
Vala ava choviwe ukhuta vakhale valongonchi savanchagele khikhioni khuliune. Nkhinkhoni ekheva likhuvomba sakhi khale ne mana khuliane. UNguluve sinkhuikha uvupelelo wa vanu.
Vakha mbona ukhuta niaminiwe ukhulumbelela ilimenyu khuvala awa savalanchiwe. Ekhava ndu uPetro alumbilile ilimenyu khuvala avavalanchiwe.
Ulwakhuva uNguluve, avombile embombo mgati mwa Petro savuli ya vuvanda nkhuvala avavalanche, nkhange avombile imbombo mugati mundiune khuvanu avapanchi.
Usinkhi uYakobo, u Kefa, nu Yohana, vamanyikhikhi ukhuta vancheengile itembile, valumanyile ulukhungu une, vatupokhile mugati mululundamano une nu Barnaba. Vagakhile ewo ukhuta putulutage khuvanu avapanchi avava chiwe.
Vatunogilwe ufue ukhuvakumbukha avatolwe. Une na yune nilikhunogwa ukhuvomba embombo iye.
Usikhi Kefa avilenchile Antiokia, nakiline inave pavuvalafu ulwakhuva ale intula nongwa.
Badala ya vanu avadebe ukhuitsa ukhuhuma kua Yakobo, Kefa alikuva ilya paninie na vapanchi. Ingave avanu avavile vinchile alekhine ukhukhega ukhuma khu vanu avapanji. Akhava idwada avanu avano guaga indagelo.
Vulevule Avayuta avange valungine nuvusongerenie uvu paninie nu Kefa. Pulikha humela leno Barnaba atoliwe nuvusongerehani wa vene.
Uluava nelolile ukhuta valekhuva savikonga elivangeliilwa lweli, niambulile uKefa pamiho ga vene voni, “Ingave umwe mule Vayahudi mbona imitamilo gevile gya lugevaanu avapanchi ukutama nda vanu avayuta?”
Ufwe yufwe tuli Vayahudi tuhaliwe satuli “Vanu va panzi avale mbivi”
ulumanye ukhuta asikhuli uviivalilwa ale pavuye lweli pa mbombo ncha ndagelo. Pulino vivaliwa uwayelweli mulwidekho igati mwa Yesu Klisite. Tukhinchile khu luedekho mgati mwa Klisite Yesu ukhuta tuvaleliwa uvuyelweli mugati mwa Klisite pasita khuvaliwa ni mbombo khu mivombelo gusikhuli umbili, ugukhi guvaliwa uwa yelweli.
Pulino tungave tukhundanda uNguluve khwa khutu valela inonu mugati mwa Klisite, tukhevona yufwe ukhuta tulini mbivi Klisite awekhiwe isuhiwa wa mbivi? Ate!
Ningave nivikha uluhuvelo luango ukhutuncha indagelo, ikhinu ikhi namalile ukhukhencha, nikhivonesya yune ukhuta nivomba imbivi.
Ukhukhuma khululagelo nikhafua khululagelo, lino ninogiwa ukhutama nu Nguluve.
Nitasiwa paninye nu Yesu sio une leno, yune nitama uKlisite. Viitama mnumbula yango. Amaisha ugunitama mu mbili nitama nulwidikho munumbula ya umwana va uNguluve, uvanganile akhihumia khu njela yango une.
Sanibela ulukhungu lwa uNguluve, ulugano lwa lenkho, ukhuhumila ingave ilweli yekhale puile ukhumila Klisite vuapule.
Wagalatia avapelwa, ni likho ilya vuvivi ilwanangile? U Yesu Klisite savonisye ukuta mwe uYesu savungiwe kumiho ginyo?
Une ninogwa nilumanye ukuhuma kulyumwe. Mwe mwapokile umepo umbalanche kumbombo iya ndagilo nu kwidika inso mwapulikhe?
Umwe, muliva pelwa ukulutilila? Lino mwatengwile khu mepo umbalanche mumalage mumumbili?
Lino mwagatantsiwe khu mbombo inyingi vuvule, kama kweli yalikuwa ya bure?
Lino ula uvihomya umepo umbalanche khulyamwe khuvomba imbombo incha makha ukhu kongana ni ndagilo incha khupulikhana nu lwidikho?
U Abrahamu “Amwidikye u Nguluve pu akha mbalila ukhuta inya yelweli”.
Vuvuwa mwidikhe ukhuta, vala ava vikhumwidikha viva vana va Abrahamu.
Uvuvigi wanchovilwe ukhuta uNguluve angale avavalile uwayilweli avanu ava nkhilunga viva ne enjiela eyavulweli. Ilimenyu elilumbiliwa nu Abrahamu: “Ukhuma ufwe khuva ukhilunga voni vasanyiwe”.
Ukhuta pongela vavo vale nu wayelweli vasayi wage paninye nu Abrahamu uviale nulwidiko.
Ava vihuvila imbo insa ndagilo valipasi pa lugelo. Ulwakhuva vuvigiwe, “Akotoliwe umunu uvesikwivbatana ni mbombo nsoni, agugandikhiwe mukhitabu ikyandagilo.”
Lino galipa vuvalafu uNguluve sikhumbalila u munu pa vulweli numo khundagilo, ulwa khuva unyavulweli itama nu lwidiko”.
Ululagilo luhumana nu lwidiko, uvivomba imbombo mululagilo, itamaga mululagilo.”
UYesu atupokhile ukhuhuma indukoto ulwa lulagilo pa nsikhi upupa vombikhe ulukoto. Ulwa khuva pandikhiwe apita, “Akotoliwe umunu uvevi khutovelelwa mu bikhi.”
Uvufumbwe vukhale ukhuta, lusayo ulukhale kwa Ibrahimu ntsa njintsage khuva khilunga nu Klisite u Yesu, ulwa khuva uwesya ukhwupilila indagano insa mepo umbalanjie ukhugendela mundwidikho.
Valukolo lwango, ninsova numwe khivumunu unsikhi ugugwale gwa lwidihano khivumunu lwasilile ukhuvikhiwa na makha, lisikhuli uviiwesya ukhulibeda nu ukwongelenja.
Lino ulwidihano lwansoviwe nu Ibrahimu ikhivumbuko khikyo sa khinsova, “Ni fivumbukho,” ukhuva manyisya vavingi, puninsova khu munu yumo u Klisite.
Lino ni nsova ndee, ululagilo ululwa injile 430 sayihensa ululagilo. Ulwa khuva ndunyavuhale, vukhale wiwage ndululagilo, ndalii sawi injile khu njila ya lwidihano.
U Nguluve akhuminji nche vuvule kwa Ibrahimu khunjila ya lwidihano.
Khikhi lino ululagilo lwa vikhiwe? Yongele nchiwe khuvwutila nongwa, pu ung'olwa uva Ibrahimu inche kuvala avene avidikhiwe. Ululagilo uluvikhiwe ukhugandela khusugwa uvi isayanincha.
Lino usayanye ikhutuvu ukhulutila khumunu yumo, nu Nguluve aliyumo.
Ulwa khuva indagilo njilivunge nu lwidihano lwa Nguluve? Bakho! Ulwa kuva ululagilo ulwa huminje lwale na makha aga khumya uwomi, wa lweli uvuvu vonekha mundagilo.
Lino uvuvige vudendile imbombo usoni insa mbivi. UNguluve avombile ulwidihano nu ukutupokha mudwidiko ulwa Yesu Klisite khu avanya lwidiko.
Ulwakhuva ulwidiko ulwa Klisite, sa lwa inje twakhungiwe pasi pa ndagilo ipakha lwinje uluvonekhelo ulwa lwidiko.
Ulwa khuva ululagilo luvombekha ndundongo nji vito pa lwidihano ulwa Klisite upuainjile, ukhuta tuvalilagwe imbulweli nu lugano.
Lino ulwakuwa ulwidikho lwintsile pasi pa ndolenji.
Ulwa khuva umwe mwivoni na vana va Nguluve ukhugendela mundwidikho ulwa Klisite uYesu.
Voni ava onchiwe mwa Klisite mwifwikhile uKlisite.
Asikuli Unjahudi Uyunani, nu uvambwavukhe, ugosi nu dala, ulwa khuva ava voni valiyumo wa mwa Klisite u Yesu.
Ulwakhuva umwe mwiva Klisite, lino mwaholilwe khwa Ibrahimu, avahale vakhilunga kya ndagano.
Nikhuvavula ukhuta maadamu unya vuhare ve mwana, sasutine nusung'wa, hata inave indolenchii va finu fyoni.
Pakhuva ya mwene, alepasi pa vuloleli nu mwemelenchii mpakha usekhe uguvekhiwe nu daadaa va mwene.
Ukhokongana nayufwe, uvutukhale vana, tukhibateliwe mbusu ng'wa wa ndagero inchaa Nguluve.
Usekhe gugwene wugufikhe, uNguluve asukhile oswambe, ong'olwa va dala, ong'olwa pasi palolagelo.
Avombile ndete ili avokholo voni avalepasi pa ndagero, ili twupele ukhuva nda vana.
Ulwa khuva umwe mulevana, uNguluve asung'ile umepo ombalaje igati mu numbura incheto, umepo uyikhelanga, “Abba, Daada.”
Ulwakhuva sulesung'wa tena ila ule mwana. Inave ule mwana, uveve pure vuhare wa Nguluve.
Ata khasekhe, usekhe ugusamwamanyile uNguluve, mwale vasung'wa khuvala avanya manguluve gavo.
Leno uhuta mu manyile uNguluve, au ukhuta mumanyikhe nu Nguluve, inave mukilivokha khusana khu ndagero imepe incha lutanchii inchivovole egarama? Leno munogwa uhuva vasung'wa tena?
Mukwibata khuvogorofu isikhu inchi nogire, uvosemo wa mwenchi, emisekhe, ne miakha ni dwada khwa ajili yenyo.
Nidwada ukhuta khu namna eyenge neteesinche vovole.
Nikhovadovaa, valokolo, muvinchage ndulunelevo, olwakhuva nivile ndulu murevo.
Samng'arinche. Ila mulumanyile ukhuta wale vosabisye wa vutamu uwambele ukhuta na lumbelile ekhwilongwi enonu ukhukhuma khu sana.
Inave ombelee gwango gwa vavekhile mundugero, samukhambede nukhumbela. Tena mukha nyupelile wita insung'wa va Nguluve, khukhuta navile Yesu Klisite mwene.
Ulwa khuva, lulendakhu ulukhekhelo lwenyo? ingave nikhuvavula umwe ukhuta, yiwesekhana, mwa muhenche amikho genyo mume one.
Leno, nivile imbivi khulyumwe nevile nikhuvavula eyayelweli?
Vikhovalonda khuvunogwe ila siokhu manonu. Vinogwa ukhutunangang'wa uve nufwe tusite ukhukhukonga.
Vunonu fincho ukhuva nu vonogwe olwakhuva khunonu ncheene, sio usekhe uguniva pupaninie.
Avanango avadebe, neletamu namasikhitekho khwajili yenyo impakha u Klisite akholiwe igati ndyumwe.
Ninogwa uhuva pupaninie numwe leno nukhupendula amamenyu gango, ulwakhuva nelenu wasiwasi igati indyumwe.
Imbuleone, umwe yumwe mwinogwa uhuva pasi pa rulagelo, samupulekha urulagero vulwinchova?
Olwakhuva nesimbile uhuta u Abrahamu avile na vana avademi vavele, uyunge khwa dala onsunkhwa oyunge khwa dala omwavukhe.
Ola uvasunkhwa akho dala omwavukhe akholiwe ni ndagano.
Amamenyu aga giwesya okhonchoviwa khwa ekhekhwani olwakhuva ava dala ava vikhwanana na malagano gavele. Oyunge akhumile mukhewamba ekhwa Sinai. Ikhola avana ava viva vasung'wa. Unywa ve Hajiri.
Leno Hajiri vekhewamba khwa Sinai kherekho Arabuni. Khikhwananinchwa ne Yerusalemu eyaleno, olwakhuva insung'wa na vana va mwene.
Leno Yerusalemu yilekhukwanya nu wavukhe, je uyo ve mama veto.
Olwakhuva yisimbiwe, “Rukhekhero, vedala uvesa wikhola, yuve sawikhola. Wove elimenyu wovele ndo khekhelo, uve yuve solenchoovele nukhokhola. Olwa khuva vingi avana avayusikhola, pa kianya paula uyalenogosi.”
Leno lokolo, inave u Isaka, umwe mulevana va ndagano.
Khusekhe gula ugu gwita umunu uyakholiwe ulwa khuva umbele gukhuteswa uyakholiwe khwa mepo umbalanchee. Leno vuvule vule.
Uvusimbe witandeti? “Ing'enche udala unsung'wa paninie nu swambe. Olwa khuva umwana va sung'wa sihare paninie nu mwana va dala omwuvukhe.”
Inave, lokolo, ufwe satulivana va dala unsung'wa, ila va dala omwuvukhe.
Ulwa khuva u Klisite atupile uvudehe pu tuve vadehe pwu mwemage nu uvugolofu msite ukhwibatiwa nu uvwusuhiwa.
Lola ne Paulo, nihovavola ukhuta mngaheketiwe, Klisite sahavatange khu njila yoyoni.
Pwu nihovavola ukhuta hela angosi uveaheketiwe ukhuta yilondiwa akonganage nu lulagilo lwoni.
Mtengiwe khutali nu Klisite, voni “avivaliwa uvogolofu wa ndagilo, mgwile hutali nu lusayo.
Ulwakhuva hu njila ya mepo, nu luhungu tugulela uvujimu wa lweli.
Khwa Klisite Yesu uhukeketiwa nu ukhusitakeketwa sahulenamaana gogoni. Ulwedeho lwene lulovomba embombo ukhugenela ndu gaano, pwu hiva khenu.
Muhanyilaga imbelo vononu, veni akhavabenchinche ukhwedeka elweli?
Uwosongeleji uva khuvombe incho sawukhomane nu mwene yaywa avelangile umwe.
Ekhelunchi hedebe khiluncha pa vuvakha.
Nelenulohovohelo numwe mwa Nkuludeva ukhuta samhasage khu njila eyenge. Uyunge uvuyaheva ihovayacha yigega uhuhegiwa khwa mwene.
Valokolo inave mpilagela ukhuheketa, khehi nigatanchiwa? Khu kherwekhehivekha ukhusiga ekidaming'ani khinangiwa.
Vunogwe vwango ukhuta vavo vikhuvalongoncha fivi vikhelamia vavo.
U Nguluve avelangile umwe, valokolo, khu vudehe. Msite ukhuvovombela uvudehe wenyo insekhe gwa mbele.
Hulugano mvombelanilage yomwe khwa yomwe. Ulwakhuva indagilo nzoni nzigolwike mbu lulagilo lumo yinogiwa uhogana unino ndu weganile uve.”
Leno mkalumanage nu hulichana, mwelolelage ukhuta samhenangania yomwe khuva yomwe.
Nihovavola ukhuta, mgendage mu mepo, samlavulekha uvonogwe wa mbele.
Ulwakhuva umbele kule nu uvonogwe vuvaha ulemehana ne numbula, ne numbula yele nuvonogwe vuvaha ukhulemehana nu mbele. Inchi chilemehana eyenge ne nine. Pu yehomile ukhuta samuvomba ifinu ifyo mwinogwa ukhuvivomba.
Engave e numbula yikho valongoncha umwe, samwiva ndolagelo.
Leno imbombo incha mbele inchivonekha, uvwuligu, uvwulami, uwvulyasi,
inyesayo incha fikhwani, uvwuhavi, uvwuvivi, imbancha, amasago amavivi, elyoyo, ukhulemehana, ukhulehehana,
Ehetule, uvwuganchi, akhyoyona agange ndaga. Nikhovavonga umwe, ndu vavongile pavwutanchi, ukhuta vavovivomba ndago savahapate uvwukhale ndu deva lwa Nguluve.
Isekhe incha numbula ulugano, uluhekelo, luhungu, ukhweyumelencha, uwipa, ikhisa, ulwidikho, Uvwudehe, ne pavwudebe.
Losikhuli ululagilo ulululemekihana nancho.
Vwala avwa Klisite Yesu vwakhegiwe umbele nu uvonogwe vwa vene uvwuvivi.
Tungatamage nu mepo, nukhugenda ne mepo.
Tusite ukhuva nu kweginio, tusite ukhukalanchana khela munu nu nine, tusite ukhuva ne khetuule.
Ulukololo anibatehe humbivi umwe yelueli mtahiwa uhukilivula ulukololo hunumbula eya vupole uhuyelewa yumwe msite uhugeliwa.
Mgegelanile emichigo mkamelesiwe indagelo cha Klisite.
Inave umunu yoyoni ihevona nonu wakati sinonu iheswova vuvule.
Hela munu apime imbombo ya mwene avene henu yuywa mwene uhwevona bila uhwelula yoywa.
Uhuva hela munu ayigega uchigo gwa mwene.
Umunu uvamanyile elimenyu ambole amanonu goni umwalimu va mwene.
Msite uhudetela. U Nguluve sidohiwa umunu uviivyala alabena.
Yoywa iviala imbeyu ya hatale iya tavango alabena uvuvivi lakini uve iviala embayu katika u mepo avabene uwomi va sihu choni uhuhuma hu Mepo.
Tusite uhugatala uhuvomba amanonu maana usehe tulabene tuna site uhukata etamaa.
Ululeno umda ugu tu pwatwiva nenafa tuvombe amanonu hela yumo tuvombe inono sana huvavo vale gati mludiho.
Lola uvuvaha uwa kalata yeyo nivandikhile hu mavoho gango yune.
Vavo vinogwa uhu vomba amanonu umvilolela umbili vuvene vinogwa mkehetiwe vivomba evo ili vasite uhwingila hutabu ya hedamilinga ni ihwa Klisite.
Maana hata vava vakehetiwe vavo savibite ululagilo vinogwa umwe mkehetiwe iliviginihechage imivele ginyo.
Yesite uhuhumela ne hegina isipokhuva huhedamilinga nia ihia Yesu Klisite. Uhugendela mwene ehelonga hetesihe na yune nilimhelonga.
Uhuva sio lasima uhukehetiwa kabula ya uhuhotiwa uhupia hu lasima.
Huvanu voni avavitama hundagelo ichi eamanine hulumachive hukianya hwa Nguluve.
Uhwanja leno umunu asite uhuneswa, maana negegile unguli gwa Yesu umbile gwango.
Uluhungu lwa kuludeva uYesu Klisite yeve nu mepo gienyo lokolo. Amina.
Paulo, avasikhiwa va Yeesu nuogane vamwene o Nguluve, avavekhiwe khumbombo ya hutwa navovo vile Efeso vedesi khwa Kristi.
Oluhungo luve hyolyomwe olunchehecho khwa Daada O Yeesu Kristi.
Unguluve nu Daada uvakholo deva u Yeesu Kelesti aginiwage vemwene atusayile khulusayo lywa khenumbula khosehemu ya khokyanya kho Yeesu Kelesiti.
Wusaheuombiwe chelonga Unguluve ahatuchangwile ufye yufye fule nu unonchehencho khwa Khelesiti. Ahatunchagwile ufye tuvenchage vavalanche tolekhe ukholaumki khya Kelesiti.
Khologano lya Nguluve ahtonchagwile ohoma khovotengololo ilitoliwe nuvana vamwene u Yeesu Kelesiti.
Amutokeo gamwene Unguluve tuhopa isifa nulohongo nuvotukufu wa mwene. Ekho kihyene ekhokatupile vole huhyela ya ogane vamwene.
Ulwakuva hogane vamwene tugomboliwe ukhugendela mkisa yuamwene, olusye helo lya mbivi tulenalyo elyo hosabu ya votayeli walohongo lya mwene.
Akavombile olohongo uvo hujili yeto nebusara nu luhara.
Unguluve ahovombile uhota uamanyehe hulyofye avolyeli vovwa wofihile no pango, ohohomana novosongo wagati mwa kelesiti.
Usehe gotimelie opango gwamwene, Unguluve ilondamanya pupaninye hela henu kya hukinya nehopakyanya pahelunga igani mwa kelesiti.
Usehe ugwa Kelesite tohaviletonchaguliwe nuhosuhudela osehe. Wosangofihe yoni eyeyeho mine nupango uyiwomba ifinu lyoni ifunu vyakuswelu igagane vamwene.
Unguluve ahavombile evetovepo ilitowesye uhuvepo ndoginwo lyamwene. Tohale vahyanja uhova na vojasili egati mwa Kelesiti.
Yehale enjela ya Kelesiti uhuta mpolehe elimenyu lya lyeli, einjili ya wosiwa wenyo honjela ya Kelesiti. Yehale nohota omuemwe musangini nuhutwa ong'uli gwa Enumbula Ombalanche vyaginwe.
Enumbula yasamimi ya uvolisi weto impaha totavale ipaka upo yaha vuvoneha. Eye yehale hosifa yaloginwo iyamwene.
Ulwakuva eye, uhuhuma uwuka votopolike uhohusu ulwoleho lyenyo egati mwa Untwa Yeesu ukhuhusu ulogano lyenyo hovoni avatengiwe homwine.
Sanene valekhile ukhoginya Unguluve khusababu yenyo nohovataja kholesayo lyango.
Nikhovadava ukhuta Unguluve no Daada veto Uyeesu Kelesiti, Udaada va lyodwado, tuhovapa umepo uvaluhara, uluvunchelo lya vofahamu lyamwene.
Nidava ukhuta amiho genyo gamunumbula gavehiwe ulumuli hulyomwe ilimo lomanye wowolehu uvojasili wakhyelangiwa hyulwomwe. Nidova mlomanye ohuta uvatayeli wavodwado nuvulisi wa mwene vavo vahatenyiwe hujili ya mwene.
Nidova ohota mlomanye uvuvana vosidile ingovu nchizidile egate dwofye tole lenetumaini uvovovaha wohomine nohivomba embombo minyofu ncha mwene.
Ngangomaha agavombihe mmbombo ya Kelesiti wakati Unguluve achosinche uhoma huvofye nuhutamuha mwavoho gamwene hohevoha ekhyahege musehemu ya Nguluve.
Ahatamih Ukelesiti hyokyanya hutaki huvotawala, nahylalitawa elianchoviwa. ahatamihe Unguluve sio huwakati uwa khosehe ogoguhyi cha leno.
Unguluve afidwanchinche paasi pamalonde ga Nguluve ambombile uhuva pakyonya pafinu nyoni mkanisa.
Elikanisa khota gombele gwa mwene uvokamilifu wamwene uwowidega ifinu fyoni mjela nchooni.
Nduvumufwile mumbunanginuvutala nongwa nchienyo.
yale muaga ukhuta khtale mwagendaga ukhukongana ni misiekhe gya lhilunga eikhi. Pumwagendaga ukhukongana nuvulogonchi nuva vaha wa mbaha va mumaveingo. Eiyie yu numbula ya ula uvivoomba imbombo muvaana va vugalukhe.
Ufwe twivooni khatale twale pupaninie navo avasavikwideekha. Pululikhuvomba khunjila eiyavunogwe uvuvivi gyeito. Putuliekhuvomba nchavunogwe wa mbeili nuvamanyi weito. Twaale vakhivumbukhu kya vana avanya huviipo ndavaange.
Pakhuva Unguluve adegile uvadekhedekhe ukhukongana nulugano lwa mwene uluhutiliile ulwantuganile ufwe.
Useikhe ugutwale mumbufwe mumbutula nongwa weito, akhatugega mumitamile eimipya mugati mwa Kilisite. Luhungu pakhuta mupokhiwe.
Unguluve atunchusinche paninie nukhutuveikha tutamage pupaninie baho pali pakyanya igati mwa Yeesu Ukilisite.
Agaile awo ukhuta eimsikhe eigikhiwincha atuvonesye uvukavi vuvaha uwa luhungu lwa mwene. Khutuvonesya ufwe eili khunchila ya luhunga lwa mweene igati mwa Yeesu Ukilisiti.
Munduhungu mokhiwe manchila ya lwedeekho ni yie sayuhume khulyafwe. Vuvaonle wa Nguluve.
Sayihumile ni mbombo, umunu uviavenchaga, alekhe nu khuveepo na umo uvakhwiginia.
Ulwankhuva ufwe tulimbombo ya Nguluve, tupeliwe mwa Yiisu Ukilisite ukhuvoomba imbombo inonu. Nchumbombo inchi inchu Unguluve aviekhile ukhuhuma khatale savali yieto.
Puleino mukhumbukhe ukhuta khatale mwale vanu vapanji khimbeili. Pumukhilangiwe- “mwisamuvalanchiwe” khukhila khikyo khikilangiwa kivalanche kya kuvalanchiwa kimbieli ikyukhivoombekha na mavookho ga vaanu.
Khuseikhi ugwa mwale vatenge kwa Kilisiti. Mwale vagenji khuvana va vaisrael. Mwale vagenji khundano ya lwideehano samwale vamanyi vaseikhi ugu gukwincha. Mwale vanchila Nguluve mukhilunga.
Puleino ule mwa Yeesu Ukilisite umwe yumwe khatale mwale khutali nu Nguluve muhegelanchiwe kwa Nguluve nu kisa gwa Yeesu Kilisiti.
Ulwankuva umwene velunonchencho lweito. Agupelile umbieli ukhuta guve ngamo. Khumbieli gwa mwene alunagile uluviego lwa valenge.
Pu akhabeincha indaagilo nu lusutu ni nyiiho ukhuta ampele umunu umo upya igati mumwene. Pwakapela ulunonchehencho.
Avombile ewo ukhuta vasayane avafipuga fiviele ifyavaanu ukhva imbileli ngumo kwa Nguluve khunchila ya khidamiliehnie. Khunchile ya khida ya khida milihanie avudunchiche uvulugu.
Uyeesu ainchila mukhunchova uluno nchehencho lhulyumwe mwimwale khutale nu lunonchehencho khuvala uvuvale pawipi.
Pakhuva khunjila eiya Kilisiti ufwe twivavieli tulipapaninie numepo ula Umepo ukhwinyila kwa Daada.
Puleino umwe mwivaano vambupanji samulivage nda njiela hange samulievagenchi. Pu muleivanekaya paninie na vala avateenge savuli ya Nguluve hange mulivaanu va munyumba ya Nguluve.
Pumunchengiwe mulyutu lwa vavanda na vamalago. Uyeesu Kilisiti yu mwene aleliwe livaha lya palukanji.
Mumwene eilinchenyo lyooni leilungani nchiwe papaninie ndietembile mugati Mutwa.
Mugati mumwene umwe na yumwe munchengiwe papaninie nda ponu apa khutaama pa Nguluve na Mepo umbalanche.
Ku njila iya une ne Pavulo ne kungwa va Yeesu kilisite nu nongwa yeno mvi vangapanji.
Nikwidika ukhuta mupulike ku mbombo ya luhungu lwa Nguluve uhuamile kwa nongwa yenyo.
Nikuvasimbila ukuhumana nu luvonekelo ulaluvonike kulione. Uvu wayilweli uwifihile ulunosimbile kikedebe mu halata iyinge.
Vu vukugakimba aga, vuwyesya ukulumanya uluhala lwango imbuyilweli uwifihile mwa Kilisiti.
Infikolo ifinge uvayilweli uvo sawavombeke vumemyikile kuvona va vanu. Pu lino ulo vulipavuvalafu ku Mempo va vaposihili avimikiiwe na vanyamalago.

Panogile ukuvamulikila avanu voni ukuhuma nu vufumbwe ivya Nguluve uwefihile. Uvu vufumbwe wa Nguluve uwa waifihile ku miaka mingi imitaji, nu Nguluve uvi apelile ifinu vyoni.
