Pu lieno nihuveila ukhusuha mbeiveimbeivei yakhiva neilumanyile khinukheikhi eikhiyakhihumeila khulyune.
Leino neiumanyile mwa Nkuludeva pakhaseikhi akhadebe akhasigile.
Pu lieno ni sangha ukhuta lunonu ukhumbuncha khulyumwe Epafradito. Umwene lukolo lwango hange imbomba mbombo nchango, ilwa indweila linghoha paninie nune, hange veisuhivwa veinyo veitangeile va fyavunonywe ifyu nikhufilonda.
Ulwakhuva ale nuvusukwa uvwakhuva paninie numwe mweivoni, puakhasusuvala fincho, nduvumupulikhe ukhuta akhale itamu.
Ulwakhuva akhale itamu fincho sakhale na makha lweli aleikhulemwa ukhwitanga akhale ndumunu uvipasinghalile padebe ukhufwa. Pu Unguluve akhandolela ikhisa, pu Unguluve sakolile ikhisa uywa mwene sakolile akhale neikhisa na palyune, ukhuta neilekhe ukhuva nulususuvalo pa lususuvalo.
Pu leino neitatile finchu ukhunkilivula khulyumwe khyahanila ukhuta yakhiva mukhumbona hange muve nuluhekhelo pu na yune uvudwanchi vwiva vuhenghile.
Mumwupilile u Epafradito munditavwa lwa Nkuludeva munduhekhelo lyoni. Muvadwadanghe avanu avalei ndavule ukhuta vanu vakhudwadiwa vuvuvwa.
Ulwakhuva akhale pa mbombo ya Keileisite akhale nyakhufwa savuli ya Keileisite. Pusaleikhwisanghila pavwumi vwa mwene pakhumanga une pala upumukhamilwe umwe pakhasinghalile ukhunanga pakhuva mukhale kutali nune.
Pu lieno valukololwango muhekhelanghe mwa Nkuludeva. Sanikhuvuvona uvunghatale nu khunghatanchiva pakhuva simbila amamenyu nghalanghala. Pakhuva angha anghanonghelanile palyumwe.
Mweilolelanghe nukhwivandeikha nimbwa hange navavombi avavivi. Mweilolelanghe navala avikheiveyanga nukhwikengheta vavo eimiveilei ghyavo.
Ulwakhuva ufwe fwefwe tukunghitwe. Tweitukhisaya khwa Nguluve mbulangeili vwa Mepo. Tweitukheinghi neiheincha mwa Keileisite uYeisu, hange twaisatuleivakifu kheimbeilei.
Na pope, khungale khuve nu munu unyakhunghuhuveila umbeilei unghu une puniale nikhunghuhuveila ukhuluteila.
Pakhuva niakenghetiwe eikhi nghono eikhya nnana. Pu une neileing'olwa vakhikolo eikhya vana va Vaislaeili. Ne iliva nkivumbukhu eikhya Benyamini. Neilei Ng'ebulinei mwana va hebuli. Mukhunchivombela indangheilo ncha Mose niale, Ifalisayo.
Pakhungimba khwango nianghunghatinche Upelela. Pakhuva neileikhuncheimikha indanghilo ncha Mose, saniale nuvunangi munangi mundanghilo incho niale ingolofu.
Pu lieno imbombo nchila inchuneilei khuvona nchikhumbuleila une pakhuva neileikhuvona muincho vukasi, pu lieno mwa Kkeileisite neinchivwene ukhuta sanahikhumbumbuleila khinu.
Vaheingho leino pa neikhunchivona imbombo nchila nchoni ukhuta savukavi pakhuva nivuvwene uvunonu mwa Yeisu uKeileisite Unkuludeva vango. Savuli ya mwene neinchilekhile nchila nchooni neikhunchivona nchinyalisya pakhukava uKeileisite
pu neivonekhe munghati mu mwene. Neileimbula vungolofu vwango yune pakhunchikongelela indangheilo, pu neilinuvungholofu mundweideikho ulwa khumweideikha uKeileisite, ulweideikho ulwihuma khwa Nguluve, ulweitotikhe mulweideikho.
Leino ninonghwa ukhumanya umwene na makha ngha vunchukha vwa mwene nuvunkuveilwa vwa mwene. Nilonda ukhuta ndeikheihwani khya Keileisite mumbufwe vwa mwene,
ukhuta neive nuluhuveilo mumbunchukha vw vafwile.
Sakhukhuta neimaleile ukhunchikava incho, ewo pakhuta neivile ngolofu mwincho. Pu neikhetanga ukhukava khila ukhyuneikavile mwa Keileisite uYeisu.
Valukolo sanisangha pakhuta neimalile ukhukava angha. Pu lieno nivombo leimo. Nisamwa angha khusana nikhunghahuveila angha mbulongolo.
Ningimba ukhufikheila uvufumbwe ukhuta puneikave ikhyuma khya khukyanya ikhyanyeilango ya Nnguluve mwa Yeisu Keileisite.
Tweivoni tweilunkuleile uvupokhi panonghile ukhusangha ndavule. Pu engave uyunge isangha vunge, pu Unguluve vope ikhutudeindulelangha pa eilyo tulumanye.
Pu leino apa uputuleipwo putunghendelelanghe mu eilyo.
Valokolo mung'onganghe une. Muvalolanghe fincho vala avavinghenda mulunghendo ulwa khihwani khyieto.
Avingi avitama vuvala vavo eimiseikhi mingi neivavulile, na leileino nikhuvavula neileila ninyihonchi - vingi vatama untwa tavangwa va khidamileihanie khya Keileisite.
Uvumaleilo vwavo vunangi. Ulwakhuva Unghuluve vavo eilitumbu, na matingo ngavo ngalei musoni nchavo. Puvisangha imbombo ncha nkeilunga.
Humbe eikaya yeito yeileikhukyanya, ukhyutukhungh'uveila upokhi veito uYeisu Keileisite.
Puyaihambula eimiveilei ghyieto emilenghetu pungiva ndumbeilei nghwa mwene unghwa vweimeikhiwa; khumakha nghalanghala anghikhutanga ukhufivonesya fyooni.
Pu lieno vanghane vango, yumwe nikhuvakuveila, yumwe luhekhelo nuludeingh'uleilo lwango, mweime khikangafu mwa Nkuludeva. Umwe mweivamanyani vango mweivanghane.
Nikhukhusimeileincha uve Evudiya, nikhukhusimeileincha na yuve Sintike, mukilivule ulweideihano lwa lunonchehencho mundyumwe, ulwakhuva umwe mweivaveilei mwale paninie nu Nkuludeva.
Lweli, nikhuvasiima hange na yumwe mweivavomba mbombo vayango, muvatanganghe avadala ava ulwakhuva vavombangha paninie nune pakhupuleisya eilivangeili lya Nkuludeva vutulei Kelementi navange avalanghilangha pa mbombo uvu avo amatavwa nghavo nghalei mukata ya vwumi.
Muhekhelanghe mwa Nkuludeva isikhu nchooni hange niita muhekhelanghe.
Uvudekhedekhe vwinyo vumanyeikheikhe khuvanu vooni. Unkuludeva aleipipi.
Muleingatanchangha kumbombo eiyavenchangha. Pu lieno, muvombanghe imbombo nchienyo nchooni munyeisayo, nukhudova paninie nukhuleimya. Nifyumwinonghwa fimanyeikheikhe khwa Nguluve.
Pu leino ulunoncehencho lwa Nguluve ululuteilile khumanyi vyooni, yeivalolele inumbula ncheinyo na ncheinyo na masanghe ngheinyo nghooni, munumbula ngheili wa Yeisu Keileisite.
Pu lieno, valukolo lwango; mweisangheilage fincho imbombo nchooni inchinyayeilweli, ulwadwado, uvulweli, nuvunonu, ulunghano nangala anghanghinchova ikhulongu einonu, anghaluhala, paninie nanghala anghilonda ukhwimekhiwa.
Munghavumbelelanghe nghala nghoni unghumumanyile, unghumunghambeilile nunghumupulikhe na nghala ungumunghavwene khulyune, pa na vope uDada yeiyo uvalunonchehencho ive nchangha numwe.
Neilei nuluhekhelo uluvaha fincho palyumwe mwa Nkuludeva ulwakhuva umwe muvonisye khange uvunongwe weinyo uvwakhunghendelela kweinyo pafila ifyu nilonda, ndaveimungave samwave nu seikhi unghwa khunanga.
Saniita ewo ukhuta neikave ifyuninonghwa fininie mbunonghwe vwango. Ulwakhuva neimanyile pa njeila nchoni khukweilamila.
Neikhimanyile ukhutama pakhusita khukweilanila na pakhuva nafyo fyu fingi. Mumivele nghyoni einghi neimanyila ukhuveikha munumbula mumileile pa seikhi unghwa nyinghute nu mwakhuleila paseikhi unghwa njala, khukhuta pakhuva nafyo na pakhusita ukhuvuka nafyo.
Neileinamakha nghakhuvomba angha mumakha ngha Mwene uvei ikhuma amakha.
Pope mwanghahile vunonu ukhuva paninie nunu mumbunkuvilwa vwanjala yango.
Umwe mwei va Filipi mulumanyile ukhuta uvutenghuleilo vwa livangeili vuneihenghile ukhuhuma khu Makedoniya, sakhwale nupelela nupelela unghwa tangeilangha ukhukongana nukhwihumya nu khupeila pu umwe mwei vene.
Nu pala upuniale khu Tesalonikhe, umwe mwasuhile uvulangeili vwa finu sa yale khamo pumwaluleilile na pakyanya savuli ya fila ifyuneileikhufilonda une.
Saniita nilonda ukhulangheiliwa. Puniita ewo ukhuta punchivonekhe isekhe khulyumwe inchiluteilile nchincho nchinghengha uvukavi khulyumwe mumbaleilo yeinyo.
Nwupelile ifinu fyoni, pu lieno neideinghile ifinu fingi. Nwupelile ifinu fyeinyo ukhuhuma khwa Epafradito. Finu finonu fifyo finuheileila wita mono, ifyufikhweideikhiwa fifyo fyoni fyeipelile nekhelo yeiyo Unguluve ayeinghanile.
Savuli ya eiyo, Unguluve vango ikhuvonghelenchangha nukhudeincha ifyavunonghwe weinyo mu mbukavi vwa wimeikhiwavwa mwene mwa Yeisu Keileisite.
Leino khwa Nguluve uDaada yeito luve lweimeikho ulwa sikhu nchoni. Ameni.
Muvaponianghe voni avavalanche aveideikhi mwa Yeisu uKeileisite. Avanghane uvuneile navo apa vikhuvaponia.
Hange naveideikhi voni apa vikhuvaponia findo vala ava munyumba ya Kesali.
Pu leino uluhungu lwa Nkuludeva veito uYeisu Keileisite luvenchanghe mumwanya ngweinyo.
U Pavuli, unsuhiwa va Klisiti uYesu, kuolunghano ulwa Nguluve, nuo Timoteo uwo kholo weito,
avaluokhololweito avavalanche na veidhiekhi mwa Klisite, vavo valiekhuo Kolosai. Uluosayo luovienchaghe khuolyuomwe, nuluononchehencho, ulwiehuoma khwa Nguluve Udada veitu.
Tuosana khwa Nguluve, Udada va Nkhuluodeva veitou uo Yesu Klisti, pwuo tukhuvadhovela amanchuva ghoni.
Ukhuohuoma upwuotukhapuoliekhe ulwiedhiekho lweinyo mwa Klisiti uYesu nuo lughano uluomuolienalwo khuo vavalanche voni.
Mlienuolughano uolu ulwakhuva muelienuoluohuvielo ulumuviekhieliwe khuokyanya uluo inongwa nchayene mkhapuoliekhe khatale khuoliemenyu eilyalweli ukhuhuma khuolivangeili,
lielyo lienchile khulyuomwe. Nduvuoleileiwo muonkhilungha kyoni. Liehola iesekhe nuokhuokhula, ndduvuliekhuola khuolyuomwe ukhuohuoma eilinchuva leilyo mwaphuoliekhe mukhulumanya ukhulutieliela ulusayo ulwa Nguluve muwayielweli.
Eili lyuo liemenyu lielyo mwapuoliekhe ukhuohuoma khwa Epafla, uoghane veitu uombombie veito, yuoywa iembombo uoghatalufu umwiedhiehinchi mwa Klisiti khuolyuomwe.
Uo Epafla vie mwene avombiele ukhuvaluovonekhe khuolyufwe ulugano lwenyo mwo Mepo.
Khuonongwa eiyaluoghano uolu, ukhuohuoma, satwielekhielwe ukhuovadovela. Ukhuta mudhienchiwe uvuomanyi ouwa lughano lwa mwene mundhuohala ulwavuomanyi uwa mughati munumbula.
Muluotaghe nuokhuonoghela mumieghendele gyienyo khuo Nkhuluodeva mung'ovosyaghe. Pwuo muoholaghe isekhe khuombombo inonu nukhuoluotielila mundhuohala uolwa Nghuluve.
Muovombeliewagwe khumakha ghoni ukhuonkhongha na mankha aghavuotwa uwa mwene mukweiyuomieliencha nukwieikhasya kwoni.
Pwuo twidhova ukhuta, khuoluohekhelo, musanagha khwa Dada, yuo ywa avaviekhiela umwe ukhuva mukhave ukhutama khuvuhale uwa vavalanche muonduomuli.
Umwene vie atuophokhiele muomaka agha akhatwienghiencha muonduouheva ulwa Mwana uvalughano ulwa mwene.
Uvie khuomwene tuophokhiewe, khuokhuota uvuosyiekhielo uwa mbievi.
Umwene vie khiekwani kya Nghuoluve uovisievonekha. Uvieatataliele ukhuoholiwa khuofinu fyoni.
Ulwakhuva khumwene ifinu fyoni fyavuombiewe, fifyo filiekhuokyanya nafilienkhielunga fifyo fivonekha ifinge safivonekha. pwu fingave fya ludeva niefya vuntwa apanghe fya vuololeli apanghe ifinymakha, ifinu fyoni fyavuombiewe nuo mwene ukhuva fya mwene yuoywa.
Umwene vie ale kwale ifinu fyoni vuo visiphali, pwu ifinu fyoni fikwibatana khuomwene pwuo panienie.
Umwene veintwe gwa mbeile khuokhuota eintembiele, umwene vie vuotengulielo vie ng'olwa uviataliela khu vavo vafwiele, ukhuota ave vakhuolongola khufyoni.
Ulwakhuva khuomwene kwa noghile ukhuova kwiedhiehane ukhuotama mughati muomwene,
nuo kuosayania ifinu fyoni khuomwene khuo wuomi uwa mwene wa vombiele uluononchehencho khuo nkhisa ugwa khiedhamihani kya mwene, khumwene pwuo fiva fyuo finu iefileinkielunga apanghe ifilikhuokyanya.
Nayuomwe, khuo nsiekhie ghuomo mkhale vagheni va kwa Nguluve khaghe mkhale vatavangwa va mwene muondhuohala na mumieghendele eimievivi avalunghanienche leino.
Khuo mbeile nie nyama ya mwene, ukhuofwa khwa mwene, ukhuota avagheghe umwe khuovulongholo khuomwene avalievuvule iembievi khange savieheighiewa,
mwieyuomielienchaghe muondwiedhiekho, khanghe muviekhiewe pakhanya pa lwuoto, mukhava namakha ukhulekha ukhuvahencha pavutali paluohuvielo ulwamakha ulwa lie vangieli leilyo muophuoliekhe. Eile lyuo lievangeili eilenchoviwe khuo khieilamunu yuoywa avuombiwe pasi leilyo khulyuone nie Pavuli, nie viele iembombi.
Lieno oulu niehovokha uluovavo lwango khuolyumwe. Une nievombela khiembeile gwango eikhiehegha khuoluovavo ulwa Klisitikhuoluovavo ulwa mbieli ugwa mwene, guogwa yuo tembile.
Uone nieliembombi va tembile ieyie, yieliehaniele nuo vuovombeli uvuonaupeiliele ukhuohuoma khw Nguluve khulyumwe, ukhuodiencha eiliemenyu lya Nguluve.
Eyie yuo lweli yeiyo yiekhale khuovuotitu yiekhafiehieme khuomyakha eimingi na khuvuoholiwa khuovanu voni vavo viekwieidhiekha khuomwene.
Khuo vavo Unguluve akhanogilwe ukhuovavonesya vukhuoliewe uvuonuno uwa vutajeili uovuoliekhuovuotitu kuvatenge, vope vie Klisti muoghati muondyuomwe, uluohuoveilo ulwa ludeva.
Umwene uofwe vei tuoluombieliela iembombo ienchamwene pwuo tuovuongha khiela munu, nuokhuomanyisya khiela munu mundhuohala lwoni, tukave ukhuoghegha khiela munu umwiedhiekhie mwa Klisiti.
Pwuo nayuone niehangayiekha khuoliemenyu lie leilyo, niekhetanga ukhuovomba eimbombo khuomwene uovievomba eimbombo mughati mu ndyuane khuo makha.
Ulwakhuva nienogwa muluomanye vuowa niekhahangayiekhagha khuombombo nchienyo, khuovoni vavo valiekhuo Laodikia na khuovoni vavo savambwene pamiho palyuone pha mbieli.
Nievomba ewo ukhuta ienumbula nchavene nchiehovokhe ukwincha ienumbula nchavene nchiehovokhe ukwinch pwuo phanienie khuo luoghano luohala, ukhulumanya inchakhuovuotitu ienchalweli iencha Nguluve, uvie vie Klisiti.
Uvie Khuomwene kyoni eikyuoma eikya luhala nie kya vumanyi fifihiwe.
Nienchova ewo ukhuta alavasyovagha umunu khuo mamenyu aghakhuvasonga.
Hange sanielie pwuopanienie nuomwe khiembieli, nielie puopanienie numwe khiemasagho, nihovoka ukhuta eimighendele gyienyo minonu, na makha aghalwiedhikho lyienyo mwa Klisti.
Nduvu mumwuophieliele uo Klisti Untwa, mughendaghe mumwene.
Mwieyiebataghe muo mwene, ulwakhuva muvekhiewe ukhuova na makha muondwie diekho, nduvuomumanyile, muolutielielaghe ukhuosana.
Pwu mulolaghe ukhuta umunu alavatolagha uluhala khuo mamenyu aghakhuvasyova ghagho vuophieliele khuovanu, ukhuokhongana nie ndaghielo iencha nkhielunga, nchincho sanchiloncha khwa Klisti.
Ulwakhuva khumwene vutwa uvueluolufu woni uwa Nguluve khie mbielu.
Nayuomwe mukweilaniele khuomwene yuoywa vei intwe gwa vutwa woni uwa vuololeli.
Khuo mwene mukheghetiwe ukhuokheghetiwa khuokhwa saghakheghite amavokho ukhuofula uombiele ugwa nyama, ukhuokheghetiwa nuo Klisti.
Ulwakhuva mwasieliwe pwupaninie nuo mwene vumuokwonchiwa. Pwu mukhanchukha khulweidiekho khuomakha agha Nguluve, uveianchusinche khuovuofwe.
Umwe upwuomukhafwiele khuo nongwa ncheinyo vusamukheghetiwe eimiveile gyienyo, akhavaviekha ukhuva muolievuomu luninie nuo mwene, pwuo akhatusyiekhiela imbivi nchetuo nchoni.
Pwu akhahencha eikhalata yiela yieyo yasimbiwe yieliekhuotuohiegha uvuhieghi uwa mwene, yale nuvutavangwa khuolyuofwe akhahencha ukhuta yieve yiesipali khavieli akhayiefwela pakhiedamihani.
Akhahencha amakha nuovuololeli akhanchieveka pavuovalafu nu khuova nchaluhekhela oululutieliele pha khiedhamihani kya mwene.
Umunu atavahieghagha uomwe pakhulya apange pakhunywa, hange ulwakhuva luohekhelo apange umwenchi vuogwiehuoma, apange palienchuva eilivalanche.
Imbombo inchi kheipepenchela kya mbombo iechiekwiencha uombieli vie Kliisti.
Umunu alavapokhagha eikyumukhaviele vuomusana khuolughano ulwa mwene vuvule nukwiesaya khuvasuhwa. Umunu uovyaliewo pwuo iekwingheila muombombo ienchanchie wene nuokhuovasonga mumasagho gha mwene aghakhiembielie.
Sikhuogwiebata uontwe, ghuogwa uombiele gwoni iefielungheilo fya yene na mancheghe viluonghiwe nuo kwiebatana pwuo panienie; hanghe pwuo fiekhuola ukhuokhuola ukwiehoma khwa Nguluve.
Engave mwafiwiele luonienie nuo Klisti mukhanchielekha iendhaghelo ienchatalile ienchankhieluongha, Pwui kheikhi mukhieviekha mundagheilo, ndavavo vietama mukhielungha:
“Muliebatagha, hanghe mulavonjagha, hanghe mulabasyagha”?
Inchoni iencho nchienangheikhagha vuonchivombeliewa munyghankhongaghe iendagheilo nuluomanyisyo ulwavanu.
Imbombo iencho pwuo nchievonekho ukhuta nchaluhala khunchila eiyakwisaya iyomwieveikhiela yuomwe, nukhuosana muokhuololela umbiele ugwavukhali. Hange sanchienoghiele kheinu ukhuosiga khuvuonogwe uwa mbiele.
Khanghe ulwakhuova Unguluve avanchuosinche luonienie nuo Klisti, pwuo mulondaghe ifyakhuo kyanya ukhuo uKlisti itamiele khuokhievokho eikyandyo eikya Nguluve.
Musaghaghe eilie khuokyanya, mwielekhelwe ukhuosagha ienchapasi.
Ulwakhuova mwafwiele, uwuomi wienyo vufihieme luonie nuo Klisti mwa Nguluve.
U Klisiti alava iekhuotuvonekhela, uvie mwuomi khuolyoufwe, pwuo nayuomwe pwuo muodiendudiwa lluonienie nuo mwene muombuotwa.
Hange mubede ifimaghiekha fienyo fifyo filiemukhielungha, uvuolieghu, uvuvivi, ukhuonogwa ukhuovivi, amasagho amavivi, nuo khuonogwa, ulwa luo lweisayo ulwa fihwani.
Khuo mbombo ienchi pwuo lukwiencha uluoviepho ulwa Nguluve.
Khuo iencho nayoumwe mwale nancho enchi, vuomutama khuombombo ienchi.
Leino pwuo muohenche iembombo ienchi nchoni. Eilyoyo, uluoviepho, uvuovivi, amadhuuosi, mumilomo gyienyo.
Mwielekhelwe ukhuovuotana uvuodhesi, ulwakhuova mufuliele muhenchienche uvuomunu wienyo uwakhatale, nie mbombo nchayene.
Mufwaliele umbiele umpya, ughuovombeliewe uvuopya munduohala lwa yuoywa avavuombiele.
Munduohala uolu pwuo iva asiphali uYunani nuo Njahudi, ukhuokheghetiwa no khulekha ukhuokheghetiwa, unyaluohala nuo uviealievuovuole uluhala, uonsuhiwa na yuoywa sansuhiwa uKlisti vie nchoni, khuonchoni.
Ukhuova muvile vahaliwa va Nguluve, vavalanche mughaniwe, muofyale ienumbula ieya khiesa, eiyawiepha, ieyakweiyiesya, eiyakhiesa, nuokwieyuomieliencha.
Mugheghanaghe yuomwe, musyiekhielanilaghe yuomwe khielamunu nuo niene. Iengave khwa uomunu uoviekhuonkhutiela uonine ansyiekhiele vule vule nduo vuo unkhuludeva avasyiekhiele uomwe.
Khuo mbombo nchoni iencho muvienchaghe nuluoghano, luolwa luo lyuoto ulwa wiedhiekhie.
Uluononchehencho ulwa Klisti luo luvalongonchaghe munumbula ncheinyo. Luluvielangile munumbula ncheinyo ukhuova mwaeilangiwe khuo mbeile ghuomo.
Nie liemenyu eilya Klisti lyuo lieve lienghi lietame muoghati munumbula ncheinyo; munduohala iwoni, mumanyisyaniaghe nuo khuoluoghano nie nyiembo, nie nyiembo ienchamunumbula. Mwiembaghe nuokhosana munumbula nchienyo khwa Nguluve.
Khuo khiela khienu eikyumuovomba khumamenyu apange muvomba khuombombo muvombaghe nchoni muonditawa eilya Ntwa uYesu. Vumuokhuonghienia uo Nghuluve uo Dada khuo Mwene.
Mwie vadala mulevaghe khuovaghosi veinyo, nduvu omunoghiele khuonkhuluodheva.
Nayuomwe mwievaghosi, muvaghanaghe avadala veinyo mulekhaghe ukhuva vaphala.
Mwie vana muvapulioliekhaghe avahonchi veinyo khuo mbombo nchoni, ulwakhuva vuokhuonoghela khuo Nkhuluodheva.
Umwe mwie va dada mlekhaghe ukhuvasakhancha avana veinyo, pwuo vivanuvuoghatale uwa kwielekhelwa.
Umwe vasuhiwa, muvapuoliekhaghe vavo khiembielie vantwa veinyo, khuo mbombo nchoni, ukhuolekha ukhuova vasuhiwa nchoni, ukhuolekha ukhuova vasuhiwa pamiho, ndavavo viekhiehilieka khuovanu, pielondiwa uvuogholofu uwa nuombula, vuomukhuomwiedhiekha unkhuludheva.
Nchoni ienchuomuovomba, muvombaghe khuonumbula khuo Nkhuluodheva hange ukhuolekha khuovanu.
Mluomanyaghe ukhuota muolupieliela khuonkhuludheva uluohombo uwa vuohale. Muokhuombombela Untwa uYesu Klisti.
Ulwakhuva uvievomba imbivi vyaluophieliela uluhombo ulwa mbivi inchamwene, umwene sikhuondhola khuomiho.
Mwie vantwa, muvapienchaghe avavanda vienyo ifyawayielweli ifyavuononu. Muluomanyaghe ukhuta nayuomwe mlienave Unkhuludheva khuokyanya.
Mwieyuomielienchaghe ukhughiemba ukhuodhova. Mtamaghe miho nukhuodhova nukhuosana.
Muotuodhovelaghe nayuofwe, ukhuota Unguluve atudhiendhuliele eimilyango khuo liemenyu eilyamwene, tuonchovaghe ienchefihiele iencha Klisiti. Nchincho iencha khuomwene niekhuonghiewe.
Ukhuota nienchievieikhe pavuovalafu, ndhuvuo nchielondhiwa ukhuonchoviewa.
Muoluotaghe nuoluhala pavulongholo khuovavo valiekhuonji, vumukhuo ghuophokha uonsiekhie.
Amamenyu ghienyo ghavenchaghe nuluosayo amanchuva ghoni, ghanoghaghe umwinyo, pwuo muluomanyaghe umwakhuo vandha avanu voni.
Tikiko, vielunkholo lwangho vieghane, viembombi vienonu, vei nghane vangho khuo Ntwa, avalavuola imbombo nchangho nchoni.
Uvieniensuhile khuolyumwe khuo eilyo, ukhuota munchiemanye eimbombo nchienyo umwene vie ikhuovahovosya einumbula nchieinyo.
Panienei nu Onesimo, ulunkholo lwangho uononu uoghane, umunu uvakhuominyo. Avo vuyaviekhuovavula iembombo nchoni ienchaphakhaya apha.
U Alistakho, yuoywa akhuonghiwe luonienie nuone, eikhuovaponia, nuo Malika umwie pwave va mwene, uo Balinaba uviemuvupieliele iendaghielo nchamwene, anghienche khulyumwe muomwuopeiliele,”
Nuo Yesu uvievikhuontamboula vie Yusito. Avo vuo avanu avakheghetiwe hange avo vene vuvievomba eimbombo nuone khuo nongwa ieyaa luodheva ulw Nghuoluve. Avene vuvakhale luncheso lyango.
Epafula uvyavile munu va khuominyo, unsuhiwa va Yesu Kklisti. Eikhuvaphonia, eikhietanga amanchuva ghoni ukhuodhova khuonongw ncheinyo, ukhuota mwieme mudhuolukhe nuo khuovonekha vuononu muombuonogwe uwa Nghuluove.
Ulwakhuva nikhuonchova ukhuota eikhie yuomieliencha khuolyuome, na khuovala vavo valiekhuo Laodiki, na khuo vavo valie khuo Hielapoli.
U Lukha uoghangha uoghane, nuo Dema viekhuovaponia.
Muvaponiaghe avaluonkholo lwangho vavo valiekhuo Laodikia, nuo Nimfa, ni tembile yeiyo yielie khuonyumba eiyamwene.
Ei balua eiye muonghamale ukwiemba khuolyuomwe, pwuo vakhiembe na khuo tembile ei ya khuo valaodikia. na khuo Laodikia muokhiembe youmwe.
Muombaule uo Alkipo, “Alolage vuononu uvuovombeli vuowa akhaviela khuo Ntwa, ukhuota lienkhonghiwe.”
Uluosamusyo iwango uone nie - Pavuoli. Khuokhie voko kyango yuone. Mkhuombuokhaghe ukhaunkhungiwa khwangho uone. uluosayo luovienchaghe pwuo panie nie nuomwe.
Paulo, siliwano no Timotheo mpelela gwa wathesalonike muangoleve O Daada nutwa o Yiesu Kelesti. Ologano ne lyecieo love numwe.
Tusana hela wakati hya Nguluve yenyo mwevoni o wakati tohowa nchova mlyesayo lyetu.
Satusamwa nohuduga pamiho ha Daada no Nguluve mmbombo yenyo ya lyedeo, ohweyomele ncha ndogano, nohwe ksya na jasili wapongela no Nguluve Yesu Kristi.
Muvalokolo lyango yamwenganiwe no Nguluve, tohomanyile olyedeho lyenyo.
Elimenyu lyeto omolinchile holofye sio holimenyu two, linchile ni ngofu, Nomepo, ambalanhe nowohakika. Honamna eyo, motomanyile hoho ofye to hale wanu vanana yelehu, nyihi msafywa la gwenyo yenyo.
Mhale vanu va hofwago ofye no Nguluve, olorupolihe elimenyu mtabu na mlaha eyeomine Nomepo ombanche.
Na matokeo gayene, mvile ifyano gwa vanu voni Makedoni no Akaiya vavo vihyamini.
Olyahova elimenyu lya Nguluve legendile hyoni, nufye no Makedonia namakala twevene. Shohoma apowedisi wenyo hya Nguluve weneile hyoni ohohoma apo satunogiwa onchova hyohyoni.
Olyahova avene vihomya ululagelo holyofye, wohale wa mbomb nyihi holyofye. Vihotosimdela alologewihe a Nguluve ohohoma ehehwani ohombombela ongole oyavile inkavu no vayelyeli.
Vahahominche ululagelo ohola mhogujele omwana ohohoma hokinya, oyafufuhe ohohoma ndiguli. Nayo ve Yesu, oyoihotaveha huru ohoma madhabu eyeyihwicha.
Ulwakhuva umwe yumwe mloumanyile, valolukolo ukhuta ukwincha kwito khulu umwe satwinchile vavule.
Mloumanyile ukhuta pavutengulielo twako nvilwe khange vatuvambile inchasoni. Mlaumanyile ukhuta pavutenguleilo twakuveilwe khaange vakhatuvombela inchasoni ukhu khuvu Filipu, nduvu muloamanyile, twaale nuvukitu mwa nguluve ukhulinchoova ileivangeli lya Nguluve nabupala uvulipapingi.
Pakhuva indeekho njeito sanji ehumila nuvuvivi mbuliiyu ni ngofyo.
Nduvutwidekwiwe nu Nguluve nukwideekwi wa elivaangeli vutwita evwo. Twinchova khista khuvahovosya avaanu putukhung'ovoosya u Nguluve umwene veikhonchiwola inumbula achieto.
Pakhuva satwanchoovele amamenyu gakhihele hele usikhigyooni nduvu muloumanyile, hata ukhunchovela amamenyu ndagavudeesi mumbunogwe, u Nguluve intangeili veitu.
Khaange satwaloonile uvutonchivwa khuvaan hata ukhuhuma khuhuma khulyumwe hata khuvange. Satwale lumele ukhuluti viela ndavasuhwa avanya Kristi.
Patukhava vade khedeekhe khulyuumwe nduva uiyuuva ikhuva ndesya avana vamweene. Khunchiila eiyee twale vadekhedeekhe khulyume.
Ulakhuva mviile vagaane veito. Twalevadekhe uvamponinie sayale khulivangiile ilya Nguluve iyeene puyale na mumitamile gyieto yufwe pamiho ngeinyo pakhuva mviile vagaane veitu.
Pakhuva valoukolo mkumbukha imbomba nuvupala weito. Pakilo na pamusitulikhuvoomba imbombo ukhuta tulekhe ukhupa unchigo umunu uvi aveenchage. usikhi guyugwa, tulivakhuvahumbi leila elivangeili lya nguluve.
Umwe uloumanyile na yu Nguluve voope, vugoloo ju uvulindakheekhi, yelweli, khisitakhuvi peiliwa umutugendele laga yufwe pamiho ngiinyo mwimukwideekha. vuvuuwa mloumanyile tukhale ndakheekhi khu umo umo ndyumwe mwemukwideekha.
Vulevule yeighale ndakhikhi khulyumwe umo umo ndudaada umwaveelile khuvaana va mwene. nukhuva kasia inumbula tulikhuvaavula.
Ukhuta mukhanugile ukhugeenda nduvui nyielango yeinayo umuyeiveelile khwa Nguluve, uviavilangile khuludeeva nuvuvaacha vwamweene.
Puleino tukhomwalesya unguluuve khange imiseikhe gyooni. Ulwakhuva mwaupile ndeilimenyueleitava lya vaanu. Umwe, mwaupile nduvueilweeli umuyiiveelile, ilimenyu lya Nguluve. Lyulimenyu lya Nguluve eili ieluli voomba embombo mundyuumwe mweimukwideekha.
Puleino, valokolo, muve vaanu vakwiga imepeleela gya Nguluva gigyoo geili khuvayuuta mwa Yiisu Kristi. Pakhuva umwe leino mwakuvilwe mu mbombo nchilanchila ukhuhuma mbanu veinyo, nduvuyielevyo ukhuhuma khuvayuuta.
Vaale Vayuuta eena vabuudile Utwa u Yeesu paninie na vanyamalago. Vuvayuta vaavo vatusweimile tuhume khuunji. Savikhung'ovosya Unguluve khaange vaalugu khuvaanu vooni.
Valeikhutusiga tulekhe ukhunchoova navampanchi ukhuta vakave uvupokhi puyiekhavoonekha ukhuta vipitama ni mbivi nchaavo khuvumalilo puuluviipo iwinchile mbeene.
Ufwe, valokolo, putwalekhehine numwe khuseikhe usupi, khimbili, sayale khinumbula. Twavoombile khumakha geito hange twale nuvunoogwe ukhulutileila ukhunchivoona isuula ncheinyo.
Pakhuva twanogilwe ukhwinchi khulyumwe uneene ni pavuli, ukhaseikhe ndakhaleikhu na khaseikhe akhaange, puleino usetano atusigile.
Puleino ukwivoona khwito kyukhiinukhikhi pongeela, nu luhekhelo, nulundinguleilo lwa iwakhwigineihincha pamiho gatwa veito u Yeesu useikhe gwa khwincha kwamwene? Puumwe samuloutilila nduvuvalevyo avange?
Pakhuva umwe lwingi nehincho auluhekhelo lwito.
Pwu twevile, twilemwa ukwiyumilicha fijo, twasagile ukhu penogile usigala ku Athene twivene.
Twansuhile Utimoti, ulokolo lwito umbombi va Nguluve mwa Kilisti, ukuvajingacha nu kuvajesya indwindiko lwinyo.
Twagavombile aga akuta aleke nu yumo uvakute ngeyuka ameka ukuhumana nu vukuvilwa uvu, ulakuva mulomanyile ukuta tuliva helwa.
Cha yelilweli, unsiki upwa twale paninie numwe twatalile ukuvavula ukuta twale pipi ukuva mbukuvilwa nago, gahumile ndu vumulomanyile.
Kunongwa iyo na vile nilemwa ukwiyunilicha nansuhihi ukhuta nilumanye ulwidiko lwinyo. Pamoja ungeli avagelila ni mbombo yengo yiva ya vuvule.
Ulakova Utimoti aichile kulyufwe ukuhuma kulimwe akatugegela ikulo-nguli inono iya lwidiko nu lugano lusinyo. Atuvulile ukhuta mulini kikuvebuhichi ikinonu kuliufwe, na khuta mwinongwa ukutuvona ndu ufwe twinogwa ukuvavona unwe.
Ku sababu iyi valukolo tuvachesiwe fijo numwen kusababu ya lwidiko lwenyo, munubapala nu vukuvikwa wenyo woni.
Limo tutaalwa, ingave mukuvi ma mukikasya mwa kuludeva.
Tundimie ndkike Unguluve kumbomba yenyo, kuluhekelo lwoni ulutulinalwo kumiho ga Nguluve na kuliumwee?
Tudova ficho pakilo na pamusi ukhuta tufivona imbumila chenyo nu kuvongelecha ukwumudumukiwa indwidiko lwinyo.
Unguluve veto nu Daada yuwga, nu nkukudeva U Yesu atulongolele injila yeto kutufike kuliumwe.
Nu nkuludeva avombe mwongoleke nu kukula ndu ngano, vamuganana nu ukuvagana avanu voni nduvutwigeha kuviamwe.
Agohe vulevule ukugingecha indumwa chenyo bila nu vugolufu kumiho ge Nguluve vetu nu Daada vetu nu mbwijilo wa nkuludeva u Yesu paninie na vagolofu va mwene vone.
Kuvosililo, lukolo, tukuvankanganchainumbula nukuvandova khwa Yesu kliste. Nduvumwambilile ululagilo ukuhuma kulyufwe umuyilondiwa ukgenda nukunogela pa Nguluve, kunjila iliyo ya mugendage nukuvomba ukulutilila.
Ulwakuva mulumanyile nchuu ndagilo nyiki unchtwavapile ukugendela Untwa Uyesu.
Uvu vuwagane wa Nguluve: Uvuvalanche wenyo-ukut muuuleke uvuligu.
Ulwakuva kilamunu alumanyile umwakundolela undala vamwene yuywa mumbuvalanche nilisima.
Ulekee ukuva nundala kuvunogwe uwa mbile (Navanyapanchi avasa vamanyile Unguluve).
Aleka ukuva pwale umunu uvyakiva ilovoka ulukindi nu kumbipencha ulukololwe kunongwa iye. Ulwakuva untwa vi mwene kwitavulila kwu mbombo nchoni incho. Nduvu tukatalile ukuvavunga nukuvavula.
Ulwakuva untwa sakatwilange kuvuvivi akatwilangile kuvuvalanche.
Pivu uvyabelile ile sikuvabela avanu, iva ikubela Unguluve, uveikuvapa Umepo Umbalanche vamwene.
Pivu ulugano lwa lukolololwo, sapanogilwe umunu uviavenchaga ukusimba, ulwakuva mmanyisiwe nu Nguluve ukuganana yumwe kwa yumwe.
Lweli mwavombile inchi nchoni kuvalukolo avaliku Makeonia yoni, ulwakuva tukuwasimilencha, valukolo muvombe na kukulutilila.
Tukuvumilencha munogwe ukutama uvatamo uwakutunala, ukujisagile imbombo nchenyo nukuvomba imbombo namavoko genyo yumwe, nduvutukavatavulile.
Uvombe inchi pivu uwesye ukuluta vunonu nu ludwadwa kwu avalikunji mundwioliko, pivu mulekhe ukupungikiwa uvunogwe wone.
Satwinogwa umwe mulumanye uvusalyulweli, umwe valukolo kivu avo vagonelile, ulwakuva pivu yamsusuvala nda vange avasavikwidika incha nseke ugukwincha.

Ulwakuva Untwa yuywa alika ukuhumu mamuvingo. Alincha na lwovelo uluvaha nu nsukhwa umbaha, paninie ni ngalape iya Nguluve, pivu avafwile mbukilisti valata ukunchuka.
Pivu ufwe twivumi, yufwe tusigile, tulahanga mumavengo paninie nukumpokela Untwa kukyanya. Ku njila iye twiva nu Ntwa ifigono fyoni.

Ulugano lwantwa vitu Yesu kilisiti luve paninwe numwe.
UPaulo, uSilwano, nu Timoti, khulikanisa lya Wathesalonike ukhugendela khwa Nguluve nu Baba vitu Yesu Klisite.
Uluhungu luve khuwumwe nu lusayo ululwihuma khwa Nguluve Daada vito nu Baba vito uYesu Klisite.
Puyinogiwa ufye ukhusana Nguluve isikhu n'choni khunjila yinyo, lukolo lwango. Manya vutuliwo na vuyinogiwa, pakhuva ulwedekho lweto lwikhula finchi, nulugano lwenyo khukhila munu luve lwingi.
Lino yofye twe vene tukhivona pakianya paliomwe mumakanisa ga Nguluve. Twinchova eikhulo nfwi ya gulela khwenyo nu lwedikho ulumwehenalwo patabu yoni. Twin'cho eikhulongwi ya sida ei yumwikhava.
Ulu lulu vonekhelwa vuhegiwa lweli ya Nguluve mulogendo ulwa khuva umwe muvaleliwe ukhuva munoge laniele ukhwingila muludeva lwa Nguluve ulu mugata n'chiwa nalo.
Pakhuva elweli ya Nguluve ukhuva homba eitabu vala avikhuva tesya umwe,
nukhuvapa umwe uvunonu umwe mwitesekha paninwe nufye. Ivomba ewo pasekhe gwa khudenduliwa khusekhe gwa mwene udaada vito uYesu ukhuhuma khukianya paninwe na va sugwa avanya makha.
Avavikhile u mwoto vala voni avasava manyile uNguluve nava savi dwada eili vangelilwa Yesu Klisite.
Vatalesekha nulwo ngomen'cho lwa sikhu n'choni viva pange nu Daada nuvu vaha na makha ga mwene.
Ivomba alava ikhwin'cha pakhwemekhiwa na vanu voni, avasavedikhe pa mbombo n'cheto n'chinchi beluwe khuvene.
Khunjila iyetukhu va dovela umwe isikhu n'choni. Tukhuvadovela ukhuta uNguluve vito avavekhe mumbalilo ya vanu avanogile ukhwilangiwa.
Tudova imbombo n'chi mkave ukhu leginiwa eilitawa lya dada vito uYesu. Tudova nukhutamkhave nikhisa kya Nguluve neikya mwana va mwene u Yesu Klisite. Pu lino panogile ukhundimwa uNguluve, ei misikhe giomi savuli yenyo, vagane umwe yumwe muganiwe nuntwa ulwakhuva untwa avahalile umwe nde nekhelo ya khwanda ei ya vupokhi khuvu valan'che wa numbula nu lwedikho
Leno ukwincha khwa Yesu Klisite nukhu lundamana pu paninwee ili tuve nave: Nukhuvachova umwe mwe valukolo lwetu,
msite ukhugata n'chiwa nukhwon'chwa khembeve, namamenyu, khukata eyeyivonekha ukhuva yehumile khuliufye eyeyin'cho va ukhuta akhasekhe khafikhe.
Umunu asite ukhuva siova khunjila yuyoni ukhuta yekhuvi mpakha uvutulanongwa vuvonekhe taasi khumunu uviagalwekhe yakhiva avonekheliwe nu mwana ula uvavunangi.
Uyu vivyo ibela nukhubela uNguluve nukhwe vonesya ukhutavi Nguluve na kyukyo ni eikhidoviwa nekhihumla nukhutama mutembile ya Nguluve nukhwi vonesya ukhuta umwene vi Nguluve.
Samkumbukha ukhuta vunile numwe nakha vavulile imbombo n'chi?
Leno mlumanyile ukhuta khila eikhekhusiga awesye ukhudenduliwa khusekhe unonu ugu ya khuva gwifikha.
Pakhuva isili ya munu untula nogwa yivomba ei mbombo hata lino, pwale uvisiga ipakha yakhiva yivonekha einjila.
Pu ula unya khunanga alava eidenduliwa, uvi uYesu Klisite ekhubuda nu mwuya wa ndomo gwa mwene. Daada ukhumseikha ukhuva sio khinu khuluvonekelo ulwa khwin'cha khwa mwene.
Ukwin'cha khwa munu unya khunanga lukhwi n'cha khu njila ya setano, khumakha goni nulukenye mkho lwa vudesi,
nu vudesi wooni uva khibudi. Imbombo n'chi n'chiva kuvala avaviyaga, pakhuva salupokhile ulugano lwa lweli khunjila ya vupokhiwa vene.
Khu njila iyo uNguluve ikhuvatumila ei njila ei yenge iyavuvivi vakelage uvudesi.
Amatokeo gagene voni valahigiwa, vala avasa vikhudikha ei lweli pakhuva vikhe hovosya nuvutula nongwa.
Pu yinogiwa ukhu sana uNguluve khila sikhi khu njila yenyo valukolo yumwe muganiwe nu Daada. Udaada avahalile umwe ukhuva nekhelo ya vupokhi khu lusayo lwa mepo nulusayo ulwa lweli.
Ikhi khukhene avilangile umwe ukhugendela muli vange li pu mkave ulwe mikho, ulwa ntwavito uYesu Klisite.
Pulino va lukalo, mwemage khikangafu mlumanye uluino lula ulu mva manyile mulimenyu ewo mkatata yetu.
Puleno ntwa vito uYesu Klisite yumwene, nayu Nguluve udada yeto uvi atu ganile hange akhatupa ulun'chesyo lwa sikhu n'choni nuvukilu uvunonu uvukhwi n'cha ukhugendela mulimenyu,
avanchesye mwekhuva kangan'cha inumbula n'chenyo mulimenyu ulyo lya vincha ni mbombo inonu.
Pu lino valukolo, tudovelage, khunjila ya limenyu lya daada lewesye ukhuenela nukhuginvei, nduvuliliwo khuliumwe.
Mudove ukhuta tuwesye ukhokholiwa pa mbivi na vanu ava vivi, pakhu sio voni vali nu lwidikho.
Pa khuva udaada igolofu uvii khuvagolosya umwe nukhuvadima, ukhuma khunta vangwa.
Tulinavakifu munditawa lya Daada khujili yenyo, ukhuta muvomba na kwendelela ukhuvomba imbombo n'chi tukhuvalagila.
UDaada avalongon'che inumba n'cheinyo mulugano nuvukifu wa Klisite.
Lino tukhuvalagila valukolo, khulitawa lya Daada vito uYesu Klisite, ukhuta mwetenge na vanu avavita ma mu mbombo imbivi na syoo ukhuhumana nei nduuhumana neilweli eiyu mupokhile ukhuma khuli ufye.
Pakhuva yumwe mwei vene mulumanyile. Pupanogile ukhwigila khuli ufye satuli khutama ndavala ava n'chila vudwanchei.
Twa vomsile ewo sio pakhuva tuli va nchila vulamun'chi pakhuva twavombile emo.
Tuve khi khwani khuli umwe mkhimanye ukhutuleigila ufye. Ei ngave yumo sinogwa ukhuvomba ei mbombo asite ukhulya.

Munyumba ya umofu, siyo vyoni mufile ifiombe ifinonu tuu. Mufile ifyombo ifivivi. Fininwe ya ifi savuli ya vuvombelo wa ludwado na fininie na fininie ya fyene mabikhi nu manga.
Ingave umunu ikhivalancha yuywa ukhuma khu mamba amavivi, umwene iva nkhi ombo ikhi khwemekhiwa. Avavikhiwe pasima savoli ya vuvombeli watwa.
Uvulekhe uvunogo wa vadebe ukhukonga uwa yelueli ulwidikho, ulugano, ulunonchehencho, paninyie na avikhumwilanga utwa khunumbula inonu.
Umbombi vatwa sinogiwa ukhulwa. Inogiwa yinogiwa ave idekhedekhe khuvanu voni uviiwesya ukhumanyesya nu khwikasa.
Umbombi va Nguluve sinogiwa ukhulwa, inogiwa ukhuva itulifu khuvanu woni, uviwesya ukhumanyisya uvitulela.
Yinogiwa avamanyesye wala avavikhupinga. Ukhuva uNguluve iwesya ukhuva syiekhela ukuvumanya uvulweli.
Muwesia ukhupata uluhala khange ukhupa ga utego gwa Setano, ulwakhuva vasyovive nu setano khulugano lwa mwene.
Ululeno mlumanye isihu icha mwisio hwiha nu wakati uvugumu.
Uhuva avanu viheganaga vavo vinogwaga ihela viva nulwigino nu lwivono viva nesalau savaha pulehage huvazazi vavene vava valevuvile emwalimi vale ni mbivi.
Vavo vale bila lugano ulwa hatale savahanogwage ulunochehecho lwoni vicho aganiswa visingisia avasivihewesia uhwelehela avalene fulugu avasavinogwa amanunu.
Viva vabudaji avasavihwedeha viheganaga vavovene vinoguage uvu malaya kuliko uhugana uNguluve.
Hunji viva nesola eya Nguluve lakini vibelaga amaha ga mwene valehe avanu avo.
Uhuva avange vagosi avavi hwingela huhekolo cha vanu nuhuvavula avadala avapelwe ava vuvadala ava lenimbivi vavo vihwongosiwa ne tama eya hela nama.
Awadala awo vihefundeswa helasihu lakini saviweswa uhufihela muluhala ulwa lweli.
Kama vuvaleva Yane nu Yambre va emili tufauti nu Musa hunjeliyo va mwalimu va vudesi vihwe henyuma nelweli vuvanu avahalibihe uluhala lwavo avasavihwedeha uhuva nulwedeho.
Lakini saviluta hutali uhuva uvubelwa wavene vuva pavuvalafu huvanu voni kama umvahavilile avanu.
Leno uve ufatile amafunde sio gano nulugendo lango na malengo gango ulwediho nuhufumelela hwango uvugane wango nu vutulivu wango,
uhuteseha huhwa na patile Antiokia, Ikonio na Listra. Nafumelile amateso uNguluve anyonilwe amateso goni.
Voni avinoga uhutama humaha aga Nguluve hulitawa elwa Yesu Klisite viteseha.
Avanu avalenimbivi na vadesi vichiga mmbivi vihuva yacha na vange vavo vene vayagile.
Leno uve udumu amambo uguwavombile nu hugedeha uhuva wu hwelewa uhumanyile hwani.
Ulwakhuva kuhwelewa tangia huvudebe hwaho waga eliwe amandiho amatakatifu ago giweswa uhuhupa amafanihio ya hohoha hwaho enjela eya vupohi uwa Yesu Klisite.
Hela vusimbe vutiiwe ulukehelo ulwa Nguluve lifaa humafundesia agaline faida kwa huvavula nuhule hebisha amakosa no hufindisia uvuye lweli.
Ave umunu va Nguluve kamili ave apevilwe imbinu choni huajili ya uhuvomba embombo enonu.
Nihuhupa eliagizo huvulongolo hwa Nguluve nu Klisite Yesu, uvepya ihega avumi na avafile uhuva avunihe umbaha yuywa.
Lumbelela ilimenyu uve nuwakati uvuvufaa nu vusaufaa vavule avanu imbivi chavo kemea nu himisia vumelela amafundisio.
Uhuva vwiva nu nugehe avanu vitanganaga na mafundesio aga yelweli bada vilonda ava mwalimu avahuvafundesia uhulingana ni tama iyavene hunjela eye imbuluhutu chitehiwe.
Vihelehelwa uhupolehecha amafundesio ga lweli nu hugevuhela ihadisi.
Lino uve mwaminifu katika amambo goni vumelela amagumu vomba embombo iyavuinjilisti; timesia ehepawa hiaho.
Uhuva une nele tayali uhududeliwa usehe gwango gusilile.
Nesindile nu vuyeleli ulugendo ni malile uledeho nemalile.
Taji ya haki yevekiwe hwajili yango uhuva uNguluve ihaga hu hahi ayehuma esihu ela nasikwangu tu navavo vihugo jela uhuvune ha umwene.
Wetange whiicha hulione.
Uhuva dema andehile aheganile ehelonga ehwaleno alutile Thesalonike, Kreseni alutile Galatia, na Tito ahalutile Dalmatia.
U Luka viale pamoja nune utole u Maliko wichenave uhuva umwe na alinuvumhimu sana huliumwe huhuduma.
Nesuhile tikiko Efeso.
Lela iligwanda ilinali lehile ulilete pamoja nivitabu ivia ngwembe.
U Alekizanda suha viuma ambombile imbivi nyingi uNguluve alangomba hi fatana ni mivombelo egwa mwene.
Nayuve ujehadhali nu mwene alehupinga amamenyu geto.
Uhutetela hulione vahuanja, hakuna umunu yoyoni uvalihuva pamoja na hela munu alihundeha. UNguluve sava valele ilikosa.
Lakini uNguluve anyemile une ahama amaha uhugendela hulione elimenyu lichoviwe huva panzi vapate uhwideha umna ohuliwe mndomo ugwa Simba.
UNguluve ihunyepuswa nulu gendo uluvivi nuhu nyohola huvu vaha uwahukianya uvaha vuve isihuchoni. Amen.
Iponie Priska, Akila ne nyumba ya Onesiforo.
Erasto asigile hu Korintho, lakini tulifemo nandehile Mileto avile tamu.
Voluba haga kabla ya mepu. Eubulo ihuhuponi pia Pude, Lino, Claudia nu lokolo.
U Nguluve ale pamoja ni numbula yaho uvupohi vuvenufwe.














































Paul nkongwaa wa Yiisu Kristi, nu lukolo Timoti hwa filemoni, mmanyani nu gane vetu nu mbomba mbombo baninie nufwe.
nu hu ng'ancha vetu Afia, nu hwa Arkipas usihri njetu, nu hu-pelela u-guhwaganita pavujenge waho.
Uluhungu luve huliyomwe nu inonchehecho ulwihuma hwa Nguruve Daada vetu nu Nswambe Yiisu Kristi.
Emiseke gyone nihosana u Nguruve. Nihohotambula mwu nyesayo njango.
Nepulike ulugano nu luhungu uluulenalyo mu Yiisu na avakilisti vone.
Nihohodova ukuta ulululandamano nu lugano iwenyo five nu hulutelela mbu-jnsi wa inongwa inonu ichili hulyofwe nu Kristi.
U-lwahova nevile nu luhekelo nu luhuvilo ndu gano lwako, hu numbula incha vakilisiti nzivile nchinuna chiwa nuve, lukolo.
Lwa hova, neleno wvujima vwoni mwa krisiti nihuhulagila uve ukuvomba ihevuwesya ukuvomba.
Ulwahova nongwa ya lugano, nihohosimelencha one ne Pau ne gogolo, na leno nelekangwa aji ya Yiisu Krisiti.
Nihohodova hu nwambango Onesmo, yuywa neng'olile pukongwa wango.
U lwahuva pavutengulilo salehwidihana nuve na yone, leno ihwedehana nuve na yone.
Nesuhile umwene uva nu munumbula yango-uhuvuya hulyove.
Nihuvela uhutale ajige pupaninie nune, ili ambombelage apyanile palyove, asehe vu nele pukongwa hu nongwa ija uvangeili.
Ulwahova sanenogilwe ukuvomba hyohyoni hesitatavuliwa nuve ne vombile ulwahuva hesikuli ehenu ehenonu ehesahevombike kwa huhomehumelencha, ulwahuva wanogilwe yove uhuvomba.
Ulwahuva ale patali nuve useke unsupi -yale evo puave nuve amanchova goni.
Alehe uhuva insuhiwa, ave igane hulyione, nu hulotelela kulovye, mwu mbele na kurudeva.
Inave vuhonolela one pu-kristi, umpokehe ndu alaleihomohela une.
ingave ukuvipiche ehenu hyohyoni, apange vuhodaya ehenu hyohyoni, udaye ehyo ukuhuma hulyone.
Unene Paul, nisimba ne kevoko kyango yune: one nelahohomba. Saninchora kulyove uhuta ulenukole mu mitamele kyaho gyioni.
Eena lukolo, indeke nupelele luhekelo lwa Nkundeva uhuhome hulyove: uguhovye untema gwango mwa krisiti.
Nengave nu lwedekopa luginio lwako, ihohosimbela vunelomanyile ulavomab nu kuhutelela hu fila ifyonikudova.
Useke gugugwa utesanie eheyumba hya avagenji hya hufikile une, ulwahuva nihovela uhugendela inyesayo nchaho nihuhugendela unseke usupi.
Epafra, onkongwa njango mwa Yiisu Kristi nihohopania.
Ndu umuivomba Malika, Aristarko, Dema, Luka ava vombambombo nune.
Ulusayo lwa Nswambe U Yiisu Kristi luve paninie ne numbula yako. Amen.
Eimisiekhe eigilutile uNguluve alikhunchova navankukhu veito ukhugendelenya muvanya malago.
Eimi seikhi mingi na seikhi mingi na khunjila inchili papingi. Puleino mufigono ifi ifyutulinafyo, uNguluve anchoviele nufwe muswambe, uvi ambeikhile ukhuva mwenevuhale va finu fyooni, uviyuywa mu mwene apelile ikhilunga.
Umwana va mwene vielumuli lwa vudwadwa wa mwene, ulugeendo lwa yumwene mwene ulwa vutenguleilo wa mwene, nuvieipikhu fyolelencha ifinu fyooni ni limenyu lya makha ga mwene. Vuamalile uluvalancho lwavutula nongwa wa mbivi atamile pasi khukhivokho eikyandyo eikyavuvaha khukyanya ukhwa.
Aviele inonu ukhulutilila avasuhwa, yiehwanine ndielitawa eilyahalile avasuhwa yiehwanine ndielitawa eilyahalile umulivelile linonu ukhuhutila eilitawa lyavo.
Ulwakhuva puvisuhwa mukhi avyagelile ukhunchova, “Uve uliemanango, eilelo nivile dadaayo?” Avuye, “Niva daada khumweene, navope iva mwana khulyune?”
Avuye, usiekhe ugu uNguluve andeetile ung'oliwa utanchi uvakhilunga, aiita, “Avasuhwa vooni va Nguluve pulusutu viesayage khumwene.”
Ukhukongana navasuhwa iita, “Umwene uviaipela avasuhwa va mwene wehuva mepo, navavombi va mwene ukhuva ndimincha mwoto.”
Puleino ukhukongana nu mwana lita, “Eikhigoda kyako eikya lwangula, Nguluve, kyasikhu nchooni ni sikhu chooni. Ulubikhi lwa vunkuludeeva vwakho pu lubikhi lwa yeilweli.
Unogilwe eilweli nukhu kalala uvudenyaji wa ndagielo, puleino uNguluve, Nguluve vakho, akhubakhile imono ncha luhekhelo lekhulutilida avanino.”
Apo pavulengulielo, Vitwa waveikhile ulyulo lwa khilunga. Ikyanya mbombo ncha mavookho gakho.
Yanchiyaganikha, puuve vupivenchage epyo. Nchooni nchi nangikha ndumwenda.
Puyavukhunchifugiyi liehania ndeilikoti nchoope yanchiha mbukha ndumwenda gwakhufwala. Puuve veve yulayula, na gimiakha gyakho sagiladuga.”
Puleino kwa suhwa aleikhu uNguluvi anchoovile useikhe gugyooni, “Tama eikhivokho kyango eikya khundyo impakha nipya nikhuvapela avatavangwa vaakho ukhuva khigoda kya malunde gakho”?
Pu, avasuhwa vooni samepo einchunchisuhi we ukhuvatanga nukhuvalolela vala uvuya khiva vihala uvupokhi?
Puleino lusutu tuviekhe mbulongolo ukhulutilila khugala ugutuga pulikhe, ukhuta putulekhe ukhulengiwa khutale nago
Ulwakhuva yiegave uvujumbwe uvuvaunchoviwe na vasuhwa vwa yielweli, pukhila vunangi nuvugalukhi vukyupilila uluvungu iwene.
Putukavaga ndakhiikhi ukhwipokha uvupokhi uvuvaha noluvu? — uvupokhi vuwa pavutanchi wa nchoviwe Nutwa nukhuvonekha khulyufwe nakhuvala uvuvapulikhe.
U Nguluve voope avuvonisye khufihwani, nifidego, na mumbombo imbaha inchilipapingi, nakhuvuvonole wa mepo umbalanche inchuanchigavile ukhu kongana nuvunogwe wa mwene yuywa.
U Nguluve sakhiviekhe eikhilunga ikhikoncha, eikhyutukhukhinchovelela inongwa ncha kyeene, pasi pa vasuhwa.
Puleino umunu nongi atuvuliele aponu nongi vuita, “Umunu vie veeni, pu ave vakhu kumbukha? Pamo mwana va munu, nekhe undolelee?
Upelile umunu ukhuva ideebe ukhulutilila avasuhwa; ufwulinche uluding'olielo lwa wudwaadwa nu lwimikho. (Nchingahincha: amamenyu aga. “Umbikhile pakyanya pa mbombo nchakho, gasimuli mbusimbe uwukhatale.)
Uviekhile khila khinu pasi pamalunde gakho.” puleino uNguluve aveikhile khila khinu pasi pa munu. Sakhile khile khinu kyukyooni khikyo khisikhuli pasi pa mwene. Puleino ulu lieno satwilola tukhaale khila khinu khingave pasi pamwene.
Paninie niyo, twilola umwene uviapeliwe mukhasekhe pasi ukhulutiliela avasuhwa— uYesu, uvi, savule yavunkuvilwa wamwene nuvufwe wa mwene, afwalei nchiwe uludinglulielo lwa wudwadwanu khwi mikhiwa. Pu leino nduhungu lwa Nguluve uYesu avonji nche uvufwe wa mwene, savuli ya munu uvie avenchaga.
Lwale lunoomu ukhuta uNguluve, ulwakhuva khila khinu pukhile savuli ya mwene nukhugendela mumweene, aanogile ukhwincha na vaana vavingi mbudwaaada nukhuva anogile ukhupela eindongonchi mumbupokhi vwavo vadulufu mumbo nkuvilwa wa mwene.
Ulwakhuva vuvavieli ula uviveikha ulwimikho navala uvuviveikhiwa ulwimikho, vooni vihuma mukhivumbukhu khimo, uNguluve ulwakhuv khu eili ula uvikhuvaveikha ulwimikho khwa Nguluve sifwa isoni ukhuta valukolwe.
Iita, “Yanikhuvavula eilitaw lyakho khuva lukololwango, yanikhwimba ukhuta uve ukhuhuma igati mundulundamano.”
Hange iita, “Yanikhwide ekha mumwene.'” Na khange, “'Lola apa punile na vaana uvu uNguluve amele.”
Pulieno ulwakhuva avaana va Nguluve vooni vikyupilila umbili nu kisa, vuvuwa na yu Yesu aupilile ifinu filafila, ukhuta ukhugendela mbufwe akave ukhufweeyula ula uvyalienuvu vaha wa vufwe, uvi uyu vindugu.
Eiyi yale ewo ukhuta avaveikhe mbulegeefu vala vooni uvu ukhugenela mbudwanchi wavufwe vataamage imilamile gyavo gyooni mutwa.
Mbwayielweli savasuhwa uvuikhuvatanga. Puleino ikhuvalanga avanki vumbukhu khya Abrahamu.
Puleino yale lusutu umweene ave ndavalukololwe vamwene munjila nchooni, Ukhuta pu ave intekhenchi umbaha unyakhisa hange igoloofu khuvaanu va Nguluve, nu khuta ave na makha gakhuhumya ulusyiekhilo lwa mbivi ncha vaanu.
Ulwakhuva uYiesu yuywa nkuvilwe nukhugeliwa alienamakha gakhuvalanga vala avaviseliwa.
Ulwa khuva, valukololwango mwievalanche, mwimuhangile nu lwilango ulwakhukyanya, mnsagielage uYesu, unsukhwa nu Untwa Umbaha uvitukhumwidika.
Alee mwiediheinchi kwa Nguluve uvambikhile, nduvu uvu Mose ale mwiedihienchi munyumba yoni iya Nguluve.
Ulwakuva uYesu avakhiwe ukhuva idwanchiwa imbaha ukhulutela kwa Mose, ulwakuva uvanchengile inyumba viivaliwa ukhuva ualisima ilivaha ukulutila inyumba eiyene.
Ulwakuva khila nyumba yinchengiwa nu munu unoongi, ukhuva uvinchenga khila khinu vei Nguluve.
Lweli u Mose aale mwiedihinchi ndu mbombi munyumba yoni iya Nguluve, ukunkonaana ni mbombo inchu nchilachoviwa unsieke ugukhwincha.
Ulwakhuva uKlisite vee mwana mumbuloleli wa nyumba ya Nguluve. Nayufwe tulinyumba yamwene eingave tukhwibatielila imbeive ukhweka ngancha, nulwimeikho ulwakhwevona.
Ulwakuva, nduvu Mepe mbalanche uvuinchova, “Ilelo, iengave tupulika alimenyu ilyamwene,
Pwulekhage ukhuyivike inumbula yakho ukhuva ng'afu nduvu AvaIsilaheli nduvuvavombile muvugalukhe khukungela, unsiekhe ugwakhugeliwe mundudasi.
Uugu ngwu gwale insiekhe ugwu udada veitu vakhangela nunsiekhe, ugwamiaka arobaini, vakanchivona imbombo nchango.
Pwunavipile nuvukholwa uwa. Nikhanchova, 'Viyaga khila nseikhe munumbu nchavene, na savanchimanyile injila nchango.
Nduvuniekhi ejyeigile mundyoyo lyango: Savakhinglele munduhekhelo lwango.”
Muvinchage miho, valukholo, ulwakuva uyugwiva pwugule unteima unangi ugusagu kwedika khuvalyumo veinyu, inumbula yiyo yiluta khuvutali nu Nguluve uvei mwumi.
Pwu muvunganage khilasiku khilamunu nu nine, ulwakuvu khila khigono munogwage, ukuva uyunge mundyumwe aleke ukuva ninumbu imbivi.
Ulwakuva tuhanga nu Klisite nukwibatana na masage na makha mumwene ukhuhuma kuvutengulilo ukufika kuvumalilo.
Ulwakuva eili lisilile ukhunchoviwa, “Ilelo mungapulike ilimenyu lya mwene, mulekhage ukhunchivika inumbu nchenyu ukhuva ngumu, nduvu Avaislaeli vavombile unsiekhe uguvagalwikhe.
Vuvaveni avo avampulike uNguluve nu kugaluka? Savakale vuvala voni uvu Mose avalongwinche ukhuhuma ku Misili?
Vuvaveni uvu uNguluve avavipile kumyaka alobaini? Ndavuvaninie vala avavombile imbivi, uvuimivieli gyavene gyafwile ndukungu?
Vuvaveni uvuuNguluve aejyeegile ukhuta suvalingiela munduhekelo lwa mwene, nda vuvala uvusamwide umwene?
Twilola ukhuta savawesinche ukwingiela munduhekhelo lwamwene ulwakuva savamweidekhe.
Ulwakuva, tunogiewa ukhuva miho, ukuva mugaati mulyufwe sapilondiwa umunu yumo avyakhiva ivoneka eilemwa ukhufikha kuludeva ulyakukyanya ulwa Nguluve.
Ulwakuva lweli, tupulike eilimenyu ilya lugatalukho ilya Nguluve ilyuvatuvulile ufwe ndava Islaeli uvuvale nalyo, hange ilimenyu ielyo salyavatange vavo vapulikhe uvusavakhongine nulwidiko ulwa.
Ufwe yufwe, tweedike ulweolieko-ufwe fwe tulimugaati tulingila mundugataluko lula, nduvuinchova, “Nduvunaijyiegile munduvipo lwango, Vusavalingiela mundugataluko lwango.” Anchovile ile, ulwakuva imbombo nchoni inchavombiwe ncha silile ukhuhuma kuvutengulilo uwakhilunga.
Ulwakuva unchovile badebe khusiku iyalekhela khumo, “UNguluve agaatalwike ilijuuva eilya lekhela khumo akhanchileka imbombo nchoni.”
Ulwakhuma munchovile, “Vusavalingiela ndugaataluko ulwamwene.”
Ulwakhuva eiwo, ukhuhuma ndugaataluko ulwa Nguluve pwu kuvale avasigiile ukwingiela, ukhuhuma kuvanya Islaeli avingi uvuvapulike eilimenyu ielinonu ilyalugaataluko lyamwene ilyakwingiela savaingeele ulwakhuva savapulikhagaa,
UNguluve hange aviekhile ilijuuva ilienge elyutwita “Ilelo.” Umwene aviekhile ilijuuva ile ukhugeendela khwa Ndaveti, uvianchovile kunsiekhe untali khugala agaanchoviwe kuvutengulilo, '“Ilelo mungapulikage ilimenyu lya mwene, mlekhe ukhunchivieka inumbu nchenyo ukhuva ng'afu.”
Ingave uYoshua avapile ulugataluko, uNguluve pwusakhale inchova kulijuuva ilienge khavili.
Ulwakhuva yiesigile isabato iyalugaataluko khuvanu ava Nguluve.
Ulwakuva uveingile mundugaatalukho ulwa Nguluve vie mwene agaatalwikhe ukhukongana ni mbombo inchamwene, nduvu uNguluve avombile khumwene.
Pwutuvinchage nukhunogwa ukwingiela mundugaataluko lula.
Ulwakuva ilimenyu lya Nguluve lyumi hange lilina makha mundu yitema khunu na khunu. Khange linyanya ukhuluteilila ukhuwesa ukhugaava inumbula inchamepo, ni mono inchili mugaati mufilungielo fya mwene.
Iliwesya ukhuvomba amasaage ga wiegaane wa numbula ya mwene. Khisikuli ikhivumbikhe ikyefihili khumiho gaa Nguluve. Ulwakhuva khila khinu khilipavuvalafu khivonekha khumiho khumunu uvalala ivonesya imbaleelo.
Pavulongolo tulava nu untekhenchi umbaha uvingile khukyanya, uYesu umwana va Nguluve, khumakha twibatelile ulweidiko lwetu.
Ulwakuva asikuli untekhenchi umbaha uvisiwesya ukwitwika iekhisa nu uvudekhedekhe weitu, ulwakhuva umwene vyalikhugeilwa khunjila nchoni nduufwe, apange umwene uvyalivuvule imbivi.
Pwu twinchage namakha pakhinyalwangula ikyantwa ikyaluhungu, pwutwupilile ikhisa nukwupilila uluhungu ulwakhututanga unsiekhe wuu tulemilwe.
Ulakuva untekechi umbavaha uvyahalilwe ukhuhuma na mbanu, uhalilwe ukwima kuvanu mufinu ifya Nguluve ukuta ahumie enekelo ya mbivi.
Ivwesya ukuvatolela mu mbwololo nu vupelwa nu lukani ulakova vope mwene achunguliwe nu vulemwa.
Ku njila eye, anogile ukuhumia enekelo ku mbivi cha mnene ndu umu avombile ku mbivi cha vanu.
Asikuli umunu uvigega ilisima ele kusavuli ya mwene, umwene impaka ilangiwe nu Nguluve, nduvu zle u Aron.
Ata uKlisite sa iyepe ilisima yuvwya mwene ukuva intekhechi imbaha. Ulakuva uNguluve achovile nu mwene, “Uve ve mwana vango, ilelo nivile Dadayo.”
Ndu uvu achovile puvunge, “Uve veve intekhechi koke whani kya Melkizedeki.”
Munseki ugwa mwene ugwa mbili, adovile nu kudovela, andovile uNguluve na kulwihochi, ku mwene uvi ivnesye ukumpoka ukuhuma kuvufwe. Kuvudekedeke vwa mwene kwa Nguluve, apulikike.
Upu ingave ale mwana, amanyile uwedihichi kumbombo ichontesiche.
Agingachiove na ku njila iye avombike ku kila munu uvi ikumwediko ukuva vupoki vwa siku choni,
Pa kwimikiwa nu Nguluve pakuva untekhechi umbaha ukulutile unseke gwa Melkizedeki.
Tulinagwo mingi agakuchova kunongwa ya Yesu, pu pakafu ukuvavola ukova umwe mule volo ukupulika.
Puingave ku kaseki aka mukanogile ukuva va vamanyisi, mukale ukuta umunu ale avamanyisye ulumanyisyo ulutachi ulwa ndagilo cha limenyu lya Nguluve. Munogile ulukama sio ikwakulya ikikafu.
Pu ulakova uvi inywa ulu kama lwenu, inchila welewa mu mbofu mbwe uasa yelweli ulakuva mukale mulivaana.
Kuluvafu ulunge, ikyakulya ikikafu kwa vanu avakulu, vala uvu vivwesya lekulehania uvuyelweli nu vuvivi vamanyisiwe ukuvumanya uvunonu nu vuvivi.
Pu tunakile ukyutumanyile tasi mbufumbwe wa Kilisite, tunogile ukuva nulugimbo ukuluta mbudulufu, tuleke kange ukuvika ulwatu lwa kupelela mu mbombo ichi chi chila womi nu lwidiko mwa Nguluve,
nu lwetu lwa lumanyisyo lwa lwocho, nu kuvavekela amavoko, uvuchoka vwa vafwe, nu vuhigi vwa siku choni.
Pu twagahile ndavule upwu uNguluve atuhovokile.
Ulakova sayi kwidihana kuvala ava vale ndumuli lutachi, uvu vavonjiche ikikungilwa kya kukyanya, nu kuva va lulu ndamano lwa mepo mbalache,
Nu ava vonjiche uvunonu vwa limenyo lya Nguluve na kumaka aga kunseki ugwichi,
Pu vakagwa - sayikwidihana kange ukwidi hana ukuvakilivola kange ukhoma mu toba. Ulakona vikukilivu la kavile umwana va Nguluve mbukuvilwa munumbula cha vene, pu vikumbika ukuta vakubendiwa pavuvalafu.
Ula kuva ung'anga ugwupilile ifula eyiyitima kila senki, yimecha ufinu ifyu avanu avavombile pakyalo, vikwapilile ulusayo lwa Nguluve.
Upu ingave gihupa imitoni ulungupa, ni kidilu, yichila kinu na yesiga lile padebe ukukotoliwa. Kuvumalilo vya pene kukuyezya.
Upu ingava twitande, vagane tukuvidikala kumambo amanunu aga ku lyumwe na aga mbupoku.
Ulakova u Nguluve sa mbivi ukuta itamwa imbombo chenu nu lugano ulumuvonisye munditanuva lya mwene, mu ile mwavavombile mukhuva vombele.
Twinogwa ficho ukuta kila munu avonesye ulugimbo lulalula ukusika kumwisyo kya wayelweli wa vukifu.
Satwinogwa muve volo, pu muve wakongi va vala avihala indaganiye ku njila ya hwidiko nu vwe yumilichi.
Pu uNguluve avile apile u Abrahamu indagavie ampile ku kuvwami wa mwene, ulakuna ale avicho sa idiegile kuyuafe umunu yoyoni uvi umbaha kuliko voni.
Atile, “'Lweli nikukusaya, kange, nikukukweongeleja ikipapo kwako.”
Ku njili iye u Abrahamu au upilile ukyu kyale ndagani vu agulile nu kwiyumilicha.
Ulakova avanu vikidiega kumbaha kulutilila kuvoni na kunuvisyo ku mbombo chomi ku kwidiega kuvugayilweli.
Wakati uNguluve alipoamua kuonesha kwa uwazi zaidi kwa warithi wa ahadi kusudi lake zuri lisilobadilika, alilithibitisha kwa kiapo.
Pu uNguluve avile alamwile lekuvika pavuvalafu ficho kuvahale va ndaganie kuvufumbwe vwa mwene uvusavukwanduka, mu umva uNguluve siwesya ukuchova uvudesi, ufwe yufwe tunyilile kupupoki nu kuginga ehwa inumbula mu maka ga lusuvilo niliviki vivwe mbulongo ndiumwe.
Tulinavwo uvakifu ukuta liwe ilikangafu nu kuhuvile inumbula cheto, uvukifu uvu vukwiufila ingati kusana kumwenda.
UYesu aingile aponu apo ukhuva indongochi vetu, wu avombike ukuva intekhechi imbaha nukuchila kusila lusuku ukuhuma kwa Melkizedeki.
Yekhale nde uMelkizezedeki, utawa va Salemu, undogoji vangolove uyavile khokyanya uyavile agine nu Abrahamu ahuwiyile ukhoma khuhubuda avatawa akhasaya.
UAbrahamu akhapile popani ninye khela ya kumi yakhela khenu ekhavile akhetekile. Elitawa lya “Melkizedeki” utavala wa woyelyeli, nutawala va Selemu” ulyahuva utavala va vavogolofu.”
Alivovole ubaba, alevovole umama, alevovole avazazi, alevovole uvotengolelo wasihu wala umwisyo ywasihu nchamwene. Badala ya apoisigala imbaha vasihu nchoni, kama mwana va Ngolove.
Ufihelelelage ukhuta umunu uyuakha vile imbaha itawala. Uzazi veto Uiburahimu akhapile vyoni ivya kumi ifinu ifinonu iufyahatolile khuvita.
Nuwohakika ekhekelo khavalawi khehapohile eofisi ya tavala vahalenayo ni amri uhuhuma hululagelo, ukhulundamanya ekumi uhuhuma huvanu, vavo vihuma uhumana na vaisilaeli avaninye nulundamano ululuhumana na vene ikhekolo khya Abrahamu.
Ulyahova uMelkizedeki, yuyua, ahale vovole ekhekolo kha valawi, akhapokhile yenio ya kumi ukhuhumana nu Abrahamu, akhasaya, uyahavile neuhadi.
Apo sayebeliwe uhuta umunu udebe isayiwa nombaha.
Khulijambo ele umunu uyipo hela yemo eyakumi ifya elinchova leemo, ulyahova hulijambo elenge yomo uyapohile yehavoliwe ndoyo itama.
Ne namna ya khochova, Ulawi uyapohile yemo ya kumi, nuyu ahahombile yemo ya kumi khwa Abrahamu,
Ulyakhuva uLawi akhavite mvi na ifya dadaye vamwene Uibrahimu useheugowagine nuMelkizedeki nu Abrahamu.
Inave uvokamelefu uvahawesehine uhugendela uvutawala wa Lawi, (Poapo avanu vipohela ululagelo), khuhale nulihitaji lihi hutawala uyunge ukhwinoha ufyano gwa Melkizedeki, sio ukhwelangiwa nopangelelo ugwa Haruni?
Ulyahuva uvutawala yavubadeleha, polunugiwa ululagelo lyope lubabadeleha.
Kyuyunu humambo aga akhacho viwe ukhuhusu elikabila elenge, uhukhuma khwemwene hakuna aliye hudumela ekhetehelo.
Isalinchi sahihi uhuta umbaha Veto ahumilee khu Yuda, ilikabila lyelyo uMose sahataje uhusu avatechenchi.
Aga agaginchoviwa khuvuvalafu hata angave itehenchi uyunge ikhomela khofyana gwa Melkizedeki.
Utekhenchi uywa sio aliyomo yoyusa avile itawala khukyonya husingi gwa lulagelo inchihuseha nuvohyolya wa munu, khusingi gwangofu iyamaisha gagosagawesye uhunangeha.
Nuvusimbe vusuhudela ukhohusu umwene, “Uveve teheji sihu nchoni khufumo gwa Melkizedeki.”
Ulyuhova ululagelo ulukhalongwile lukavehiwe pulokanji khuhava salulenkofaa.
Ewo ululagelo salulenkovomba khokhoni akhekamelihe. Ulyohova, pahalepo uwokafu uwononu khuago tuhasogelela uNguluve.
Nuvokafu uvo uvononu savo hahumile bila khonchova ekheapo, khuele avateheji avange savahatole ekheapo khokhyoni.
Ulwahova uNguluve akhato lile ekheapo usekhe ugwa nchovile ukhuhusu uYesu, “Ungolove apile sibadelesya amasage gamwene.' uve vetenchi isihu nchoni.”
Ulyahova unguleve ainchile khusamani ya ululagonu ulunonu.
Uwoye lyeli, ukhufya hubela avatehenchi ukhuvomba isikhu nchoni. Ulyakhova vahalepo avatekhenchi avange, uyumu baada ya vayonge.
Ulyahuva uNguluve itama sihu nchoni uvutekhenchi wamwene savubadeleha.
Umwomwene lwesya nu vogolofu ukhukamelesya uvohela avanhusogelela uNguluve ukhugenda khumwene, ulyakhova itama nuhudova khuvene.
Potehenchi umbaha nduyu inagiwa khulyofe, uyalevovole imbivi, alevowole inongwa, isafi, uyahatengiwe, ukhuma khumbivi, unchile khukyanya khuliko khukinya.
Umwene ahale bila sida, ekhehwani avatekhechi avavaha, ukhuhumya esadakha khela sihu, khumbivi nchasambi nchamwene yuywa, napongela khumbivi ncha vanu, akhavombile evo husihu yemo khuvoni, ulyakhehuminche yuywa.
Khululagelo luhovachagola avanu avasaviwesya uvotehenchi uvovaha, ulyahova elimenyu lyaheapa, lehinehile badala ya lulagelo, akhachagwile umwana, uyahavombikhe ukhuva imwaminifu isihu nchoni.
Lino ilitwincha lyu ili tulinave untekhenchi umbaha uvya tamile pasi mkhivoko ikyando mkhigoda ikyavutwa khukhanya.
Umwene vi mbombi pavuva lanche, elihema lya lweli ilyu ili untwa alivikhile, sa khila munu vakhufa.
Ulwakhuva khila ukhuhani umbaho ivikhiwa nu khokhela ni sadako, pwu lunonu ukhuva ni khinu kya kuhumya.
Lino uKlisite ale pakyanya pakilunga, umwene sangale iva kuhani ulwa kuwa vakhidikhile vala avakhahuminche ifirhungilwa ukhukongana ni ndagilo.
Valikhumba ikhinu ikyukyale masigalilo ne khipepe n'chela kya finu fya kukhanya, ahwanine nu Mose upwu avongiwe nu Nguluve upwu anogwa gwa ukhunjenga elihema. “Lola,” UNguluve akhata, “Vomba khila khinu ukhukongana nu mfivelile umwo akhu vonisye pakhyanya pakyamba”.
Pwu lino uKlisite upelile imbombo inonu fincho ulwa khuva navope insayani va lwidihano elinonu, ilyu lelinywile ndwidihano ulunonu.
Pwu lino ingave ulwidihano ulwa kuvutengulilo pwu ulwidihano ulwa kwanja lungale lule ukhuyaga, apo satwa twive ni mbombo ya kulande ulwidihano ulwa vili.
Ulwa khuva uNguluve avile alumanyile ukhuyaga kwa vanu akhata, “Lola, imisikhi igikwincho, 'inchova uNguluve, 'Ita unsikhi ipya nevombile ulwidiheno uluoya paninie ni nyumba ya Isilaeli, ni nyumba ya Yuda.
Salukhale ndu lwidihano ulunivombile paninie nu dada vinyo ikhigono ikyu navatolile kyu mavokho ukhuvalongoncha ukhuhuma khukhilunga ya kuMisri. Ulwakhuva savaliku gendelela mundwidihano lwango, nayune sanilikusagila,' inchova untwa.
Ulwa khuva ulu lwulidihano nivomba kyu nyumba ya Israeli khu figono fya kuvulongolo,' inchova untwa. 'nivekha indagilo nchango mmasage gavene khange nikwandika munumbula ncha vene. Niva Nguluve va vene navope viva vanu vango.
Savakha manyisana umunu nu jirani na khila munu nu lukololwe uvi ita mmanye, “Unkulu deva,” Pwu voni vikumanya une, ukhuhuma udebe mpakha umbaha vavo.
Pyuni kuvavonesya ikhisa kya mbombo ncha vene nchincho sancheyelweli, sanila kumbukha inongwa ncha vene.”
Pwu ukhuta “Kipya,” atengenisye ulwidihano ulwa kwanja ukuva lukulu kulu. Na ilyo ikhulitangasya ukuva likuhuhe khulu lugulila ukhuhega.
Leno ulwedikhano ulwa vwutanchi lyale na pono pa khusayela pahelunga nu lwiho lwa nyesayo.
Mu ndyeve mwale neheyumba ekyahunji, patambuliwagwa pavalanche. Apa pupale ne khevelelo khya nyale, mesa ne mikate egya hwelolela.
Hunsana hu mwenda u gwa vele ne ekheyumba ekhenge, patambuliwagwa pavwuvalanche fiicho mwale ne ekhetehelelo ekhyakutehelela.
Mwale ne livohosi lya ndagano elyajengiwe nu talama lwene. Mgati mwale ne beseni lya lutalama elenya manna, ulusaga lwa Haruni ulumelile elinyasi, ni mbavo nzila incha mawe aga lwedehano.
Pakyanya pa livohosi lya lwedehano pale ni fihwani vya wasung'wa avavalanche avagubehile amapapatelo gavene huvulongolo huhegoda kya husayanila, hekhyo twilemwa ukhupanga vononu.
Vwo vamalile ukhutesania ifinu ifi, avatekhenchi valekhwingela ekheyumba ekya khonji ekhyalieve mu hutekhela.
Untekhenchi umbakha alekhwingile mu kheyumba ekhya vele mwene khamo mwakha, salekhumihincha enekhelo ya mwene, kho mbivi incha vanu nchincho vavambile khetasaga.
Umepo umbalanche inchova ukhuta, enjela eya pavuvalanche sayede nduliwe ulwa khova elyeve elya khutengulila lenchige lyemile.
Ekhe khehwani khya sekhe ugwa leno. Fyoni ifivonole ne sadakha ifihomenchiwe leno safiwesya ukhumala amasage ga unyakhutehela.
Ifyakhulya nu uvwubaga fyene vafilonganche ne nekhelo eya khwesukha. Fyoni ifi fyale nu uvulongonchi uwa mbili fifyo vafitesanche pwu ululagelo ulupya uluyaheva luvekhiwa aponu palwene.
UKlisite ainchile ndu ntekhenchi umbaha uva imbombo inonu nchincho inhonchile. Uhugendela uvwuvaha nu kwilanila ne lyeve lelyo salyajengiwe na mavokho ga vanu, vavo sava khelunga ekhe ekhepeliwe.
Yale siyo khunkhisa gwa mene ne ngwada, yale khunkisa gwa mwene uhuta u Klisite aingelaga pavuvalanche khamu nu lotelela khela yumo yumo nu ukhutupelela uwvupokhi wetu uwa majuva goni.
Enave khu nkhisa gwa mene na amapongo nu ukhulagakhencha elyela elya ngwada khu avo avavalanche avakhaliwe khwa Nguluve nukhugevekha emivile gyavene geveminonu,
Uvwu loteleli wa nkhisa gwa Klisite ukhugendela umepo va sikhu nchoni aekhominche yuywa khesita nkole khwa Nguluve, ukhusukhiwa imbivi nchetu ukhuma imbombo imbivi ukhumbombela u Nguluve umwumi?
Ulwa khuva, Klisite insukhiwa va ndagano imya. Ukhumana nele uvufwe vuvalekhile nu vudekhedekhe woni vava va ndagano incha vutanchi, ukhuma mu nongwa nchavene, pwu vwoni avelangiwe nu Nguluve vambelele uvukhale wa vene uwa siku nchoni.
Inave khuile endagano inchitama, levonekhe mu mbufwe uwa munu ola uvealevombile.
Ulwa khuva endagano yiiva na makha upwuvuhumila uvufwe, gasikholi amakha unsekhe unyakhole vomba wipitama.
Vwulevule endagano eya khatale yavekhiwe khenchila nkhisa.
U Mose avile akhominche ululagelo khu vanu voni, atolile ukhisa gwa senga nu gwa mene, paninie na magasi, umwenda undukhu, ne sabuni, nu ukhuminchulila elivangeli na avanu voni.
Pwu akhanchova, “Ugu gwu nkhisa gwa ndagano gugwa avapile u Nguluve ululagilo.”
Vwulevule, akhaminchulila ukhisa pakhianya pa lieve ni ifivombelo ifyavombile khu nekhelo.
Ukhukongana nu lulagilo, khela khenu khisukhiwa nu nkhisa. Khetaduda ukhisa lusikhuli ulusyekhelo.
Pwu yelekhuva ifivchwani vya yinu ifya khukyanya yelekhuva fisukhiwe ne nekhelo eya fidemo. Pwu, ifinu ifya khu kyanya filikhusukhiwa nu nkhisa unonu.
Ulwa khuva Klisite sakhingele pavuvalanche apanchengiwe na mavokho, yeyo khehwani khya khenu. Pwu akhingela khukyanya yoywa, upwalepo leno alepamikho ga Nguluve khu nongwa ncheto.
Saingele ukhu ukhwekhomja enekhelo emisekhe gyoni, ndu umwivombela untekhenchi umbakha, uveaikhwingela pa vuvalanche khela mwakha paninie nu nkhisa gwa yonge,
enave yale ya lweli, pwu ya yiva agatanchiwage khu khingi ukhuma khu vutengulilo wa khelunga. Unsekhe ugu yivombikha khamo na khuvumalelo uwa miakha egyaevonisye nu ukhuhencha uvutulanongwa khu nekhelo ya mwene.
Enave khila munu ukhufwa mara khamo, vwukonga uvukhegi,
ulwa khuva u Klisite aekhominehe mara khamo ukhusukha umbivi incha vingi, aivonekha ulwavele, ukhusita nchivombela imbivi, ulwakhuva khuvupokhi khuvavo vakhulelaga khuluhuvile.
Vule vule ululagilo, mwenchenchi gwa imbombo inonu inchikwincha, sionchonchene. Ululagilo lunave salukwidekhana navowo valipipi nu Nguluve kunjila ya Neghelo nchinchila enchuvahumigya avatekhenche imiaka khoni.
Ndalino savilekhile ukhutekela? Ekhegelelo ekheyo khya vanya lwusayo, vagave vasukhiwe khamo, vavilemwa ukhunchi manya imbivi.
Pwu munekhelo incho ekhwani ekya mbivi incha vambighe imiaka gyioni.
Ulwakuva yitakhana khukhisa gwa magida na mapongo ukhunche imbivi.
U Klisite avile inchile pakhilunga anchovile akhata samwanogwe enekhelo, Pwu mwanonchinche umbili.
Samweli khenu munekhelo iyakhu nyanya khumbivi.
Apa nanchovile, “Lola, nivomba ulugano lwakho, Nguluve, nduvuwuyesimblwe, mundivangili.”
Anchovile ndavuwa yenchoviwe pakhya apo: “Samwanogwe enekhelo efya kunyanya khumbivi, samwahovokhe mnumbula ncheyo” Enekhelo enchovite khela ukhokongana nidogilo.
Anchovile, “Lola, pwanile apa ukhuvomba ulugano lwakho”. Avikhile kulu khanchi inyikho incha khatali iliukhunchikhagancha nchila incha vili.
Munyikho incha vili, tutegiwe nu Nguluve nulugano lwa mwene ukhugendela ukhumya khumbili gwa Yesu Klisite khamo khumisiki gyioni.
Lweli khela ntekhenchi inkhwima kutekela insiku nchoni, ikhumya enekhelo yilayila, nchavencha yayilemwa ukhunchikhencha imbivi.
Ulwakhuva uKlisite atekhele khamo khumbivi amanchova goni atamile khukivoko inkyadyo.
Apulikhila avalugu va mwene vakhiwa pasi nu khuva khigoda kya kuvikhila amalunde ga mwene.
Ulukhuva khunjila ya nekhelo nyimo avakaginche isikhu nchoni eivategiwe nu Nguluve.
Nu mepo umepo umbalanche inchova khulifwe. Ulwakuva pavutengulelo anchovile,
“Ulwu lwu lwidihano uluyakheva nivomba paninie na vene vwukhalutile amanchova; inchova u Nguluve: Nivekha ululagilo mgati mu numbula nchavo, nanisimba mu nyala nchavo.”
Pwu akhachova, “Savalanchikhumbukha imbivi ni mbombo nchavo inchifwile”.
Leno bhaho pulule ulusyekhelo khu ava, yesikhuli enekhelo yeyone khu mbivi.
Ulwa khuva, valokolo, tulenuvunchimu ukhwingela pavuvalanche khu nkhisa gwa Yesu.
Eyo njela eyeayedendwile khu mbivi nchetu khu mbile gwa mwene, emia ne nyumi eyigendela mu mwenda.
Ulwakhuva tulenave untekhenchi umbakha mu nyumba ya Nguluve,
Pwu tukhegelelage ne numbula ya welweli khuvumalilo wa lwidikho tuvinchage ne numbula inchilagahe nchiwe inonu ukhuhuma khu vovivi wa masage nu lwa khuva emivele gyetu gesukhiwe na magasi amanonu.
Pwu tubatelele khu makha ulokhuto lwa vonehimu wa lwedekho lwetu, khetasyetukha, ulwa khuva u Nguluve anchovile va yelweli.
Pwu tusagage ukhonkhangancha khela munu ukhunogwa ukhuvomba inonu.
Tusite ukhwelekhelwa ukhulundamana paninie, nduvuvyavigakha avange tutunganage mu numbula, nduvu mwilola isikhu nchihegelile.
Tungave tuvomba amatingo nu ukhupivomba imbivi vwutwembile isyole ya vuyelweli, Enekhelo eyenge eya mbivi sayisigala khange.
Pwu, mbalongolo tupolekhela uvukhegi uwa khudwancha, nu ululimbo lwa mwoto lulanyanya avatula nongwa khwa Nguluve.
Uve avenchaga uveabelile ululagilo lwa Mose ifwa bila khesa mbolongolo mwa watangili vavele ama vadatu.
Ekhegelelo khikhi ekhelutilile ekya livungu vusaga ikhinogelanile khwa umoumo uveabedile umwana va Nguluve, uveavenchaga uveagokhinile unkisa gwa lwedehano ndekhenu ekhesakhevalanche, unkhisa gugwa agwemikhe khwa Nguluve - uveavenchaga uveadukhile umepo va luhungu?
Ulwa khuva tulumanyile yumo uveanchovile, “Uvukhegivwango, nikhomba.” “Unguluve alavakhega avanu vya mwene”.
Khenu kya khudwancha umunu ukhugwila mu mavoko ga Nguluve umuomi!
Khambokha isikhu inchilotile vulwinchile ulumuli, mwagakhile ndeti ukhusipa uluvavo uluvakha.
Mwavekhiwe pavuvalafu nu hubediwa nuhudukhiwa nu hugatanchiwa, mwale paninie na vavo vagendile uvugatale nduvwa.
Ulwa khuva mwale ne numbula ya khesa khuvala avakhongiwe, pwu mwapokhile ulukhekhelo uvukhuvilwa wa vwukhale wenyo, mu khalumanya ukhuta yumwe mwale nu uvukhale uvunonu uwa sikhu nchoni.
Msite ukhuvulekha uvunchimu wenyo, uvunyawokhela vuvakha.
Ulwa khuwa yinogiwa ukhweyu melencha, pwu mwambelele ekhe u Nguluve avavekhile, vomvombile imbombo ncha mwene.
Akhavalilo akhasupi pwu yumo ikhwincha lweli sakhalindidele.
Ugolofu itamaga nulwidikho. Akhave owuya khusana sangakhovokhele.”
Ufwe satulindavene avikhilivukha khusana, ukhuyaga. Ufwe tulivadebe twivanyalwidekho ukhunchilo lela inumbula ncheto.
Leno ulwedekho ulwalweli ulwa munu usekhe uguvugu lena ekhenu jasiri. Pu ulwedekho ulwa khenu ekhelebado sakhevonikhe.
Khululagelo ulu avakukhu veto vakhagulile khulwedekho lwavo.
Khulwedekho tulumanyile ukhuta nkherunga khwava Nguluve, inave sakhekhajengiwe ukhukhumana ni finu fifyo filihova fivonekha.
Yale ukhuva inave ulwedekho hoita uHabili akhang'umekhije uNguluve enekhelo enonu khulikho eyakhakhu minche u Kaini. Yale ulwakhuva khundagelo inchii ayiniwe ulwa khuva ale munu wa lwedekho. Nguluve amwedekhe ulwakhuva ya vinu ifwakhakhuminche. Inave evo, Habili bado inchoova, mave afwile.
Yale ukhuta khulwedekho ulwa Enoko atoliwe khukwanya sakhavovone uvufwe. “Sakhavonekhe, ulwakhuva yanchoovivwe pa kwanya pa mwene ukhuta akha nogelanile khwa Nguluve kabla ya khutoliwa khukwyanya.
Apalejila lwedekho sapivombekha ukhuginia uNguluve, ulwakhuva uyie khwinchaa khwa Nguluve yinogiwa edekhe ukhuta uNguluve itama nukhuvapa nukhuvakhelekhila ulupatano ulwavala avavikhundonda.
Yale ukhuva lwedekho khwa Nuhu, inave avungiwe nu Nguluve ukhugendela mumbombo nchiinchoo sajikhale nchakhuvonekhaa, mave elisima elwa Nguluve ancheengile e ngalava khu mbombo ya khuvokhola avamunyumba ya mwene. Khwa khuvomba eva, akhekhegile ekhelunga akhavile nuvukhale uvwayelweli uvuvukhwincha ukhugandela mundwedekho.
Yale ukhuta lwedekho lwa Ibrahimu, avile elangiwe akhedikha nukhuluta esehemu eyiyinogwa ukhupokhela uvuhale. Aha uhegile bila khulumanya ndakhu uhwiluta.
Yale ukhuta ulwedekho atamile nkelunga nurupulekhelo kama igeni. Atamile munyumba pupanie nu Isaka nu Yakobo, avahare avange nu lulagelo lulalula.
Ulwakhuva aletayali ukhupewa esekhemu eyiyelaguliwe nu mbombi va yene aiva ve Nguluve.
Ulwakhuva lwale lwedekho lwa Ibrahimu, nu Sara mwene, vapokhile amakha agakhuvekha ulwanda ulwakhuva vale vagogoro sana, ulwakhuva vambwene uNguluve u khuta imwedesi, uyavavulile ukhuta ikhuvapa umwana udemi.
Ulwakhuva ukhukhuma khwa munu yumo uyarekaribu nu khufwa vakhoriwe avana avasavivalekha. Vale vingi wita nondwe incha khukwanya na vingi wita mbeyu incha manga mulukhanchi ndugasi uluvakha.
Avavoni vafwile khupokhela ulwedekho ulwa lutanchi. Inave evo, vangave vanchiwene nukhunchisogelenchaa khuvutali, vanchoovile ukhuta vale vageni na vagenda njila pakwanya pakherunga.
Khuvala avavinchoova embombo inchii vikhevekhela ukhuta valalondaga ekherunga khwavene.
Ulwakhuva, inave vakhale vikumbukha ekherunga ekhevakha humile, vaviva nusekhe ugwa huvuya.
Ulwakhuva vuyilevo, vinogwaekhe runga ekhenonu, inave khya khukyanya. ulwakhu uNguluve sivona soni ukhwelangiwa Nguluve vavene, ulwakhuva andalile umji khwa ajili yatoo.

Uve pakhwanya pamwene pa nchoovivwe, “Ukhukhuma khwa Isaka uvukhohoa wakho vuva.”
Ibrahimu alumanyile ukhuta uNguluve ale nuvuweso uwakhundonda u Isaka ukhukhuma khuvufwe, nu khunchoova khunchoovelo eya maumbo, ampokhile.
Ulwa khuva lwale lwedekho ukhuta Isaka amwopelile u Yakobo nu Esau ulwakhuva ya mbombo nchooni mchinchikhwi nchaa.
Lwale lwedekho ukhuta uYakobo walepakhuva pa khegono ekhwakhufwa, avapile khela mwana va Yusufu. Yakobo akhabudu, akhegime pakwanya parubekhi lwango.
Yale ukhuva lwedekho lwa Yusufu unsekhe ugwamene vugufikhe ugwa mwisyo, anchoovile uhukhuma khwa vana ava mwene khu Israeli Misri avavulile ukhutola amachege agavene pupaninie.
Lwale lwedekho ukhuta uMusa, vwa holiwe, anikhiwe na valongonchi va mwana edebe uyale inonu, savakhadwade ululagero ulwatwa.

Yale ukhuva lwedekhe ukhuta umusu akhumile khu Misri. Sahadwade uvukalale vwatwa, alwakhuva aiyu melinche ukhulola ukhusakhuvonekha.
Yale ukhuva lwedekhe ukhuta aibite ekhwakha nu khududelela unkisa, khukhuta unangi uva nglorwa va khwa nchaa alemwe ukhuvibata avakholwa va hwancha ava demiva khu waisrael.
Yale ukhuva lwedekhe ukhuta vage ndile munyanja eya shamu ndolwakherunga ekhekafu. Usekhe ugwa wamisri uluvakhagelile ukhugenda, valeviwe.
Yale ukhuva khulwedekho ulwa ruvego ulwa Yeriko lukha gwile pasi, puvakha rwugile isikhu saba.
Yale ukhuva khulwedekho ulwa Rahabu ukahaba ula sakhagwe paninie na vala avasavale vagorofu, ulwakhuva avapokhile avavonchii nu khuva vekha pavunonu.
